1.content:
The Smash tournament grounds were bustling with activity. It was only a few few months until the tournament would start, and everyone was doing their best to make sure everyone and everything was ready. Master Hand was currently going through the mail to see if any of the other fighters had replied to say they were on their way. In amongst the letters though, was a strange parcel. Opening it up, he found a strange device inside, and a manual explaining how to use it. After a quick look for the manual, he certainly new this wasn't a new item he wanted to use for the tournament, it was far too uncontrollable and dangerous... much like the person he gave it to.

"Crazy! Can you come here for a second?" he called out.

Quick as a flash, the hand's brother burst through the door. "Yeah bro?"

"I need you to take this to the incinerator," He said, handing the package to Crazy. "It's far too dangerous to let it stay around here."

"You got it!" Just as quick as he entered, Crazy left in the direction of the incinerator. Of course, Crazy was more than a bit scatterbrained, and on his way, he thought of something else to do and sped off in another direction, dropping the package as he went. And so that package sat in the hallway of the living quarters of the tournaments grounds, until someone happened to find it and take the contents of the package for themselves.

And that person is you. But who are you?
1.title: One Misplaced Package, Endless Opportunities

11.content:
You are Mario, the plumber who never really does any plumbing. The hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. You had been heading to the dinning hall to have some of your favorite pasta when you stumbled across the package in the hallway. Curious to see what is in the package you decided to take a look in it.

Making sure that no one is around, you open the book and find a strange remote inside with some type of manual. You look at the remote and see a bunch of strange buttons on it. You are not sure what they all do so you decided to open the manual and read up on it. According to the manual, the remote has the ability to change the user with an other person depending on the button. You decided to go back to your room and do some more investigation on the remote. Lucky for your Luigi (your brother) was not in the room.

After doing some reading, you wanted to try and test this new device on someone. You are not sure who exactly you would want to try this on and even what button do you want to press. There are so many options for this. You decided to just like luck make the selection of the person. You made up your mind that the first person you see outside of the room would be the person you swapped with.

Opening the door, you hear someone coming down the hallway. Trying not to be too suspicious, you turn down the hallway and see...
11.title: Mario

choices: Tell her about the remote first
111.content:
Its the Princess! The two of you were very close, both coming from the Mushroom kingdom. Do you maybe want to get her involved? You don't know if the remote works at all, so it might just be better to try it out right now without asking. However, if it does end up working, you'd prefer for her to know if you were going to try and swap something with her.

As you point the remote to her, you decide to...
111.title: Princess Peach

1111.content: Deciding to test the remote before telling Peach about it you look at the remote and see what buttons there are. After thoroughly looking at them and reading the manual you decided which swap would be the right one for a first test.
1111.title: Click a button

11111.content:
Mario decided to use the scientific way of solving which button to push
Mario:eenie meenie miney mo
What button does he push
11111.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Clothes Swap

111111.content: Mario suddenly felt different, though Peach kept on walking. Soon Peach went around a corner and was out of Mario's sight. But as Mario looked down he found that he had the body of...
111111.title: It's a me... Peach

1111111.content: What smashers body did Mario now possess
1111111.title: Messed up!!!

11111112.content: What female smashers body, besides peach, does Mario have?
11111112.title: Female

11112.content: Which swap does he use?
11112.title: Life Swap/Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

113.content: Is she wearing her power suit, or is she only wearing her zero suit?
113.title: Samus

1131.content: You run into Samus in her power suit. Her attention snaps towards you. "Oh, hey Mario. What's up?" You smile at your friend. What'll you do?
1131.title: Power suit

11311.content: You aim the small remote at Samus much to her surprise and press one of the many multi-colored buttons. The change was almost instant as you and Samus swapped...
11311.title: Use the remote

choices: Go back to Samus' room and rest, she won't mind if you be her for a while longer
Swap back with her, this was all just a convenient experiment anyway
113111.content:
You were almost instantly aware of your new HUD as you looked out of it to stare at your previous body who was now occupied by Samus-Aran and who now looked slightly confused but still looked towards you and says, "uhh sorry Samus, I'm not very sure why I'm here but I hope I see you later!" and jumps away leaving you alone in the hallway with Samus' body and power suit. "Well that didn't go to plan, I didn't want to steal her...well EVERYTHING! From what she just said to me and how she acted it seems like I have her life now plus her body AND clothes" you mumble as you walk towards the training area, presumably where Samus was going before you stopped her. You reach one of the large tournament stadiums where most of the actual games took place and find many fighters already training with each other there specifically Link and Ganondorf who were locked in a heated battle. You decided to let them duke it out on the bottom of the stage while you get more familiar with your new weapons and abilities closer to the top of the large stage.

You quickly got acquainted with her "recoveries" as most fighters call it while somersaulting upon the platforms to get to the top, your jumps weren't as high as before and jumping really wore you out while wearing the power suit so your recovery was a better option. Once at the top, you decided to work on your new arm cannon on a few training bags, keeping a mindful eye on the two clashing forces below you, you shot the bag a few times with a couple missiles but then discovered how much more damage it did when charged it for only three seconds, unleashing a powerful ball of energy towards the poor bag knocking it back a few meters after the initial collision. "Wow! That was awesome!" you say aloud as you look upon the damage that singular shot did, "what other abilities does Samus have to offer I wonder?" You use more arm Cannon attacks upon the bag and even getting up close and doing some melee damage upon it, grabbing it with a grapple beam and knocking it to the ground before unleashing a volley of damage using a flamethrower like device within the arm cannon knocking it high up into the air allowing you to jump up and do a type of spin attack launching it even higher and higher until it stayed up.

You were preparing for it to fall yet again when suddenly you heard two swords clang against each other very close to you and, with your new bounty hunter skills and reflexes you dodge completely out of Link and Ganondorfs way for the moment at least. As the two powerful forces of good and evil were now bringing their fight to the upper platforms and it was getting more and more violent and chaotic. You now knew that it needed to stop or the whole stage would need to be rebuilt before the tournament actually began so you decided to fire a charged ball of energy at Ganon, who was the most destructive. It knocked him up up a bit allowing link to get a good hit upon the immortal king but ultimately this only made him angrier as he attacked both fighters with animosity and vicious rage that both fighters were barely able to keep up. He slashed out with his long sword every once and awhile and was almost always blocked by Links Master sword or your grapple beam and either stunning him or taking away his sword for a couple precious moments allowing both of you to deal great damage upon him and even knocking him off the stage but he swiftly recovered to the ledge showing that this obviously wasn't his first time in the tournament. Fortunately both you and Link were veterans of the tournament, meaning you both had more knowledge and experience fighting on theses stages and as such were able to trick him into following them off the stage and allowing Link to spike him off into the abyss. He almost recovered but thanks to your missile it knocked him even further off not even allowing his recovery to save him that time and thus throwing the King of evil into the abyss to wait out the rest of the round while you and Link celebrated upon the now partially destroyed stage.

"Whoa, that was exhilarating huh, Link?" it completely slipped your mind that Link (usually) preferred to stay silent, even in the most dire of situations, so you were almost confused by his thumbs up and exhausted smile. You smiled back, though he could not see it because of the visor, and gave an equally exhausted thumbs up back to him showing you admiration of his skills and abilities through one gesture. Link soon left the stage, presumably to go and rest after that long training session, leaving you alone on the now wrecked stage leaving you to find that you were also exhausted and had the power suits A.C. to thank to keep the sweat from getting in your eyes and face and you also decided to head back to rest. However where would you go? Back to find your real body and swap back? Or would you stay in Samus' body and go back to her room to rest? The real Samus didn't even seem to know of the swap ever even occurring and just assuming her new role as the the first of the Mario Bros. but then if you stay would you be stealing Samus' life?!

So many questions were circulating through your head and you decided to take out the remote and look at, giving it a good feel. You decided to...
113111.title: Body/Life/Clothes

1131111.content:
You were far too tired to go find Samus so you decided that you would just go back to her room, besides she won't even care if it's only for a little while longer. You slipped the remote back into one of the suits many containers and walked out of the state and back into the long hallway you had come in from, you notice Ganon on the right sitting on a bench that was right outside the stage's entrance and he was looking very sour about the fights conclusion. You briskly walked past him eager not to get into another conflict with him but you caught something before you rounded the corner: "better watch yourself, Samus-Aran". "Great" you think to yourself "Now I've created an enemy for Samus". You walk back to one of the main courtyards and look around for rooms/dorms for women (for obvious reasons boys and girls could not share room) and find that it was on the right lane as opposed to the boy's left lane. You travel down it and find many rooms with names and such upon them indicating who was supposed to be rooming with who: Zelda and Peach went well together and Bayonetta and Palutena tolerated eachother. You were relieved that Samus was roomed with Sheik who, like Link, was not to chatty so you didn't have to be asked questions about Samus you didn't know, because the swap had only given a few helpful memories like how to put on and off the power suit and zero suit.

You turned the handel to get inside but found it wouldn't budge, "huh? What the-" you forget with it a little more until you finally realize that unlike the boys rooms the girls had codes that needed to be inputted before entrance, something about men not being as trustworthy or soemthing. That was one memory that the swap had neglected to give you so you were stuck outside until you could ask one of the hands to open it for you or if Sheik could possibly open it for you, which would've been a bit awkward. However, the door opened on its own after about a minute and a computerized voice says "scan complete identity authenticated: Samus Aran, welcome". You were a little confused by what just happened, did it just scan you to let you in? If so that was very convenient to you, you walk in and find a small living quarters scattered with technology probably belonging to Samus and two doors in the back with Samus' name on one door and Sheiks name on the other. You stepped carefully over some of the junk and weapons that Samus had left and stepped into the thankfully unlocked door to enter Samus' room.

You find a bed that looked comfortable and had extra beams to keep it up so it could hold more weight, Samus probably wore her power suit to bed at times causing the regular beds to collapse, you were tempted to test the weight capacity of the bed now but decided if you were gonna get some rest you didn't want to wear the power suit and find yourself cramped later so you pressed a few modules here and there then pressed a deactivation button the arm cannon that allowed you to slide the suit off. You started with the arm cannon to give you another hand then began to take off the boots and let armor allowing you to walk more freely, you then pulled off the cheapskate then the arms and finally the helmet and placing the pieces in a neat pile in the corner for later use. You were now in her zero suit and were tempted to take that off as well but decided against it out of respect for your friend, you climbed into the bed and began drowsy quickly before finally passing out on the comfortable subsets and pillow.
1131111.title: Go back to Samus' room and rest, she won...

11311111.content:
You are awoken by a loud alarm apparently coming from the power suit in the corner. You rub your eyes and slide out of the comfortable bed before approaching the suit and find that it appears to be coming from the helmet, "hmm guess i'll have to put it on to turn it off" you say as you stretch and pick up the advanced helmet. You slide it over your head and a long message is displayed across HUD that reads: "DINNER IN CAFETERIA EAT ONLY WHAT IS NEEDED" you were surprised by how long you had slept considering that dinner usually was around 7:00 pm and you had only gone to rest at 12:48. A loud grumble is heard coming from your stomach only confirming that it was time to eat, "Well I better get going if I want to eat something" You say before rubbing your now very slim but durable stomach and turning off the loud alarm before placing the helmet back with the rest of the power suit.

But do you take the Power suit to dinner or stay in the Zero suit?
11311111.title: Later, dinner with the fighters

113111111.content:
You begin to suit up inside the rest of the armor, deciding to do the helmet last as it would only block most of the bulkier pieces. The leg plates and boots were the first on and made you quite a bit taller, then the torso and chestplate which covered a lot of...well Samus's "gifts". Then the bulky shoulder plates and arm cannon respectively on your right hand and regular arm and hand coverings on the left leaving only the helmet which you picked up and slipped on. It took a minute for the helmet to sync with the rest of the suit and make it fully operational but when iit was done yo felt super powerful; similar to how the mega mushroom made you feel after you consumed it. You smiled as you exited the room to find the messy room now cleaned and organized with all the weapons now in a neat pile in the corner, you then noticed that Sheik was impatiently tapping her foot in the corner apparently waiting for you, "let it be known,Samus, that I will not be responsible for your gadgets next time AND wait for you. I'm starving" she informed you before opening the door "by the way, I was informed the moment you tried to enter the room...please remember the code next time" she handed you a sheet of paper containing the 4-digit code: 2679 and then left the room.

You memorized the code but slipped it in one of the suits compartments just in case you forget, "huh that code looks familiar...ehh its not important right now" you say before following Sheik out into the long hallway where you see she is again waiting on you. "Jeez Samus, you're ususally a lot faster, something up?" she questioned as you both walked along the long hallway. "uhh well, nothing much" you mumble getting a laugh from Sheik which was unusual considering Sheiks usual toughness "heh heh, sorry just never heard you mumble before, somethings clearly bothering you Samus and I intend to find out so why not just tell me" you think on her words and finally say "well...I kinda helped Link defeat Ganondorf before I took my rest, he was super tough and after he kinda threatened me" Sheik's eye widened a bit but still remained calm enough to say "heh well...yeah I guess that would be a unnerving event for you, considering he is a very powerful fighter...maybe even the most powerful fighter currently here". This did not set you at ease at Ganons supposed threat to you, but it was good cover for your odd behavior as Samus so you'd stick with it, "yeah...I just hope he doesn't do anything too harmful in the tournament" Sheik shook her head and said "i wouldn't bet on it" just as you and her arrived at the cafeteria.

So many fighters were already present and eating the food that both Crazy and master hand were creating, while it was mostly Master while Crazy messed around with the flour and made chaotic "snowstorms" much to Master hands dismay. Peach and her toad companions were sat together at one of the tables enjoying sandwiches and lemonade and you were tempted to join them but then the real Samus beat you to it along with Luigi who had brought over some delicious smelling spaghetti. You decided against it and chose a spot next Sheik and Palutena before going up to get some food, there were so many options ranging from the delicious smelling spaghetti from earlier to a full on turkey possibly made for duck hunt (one of the new additions to the roster). You picked up a simple meal of a couple wings and plenty of vegetables, something about looked more appetizing than the spaghetti for some reason, you brought it back to your spot and begin eating, having taken off the helmet to eat more easily. You look over the large dining area until you spot Ganon in the corner of the room, he wasn't eating anything but was just observing...watching his fellow fighters enjoy themselves without enjoying it himself, very creepy indeed. You were brought out of your staring to a tap on your shoulder plate which made you jump in your seat and looked over to see....
113111111.title: Power suit

1131111112.content:
You look over to see Samus, well in your body and still oblivious of you in her body, she appears to have something to say to you so you say "hey Mario, what's up?" this is beginning to sound familiar but instead of revealing a remote she says "uh well...I just wanted to say how uh sorry I am about earlier, I was hallucinating quite a bit, something about a body-swapping remote, but it was a little weird and I'm sorry for interrupting you". You gulp at her words and say a lot calmer than you really were "it's cool Mario..really" she smiles and heads back over to peaches table leaving you to your food and thoughts: "why didn't I do anything? I could've swapped back if I was quick enough so why didn't I? Am I getting...close to Samus?" you think in your head as you quickly finish your meal and head out leaving the cafeteria to go back to where it all began.

You arrive in your room where you stashed the box and manuel, hopefully Samus or Luigi hadn't gotten too curious and messed around with it. You enter quite easily due to your arm cannon and find it in the back where you left it quite undisturbed, you swiftly run over to it and open it finding the manuel and Styrofoam still inside leaving you to believe that Samus and Luigi hadn't looked inside yet. "okay...so that's taken care of, but what to do now?" you obviously could take the box with you back to your room but you could also just swap back when no one is looking. But was that even what you wanted now? You had started this whole thing as a test and you certainly hadn't meant to stay for so long but you were enjoying being Samus, not having to worry about Luigi or Peach was relieving and of course being female (and quite an attractive one at that) was cool in and of itself. Were you ready to give it up just for the sake of normalcy? You weren't sure of your answer.

You sighed and took out the remote from an compartment and the helmet from your head and placed them in front of you, seemingly weighing your options. You thought for a long time on both of them and debated and debated with yourself until finally you had an answer. One would stay and one you would take with you signifying your choice, you brought your left hand over to...
1131111112.title: Samus (in your body)

choices: The lounge (a place where many of the fighters hang out)
Your room (to change into the zero-suit)
11311111121.content:
You pick up the helmet and stare into the light green screen to see your Samus's face staring back, your face staring back. You sighed as you slid the helmet on and waited for the system calibration, "I'm sorry...Mario".

You exit the room now completely sure on your choice: you were now Samus Aran, the deadliest bounty hunter in the entire galaxy and one of the most dangerous fighters here. "Hmm what now?" you say as you walk away from the boys hallway and enter yet another large courtyard that was surprisingly empty allowing you to explore these thoughts, you cold head back to your room and change into your zero-suit or you could find someone to talk to other than Sheik. "Bold to assume that you were alone, Samus Aran" a malicious and deep voice snarled from behind you and you quickly did a 180 pointing the arm cannon at the source of the voice. There stood the menacing form of Ganondorf simply standing and staring at you, arms crossed and cape flapping with no wind (isn't that weird). "What do you want, Ganon" you say with authority not letting the evil being out of your crosshairs, he merely smiled "if you think your poor excuse for a weapon will do much against me you would be mistaken, however I merely came to tell you one thing" you grunted in displeasure which he took as confirmation "stay out of my way or death will be much closer than you realize" he then disappeared in a haze of smoke.

"What an idiot, everyone knows the hands have bestowed immortality on all the fighters" you said as you placed your arm cannon by your side but not putting your guard down. It was true that both master and crazy hand made it physically impossible to die within their tournament but the way Ganon said it...with authority like he had the means to do it. You shook your head to those thoughts and started heading towards...
11311111121.title: Samus' Helmet

113111111211.content:
You open the door to the lounge, one of the main leisure areas available to the fighters, and see it in chaos. Diddy Kong and Pikachu are bouncing around on the ceiling supposedly playing a game tag while Zelda tries to contain them using one of her many spells, Duck hunt (dog) is chasing his partner around Bayonnetta who is casually drinking some dark liquid and reading a book generally unfazed by the mayhem ensuing. You rush over to help Zelda contain the monkey and mouse-type Pokemon before they seriously damaged something, "sit still you troublemakers!" Zelda screams before casting yet another spell towards them only for them to dodge and continue playing their game. You charge up a shot on your arm cannon and wait for a precise moment to shoot, trying to keep them in your crosshairs.

Finally Diddy crossed them and you let lose the ball of energy allowing it to hit small chimp and make him collapse in an exhausted heap on the floor allowing Pikachu to run down and tag him, simultaneously giving Zelda her much needed opportunity to cast her spell capturing both of the speedy fighters. "whew...thank you, Samus, they were giving me a run for my rubies and being quite a nuisance for both me and Bayonnetta over there" Bayonnetta merely waves and takes another sip while occasionally petting the now tamed duck hunt, "you're welcome, I was coming in here to relax but I guess that's a rarity wherever you go huh?" you say while putting a hand on you hip.

Zelda giggles and offers a seat next to her which you take, "so...what do you usually do to relax, Samus?" The question caught you off guard, Zelda wan't usually one for invading others privacy, or at least not when you were Mario, "well...usually I train with or without the power suit to be ready in all of my combat suits and hang out with Sheik...hang on, I just realized, if Sheik is you then how am I not rooming with you and why isn't peach rooming with Sheik?"you answered/questioned her. Zelda chuckled at your questions and rubbed the back of her head as if she too was wondering the same thing, "well...it's a bit complicated, I also had these questions and asked the hands this, and the simplest answer I got was that Sheik and I are the same person just from two different times and realities, one where I went back to being Zelda and one where I stayed Sheik" she sighed as if she had just oversimplified something that took a couple hours to explain. "huh...well that kinda makes sense" you said simply and Zelda nodded her head thankful she didn't need to explain anymore.

You two chatted a while after that, so long in fact that Bayonnetta finished her book and took both of the trouble making fighters with her with duck hunt not too far behind, some fighters came in to briefly join the conversation or do other activities the room had to offer. Soon enough though Zelda left to get ready for bed and it was then that you noticed the time: 11:00, your sleep schedule was definitely going to messed up after this, you rushed back to the women's rooms to find the door locked again. You racked your brain for the password but could not remember it so you took out the code from one of the suits compartments and inputted it into the console. The console beeped and the door opened while the same automated voice from before said: CODE ACCEPTED, you walked in and allowed the door to close behind you before walking into your room.

But did you change into your sleeping clothes or is the Zero-suit becoming sleepwear?
113111111211.title: The lounge (a place where many of the fighters ...

1131111112112.content:
You decided that wearing the Zero-Suit might be best, although it wasn't the most comfortable of clothing it was nonetheless a second combat skin in case you were attacked in your sleep, "huh...guess I'm assimilating into this life more easily then I thought". You began to strip off the armor as you did before until again your were standing in the Zero-Suit with a neat pile of power armor in the corner of the room, "hmm...it's sorta ...smooth" you say as you admire your facial features only just now giving them a good look. Compared to your more cartoonish nature before, Samus's face and body was all too realistic and just seeing the detail was interesting, and the feelings the tight combat suit was giving your body was incredible. Alas, you could explore these feelings tomorrow, for now it was time for some rest, you climbed into the bed and covered yourself with the sheets and allowing your body to adjust to the comfortable and safe feeling, "ugh! This hair is getting in the way!" you say as the golden yellow hair fell in your face as you took off the red scrunchie and placed it near the paralyzer and rocket heels which you had taken off due to them being most uncomfortable and making your sleep aggravatingly difficult.

You pushed your hair back and placed your head on the comfy pillow allowing your body to take over, leading you into a restful sleep with a smile on your lips...








Now is the time to ask whether we should switch perspectives to the real Samus in Mario's body with the remote or stay in this perspective.
1131111112112.title: Zero-suit

choices: accepted, you wanted to kick her ass at your own game!
declined, you wanted to go out into the buildings and explore with your new form
11311111121122.content: You awoke yet again to the familiar alarm coming from the suit's speakers, you smiled as you jumped out of bed mostly rested as you usually did, only to find that your new body wasn't exactly made for jumping like your last one was. You felt slightly sore as you stretched, although the zero suit remarkably did have many upsides as it kept your body warm when it was cold and cold when it was warm, it also allowed your cramps to disappear almost instantly after a few stretches, that your new body was more than capable of doing now. You finished stretching and walked over to the helmet still blaring the alarm and slipped it onto your head and, using neuro links, turned it off by thinking it, "huh, guess I'm learning faster than I thought". You decided not to wear the power suit today as you didn't want to wear all the bulky armor when you had just gotten used to your new slim form, you brushed through your hair and used the red scrunchie to tie it into zero-suit Samus' signature ponytail, you slipped into the rocket heels and holstered your paralyzer before exiting the bedroom to go out to the small living room where you see Sheik casually playing single player Mario Kart, you grinned at the disguised princess as she continued playing Yoshi, while you had some bias you couldn't disagree with Yoshi's amazingness as a selectable character in Mario Kart. Sheik didn't skip a beat as she passed yet another player and also commented, "hey Samus, wanna play?" she handed you a controller which you...
11311111121122.title: Stay as Samus

113112.content: Shall it be relationships that are swapped? Or one of the others, perhaps?
113112.title: Relationships/Head/Gender

1131122.content: Will you take the Red Pill(Head Swap), or the Blue Pill(Gender Swap)?
1131122.title: Head/Gender

choices: Body, life and relationship swap with Samus to become her but date peach
1132.content: You find Samus training in the gym with her zero suit what do you want to do with her?
1132.title: Zero suit

choices: Go check out your new body
11321.content: You really want Samus’s sexy body and it would be nice to be taller so you pull out the remote and push the body swap button and then life swap button and then suddenly you are training you remember what you were Doing and look down to see Samus’s body in her tight zero suit you turn around to see your old body leaving you quickly grab the remote and hit the relationship swap button then go back to training as to not raise suspicion and then when your done you
11321.title: Body, life and relationship swap with Samus to ...

choices: Go get peach for some fun
113212.content: You go back to your room feeling your breasts with every step and it’s surprisingly easy to walk in Samus’s heels and you even walking like her man this remote is amazing when you finally In your room you lock the door and go over to the mirror and do some sexy poses and start saying things Samus would never say “oh Mario I love you more then anything you are so hot” say this really turns you on maybe you should make Samus your girlfriend or just get peach
113212.title: Go check out your new body

115.content: Which character do you see?
115.title: Someone else.

1151.content: You see the Hylian princess, Zelda. If you chose body swap or head swap, you could play with her breasts.
1151.title: Zelda

11511.content: You press the body swap button. Immediately you are in the hylian princess’ body. You are a lot taller now. You look down and see two big breasts sticking out of your clothes. You squeeze them and let out a little moan. Will you explore in Zelda’s room or swap something else?
11511.title: Body swap

1153.content: Which of the three choices do you want to pick?
1153.title: Someone else

11531.content:
You see Bayonetta, the Umbra Witch walking down the hallway. You remember that she was the most recent newcomer to the tournament thus far, coming in so late she had to be made DLC. You think about how to swap with her.

On one hand, you were thinking about switching bodies with her, so that you could get a better view. You would finally get to be tall for once. And the internal plumbing seemed interesting too.

On the other hand, you were also thinking about switching lives with her, so that you could get a break from constantly protecting the princess from Bowser all the time. But you were a hero, and it didn't seem right to doom someone else to that endless loop. But it could be just for a moment...

On yet another hand, all the other buttons looked like they could do some interesting things too...
11531.title: Bayonetta, the Umbra Witch.

115312.content: Do you decide to swap lives with Bayonetta?
115312.title: Life Swap?

12.content:
You are Link, the hero of time. You come from the land of Hyrule, or at least one of the iterations from it. Another Link is also participating, but he doesn't come from your Hyrule. You had been heading to the gym to do some training when you stumbled across the package in the hallway. Never one to turn down free loot, you pick up the box, make sure no one else is around who could have dropped the box, and head to the nearest room, which happened to to be the leisure room, to sit down and find out what's inside.

Luckily, there was no one around to question you on your find, so you take a seat on the couch and look inside the box. "Well, I found this remote that can swap things around," you say, showing it to her. "I thought it might be funny to see your reaction to the swap."

"Funny!? You can't just do something like this to people! Give me that!"

Peach reaches for the remote, aiming to take it from you so she can put things back to normal. Of course, not wanting to give up your new toy just yet, you do your best to hold onto it as well. However, with you in Peach's body, and she in yours, she was stronger than you, and she ends up pulling the remote out of your hands, accidentally pressing one of the buttons in the process. Which button did she end up pressing?
12211221.title: body swap

122112211.content: Which button does Peach end up Pressing
122112211.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Clothes Swap

1221122112.content: Which button does Peach end up pressing?
1221122112.title: Body Swap/Head Swap

122112212.content: Which button did she end up pressing?
122112212.title: Life Swap/Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

choices: You spend the day as Peach
Skip to night, as you try to get the remote back
1221122121.content:
As Peach pulls the remote from your hands, the two of you swap places. Peach reacts first, since you had already swapped clothes with her before so wearing her dress was nothing new, although wearing her dress on her body was still a different feeling. "Did we just... swap clothes?"

For a moment, you think that that might be it, before you notice that you are facing towards the other end of the hallway. "Wait, which button did you press?"

"Um, I think this one," she says, pointing at the life swap button.

"Okay... so everyone thinks we're each other now."

"Really? Hm, this could actually be fun."

"Huh?" This sudden change in Peach's mood surprises you.

"Now I can be the hero instead of the one who always gets kidnapped," Peach says, flexing her new muscles. "Might take a bit of getting used to though."

Now you were worried. While you had had fun experimenting with the remote on Peach, she was planning on keeping your life and body for good! "Wait! Peach, you can't..."

"Can't what? Keep your body? You're the one who gave it to me in the first place."

"Well, fine, you can have my body, but you can't take my life like this." You reach for the remote, but Peach quickly moves it out of reach.

"I can, and will. Clearly you're not responsible enough to have something like this if you're going to go around swapping things with people just to laugh as they freak out. Maybe a little time as a princess will teach you some proper manners."

"But.. you... I'll tell everyone you stole my life!" you threaten.

"And who's going to believe you? And even if they did, I'll just tell Zelda that you stole my body first." You gasp. Even if you weren't yourself right now, you can only imagine what Zelda would think about you doing this to her best friend. "Haven't got anything else to say, 'Peach'?"

"Um, I..."

"In that case, I'll be going now. Have fun with your new life." With a smug grin on her face, Peach turns and walks away. You would have chased after her and tried to take back the remote, but you knew that you were no match for her now that she had your body and life, and you had her's. No, if you wanted that remote back, and with it your life and body, you'd need to be smart about this. If you stayed up late, you might be able to sneak into your old room and take the remote while Peach was sleeping and swap back. Maybe if you swapped back while the awareness setting was on 1, she'd forget about this whole incident.

"But until then," you say to yourself, looking down at the body and clothes you now possessed, "I'm stuck like this."
1221122121.title: Life Swap

12211221211.content:
You couldn't help but groan. Because of a series of stupid decisions and bad luck, you're now Peach. You knew there was nothing you could do to fix this at the moment. Peach has the remote and you couldn't overpower her in her body. The best thing to do right now is to spend the day as Peach. It could be interesting seeing life from her perspective.

Now that you made your decision, you weren't sure on what to do next. Maybe you could go to Peach's room and find out more about her life. It'll be easier to pretend to be her this way. It'll raise suspicion if you still act like yourself but everybody thought you were Princess Peach. But you were an adventurer. Wandering around and pretending to be Peach could be a challenge and maybe that could be an adventure on its own.

After some thought you decide to...
12211221211.title: You spend the day as Peach

12211221212.content:
Late at night, well all the lights at the tournament grounds had been turned off and most people were asleep, you crept out of your room (although really, it was Peach's room), wearing Peach's nightgown. You had managed to last through the entire day, pretending to be Peach. If this was temporary, you might have been tempted to stay this way a little longer, but knowing that this would be permanent if you didn't take the remote back from Peach, you continued on, heading towards your old room.

As you walk, you reflect on the events of today. Not everything had been bad; you had enjoyed being treated like a princess, and getting to hang out with Zelda and Samus had actually been pretty fun. Of course, having Zelda treat you like a friend reminded you of your predicament, and even more repulsive was your run-in with Mario. You had also felt incredibly awkward as you took a shower and changed into Peach's nightgown. You would have preferred to not do it at all, but Zelda would get suspicious if you didn't change into your pajamas for bed.

You soon reach your old room, shared by you and Toon Link. Luckily, the door was unlocked, do you open it slightly and peer inside. It seemed like both occupants were asleep, so now was your chance. You slowly enter the room, doing your best to not make any noise, and begin to search for the remote on your side of the room.
12211221212.title: Skip to night, as you try to get the remote back

122112212121.content:
As you rummage around in what had once been your belongings, you make no notable discoveries. You are about to check inside the drawers of your bedside table, when you hear a voice. "Looking for something?" Your heart practically stops. You slowly look over towards the bed, to see Peach, in your body, looking at you smugly. "Oh, Peach, Peach, Peach," she says condescendingly. "What am I ever going to do with you?"

"Peach, please," you plead. Your resolve had practically been broken. "I just want to be me again."

"Sorry, no can do. I'm having to much fun being you." She paused, reading the emotions displayed on her former face. She could tell how upset you were about this. "How about we make a little deal? I'll keep your life, but I'll swap relationships with you. Then you can stay in Hyrule and everything. What do you say?"

You consider Peach's offer. Some of your biggest problems with living Peach's life were your relationships, notably those with Zelda and Mario. If you accepted Peach's proposal, you'd have a chance to fix that, but it'd also mean you'd be accepting Peach's life and body for good.
122112212121.title: Peach wakes up

1221122121211.content:
You slowly nod, "O-okay." You knew Peach held the upper hand here, so you were willing to compromise for whatever you could get. Even if it meant all you had was the relationships of your old life.

"Alright then." She sits on the edge of the bed, and reaches for the bedside table. She opens the drawer you were about to open when she woke up, and takes out the remote. 'If only I'd been a little quicker..." you think to yourself. Peach points the remote at you, and presses the relationship button. "There, now everyone's happy." Thinking over it, you find your memories as Peach were now changed to match the relationships of your old life. You breath a sigh of relief, knowing you'd have at least some normality. "So, I trust I won't find you snooping around in my stuff again?"

"Y-yeah," you say. You would have loved to take the remote back and make everything normal again, but there was no telling what would happen if Peach found you looking for it again. She showed you a little bit of kindness this time, but next time she might not be so forgiving.

"Good. Now head back to your room. I still need to get some sleep after you woke me up." Peach puts the remote away and lays down in bed, waiting for you to leave. You knew there was nothing left for you to do tonight, so you turn to leave the room, another sigh, this time of disappointment, escaping your lips.

You eventually reach your room, and open the door, trying to be quiet and not wake up Zelda. Inside, you find that rather than having two separate beds on opposite sides of the room, as they had been when you had left, the two beds had been pushed together in the middle of the room. It seemed this was a change made to reality to compensate for you and Zelda being both roommates and lovers. As you close the door, Zelda stirs.

"Hm, Peach? Is everything okay?" Zelda says.

"Oh, yeah. Everything's fine, Zelda."

"Well come back to bed then. It's late." You smile, and for the first time since Peach stole your life, your smile was sincere. You suppose you'd have to take the smaller victories for now. You get back into bed with Zelda, and the two of you drift off to sleep.
1221122121211.title: Accept Peach's proposal

1221122121212.content:
You contemplate your options and decide that you don’t want Peach’s life and body forever “No deal” You say. Peach just shrugs “Fine, the door is over there. See you tomorrow ‘Peach’” She says with a wink. You start to head out the door...only to instead turn around and lunge towards the princess! You weren’t going to give up that easily!

The question is though, did you get her?
1221122121212.title: Reject Peach's proposal

122112212122.content:
After a while of searching different places, you eventually find the remote inside one of the drawers of your bedside table. You do your best not to squeal in in excitement. However, you notice that the remote had already been set to awareness mode 1, and the manual was sitting next to it. Had Peach already used the remote? If she had, there was no way to tell. You grab the remote and leave the room. You close the door most of the way, and through the door, aim the remote at Peach. First you use the body swap button, giving you your own body back, and then use the life swap, and end up lying in bed where Peach had been.

Before you can do anything else, you hear the door close, and the sound of footsteps walking away. It seemed that Peach had left. Right now, you couldn't tell if she thought she was herself or you, or whether she knew about the remote or not, but for now you were just happy to be back to normal. Or at least, what you thought was normal. If Peach has swapped something, you wouldn't be able to see, and would have no choice but to accept it as normal. Still, you decide to get up and take a look at yourself in the mirror regardless.
122112212122.title: You find the remote

choices: In the morning (Samus's body was the only change)
In the morning (Peach changed more than your body)
1221122121222.content:
You enter the bathroom and turn the light on, trying not to wake up Toon Link. Looking in the mirror, you try to see if anything seemed different. Blonde hair? Check. Blue eyes? Check. Mole on your chin? Check. Just as you had thought; if Peach had made any changes, you weren't aware of them. "Well, I guess I might as well try to forget about it and just assume this is normal," you say to yourself. You head back to bed, your large hips swaying as you walked.

Of course, you weren't actually back to normal. While in your body and life, Peach had swapped bodies with Samus, and now that you had swapped back with Peach, you thought that Samus's body was your own. Doing your best to try and forget that Peach might have changed something about you, put the remote back in the drawer, and lay down in bed. You soon fall asleep, dreaming of what fun you could have with the remote tomorrow.
1221122121222.title: Peach made some changes

choices: You arrive at the Cafeteria with no interruptions
12211221212221.content:
You wake up the next morning, groggy. It appeared that your roommate, Toon Link, has already left for breakfast. Good, now you wouldn't have to worry about hiding the remote any longer. You get up out of bed, and open up your drawer to check on the remote. Good, it's there. You quickly decide to get dressed and get breakfast. Perhaps you'll be able to test out the remote in the cafeteria while everyone is busy eating.

You grab your clothes off a trunk, and put them on. You still didn't realize that Peach had swapped your body out for Samus's and that despite you having her rather buxom and curvy feminine body, you still considered yourself a man, and were treated as such by everyone else.

As you finished putting your clothes on, you grabbed your sword and shield and headed off to the cafeteria.

(Writer's Note: I kept it similar to the other chapter for sake of consistency)
12211221212221.title: In the morning (Samus's body was the only c...

1221122121222122.content: Was it Samus or Zelda?
1221122121222122.title: Other?

12211221212221221.content:
"Morning, Link."
You'd recognize that voice anywhere.
"Oh, hey Samus."
Samus Aran. She had been in the tournament since the beginning, but this was the first time she entered as two fighters. You contemplate swapping with her. Definitely not an aware swap, you really didn't want Samus to steal the remote like Peach did.

The irony of wanting to swap with Samus while already being in Samus' body is entirely lost on you.
12211221212221221.title: Samus

122112212122212211.content:
Yes, swapping with Samus. Having her strong body or her face would be an experience to say the least (unaware that those were your own just a couple days prior), and her zero suit was always an enticing option. But there were always the other three buttons, allowing you to become Samus, have her friends, or swap genders.

Stealthily you pull out the remote during the friendly conversation and press a button.
122112212122212211.title: Swap with Samus

1221122121222122111.content: You go for a swap that'll leave you the same to others. But which one?
1221122121222122111.title: Body/Head/Clothes

12211221212221221111.content: You already tested the clothes swap with Peach but you'd never tried an unaware body swap except for getting your body back, so you choose one of the more physical options.
12211221212221221111.title: Body/Head

choices: Find someone else to swap with
122112212122212211111.content:
With a press of a button, you feel a weight taken off your chest and a weird sensation between your legs. Looking at Samus, it seemed the bulge in her zero suit was gone, and your curves filled her zero-suit well. It was hard to hide your surprise and arousal, but you kept a good enough poker face for Samus to not think anything was wrong.
"Okay, see you later." Samus said, walking off toward the cafeteria with her new curvy body.

You had swapped with a girl before, Peach, but Samus feels completely different. You and Peach both have breasts and a vagina, so the biggest difference then was height. But with Samus, you are in a wholly new body with wholly new parts. At least your tunic didn't look weird on your new body.

Unknown to you, you had just gotten your own body back. Not that much of a big change when viewed through that lens, huh?
122112212122212211111.title: Body

1221122121222122112.content: You had already used the body and clothing swaps the other day, so why not try something new? With these buttons, you could become Samus or at least have her friends. But which button do you choose?
1221122121222122112.title: Life/Relations/Gender

choices: Use the remote on the way there
12211221212222.content:
You wake up the next morning to find that your roommate, Toon Link, has already gotten up and left. Good, you wouldn't want him to see you get out the remote. You get out of bed and head over to your wardrobe. You take your usual blue dress off the rack, and pick up a pair of blue high heels off the floor, placing them next to your bed. You take off your nightgown, placing it on top of the laundry pile, and get a new pair of panties and a bra out of your drawers, and then start getting dressed for the day.

Once you have all your clothes on, you sit down at your desk and and start to apply your makeup, and put on your jewelry. Once again, you were unaware, on the change, but while in your life, Peach had swapped clothes with Rosalina, so now you thought they were your clothes. Altogether, you now had your own life, Samus's body, and Rosalina's clothes, but you, and everyone else, thought it was normal. Oddly enough, despite the lack on anything masculine about your appearance, you were still considered a man, and everyone treated you as such. Completely dressed, you leave the room to head to the cafeteria for breakfast, the remote in one hand and Rosalina's wand in the other.
12211221212222.title: In the morning (Peach changed more than your body)

122112212122221.content:
Your stomach growled, you put one of your longer, slander hands against the blue dress. "I should go get break fast," you say, smiling, as your reached to open the door, you gasp, "I nearly forgot."
YOu turned around, and walked over to a table near the window, where there was three pots. Emptying one hand of your wand, you reach over, first grabbing a thick red stem, and pulling it from the ground, throwing it over her shoulder, and repeated this with a yellow one, and a blue one.
"Come on, it's time to eat," You say, picking up your wand, and waving it, signalling them to follow. They turned to each other, nodding, and what you had learned was smiling, although it was just with their eyes. You left, and made your way to the cafeteria.

When getting there, you walked by mii fighters, who handed out the food. You fill your tray, and went to sit down. The Pikmin jumped up to the table, you had made sure it was in the sunlight, and you gave them a shallow dish of water. The Pikmin sat in the light, while taking an occasional drink from the bowl. while you sat back watching them, eating more carefully, as not to mess up your make-up.

What you did not know was that Peach had swapped relationships with Olimar. Normally, Zelda or Toon Link would have eaten with you, but with the swap, they didn't know you that well, and Alph hadn't arrived yet.

Having finished eating, you stood up, and brushed yourself down. You looked around, most of the fighters were here.
You reached for the remote, and then...
122112212122221.title: Head to the cafeteria

1221122121222211.content:
"Hi, Link," someone greeted you.
Turning your head, "Hi..." you said to see them, pushing the remote up your sleeve.
1221122121222211.title: Someone came over

1221122122.content: Which button did she press?
1221122122.title: Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

12212.content:
As Peach walks away, you decide to let her keep your clothes for now. The point of this exercise was to test if and how the remote worked, so you felt like if you reversed the swap right away it'd be sort of cheating. Allowing Peach to walk away, you head over to your room to put the manual somewhere safe, noting that you somehow knew exactly how to walk in Peach's heels. After putting the manual on your highest shelf where Toon Link couldn't reach it, you think about where you want to go next. Remembering that you were heading to the gym before you found this remote, you decide to head over there and test out how well you can fight without any weapons (although you did see Peach's umbrella, frying pan, and golf club back in your room). Perhaps you'd even find someone else who could test one of the other buttons on, although you weren't committing yourself to swapping with the first person you saw like you had with Peach. Speaking of Peach, you were beginning to like the feel of her clothes. They felt very different from your old tunic, but after only a little time wearing it, your were feeling almost as comfortable in it as you did in your old clothes. Perhaps that was the influence of the remote giving you the skills you needed for the clothes though.

Before you leave, you head into the bathroom to see exactly how you look. Checking the full length mirror on the back of the door, you had to admit you looked a little ridiculous. While the dress and the rest of the outfit had made Peach look cute, it looked rather weird on your male body. The top had been stretched to fit your wider, flatter chest, and the skirt lengthened so that it would reach the ground even with your added height. Interestingly, you thought the makeup would have been the strangest part about the outfit, but it actually didn't look too bad, and made your face look a bit feminine. Speaking of the makeup, you notice all of Peach's makeup supplies are around the sink, and you instinctively start to touch up your makeup, just as Peach might have. Once you are satisfied with how it looks, laughing a little at how odd this situation is, you leave your room and head to the gym.

You find the gym to be deserted, and you didn't run into anyone else on the way there, so for now executing more swaps was out of the question. You are about to put the remote away in a pocket or bag, before you realise that with Peach's clothes, you no longer have any. You can't exactly go hitting a sandbag while you have the remote in your hand. That would have the risk of accidentally breaking it, and even though you were currently enjoying Peach's clothing, you weren't sure you wanted to be stuck with it for the rest of your life, and miss out on the opportunity for more swaps. Since no one was around, you could always leave it on a bench next to the sandbag. That'd be easier, but if you wanted to be completely sure that no one saw it and it didn't go missing, putting it in your gym locker would be the safer option. You decide to put the remote...
12212.title: Keep the dress, it might be interesting.

122121.content:
The gym was currently empty anyway and most of the other smashers were probably busy doing other things. You take a chance on hoping that no one would be coming so you leave the remote on a nearby bench. Now that the remote was settled, you turn your attention to a sandbag.

Now that you no longer had your own weapons, which you relied on greatly, you probably needed to change most of your attacks if not all of them. You were probably going to adapt some of Peach's moves to work with the clothes you now had.

You start with trying out some of the special attacks you've seen Peach do since you currently don't have a way to make use of any of your own special attacks. You start by trying out the move she called Peach Bomber. You try and ram the sandbag with your behind, just like you've seen Peach do. You stumble a little as you do so, because of the hem of your new dress, but manage to hit the sandbag anyway. Surprisingly, despite your blunder, the sandbag flies backwards from the impact. You figure that the move itself was already pretty powerful but your well-toned and conditioned body helped and made the move even more effective than it already was. Now you wanted to try and use her Peach Parasol move. You try and figure out how she pulls out her parasol seemingly from nowhere. You try to vision the parasol appear in your gloved hand. To your amazement, the parasol appears in your hand. Next you attempt to do the attack. You go and thrust the parasol upwards while jumping upwards with a bit of a forward direction. At the height of your jump, you open the parasol and, despite your much heavier weight, you slowly float down to the ground. Although much to your embarrassment, the bottom of the skirt inverted itself and revealed the bright pink panties you now wore. As soon as you landed, you begin fixing your dress, you find it difficult with all the layers it had.

"Getting rusty are we Link?" a voice suddenly said from behind you. Quickly turning around, you see...
122121.title: On a bench

choices: Pretend you don't know what it is.
1221211.content:
"Samus! Wh-what are you doing here?" you ask while hurriedly finishing up with fixing your dress upon spotting your fellow veteran standing in the doorway to the gym.

"I was going to go train and work on some new moves I would be using in the tournament until I saw you training." said the bounty hunter currently wearing only her Zero Suit.

"How long have you been standing there watching?" you ask hoping she didn't see you in a compromising position a few moments ago.

"Long enough to know that you haven't been practicing enough since the last tournament. I mean seriously, I haven't seen you messing up this bad since the first time the hands got us all together." Samus said.

"Hey I'm sorry. I've been trying to work out some new moves as well." you quickly make as an excuse though it was partially true.

"That's alright." she said, then noticing something on the bench in the corner, "Hey what's that over there?"

You instantly realize that she was talking about the remote. Inwardly cursing yourself for not storing the remote in your locker, you think about what you should do now.
1221211.title: Samus

12212112.content:
"I didn't even know there was something there in the first place." you lie. "Maybe it's best if we leave it alone."

"What are you talking about Link? What if it's one of those new items that the Hands are gonna let loose on us? We could get a leg up on the other fighters by practicing with it before they get to." she said excitedly while going to grab it.

"Yeah...sure...okay. We could do that. But what does it do?" you say anxiously, still pretending to not know about the remote.

"Hmmm...Looks like some sort of remote. Doesn't look like anything I've seen before. Weird labels on the buttons" she says, while examining it in her hand. "Sure wish I had my Power Suit right now. I could have scanned this thing and found out everything it does."

"Oh well. I guess you have to go get it before we can try it out. Right?" you ask, relieved that maybe Samus would leave without using the remote.

"Maybe. But maybe not." she says. "Why don't we just try it out?"

"I don't know. What if we get hurt while trying to find out what it does?" you say, hoping she chose not to use it right now.
12212112.title: Pretend you don't know what it is.

122121122.content:
After mulling things over a bit, "You have a point there." she admits. "Wait for me here while I get my Power Suit."

"No problem." you say, relieved to have avoided a potential disaster. "I'll stay here and work on some new attacks while you do that."

"Okay. I'll be back as soon as I can." she says, leaving the room.

As soon as she exits, you let out a deep breath you didn't realize you had been holding in.

"That was close." you thought to yourself. "Good thing she didn't try out any buttons. I should probably hide the remote for now. I should also do something to make sure Samus doesn't just think I hid it. Speaking of the thing, where is the remote anyway?"
122121122.title: Samus gets her Power Suit.

choices: Samus does not use the remote.
1221211221.content:
"Oh no. No. No. No. No. No. No. She took the remote!?" you say hysterically. "Why did she take it? I don't want to wear dresses forever!"

After a few more minutes of panicking and hysterics, you had calmed yourself down enough to start to think rationally.

"Okay Link. You won't be stuck wearing Peach's clothes forever. Only if you can't get your hands on that remote." you start thinking. "You just have to wait for Samus and somehow get the remote from her then go and swap back with Peach."

While you were busy thinking about what to do, on her way to pick up her Power Suit, Samus was further inspecting the remote she had in her hand.

"I wonder why Link was acting so weird earlier. I've never seen him mess up his dress like that after three tournaments. Plus when I was talking to him, it was like he was hiding something." she thought. "Maybe this thing had something to do with it. I wonder what it does. Well, guessing that since it looks like some kind of remote you need to point it at something first before pressing any buttons and since the red buttons have pictures of things that relate to people then most probably this thing was to be used on other people. Still doesn't tell me what it does though just what I think it's used on. Maybe I should try it out myself without Link."
1221211221.title: Samus took the remote.

12212112212.content:
You had been sitting on one of the gym benches for what felt like hours, although in reality, it was just a few minutes. Any plans of trying out new moves in your current clothes forgotten for the time being. You were deep in thought about what was taking Samus so long to return and what would happen if Samus used the remote before she came to you. In fact, you were so deep in thought that you had not notice her come in still in her blue skin-tight Zero suit.

"Hey Link. You miss me?" she asks.

"Samus! You startled me." you reply, jumping from your seat a little. "Why aren't you wearing your Power Suit?"

"I already scanned the remote in my room. So I decided to just leave the suit in my room since I wouldn't need it anymore. Plus it would be better for me to show you what it does without the Power Suit."

"Wait... so you already know what it does? Did you use it yet?" you question her since you didn't see anything different.

"Yes. I already know what it does. And no. I wouldn't use it without you." she answers back.

"Okay. So what does it do?" you say, still pretending to not know what the remote does.

"This thing is supposed to switch certain things about people around. The switch is normal to everyone except the person holding the remote. Although they can change who else can see the swap. I think it's better if I show you instead." she quickly explains.

Before you could say or do anything, Samus had quickly pressed several buttons on the remote. In an instant you were no longer looking at the female bounty- hunter, instead you were no looking at yourself complete with the puffy, pink dress you had swapped earlier.

"Wha-" you stop and put your hand to your mouth upon hearing your voice. It definitely came as a shock since you hadn't tried swapping anything except for your clothes. It was much higher and breathier than you remembered. Itwas also weird that when your hand touched your mouth, there was now a blue, rubbery material covering it. Upon further examination, your hand is now much thinner and more slender than before. Also, the blue material on your hand extended to cover your entire arm and the rest of your body. Speaking of your body, it was definitely much more feminine than you remembered. It was definitely weird seeing a pair of breasts and long, blond hair falling in your vision whenever you looked down. You now had the body and the clothes of your good friend Samus Aran.

"This is really weird." you hear Samus in your body say. "How you doing there Link?"

"I think I'm doing okay." you answer. "How did you make me notice the swaps and what exactly did you swap?"

"Well, I chose Swap Mode 2 before swapping." she answers in your voice.

"Oh okay. So only you and me can notice the swap." you further answer.

"As for what I swapped, I only swapped bodies and clothes with you." she explains further. "I just wanted to try swaps that would be obvious. You want to swap back now?"
12212112212.title: Samus does not use the remote.

122121122121.content:
"Let's swap back for now." you decide. "We can try being each other again later."

"Sure. No problem." Samus agrees.

Just as quickly as before, Samus presses the body and clothes swap buttons again. Just as quickly, you are put back in your old body and the puffy, pink dress you took from Peach.

"Hey Link, I just realized something." Samus mentions. "How did you know what swap mode 2 does?"

"Umm...Uhh...Well...You see..." you mumble, cursing yourself mentally for your slip-up.

"What aren't you telling me Link?" she questions.

It looked like you were caught either way so you decide to come clean. "Remember when I told you that I hadn't noticed the remote before you came in? I put the remote there. I found it in one of the hallways. It came with a manual explaining everything it did." you explain with head bowed.

"Why'd you lie to me?" she asks with hurt in her eyes.

"The remote was set at swap mode 1 when you came in." you explain further. "I didn't want you swapping with me not knowing about it."

"I understand why you did that but the fact that you still lied to me still hurts." she says. "You could have just told me not to use it and explain what it did."

"I know. It was stupid." you say, ashamed. "How can I make it up to you?"
122121122121.title: Swap back.

choices: Samus goes with you to let you swap back
Samus uses one of the hidden buttons so she can see you in Peach's dress
1221211221211.content:
"Well, you could let me hold on to this remote, for one thing. I wouldn't want you leaving it on a bench again," Samus says.

"Wait!" you exclaim, startling Samus. "There's something I need to do with it first."

"Oh? What do you need it for?"

"Well, I... I had already swapped something before you found the remote, and you're going to keep it, then I need to swap back "

"Oh, is that why you seemed so out-of-practice before?" You nod. "So, what did you swap?"

You hesitate, not wanting Samus to know what you had done. "I... I swapped clothes with Peach."

Samus holds in a laugh. "Wow, really?"

"She was the first person I saw and it seemed like the most harmless test I could do," you say, trying to justify your swap.

"So why'd you keep it? I would have thought you'd swap back as soon as you knew it worked. Did she walk off before you could swap back or something?"

"Uh, yeah, something like that." You didn't want to tell Samus that you had willingly kept Peach's clothes.

"Well, in that case..."
1221211221211.title: Samus keeps the remote.

choices: "Nah, I think its funnier to leave you like this for now."
12212112212112.content:
"...There's no way I'm missing out on seeing this." Samus says, a grin on her face. Before you can even say "Huh?", Samus points the remote at herself and presses a button. Nothing seems to change, but after one look qt you, Samus bursts out laughing. You can't help but blush out of embarassment at the situation. Judging from what Samus had said, and her reaction just now, it seemed whatever Samus had done had caused her to be able to see your swapped clothing.

Finally managing to calm herself down a bit, Samus manages to say, "Oh, that is priceless."

"Yeah, yeah. Laugh it up," you say, trying to hold onto what little dignity you could. You walk over to Samus, who laughs a bit more at that you're walking perfectly in Peach's heels, and not tripping over her dress. "So, how'd you do that?"

"Oh, I guess you didn't find them yet." She shows you the remote, which seems to have a panel below the main buttons removed. "The orange button there allows people to see any swaps that have been made. Since you found the remote in the first place, I guess I should make you aware too," she says, before pointing the remote at you and pressing the orange button.

"Huh, cool. So, can we go get my clothes back now? If you're going to be the one keeping the remote for now, I'd like to be back to normal first."

Samus silently looks at you and thinks, a smirk on her face, before saying...
12212112212112.title: Samus uses one of the hidden buttons so she can...

122121122121122.content:
"Wait, what? What do you mean?" you ask, as little worried that you were going to be stuck wearing a dress.

"Exactly what I said. I think it's funnier to leave you like this for now. I'll probably change you back eventually, but for now this is too good to give up."

"But, it's my remote! You can't do this to me."

"Well excuuuuuse me, princess," Samus taunts. "Just because you found it, doesn't mean it's yours. And even if it did, I found it afterwards, so it's mine now."

"So that's it? You're just leaving stuck in a dress?"

"For now at least. Stop making such a big deal about it. It could be so much worse. Just imagine if you'd swapped bodies with Peach and I refused to let you swap back."

"Yeah, I guess." You look down at yourself, at the pink ensemble you've doomed yourself to. Maybe you could deal with this for a while. Samus was the only one who knew, after all. You'd just need to put up with her laughing at you until she got tired of it and let you change back.

"Beside, you look fabulous in that outfit." She adds a wink, making it completely clear that she's joking.

You decide you might as well make the most of the situation, and join in on the joke. "You've just jealous that I pull it off better than you would."

"Oh, really? You think so?" Before you can reply, Samus points the remote at you again.
122121122121122.title: "Nah, I think its funnier to leave you like...

1221211221211222.content:
Samus clicks a button, and suddenly you're no longer looking at Samus. Instead, you're looking at your own body, holding the remote, and dressed in Samus's Zero Suit. Samus says, with your voice, "Huh, you know what, I think it does look better on you that it would on me."

You look down at yourself to find that you're no longer really yourself. You now possessed Samus' shapely body. You had only swapped clothes so far, so having your entire body reshaped caught you off guard. You were speechless. You slowly reach up your hand to touch one of the breasts hanging from your chest.

Your hand is quickly slapped away by Samus. "Hey, hands off!"

"Uh, sorry," you say, a little shocked at Samus' voice coming out of your mouth.

"Wow, you have my body for five seconds and you're already trying to feel me up."

"Well what did you expect? This is completely new to me. You suddenly stick me in your body without any warning and expect me not to be a little curious?"

Samus pauses, trying to think of a rebuttal. "Well, I guess you're right. Really though, Peach's clothes don't look that great on my body either. Better than on your body at least, but it just doesn't really work."

"Aw, don't like what you see?" you say in a teasing way, striking a pose.

Trying to ignore what you had just done using her body, Samus says, "Anyway, I'm sure we could have a lot of fun with this remote."

"We?"

"Well yeah. You found it in the first place. Just because I'll be the one holding onto it so you don't leave it somewhere, doesn't mean I'm leaving you out of the fun."

"Oh, cool." Even if she wasn't letting you have your clothes back, at least Samus was letting you join in on the swapping fun.

"Come on, let's go see who we can find." Samus turns to leave the gym, motioning for you to follow.

You take a set forward to follow, but the shift in your center of gravity, and the weight on your chest, reminds you of your current situation. "Shouldn't we, uh, swap back first?"

"Oh, so first you want to feel me up, then you don't like my body anymore?"

"Well, no, that's not what I mean. It's just... weird."
1221211221211222.title: Samus swaps bodies with you

122121122122.content:
"We could stay like this for now." you say in your new, feminine voice. "I'd like to try out having your body and clothes."

"Sure." she agrees. "I want to try out your body and clothes too."

"Okay then. So what do you want to do first?" you ask.

"Well..we could try and have a practice fight against each other the way we are now. That would be interesting." she suggests. "If you want, we could try using the remote a bit more. We could switch lives and turn completely into each other or do something else completely."
122121122122.title: Stay like this for now.

122122.content:
The gym was currently empty anyway and most of the other smashers were probably busy doing other things. But you'll rather be safe than sorry so you leave the remote on a nearby bench. Now that the remote was settled, you turn your attention to a sandbag.

Now that you no longer have your weapons, which you mostly relied on, you need to change most of your attacks to fit your new clothes. You're probably gonna have to use some of Peach's moves.

You start by trying one of her special attacks called "Peach Bomber". You ran up to the sandbag and try to hit it with your butt, just like Peach did. You stumble a bit in the process, due to your new dress and heels. Surprisingly, despite your blunder, the sandbag flied backwards from the attack. You figure that the move itself was already pretty powerful but your more muscular body made the move even more effective than it already was.

As you were staring at the sandbag you began to think. You seen what you can do with the Peach Bomber technique. Maybe with a little time and practice you can become just as good in Peach's dress as you are in your old clothes. You can even come up with a few new moves in Peach's dress.
122122.title: In your gym locker

1221222.content:
Now you wanted to try and use her Peach Parasol move. You try and figure out how she pulls out her parasol seemingly from nowhere. You try to vision the parasol appear in your gloved hand. To your amazement, the parasol appears in your hand. Next you attempt to do the attack. You ran up to the sandbag then you thrust the parasol upwards at it while jumping upwards with a bit of a forward direction. At the height of your jump, you open the parasol and, despite your much heavier weight, you slowly float down to the ground. Although much to your embarrassment, the bottom of the skirt inverted itself and revealed the bright pink panties you now wore. As soon as you landed, you begin fixing your dress, you find it difficult with all the layers it had.

"Getting rusty are we Link?" a voice suddenly said from behind you. Quickly turning around, you see...
1221222.title: Someone sees you

choices: Peach is not at the garden
12213.content:
After thinking it over a little, you decide the dress is too weird and you want your old tunic and weapons back. You look up and point the remote at Peach, only she isn't there anymore. Your eyes go wide in shock as you think about what this means for your current situation. You needed to find Peach if you wanted your clothes back. The next time you knew exactly where she'd be would be dinner, when she would be in the cafeteria with everyone else, but that was hours away and you didn't want to spend all that time in her dress. Pulling your dress up a little so you don't trip, you quickly walk over to where she was, somehow knowing exactly how to walk in heels and what speed you can walk without hurting yourself. You are so worried about getting your clothes back that it barely even registers that you're already thinking of Peach's dress as yours.

You reach the closest corner to where Peach was headed and can't see her down either path. You had earlier assumed that she was heading to the garden, and this path down here does lead there, so you could always look there. Whether she was there or not, you would probably end up switching with someone. The dress didn't feel bad, it just felt weird on your male body. With that in mind, you head in the direction of the garden to see if Peach is there, still marveling at how odd this situation is.
12213.title: Peach leaves before you can decide.

choices: Someone distracts you and you mess up
122131.content: You reach the garden as quickly as possible. Scanning the area, you luckily spot your dark green tunic amongst the plants, with Peach's bright blonde hair sticking out from underneath the cap. You breath a sign of relief, knowing that you won't be stuck in a dress until dinner. Although really you wouldn't have been stuck, you'd just have yo offload Peach's dress onto someone else and take their clothes. Walking around to a spot where you have a clear shot through the plants and you won't be completely obvious and out in the open, you point the remote at Peach and...
122131.title: Peach is at the garden

1221312.content:
"Link? What are you doing here?" You hear a voice, who you identify as the Wii Fit Trainer, talking to you. She often came here to meditate, so you're not surprised she's here. However, worried about someone finding out about your new little toy, you frantically push the button you think is clothes swap and hide the remote behind your back. For a second, you think it's worked, as you can feel the familiar feel of your tunic and the weight of your weapons on your back. Then you notice that you're over the other side of the garden, and Wii Fit Trainer is no where to be seen. It takes you a moment to realise, but over the other side of the garden, you can see Peach talking to Wii Fit Trainer. Peach seems to be normal and back in her own clothes, but she seems to be acting like you would. Then it hits you that in your haste to hide the remote, your finger must have slipped and accidentally pressed life swap instead of clothes swap. You notice that instead of being in Peach's hand, the manual is now on the table, no doubt because without the remote itself, she'd have no idea what it was.

You are about to swap clothes and lives, so that you can be yourself again with your own tunic, but an idea hits you. You were thinking it might be nice to be royalty, why not stay in Peach's life? You might have to make a few adjustments so that you're still dating Zelda instead of Peach, but it seems like the perfect idea. You'll have your own clothes and weapons, along with Peach's abilities like floating, and the power of a monarch.
