The only downside you can see is that people would perceive you as a girl, you'd have to get used to being called Peach, and you've lost the triforce of courage, but other than that it seems like the perfect plan. With these ideas in mind, you aim the remote at Peach through the plants again and press the button for a...
1221312.title: Someone distracts you and you mess up

choices: Everything's back to normal, for now
12213121.content: You press the clothes swap option again. Now you're back wearing Peach's dress again, only everyone believes you're actually Peach. You don't exactly like it, but just one more button press and you'll be back to normal, back in your own life with your own clothes. Then maybe you can experiment in a more favorable manor, instead of one that makes you into a girl. You aim through the bushes at Peach, who is wearing your clothes and still talking to the Wii Fit Trainer, and prepare to perform a life swap to sort out this whole mess.
12213121.title: Clothes Swap

122131212.content:
"Hiya princess! Whatcha doin'?" greeted someone behind you. Startled, you fumble the remote and press what you thought was the life swap button. Turning around and hiding the remote behind you, you find the Villager standing there, unsurprisingly. Like the Wii Fit Trainer, Villager liked to spend his free time in the garden. Surprising, however, was the fact that you were even in front of him in the first place since the life swap would place you in the conversation with Fit instead. Also surprising to you was that really long, blonde hair swished around you as you turned.

"Oh hi Villager." you answer, in a feminine voice which shocks you a little. "I was just taking a walk."

"Oh okay! See ya later princess!" he says heading on his way to the provided planting areas in the garden.

As soon as he left, you began to examine yourself to find out what you swapped instead. It was a brief examination since all you had to do was look down. You still had Peach's dress but now they covered the body it was originally designed for. The front of the dress extended forward due to the breasts you now possessed. Instead of swapping lives with her, you had accidentally pressed the body swap button. You had Peach's life, dress and now you also had her body to go with it. You then realize that you had now completely swapped with Peach and nothing of your real self remained with you. Speaking of Peach, she was now completely you. Looking towards where Peach, in your life, was having a conversation with Fit, you see that both of them had already left. The conversation probably wasn't that long since you and Fit weren't really friends yet. That left you unable to swap back with Peach.

Since swapping back was no longer an option, you had to decide what to do next. You didn't really want to be Peach completely so you consider swapping with someone else and off-loading Peach's life, body and clothes on someone else then swapping back with Peach when you get the chance. Then an idea comes to you. You were considering trying out life as royalty earlier after you accidentally swapped lives with Peach. You now had the body that went with the life and clothes, so why not try to do that now?
122131212.title: More interuptions!

1221312121.content: You decide that as enticing as life as royalty may be, you had no desire to remain in Peach's life and body. So, that meant swapping with someone else. You look over at where Villager had gone. Peach and Wii Fit Trainer may have left, but he was still here. You could swap with him, but it wouldn't be too hard to find someone else to swap with.
1221312121.title: Swap with someone else.

12213121212.content:
Deciding you don't want to be Villager, you leave the garden in search of someone else to swap with, doing your best to try and ignore the new sensations Peach's body was giving you. Unfortunately, finding someone else was proving to be harder than you had previously thought. Apparently the other competitors in the tournament were rather spread out around the grounds, making it difficult to find them. It wasn't too long before your feet were sore from walking around in high heels, and the straps on Peach's bra were starting to dog into your shoulders uncomfortably. You were really considering just going back to the garden at this point and hoping Villager would still be there, just so you wouldn't be stick as Peach any longer.

However, in a stroke of luck, you happen to find a pair of people that you could potentially swap with. Unfortunately, you weren't entirely sure that either was better than your current predicament. The first of the two was the Pokemon Jigglypuff. Not only was Jigglypuff a Pokemon, essentially an animal, unable to communicate with humans, but you couldn't even tell what gender it was. It certainly had a very feminine appearance, regardless of what gender it really was. The other option, seemingly communicating with Jigglypuff telepathically, was the Goddess of Light, Palutena. You could certainly tell what gender she was, however, she certainly has more going for her than your current life as Peach did. The powers of a goddess, or instance. Of course, she was still a woman, something you were kind of hoping to avoid on your way back to your own life.

With the options on offer, you were almost ready to go off and find someone else to swap with, but your aching feet remind you of how long it took you to find these two. You consider your options, before deciding to...
12213121212.title: Find someone else

122131212121.content: Though neither of the two targets were ones you really wanted to swap with, the impracticality of your current clothes and the aching of your feet practically forced your hand. You had to choose who to swap with quickly or else you would risk them walking away from you. You select ...
122131212121.title: Swap with Jigglypuff or Palutena

1221312121212.content: It was an easy choice. though it was one you wished you had different options. Palutena was the obvious decision since, at the very least, she was human-like. Also, her godly abilities interested you somewhat. Now it was a matter of what to swap with her. You selected...
1221312121212.title: Palutena

12213121212121.content:
You wanted to swap lives with her. That way you gain her godly powers which you would like to try having. You would also receive her clothes, which were definitely more practical than what you currently had. Not wasting anymore time, you point the remote at her. Just as you are about to push the button, your eyes suddenly feel heavy. You try to suppress a yawn as you try to keep awake so you can swap with Palutena. The last thing you remember before slumping down on the floor, unconscious, was Jigglypuff singing to Palutena.

You wake up hours later to find Jigglypuff nowhere in sight. Sitting up, "What in Hyrule-". you stop yourself and cover your mouth upon hearing your voice. It was not your usual male voice. It was a very female voice. You then remember about the remote you found and your complete swap with Peach. Your feminine gloved hand holding the remote confirmed this. Although the voice you spoke in seemed different from Peach's voice. It was then that you noticed another person lying down in the hallway, apparently also a victim of Jigglypuff's Sing attack. This didn't surprise you since you've been going against Jigglypuff since the very first tournament. What did shock you however was who was asleep on the floor, or at least who it appeared to be. It looked to be Peach but she was wearing the clothes of the goddess, Palutena. "This could only mean-" you thought. Quickly looking down, some green hair swishes into your field of vision. You also notice that your feminine...assets...were much more pronounced than before. All these new features of your body and the fact that Peach was lying on the floor near you told you that you had inadvertently swapped bodies instead of lives with Palutena. You had once again made a wrong swap.

"Ugh! Not again!" you shout, frustrated. "Why does this keep happening?"

You were starting to get really mad at how rotten your luck is. You just wanted to try out the remote once and swap back before actually using the remote seriously. Instead you had been temporarily stuck in Peach's dress, accidentally swapped into her life, got put into her clothes again while trying to fix that mess, swapped bodies with her, getting stuck as Peach completely and now you had swapped bodies instead of lives with Palutena. You just wanted to use the remote and have it work out in your favor for once.

The best bet for you right now, with your rotten luck, was to completely take over someone else's identity and swap back into your original self. Right now, you had a choice of completely becoming Peach or Palutena. You didn't really care anymore that these two weren't ones you wanted to swap with earlier. You decide to...
12213121212121.title: Body Swap

choices: Go looking for your old life
122131212121211.content:
The choice was pretty clear about who you wanted to become. The allure of becoming a goddess was too strong, or at the very least, stronger than wanting to be a princess. At the very least you might command some respect in Palutena's life, not to mention her powers. While she wasn't someone you would have willingly swapped with under normal circumstances, she would at least make for a better substitute until you got back into your own life than Peach would. This would technically leave Palutena and Peach switched around, but they'd think they had always been each other, and they'd look completely like each other too, so it would be like nothing had changed. As Palutena, with Peach's body, begins to stir, you point the remote at her and press the life swap button.

Within an instant, you find yourself back to laying down on the floor, this time where Palutena had been. Before you can even start to get up, you hear the sound of high heels clicking their way down the hallway. It seemed that the new Peach had gotten herself off the floor and was headed elsewhere. "Good riddance," you mumble to yourself, still not used to hearing a voice other than your own coming out of your mouth, "I'm not going back to that again." Luckily Jigglypuff wasn't around to hear your musings. You supposed it had probably gotten mad and left after Palutena fell asleep during its song. You slowly lift yourself off the ground into a sitting position, before standing yourself up, and take stock of the changes to your body.

Despite going from being one woman to another, there were quite a few differences. Not as many as between yourself and Peach, but still enough to be significant. You were definitely taller now, something you were glad about, thinking about Peach's petite frame. Your hair was much longer, and the length made it heavier too. Something else that was heavier was your bust, which was somewhat larger than Peach's, although your "assets" definitely seemed larger when seeing them from this angle. Of course, the clothing was different too. Unlike Peach who practically covered up everything with her dress, Palutena's dress had a large slit on the right side of it, running all the way up to her hip. It honestly embarrassed you a bit, knowing that one false move could possibly lead to you flashing your panties for everyone to see (even if they weren't really your panties, and you weren't really you right now). At the very least, you had some more conventional weapons, a staff and a shield, and of course, Palutena's godly powers.

"Hmm, I suppose I can deal with this for a while." Palutena's life would suffice for now, but what you really wanted was to be yourself again. Now that you had found someone to offload Peach's life onto, you could go looking for yourself again. But where would you have gone? You tried to think about what you had planned to do before finding the remote, but you just seemed to draw a blank. Were you really just going to wander around aimlessly looking for yourself? Perhaps it would be better to just try and live out Palutena's life until a time when you knew exactly where your old life would be, and perhaps find a more suitable life than Palutena's in the meantime. You begin to walk away from where Jigglypuff had put you and Palutena to sleep, mulling these thoughts over in your head, your new breasts moving slightly with each step. "Heh, can't wait to get rid of those."
122131212121211.title: Completely turn into Palutena.

1221312121212112.content:
You figure there wasn't much use in running around aimlessly trying to find your own body. You'd just end up tired and sore like you'd done in Peach's life. As much as you didn't really like it, living out Palutena's life for now seemed like the best option until you could find your own body and life, or at least one you'd be more comfortable with than Palutena's.

You sigh. "So what to do now," you say out loud, if only to get used to hearing this voice instead of yours. "I guess I could pay the library a visit. Seems like something she might do."
1221312121212112.title: Live Palutena's life for now

choices: Come up with a way out of it
12213121212121122.content:
Before you can even take a step in the direction of the library, you hear someone call out your borrowed name. You'd groan, but at this point you really should have seen it coming with your current streak of bad luck.

"Lady Palutena!" the voice calls out. You recognised the voice, and the somewhat formal way it addressed you. Turning and confirming your suspicions, you find Pit, the angel who served under Palutena, walking towards you.

Doing your best to imitate Palutena, you greet him with a simple, "Hello Pit."

"Enjoying the tournament so far?" he asks.

"Well, the you're tournament hasn't technically started yet, Pit."

"Oh... Right. Hehe." He scratches the back of his head sheepishly. You consider swapping with Pit while his gaze was averted, but unfortunately for you, Pit notices the remote before you even have a chance to point it at him. "Hey, what's that?"

"Oh, uh, it's nothing," you say, trying to divert his attention away from the remote.

"Aw, c'mon, let me see it," he says, trying to get a good look at it. There had to be some way out of this, right? Maybe give Pit a bit of a scolding from his goddess? Although, the easiest path might just be to come clean about the whole thing.
12213121212121122.title: Oh look, another interruption.

122131212121211221.content:
"Please Lady Palutena." Pit asks, pulling at your arm to see what you were hiding. "Let me see."

"Pit. Please stop it unless...you want to become a frog." you respond calmly, your current life as Palutena letting you know that you have the ability to transform people.

"No!" Pit says quickly. "That's fine Lady Palutena. I'm going now. See you!" Just as quickly as he came, Pit had turned around and vanished down the corridor he came from.

"Oh dang it!" you say, realizing that you just lost an opportunity to become a guy again while you waited for your chance to return to your own body and life.

You once again had to decide what you were gonna do. You consider chasing after Pit to swap with him. He hadn't been gone for very long. Maybe you could catch up to him. You could also just forget about swapping with him entirely and head to the library. It was where you were going before Pit interrupted you to begin with. You choose to...
122131212121211221.title: Come up with a way out of it

choices: Pit offers to help you look for your life/body
Pit offers to swap with you
122131212121211222.content:
"And that's what this thing is, and every thing it's done up to this point," you say as you finish explaining the whole thing to Pit.

After a long pause, in which Pit's jaw was dropped the entire time, Pit speaks up. "So, let me get this straight; You're actually Link in Palutena's body, Palutena is in Peach's body, but she thinks she's actually Peach, and the same for Peach in your body? And it's all because of that remote?"

"Pretty much. The only reason I'm in Palutena's life at the moment is because I couldn't find my own life to swap back into. You wouldn't have happened to see me around somewhere recently, have you?"

"Sorry, but no."

You let out a sigh. "Zero leads, and I'm still stuck in this body," you mumble to yourself.
122131212121211222.title: Tell Pit the truth

1221312121212112222.content:
"So, if you swapped with me, then I'd think I was Palutena?" Pit asks.

"Yeah. Well, unless I change the setting or make you hold onto the remote."

"Aha, so I can still know about the swap."

"Pit, where are you going with this?"

"Well, you don't like being stuck in a female body, right?" You nod. "Then how about you and me swap? You can use my body until we can find yours."

"Wait, you want to be a girl?"

"Not just any girl. I serve under Lady Palutena, but she, uh," he looks away, "she doesn't always treat me the nicest. Like the time she sprayed me with monster pheromones. It might be nice to turn the tables and be the one in charge for a while."

"'A while'? So you'll want me to swap you back eventually?"

"Maybe. Depends on if I like being Palutena or not."

Even if it meant you had further obligations later down the track, you weren't about to turn down a male body right now. "Alright. Just hold on to this and I'll swap our bodies and lives." Pit does so, eager to try out being in the body of a goddess.
1221312121212112222.title: Pit offers to swap with you

choices: Pit wants to help you find your body
12213121212121122221.content:
You press the two buttons, one after the other, and soon you find yourself in Pit's body. You still weren't yourself, but you were happy to at least be male again. "Ah, that's better," you say with Pit's voice. You look over your shoulder at the wings you had gained from the swap. It almost felt like you had a second set of arms coming out of your back, and it felt a little awkward to control. But at the very least, you could cope with this better than you could cope with being a woman. Speaking of being a woman, "How are you doing in there, Pit?" you ask.

Pit was busy taking stock of his new body, just as you had been, his long green hair darting this way and that. "This is so weird..." he says, before putting a hand to his throat as he realises he has Palutena's voice as well. "I'm... I'm really in Lady Palutena's body."

"And her life," you add. "Everyone will think you're her, and you can do everything she used to do."

"This is amazing... So, I guess you're going to go off and find your own body now?"

"Yeah, if you don't mind. You probably need a bit of time to get used to being Palutena anyway."
12213121212121122221.title: The two of you swap

choices: You miraculously stumble into your old body.
122131212121211222212.content:
Pit then replied, "You know what? I'll help you find your body. At the very least, I could repay you for giving me the opportunity to get back on Palutena."

"Okay!" You say, rather excitedly. "But, wait. Are you sure you're able to help me if you've barely been in her body for only a few seconds?"

"Nah. I don't mind, though these things on my chest are pretty irritating to have, and not to mention the fact that I'm twice as tall as you now."

"All right, then, let's find my body and settle this once and for all."
122131212121211222212.title: Pit wants to help you find your body

1221312121212112222121.content:
The two of you began to wander the hallways, searching for your body. Unfortunately, you still didn't have a good idea of where your body would be, but at least you know had two eyes on the case. You were also more comfortable with Pit's body than you were Peach's or Palutena's, although the wings were a little distracting. You didn't know what was going through Pit's head, but he didn't seem as uncomfortable with Palutena's body as you'd been in it, although you did notice him occasionally stopping to adjust Palutena's dress.

After a while of not running into anyone, the entire thing seemed a bit hopeless, you looked back at Pit for a moment, to tell him that it was fine if he wanted to leave and go off on his own, but as you turned your head away from where you were going, you suddenly bumped into something. Apparently someone had come around the corner, and you'd bumped into them. The sea of light blue you saw as the collision occurred was enough to tell you that the person was apparently Rosalina.

Normally, this would be of no problem, but you currently held the remote in your hand. Did you press a button when you collided with Rosalina or not?
1221312121212112222121.title: You bump into Rosalina.

12213121212121122221211.content:
You and Rosalina both fell to the ground after the collision, the remote clattering to the floor. From Pit's perspective, nothing seemed to have happened, save for the collision itself. As such, he was surprised when his body suddenly got up.

"Sorry Rosalina! I was kind of in a hurry. Gotta go!" With that, Pit's body left, leaving the remote on the floor.

Pit stared at the scene blankly for a moment, before he managed to put two and two together. "Link?" he asked of the woman sitting on the floor in front of him.

You were silent for a moment. You couldn't believe that this had happened again. You could once again feel female parts making up your body, and a dress cloaking your form. With the body and life swap buttons being so close to each other on the remote, you'd somehow managed to hit both of them in the collision, and had wound up as Rosalina. You replied to Pit with a sigh.

Pit held in a laugh, and offered Link a hand. "I guess me letting you use my body didn't do much good, huh?"

You grabbing the remote off the floor, and accepted Pit's hand up. "This remote must be cursed or something."

"What do you mean?"

"All I wanted to do was test out the remote and then swap back, and since then, I've gotten stuck doing all sorts of swaps I didn't mean to do." The stress of it all was definitely starting to get to him. At the very least, Rosalina's body seemed a bit better than Peach's or Palutena's. She wasn't as petite as Peach, or as curvy as Palutena. She had powers similar to Palutena, but her dress was more conservative, like Peach's. It still wasn't your body, though, and it was still a woman's body, and you weren't comfortable with it.

"Well, maybe it'd be good for you to relax a bit," Pit suggested.

You looked at Pit as if he'd just said the craziest thing in the world. "Relax? I'm stuck in someone else's body and I don't know were my real body is!"

"Well... yeah. But, the tournament hasn't even started yet, it's not like you're never going to see your body again. Maybe you should take a break and try to calm down, and then swap back once you know where your body's going to be."

Pit's suggestion did make a bit of sense. While you hadn't exactly been comfortable swapping around between different bodies, there was really nothing stopping you from simply waiting until dinner time or something and swapping back then. It might do you some good to try and relax a little after how stressful the past few minutes had been. Of course, that meant spending the rest of the day as a woman, and you weren't sure if you were comfortable with that idea.
12213121212121122221211.title: Link pressed a button

choices: The dinner bell rings before you can tell her
122131212121211222212111.content:
You decide to relax and wait for the perfect opportunity to swap back into your body, that way you wouldn't be stressing over it and let it come to you. You look up to Pit and ask, "alright, I guess I'll try to relax, but if we spot my body I have to swap back immediately, understand!" you say in a tougher, more angry tone than Rosalina's usual spacey and calm one. Pit smiles and quickly says, "sure Link, whatever you say, now where do you usually go to relax?" You thought on it and find that you were at your most calm hanging out with Zelda at the Library, although it was always awkward being that close with one another in your usual body, especially since everyone though you two were together. "uh, the Library, I suppose..." you say uncertainly, you watch Pit's playful smile vanish from Palutena's face, "really? The most boring place here is where you go to relax, why not the Smash Park, maybe we'll find your body there?" He tried desperately.


"No...I've made my decision, now are you coming or not?" You ask already turning towards the Smash Library. Pit sighs and say's "fine....I'll come with you, maybe something interesting will happen, I doubt it though" You find that Rosalina doesn't eally walk but kinda floats about three centimeters off the ground so you didn't have to worry about tripping on her heels, overall Rosalina felt more laid back and chill than Peach and Palutena who both had differing extremes. Peach being too uptight and Palutena being too loose, Rosalina striked that balance where you felt comfortable and concealed at the same time. "Why don't you like reading? It can be surprisingly calming with the right people" you blurt out in curiosity as you watch a grumpy Pit in Palutena's body walk behind you sulking. "It's because I can't read, idiot, I've said this soooo many times" he said still pouting "well that was when you were Pit...can Palutena Read?" you ask as you begin to approach the old doors of the Library, "of course Lady Palutena can read, she's a goddess for crying out loud!" He said frustrated as you tap the door handle with the tip of your star wand and the apparent impact blasts open both doors until they were wide open, scarring the poor librarian to death "well now you're that goddess who can read, Pit, try it out!" You offer him a book from off the shelfs which looked really interesting, "huh...these letters...they form into certain words and...those words combine to create sentences! I....Can....READ!!" Pit shouts loudly with Palutena's booming voice causing most of the Library to "shush" him, leaving him in an embarrassing position, "oh...sorry, everyone" he said shyly getting back to his book.


You roll your eyes and grab one of your favorites, Hyrule legacies, from the shelfs and brought it over to a reading table with Pit following closely behind, "Link, why is reading so cool! Why did Lady Palutena never teach me!" he asks in a surprised tone but in a whisper now. "Maybe cause she knew you would react like that, now let's just sit back and read until Dinner so I can swap back" You answer the still excited Pit who had picked up all three versions of the dictionary that was currently available and was currently reading with a smile on Palutena's face, "you don't have to tell me twice". You both read to yourselves for a while until you noticed someone coming in, it was Zelda and she took one of her favorite's off the shelves as well before walking over to you and Pit and asking, "would it be okay if I joined you ladies, Link isn't here so I prefer not to read alone" You smiled daintily and pulled up a chair while Pit said, "sure, feel free". Zelda smiled back and sat next to you and before opening her book looks at the title of yours and gasps, "that's Link's favorite! He would tell me he loved the stories of ancient Hyrule leaders, he would be happy to know someone else shares his fondness with the book, Rosalina".

You smile back and say, "yeah, it looked pretty nice from the title and has only gotten better" Zelda nods and looks over at who she presumes to be Palutena and raises an eyebrow, "Palutena, I didn't know you were such an active reader" Pit smirks back putting down a half finished third dictionary,"I find it very...enjoyable, to say the least, I should really teach this to my servants the next time I see them" he adds as Zelda smiles and finally begins her book. You felt like you and Zelda were really getting off to a great start again, like a newish fresh slate had been created between you and her, however you felt like you were lying to her pretending to be Rosalina, you told Pit, and you barely knew him let alone trust him. Zelda had been your damsel in distress and your most precious ally, if anyone deserved to know it was her. Who knows maybe she knows where your real body might be.
122131212121211222212111.title: Try and relax for now

choices: Just swap with one of them
122131212121212.content:
You suppose, in the long run, it wouldn't be very fair to Palutena OR Peach to just leave them stuck as each other, even if neither ever became aware of it. With this in mind, you use the body swap function to reclaim Princess Peach's body, and quickly make yourself scarce before Jigglypuff decides to start singing again.

Fairly frustrated at your lack of progress, you stomp off to the library, heels clicking loudly. There wasn't much there you really wanted, but you knew it to be the nearest gathering place, and it was also fairly peaceful. Surely, you could find a target in there who would just stand still long enough for you to use the remote on them.

When you finally make it down the hall and walk inside, you find the place to be fairly dead. You let out a frustrated sigh in Peach's high voice. You do, however, see two people on opposite ends of a table quietly flipping through some books. They were both newcomers: Robin and Lucina.

This was sort of a mixed bag. Robin - or atleast the Robin in the room right now - was male, which was convenient for you, but he seemed too weak for your preferences. Lucina, on the other hand, seemed very strong, but sort of had the same problem as the body you had right now did - AKA she was female. You suppose you COULD mix and match them, but it would be a bit of a hassle if you wanted to fix everything later.

What do you decide to do?
122131212121212.title: Switch completely back into Peach.

12213121212122.content: You were definitely not swapping anything you didn't need to like your body. So you decide on...
12213121212122.title: Other Options

choices: Swap something with one of the girls
Head back to your room (Peach's old room)
12213122.content:
You press the relationship swap button, and nothing seems to have changed. However, upon closer inspection, Peach is acting more friendly towards Wii Fit Trainer, the way you'd act if you were friends with her. It makes sense, Peach was friends with Fit, while you barely talked to her, so switching relationships with your old life would make Peach friends with her again. Now, you'd have Peach's life as a princess, but you'd still be together with Zelda, and according to the remote, you'd still be living in Hyrule. Proud of your handiwork, you begin to head out of the garden, sneakily picking up the manual for the remote on your way, deciding to leave it in your new room before you lost it again or something.

Or at least, you would have headed out of the garden, but something felt off. You couldn't quite put your finger on it, until you looked back at Peach, who had your life. You had the life of a princess, but you didn't look the slightest bit like one! What kind of princess wore a warrior's tunic and had a flat chest and manly body? But why should that worry you? Everyone thought it was normal for you to look like this, but for some reason you couldn't help but want to look more feminine. Perhaps it was Peach's personality influencing you or something, or maybe there was just a more feminine part inside of you that you just weren't aware of until now. Peach and Fit were still in view, and Peach's wardrobe, which you had been in such a hurry to get rid of before, suddenly seemed a lot more appealing.
12213122.title: Relationship Swap

122131221.content: Driven by some odd, adventurous desire, you lift the device and decide to make a switch. You have two easy targets, Fit and Peach, so there's a variety of things you can pick and choose from. What kind of swap do you go with?
122131221.title: Swap something with one of the girls

choices: Take Wii Fit Trainer's Body (or look for someone else)
1221312211.content:
Your mind immediately jumps towards body swap, one of the more extreme settings on the remote. Your incredibly curious about what it might be like to have a new body, and you already have a girl's life, so why not complete the package?

Your first thought is to switch with Peach, since you have her life, but there's no reason to be hasty. Wii Fit Trainer is right there too, and you doubt it'd be hard to find an alternative if you looked around.
1221312211.title: Body Swap

choices: Take Fit's clothes, or just keep your current outfit.
12213122111.content:
With a click of a button, you suddenly find every aspect of your body rearranged. Your clothing is the same, but that's about it. Your chest is larger, as are your hips, and strands of thick blond hair fall into your eyes.

"Woah..." you mutter, hearing a woman's voice. You're now 100% girl. A Princess's body to match a Princess's life. You pat yourself down, shaking with a newfound sense of excitement. This is amazing... should be impossible!

You move around your fingers and run in place for a moment, as though to confirm to yourself you're really in control.

As you do so, you notice you still have your sword, tunic, and equipment. That's good, but part of you wonders how far you can go. You look back off to Peach and Fit, and notice Peach is in your body, but still her dress. You were so quick to get rid of that dress earlier, but now you'd have the body to make it work. On the other hand, you could also take Fit's clothing if you want a feminine look that's easier to manage.
12213122111.title: Take Peach's Body

choices: go back to your room (peach's room)
122131221111.content:
Thinking it was weird to be a princess but wearing a mean's clothes, you point the remote at peach and hit clothes swap.
There is a flash of light and afterwards you see that you are wearing peach's clothes. You look over and see peach in your body and is now wearing your clothes and your weapons. You don't want to lose them but it is a small sacrifice.
What do you do now?
122131221111.title: Take Peach's Clothes

122132.content: You reach the garden, but as you had feared, Peach is not here. You let out a sigh of disappointment. Even if you can't get your tunic back, you're certainly not going to stick around in this dress. You'll just take someone else's clothes for now and get your tunic back next time you see Peach. Sure, they'll end up with Peach's clothes, probably permanently, but it's not like they'll notice anything different, unlike you who is thoroughly weirded out by how comfortable the dress is starting to feel. There isn't much choice here in the garden, but both choices are better than this ridiculous dress. On one side of the garden, there is one of the newcomers, Villager, planting a sapling. If you swapped with him you'd be back in male clothes, although a bit immature. By the way he seemed a little annoyed when you and some of the other guys laughed at the thought of wearing a dress (and experience which after today, you've decided you don't want to do again), and how he mentioned that in his town no one had a problem if a boy wore girls clothes and vice versa, maybe he's actually enjoy the dress. On the other side of the garden, another one of the newcomers, Wii Fit Trainer, was meditating. If you swapped with her, you'd still be wearing girls clothes, but it'd be a bit more sensible, and at least you'd have pants. If you did this at least Peach's dress would be going to a girl, and you wouldn't be forcing another guy to wear a dress just so you wouldn't have to. You end up deciding to swap clothes with...
122132.title: Peach is not at the garden

1221322.content:
Deciding you don't want to force another guy to wear a dress, even with Villager's little "screw you" to gender roles, you point the remote at Wii Fit Trainer and press clothes swap. Just as quickly as last time, the change happens. Now, Wii Fit Trainer is still sitting on her exercise mat meditating, but she now wore Peach's dress, heels, and jewelery. Peach's makeup was very obvious on her, thanks to her incredibly pale skin tone. Looking down at yourself, you now had much more sensible attire, although it was clearly still meant for a woman to wear. You had on a blue tank top that showed off your midriff, a pair of black yoga pants, and you could also feel a hair-tie trying to pull what little hair it could grab into a ponytail. Just as with Peach's clothes, you could feel some feminine undergarments, although from what you could tell, instead of Peach's silky bra, you now had Wii Fit Trainer's more practical sports bra. Without all your weapons, and with so much skin showing, you definitely felt a bit naked, but you put yourself at ease a little by assuring yourself that no one would see anything out of place.

Exiting the garden, you head towards your room. You wanted to put the manual away so that you wouldn't loose it, and then maybe improve the situation you were in with regards to your clothing. The sooner you could find Peach, the better. Now that your weren't frantically running somewhere as you had been in Peach's dress, your mind had a lot more time to process all the little differences about your clothing. Every slight breeze caused you to become aware of your exposed stomach and shoulders, prompting you to try and pull the tank top down further. Walking down the cold hallway barefoot was also a rather different experience. As you were distracted by the different feelings you were getting from your clothes, you don't notice someone coming from the other end of the hallway, and you bump into them, accidentally pressing one of the buttons on the remote to swap with them. Who did you run into?
1221322.title: Wii Fit Trainer

12213221.content: Not looking where you were going, you end up bumping into Samus, one of your friends from the original Smash tournament. At the time, she was not wearing her usual power suit, as she had just finished a training session to hone her skills with her zero suit. Thanks to your previous swaps, you definitely wouldn't have wanted to swap with another girl (unless it was with Peach to get your own clothes back), but apparently fate had a different plan in mind. When bumping into Samus, your finger accidentally presses the button for a...
12213221.title: Samus

122132212.content: When bumping into Samus, your finger accidentally presses the button for a...
122132212.title: More Swaps

1221322122.content: When bumping into Samus, your finger accidentally presses the button for a...
1221322122.title: More Swaps

choices: Swap back, get Wii Fit Trainer's clothes
12213221221.content:
As you bump into Samus, you feel you clothing shift around you for the third time today. Everything feels tighter, your feet raise off the ground, and the breeze no longer affects you.

Before you can check yourself, Samus speaks. "Woah there. Might want to watch where you're going, Link." Looking up at her, you can see she is now wearing Wii Fit Trainer's exercise clothes, and they actually look pretty good on her. You also note that any and all makeup she had on has disappeared, which you now feel on your own face, and the position of her ponytail had been lowered to match how Wii Fit Trainer had her's.

"Heh, sorry about that. I was distracted by something." You scratch the back of your head with an awkward laugh. You find it a little off-putting that you can't actually feel your hair on your fingertips. You know why, Samus' Zero Suit covered your whole body below the neck, but it still bothered you a little.

"Alright. Just, keep your eyes on where you're going. You wouldn't want to go running into one of the villains like that."

"Yeah, I guess."

"Well, see ya." With that, she walks away, completely oblivious to the changes that have occurred. You take the time to look at yourself. Despite being more covered up than before, you somehow feel more exposed. You are completely covered from the neck down by Samus' skintight Zero Suit, leaving nothing to the imagination. If you had been a girl, this probably would have looked great on you, but it didn't exactly suit your manly frame. The tightness of the suit didn't really bother you too much, except for the tightness on your groin. It was pretty uncomfortable. You were also wearing high heels again, albeit rocket powered ones. After all the running around in Peach's heels, you weren't too bothered by them. Although you did find it a little strange how much it didn't particularly bother you to be in female clothing anymore after trying on three different outfits. In fact, looking back at Samus walking away in Wii Fit Trainer's outfit, you couldn't tell which outfit you preferred. Samus' outfit covered you up more, but Wii Fit Trainer's outfit wasn't as tight. You needed to make a decision before Samus left your sight, or else you'd be in Samus' outfit regardless.
12213221221.title: Clothes Swap

122132212211.content:
"Screw it," you say to yourself, and begin to walk away, Samus' Zero Suit still on your body. You really needed to get back to your room to put the manual away, and maybe the remote too. Until you found Peach at dinner so you could get your clothes back, keeping the remote with you might just do more harm than good.

On your way to your room, you notice things about your outfit. You could feel Samus' hair-tie higher up in your hair than Wii Fit Trainer's had been, and it felt a little tight (much like the rest of the outift did) as it tried to find enough hair to grab onto. Maybe if your hair was longer, like a girl, it wouldn't be as awkward. You also noted your hips swaying slightly due to Samus' jet boots. Not as much as it would if you had a female body, but still a little. You also thought that along with being a bit uncomfortable on your groin, the Zero Suit really wasn't made to be worn by a male. If you had a female body, you think it would probably look and feel a bit better.

You freeze as you think about what you had been subconciously thinking. The whole time you were thinking about Samus' outfit, you were thinking about how it would be better if you had a female body. This worries you a bit. Had the remote influenced you in some way? Was this just some side of you that you didn't know existed that wanted to be female? The more you looked at the Zero Suit on your body, the more you felt it should be a female body filling it, and you should be that female body. This freaked you out, but as much as you wanted to just swap back as soon as possible and then get rid of the remote so it would stop messing with your head, but part of you just wanted to give into these impulses and see where it took you. You could always swap back if it got out of hand, right?
122132212211.title: Screw it, keep Samus' clothes

1221322122111.content:
After a bit of thinking, you decide to go and try getting a female body for now. It didn't matter why you wanted to try it since, as long as you had the remote, you could reverse the changes you make.

Now you had to choose a body you would be "borrowing". You could head back to the garden. You knew Wii Fit Trainer was there and Samus was in the hallways heading there.You could head somewhere else completely. You could also go to the cafeteria to look for someone to swap with. People were usually there either to eat or just hang around.
1221322122111.title: Get a female body

12213221221112.content:
Letting this strange urge carry you, you make your way to the cafeteria. There had to be someone there with the kind of body you were looking for.

Sure enough, as soon as you entered the room, you spotted some familiar faces. At one table, Peach and your girlfriend Zelda were enjoying a meal together. It would have been helpful to know where she was earlier, but things have gotten too complicated to worry about that now.

At another table was a different set-up: the goddess Palutena and the witch Bayonetta. Their bodies were... significantly more curvaceous than you'd anticipated. But they're still a tempting possibility.

Which table do you aim the remote at?
12213221221112.title: Head to the cafeteria

122132212211121.content:
You point the remote at the Princesses. You new them way better and it would be much easier to solve this problem later with one of them.

It occurs to you, however, that you don't necessarily need their bodies. You could always use the gender option and just make yourself a girl. The question was whether you'd want your girlfriend to be a guy or not.
122132212211121.title: The Princess Table

1221322122111212.content:
The temptation is too great. You need to know what you look like as a girl. Besides, swapping genders wasn't as guilt-inducing as taking a body. Granted, the difference was small, but it was there.

Now to the question of the hour. Did you want your girlfriend, Princess Zelda, to be a man? Or would you rather be a girl with her? You're not entirely sure what you're comfortable with. Being a girl yourself is one thing, but being in a relationship with a guy is another. Your curiosity is peaked, but you're not sure if you want to follow through on it.
1221322122111212.title: Gender swap

choices: Stay this way and check on Zelda
12213221221112121.content:
With a sense of commitment, you point the remote at Peach and press the gender swap button. The swap onky takes an instant before you find yourself in a completely different body You're still you, but different somehow. You look down at yourself to find an unfamiliar body where your own body should be.
Your hair was much longer than before, and you could feel it run down to about the middle of your back. Your finger curl around the soft lock and see that it was a brighter blonde than before. Now that you could have a closer look at them, you could see that the fingernails were a little longer, and were painted green. Your limbs overall felt a bit thinner, your waist especially so. Despite the loss in muscle mass, you still felt fairly strong. You were sure you could swing a sword no problem, if it came down to it. Your breasts were on the small-ish side. No unreasonably so. The thought of them being "your" breats is still a little hard to grasp. You hips and butt felt a bit bigger as well. You had also dropped a bit in height, and although you couldn't see your face, you could tell your features were a bit softer. You could feel a bit of make up on your face, and guessed it was about the same amount as Peach usually wore.

The change is a bit overwhelming, and you find yourself just standing still, trying to take everything in. You can feel the steady rise and fall of your chest as you breath deeply, trying to calm down a bit. And yet you also feel... comfortable. Finally, you had a body that fit the clothes you were wearing. Samus's suit showed off every curve of your body, and while that was a little awkward, it also felt immensely more natural than it did on your male body.

Peach was still there, but it wasn't the Peach you had once known. Oddly enough, you knew that the two of you had still retained your old names despite the gender change. Princess Peach was now Prince Peach, ruler of the Mushroom Kingdom. Her pink dress was now some sort of purple suit befitting of a prince, and she seemed a bit taller, and her hair seemed a bit closer to orange than blonde. Neither he nor Zelda considered anything different.

And then the memories hit. Every little moment, changed to make it so that you were a woman. It was actually kind of surprising how little had changed, aside from your body and the way people treated you. You shake your head, feeling your long hair moving about as you do so, trying to break yourself out of your little daze that was set on by all the changes. You have two sets of memories now and yet organizing them takes little to no trouble.

The big difference, you realize, between picking Peach and Zelda is that Peach was far more feminine than Zelda ever was. You still have your memories of fighting Ganon and defeating evil and saving Hyrule, but your memories suggest that you did it in a more girlish fashion. You doubt that, had you switched with Zelda, your body would have the same level of makeup and nail polish. But that's no big concern. You're still dating Zelda and your preferences haven't changed. In fact, you think your body is even more passionately in love with Zelda. You recall behaving like a schoolgirl with a crush around her before, although you maintained your fighting instincts and determination throughout. You just also enjoy dresses and your current outfit a lot too.

This whole swapping business was weird.

You weren't entirely sure where to go from here. You had gotten the body you wanted without any trouble and were far more comfortable for it. You were beyond satisfied. Plus, your concern about the remote doing something to your head, making you a little too comfortable, influencing you to cause more changes... well, that's in the back of your mind too. Plus, it'd be nice to catch up to your girlfriend. You sigh contented just thinking about her.

On the other hand, the remote is meant to be used. What's the point of having the swapping remote in the first place if you aren't gonna use it?
12213221221112121.title: Swap with Peach

choices: Flustered and lovestruck, you tell Zelda
122132212211121212.content:
With a skip in your step, you make your way over to the beautiful Zelda. The closer you get, the louder the thumping of your heart gets. She was just so beautiful and smart and sweet. How did a girl like you end up with someone so perfect?

By the time you reach the princess, your heartbeat is like twenty drums at once and your face is as red as, well, a peach.

"H-hi Zelda!"

She smiles at you with that dazzling smile. You don't think you fully appreciated that smile when you were a guy.

"It's good to see you Link. You get a good night's sleep?" Her hand touches yours and you feel a million goosebumps pop onto your skin.

"Y-y-yes." You find it difficult to look away from Zelda.

Prince Peach grins a wry grin as he gets up from his seat. "I'll let you two lovebirds enjoy yourselves. You make me feel like I should spend some more time with Mario."

And soon the two of you were alone. With your newfound girlishness, you're so much more flustered and nervous around Zelda. What if you screw this up? But she just keeps smiling and giggling at your nerves, occasionally pecking you on the cheek. She must really think you're cute.

The conversation, as much as you can manage it, is a typical one about the tournament and how they've been doing.

Eventually though, Zelda's curiousity is peaked.

"Say Link, what's that remote you have with you?"
122132212211121212.title: Stay this way and check on Zelda

12213221221112122.content:
The temptation is a little too great. You as a girl and Zelda as a man is a mental image that you need to see in person, to satiate your curiosity.

With a sense of commitment, you point the remote at Peach and press the gender swap button. The swap onlytakes an instant before you find yourself in a completely different body You're still you, but different somehow. You look down at yourself to find an unfamiliar body where your own body should be. Your hair was much longer than before, and you could feel it run down to about the middle of your back. Your finger curl around the soft locks and see that it was a darker blonde than before. Now that you could have a closer look at them, you could see that the fingernails were a little longer and thinner than before. Your limbs overall felt a bit thinner, your waist especially so. Despite the loss in muscle mass, you still felt fairly strong. You were sure you could swing a sword no problem, if it came down to it. Your breasts were on the small-ish side. No unreasonably so. The thought of them being "your" breasts is still a little hard to grasp. You hips and butt felt a bit bigger as well. You had also dropped a bit in height, and although you couldn't see your face, you could tell your features were a bit softer. Everything was softer, really. You can feel a small tinge of make-up on your skin, but its just a light blush and some eyeshadow.

The change is a bit overwhelming, and you find yourself just standing still, trying to take everything in. You can feel the steady rise and fall of your chest as you breath deeply, trying to calm down a bit. And yet you also feel... comfortable. Finally, you had a body that fit the clothes you were wearing. Samus's suit showed off every curve of your body, and while that was a little awkward, it also felt immensely more natural than it did on your male body.

Zelda was still there, but it wasn't the Zelda you had once known. Oddly enough, you knew that the two of you had still retained your old names despite the gender change. Princess Zelda, owner of the Triforce of Wisdom was now Prince Zelda, ruler of the kingdom of Hyrule. Her purple and white dress was now a royal outfit vaguely resembling a military uniform, with a purple sash going across his white ensemble. She (he?) seemed a bit taller, and her hair lightened a little, the opposite of your own currently dirty blonde hair. He was also far more muscular than Zelda was and you were fairly sure there was a sword resting next to him. Neither he nor Peach considered anything different.

And then the memories hit. Every little moment, changed to make it so that you were a woman. It was actually kind of surprising how little had changed, aside from your body and the way people treated you. You shake your head, feeling your long hair moving about as you do so, trying to break yourself out of your little daze that was set on by all the changes. You have two sets of memories now and yet organizing them takes little to no trouble.

The difference between this version of you and the former you was very small. You were still the hero of Hyrule, fighting evil, and saving the day and nothing had stopped that. Personalities didn't switch with gender, but you can't help but wonder if, had you swapped with Peach, you'd be as mature as you usually are. Peach was considerably more mischievous and flirty than most people gave her credit for. If her girly behavior was connected to that, would that have transferred to you as well?

This whole swapping business was weird.

Lost in thought, you don't notice someone approaching you until they're right in front of you. You jolt a little but rest easy.

"You startled me a little."
12213221221112122.title: Swap with Zelda

122132212211122.content:
Both Palutena and Bayonetta were tall and curvy. But they way they moved and how their bodies might move in Samus' suit were completely different. Palutena was graceful. Bayonetta was showy. Neither of which were bad things, but they were good to keep in mind.

Who's body?

122132212221.content:
As the bump occurs, you can definitely feel the differences, but you assume you've switched clothes again, until you hear Samus speak to you. "Oh, sorry Samus. I wasn't looking where I was going."

You do your best to hide your reaction s Samus refers to you using her own name, looking up, you see Samus is now dressed in the workout clothes of the Wii Fit Trainer that you had been wearing a few seconds ago. It would seem you accidentally pressed the life swap button when you bumped into her, which now made you bounty hunter Samus Aran. "Don't worry about it. Just try to watch where you're going next time."

Samus smiles, and then walks past you in the direction you had been heading before the swap occurred. You notice you are now wearing Samus's Zero Suit, which while it covered you up more than Wii Fit Trainer's workout clothes, was rather tight and left nothing to the imagination. You were also wearing high heels for the second time today, although now they were a pair of jet boots. When you had thought about what you could do with this remote, swapping lives with Samus was definitely not something you thought you'd be wanting to do.

Samus was still in sight, so you could swap back if you wanted to. Or perhaps you could swap something else. Sure, you had screwed up and this swap was an accident, but perhaps you could make the most of it. Since you had found the remote, you had made one swap and then continually worried about getting things back to normal. Why not throw normal out the window? Why not be Samus for a few days? There'd be plenty of time to get everything back to normal before the tournament actually started, and as far as you were aware, Samus's didn't have a boyfriend you'd have to deal with. Perhaps you could borrow her body for a bit, or put your head on her body to really mix things up.

Although, if you really wanted to throw normal out the window, Samus was old news. You'd already swapped with her, and taken her life, there were plenty of other people around who would be great targets for swaps. You'd just need to wander around a bit to find one. Of course, you could always just leave things as they were for now, and try to live Samus's life for a while without changing things even more.

12213222.content: Not looking where you were going, you end up bumping into Princess Zelda, the princess of Hyrule and your girlfriend. You didn't want to mess up your girlfriend like you had messed up yourself. But apparently fate had a different plan in mind. 12213222.title: Princess Zelda

122132221.content:
"Oof!" Having not really been watching where you were going, you accidentally bump into something. You were looking down after the bump, and from what you could see from the clothes, you had just bumped into your girlfriend, Zelda. Still, something felt a bit off.

"Oh, sorry Link. I wasn't watching where I was going." You try not to react, but the voice you had just heard was your own. Looking up, you see yourself, or your body at least, wearing Zelda's clothes. You had thought you had looked ridiculous wearing Peach's clothes, but you hadn't actually had to look at yourself head on then. Now you could see clearly what you, or at least your body, looked like, and it certainly wasn't pretty.

Trying to keep calm, you reply, "Don't worry about it. I wasn't watching either." You do your best not to freak out as Zelda's voice comes out of your mouth, although even now you can feel that your mouth was different, like your facial structure had been rearranged. But not just that, you could tell your entire body had been changed into Zelda's but if you started examining your body in front of her, she'd know something was up.

"Well, I've got somewhere I need to be. I'll see you tonight." She give you a wink, which honestly looks a little weird coming from your body, before walking off down the hallway. You quickly look over your body so you can decide whether you want to swap back nor not before she disappears. The obvious thing when you look down is the pair of breasts sticking out from under Wii Fit Trainer's tank top. Below that you have Zelda's slender arms, her thin waist moving into her larger hips (larger than yours at least), all the way down to her thin legs and dainty feet. You could also feel Zelda's long brown hair on your head, pulled into a ponytail by Wii Fit Trainer's hair-tie. The outfit at least looked better on you now, but you weren't sure that was a good thing if it meant accidentally stealing your girlfriend's body.

As you ready the remote, you mind thinks back to what Zelda said. "I'll see you tonight." With a few couples entering the tournament (and from how you had seen Little Mac around the Wii Fit Trainer, the possibility of new ones being formed while at the tournament), Master Hand had set up a couples room that people could rent out to spend a night together with their special someone, and tonight you and Zelda would be using it. This causes you to stall the swapping back. Sure, it felt a little wrong to be stealing your girlfriend's body, and it felt very different to your old body (you weren't sure if it was a good different or a bad different yet), but now you were curious. Maybe you could keep Zelda's body for tonight just to feel what it would be like. Still, you suppose if you wanted to, you could give Zelda's body back and borrow someone else's for tonight. Although even with your curiosity, you weren't sure you liked having a female body, especially one with so much less muscle mass than your old body. As Zelda is about to round the corner and leave your sight, you decide to...

12213222221.content:
As you bump into Zelda, you can feel your clothes shifting around you. Having switched through 3 different outfits in that past few minutes, you had become very aware of your clothing, and you could feel it becoming less exposing and more restrictive.

"Oh, sorry Link. I wasn't watching where I was going," Zelda says. Looking up at her, you see that she is now dressed in Wii Fit Trainer's exercise clothes, instead of her usual regal outfit. Without her usual jewelery and makeup, and with her hair pulled back into a ponytail, she looks much more plain than she usually does. Still beautiful, of course, but she definitely looked better in her own clothes.

Quickly glancing back at down at yourself, you see that Zelda's dress is now stretched across your male body. It's not as poofy as Peach's dress, and it feels more sensible, but at the same time it was a bit tighter, clinging to your body, and left your top a bit more exposed, although the armor on your shoulders helped with that. Her jewelery and makeup wasn't as heavy as Peach's was as well. "Don't worry about it. I wasn't really paying attention to where I was going either."

She giggles a bit. That smile warms your heart, even in a situation as odd as this one. She brushes a stray bit of hair out of your face, and says, "Y'know, I always love it when you doll yourself up like this." It takes you a moment to process what she says. You knew reality would change so everyone would think it was normal, but Zelda didn't just think it was normal for you to be wearing dresses and makeup, she liked it. She gives you a kiss on the cheek, which makes you blush. "I'll see you tonight." With that, she walks off. You remember that Master Hand had set up a couples room that people could rent out, and tonight you and Zelda had done just that.

You turn to watch as she walks away, dress swishing and you spin on your heels. You would have swapped back as soon as she wasn't looking if not for the fact that Zelda had said she liked you dressing up like a girl. If she liked it, who were you to deny her of it? Still, you did think the clothes looked better on her than they did on you, and you didn't feel right taking all her expensive jewelery and such away from her (You hadn't exactly felt the same way about Peach's jewelery because, well, she wasn't your girlfriend). You think about what you could do now. Zelda currently liked you wearing makeup and dresses and such, and you liked her wearing the same. Perhaps you could switch back with Zelda so she had her clothes back, and then you could switch back with Wii Fit Trainer so you'd have Peach's clothes again. Peach's dress made you feel a little more ridiculous than Zelda's did, but maybe it would have the same effect on Zelda as you wearing her clothes did. Still, your original plan had been to get your old tunic back, and you'd be going against that plan if you were actually considering wearing the clothes of one of the princesses permanently, just to please this altered reality Zelda. You think carefully over the options, and decide to...
12213222221.title: Clothes Swap

122132222211.content: You decide that regardless of what Zelda thought in this current altered reality, you definitely prefer Zelda to have her own clothes, so you point the remote at her and press clothes swap. In an instant, Zelda was back to normal, and you were back to feeling a little cold in Wii Fit Trainer's workout clothes. Now you had the decision to make. Did you want to just wait until you could get your own clothes back, or did you want to please the altered reality Zelda by dressing like a girl (or at least a more feminine on than you were currently dressing as) again? You were about halfway between the garden, where Wii Fit Trainer was with Peach's clothes, and your room, where you had been heading before your bumped into Zelda and started thinking of dressing as a girl as a good idea. You stand in the hallway for a decent amount of time, thinking about whether you were prepared to wear a dress for the rest of your life.
122132222211.title: Switch back (and maybe go get Peach's clothes)

1221322222111.content:
You decide that as much as you had been wanting your old clothes back earlier, it wouldn't hurt to see if Zelda would like you better if you dressed like a princess. You jog back to the garden, trying to ignore the breeze on your exposed arms and stomach. When you get there, Villager has left, but luckily Wii Fit Trainer is still doing her meditation. Doing your best to put your manly pride aside, you point the remote at her and press clothes swap. Once again, you feel your clothes change around you, and you've changed back into what you had been in after the first swap. You could always have swapped later if you wanted to see how Zelda would react, but you decided that if Zelda did like you in these clothes, you'd need a while to get used to them. Leaving Wii Fit Trainer to finish her meditation, you head back towards your room to finally put the instruction manual away somewhere safe. On the way there, you notice some of the smaller changes you had missed when you were frantically trying to find Peach. For one thing, you were walking perfectly in Peach's high heels, and they gave you a slight sway in your hips. You wondered how different your walk would be if you had the hips to match the sway, but you put the thought out of your head for now. You were already dealing with the clothes of a girl, you didn't want to have to deal with the body of one just yet. You also noticed that while in Wii Fit Trainer's clothes you felt every breeze on your arms and stomach, Peach's dress covered you a bit better, but you'd still feel when a stronger breeze came in from outside and blew up under your dress. You also realise now that you're thinking of the dress as both Peach's dress and your dress, and that you're a lot more comfortable wearing it after spending the last however many minutes switching between various girls' clothes.

When you reach the room, you put the manual on the highest shelf you had, where Toon Link couldn't reach. Not really sure what to do, you decide to check the full length mirror in the bathroom to see exactly what you looked like. You had to admit, you definitely looked a bit silly, although you'd be the only one in the world now that thought that. The dress and gloves had been stretched to fit your male body. Lifting up the hem of the dress, you Peach's heels resized to fit your feet, although it doesn't look as out of place as the rest of the outfit. You are glad the skirt of the dress wasn't shorter, because you found your legs were still unshaven as they were before, creating a strange juxtaposition with the girly dress. You weren't sure if it would be considered weird in this reality if you decided to shave your legs, but if you were going to be keeping Peach's clothes then you might decide to do it at some point, just so it felt better in the dress. Strangely, your face seemed to be the least weird part of the ensemble. The makeup by itself had made your face look more feminine, and the crown and earring added to that. If your hair was a bit longer, you'd barely be able to tell it was a male head you were looking at.

Speaking of makeup, you notice that in all the shenanigans that had occurred, some of it has gotten a little smudged. Noticing all the makeup supplies around the sink, you start touching up your makeup as if by instinct. You find it a little strange that you not only know how to do this, but also feel the need to, but you suppose that the whole point of wearing Peach's clothes again was to look good for Zelda, so you don't mind. After you finish up there, you think about what you could do now. You didn't really need to be anywhere, so you could just hang out in your room and find out the extent of the changes. Although you didn't particularly want to change much about yourself again yet, you were also feeling a little mischievous, so you could use yourself as a middle step to swap two other people. You could think of a bunch of people it'd be funny to swap around.
1221322222111.title: Go get Peach's clothes back

12213222221111.content:
Deciding you aren't quite ready to go parading around dressed like a princess quite yet, you choose to explore the changes from the comfort of your own room. The first thing you noticed aside from the clothes you were wearing being changed was that Peach's array of weapons had made their way onto a shelf where you kept your spare weapons. You weren't exactly sure how much damage you could do on the battlefield with a parasol, a frying pan, and a golf club, but considering the remote had given you the skills needed to use them, perhaps you'd still do it well enough. At the very least, you'd probably be able to cook better.

The next change you notice is that not only have the clothes you were wearing been changed, but also every item of clothing you owned. Even the differently coloured tunics you used for some of the fights were replaced by different colours of Peach's dress. "Huh. At least I get some variety," you say to yourself. You find it kind of amusing how you're thinking about wearing dresses as no big deal now, you just need to get used to the feel of them. You also find a few screenshots from previous tournaments, and find that you are wearing Peach's clothes in every one of them. You suppose that makes sense, since reality was altered to make people think this was normal, although you half wish you actually had the memories and experience that would have come with wearing the clothes of a princess for your whole life, since it would help with adjusting to it if you decided to keep it.

After a while of checking just what has changed, you are bored. At the very least, this time has gotten you more used to the lighter, softer feeling of the dress, and all the other feelings of the other bits that came with it. You still think the dress didn't look the best on your male body, but you were still determined to see if Zelda would like it, and you didn't want to borrow someone else's body yet, especially not a girl's. After staying inside for so long, you were itching to go out and have a bit of a walk around, or get some exercise. Your hand rested on the remote. You could always take it with you to have a little fun messing with other people. Although you didn't have any pockets to keep it in, and if you left it in your room, it would no doubt be safer in case you wanted to use it again to change something about yourself again.
12213222221111.title: Stay in your room

You aim a Peach and press the Life Swap button. It is a little disorienting how quickly you find yourself removed from your old position near the leisure room and thrust into Peach's life down the hallway. You look down at yourself to find that you are now dressed in Peach's pink dress and high heels. On your head you can feel her crown, earrings, and even her makeup. Probably the most disturbing part is that under the dress, you can feel what seems to be a bra and panties, which feel very different from anything you'd ever worn in the past. Looking back down the hallway, you see Peach walking towards the gym dressed in your clothes, not knowing anything was wrong.

You're not sure you like what you've gotten yourself into. Peach's clothes felt weird, especially on your male body, and you didn't want to be dating Mario instead of Zelda. It wasn't permanent, but the thought of doing anything romantic with another man was enough to make you sick, even if everyone thought you were a woman right now. You definitely needed to swap with Peach again before she left, so you aimed the remote at her and got ready to swap.

"Hey, Peach."

You hear a familiar voice behind you. That was Zelda's voice, which once again makes you think of how because of the remote, Zelda is currently your best friend instead of your girlfriend. Her calling out to you startles you a bit, and you accidentally press one the buttons while aiming at Peach before turning to face her. Which button do you press?
1222.title: Life Swap

12221.content:
"Oh, hey Zelda," you say as you turn to face Zelda, hiding the remote behind your back. You try not to show any reaction, but you could feel that your body had changed instead of being put back into your old life.and the high pitched voice your just spoke in and the long blonde hair that blew into your face as you turned around only confirmed this. You briefly glance down at yourself to see that Peach's is in fact filled with the curves it was made for. You have to admit that her clothes feel a lot more comfortable on a female body, but you feel even more uncomfortable than before thanks to all the unfamiliar body parts you now possessed.

"How are you today?" Zelda asks. For a moment, you are worried she'll notice something is wrong, but as if by instinct, you reply without a hint of the worry you were feeling inside affecting your speech.

"Pretty good. I was actually just heading over to the garden." You figure the life swap had let you act like Peach without any problems so you could take over her life exactly as she had left it, if you wanted to.

"Sounds fun. I was heading to the library."

As you and Zelda make small talk, you notice out of the corner of your eye that Peach is getting further and further away, taking your life and body with her. You notice that she looks and acts exactly like you, which makes you realise that with her clothes and body, you look exactly like Peach now. If Peach got away before you could swap, you didn't really know when the next time you'd see her would be, and you'd be stuck as a carbon copy of her, living her life, until you found her again. You definitely didn't want that, but were you ready to risk another misfire by swapping behind your back? The other option would be to swap with Zelda. Sure, you'd still be female, but at least you'd be swapping with a female you were familiar with. And in Zelda's life, you'd have more opportunity to see Peach in your old life, although it might mean Peach and Zelda end up as eachother or something.

122211221.content:
After pressing the button, nothing seemed to have changed, and you thought you had missed Peach (and your opportunity) altogether. However, it was clear something had changed, as instead of treating you as she would her best friend, Zelda came up and gave you a kiss on the cheek.

She said softly in your ear, "I'm looking forward to tonight." She had somewhat of a seductive smile on her face, one you'd seen many times before. "See you later, Peach," she said as she walked away in the direction of the library.

It took you a moment to figure out what had happened. You were still Peach, that was clear from what Zelda had referred to you as when she walked away, and you still looked exactly like Peach, but you had now swapped relationships with your old life, so you were Zelda's boyfriend (or girlfriend you figured might be the more appropriate term right now) again. You looked back at where Peach had gone. Part of you wanted to use the opportunity to go back and find her so you could make yourself normal again, but you were also curious to see just what life would be like now. If the manual was right, in order to keep all your relationships intact, you (or Peach's life) were a citizen of Hyrule, and since Peach was a princess, you'd probably live in the castle with Zelda. People you treat you like a princess, and you had the body and wardrobe to match. You weren't sure if you wanted people thinking you were a girl, nor were you sure you wanted to physically be a girl or wear girly clothes, but your adventurous spirit was making you want to see where this new reality would take you. You looked back and forth between the direction Peach had left in, and the direction Peach had been headed before you stole her everything, thinking about which way you should go.
122211221.title: Relationship Swap

Keep the remote with you and just head to the garden
1222112212.content:
A small smile spreads across your face. Being Peach for a while could end up being fun. It was interesting how little the world as a whole had changed, but how much things had changed for you. The world was pretty much completely the same, except that Princess Peach lived in Hyrule and was dating Zelda, while Link lived in the Mushroom Kingdom and was dating Mario. It was actually a somewhat small change, except for the fact that you were now experiencing life from the point of view of Peach instead of Link. You place your hands on your hips, and let out a small laugh (which sounded more like a giggle with your new voice) as you look at your new body. It was so different compared to your old one, and yet, thanks to the remote, you actually felt somewhat comfortable in it. You could definitely see yourself keeping this for a while, especially since you didn't have to worry about your relationships being messed up.

You look down the hallway where Peach had been headed before you became her. She seemed to have been headed towards the garden, which you can now confirm since you ARE her. Gardening hadn't really interested you before, but perhaps it would be more fun now that you were Peach. You take a few steps towards the garden when you think about the remote. You had already messed up and accidentally become Peach, even if you were currently deciding to keep things that way. Perhaps you should put the remote away for now so you don't mess things up more, but if you did that, you'd possibly miss out on other opportunities for good swaps. Your room wasn't too far from here, so you could put it away in there if you wanted. Although it takes you a moment to realise that you're not staying in your old room anymore, you'll be staying in Peach's room with Zelda.
1222112212.title: Stay as Peach, and go to the garden

choices: Go visit the garden, you've been putting it off long enough
