Zelda snaps you out of your thoughts, saying, "Hey, how about we swap with them?" Looking where Zelda was pointing, you spot...
122332222221222.title: Find some new targets

1223322222212221.content:
"Oh hey, it's Peach again," you say.

"Again?" Zelda asks.

"Peach was the first person I swapped with, although I swapped back with her. So, which one of us should swap with her?"

"Well, it might be easier for me to adjust to swapping with her, but it might be more interesting for you. As long as you don't have a problem with being a girl."

"Well, I'm wearing a dress, aren't I?"

"Heh, very true. How about..."
1223322222212221.title: Peach

12233222222122212.content:
"How about you swap with her?" Zelda suggests.

"Alright," you say as you both hold on to the remote. "Now, what to swap..."

You had really just been thinking aloud, but Zelda makes a suggestion anyway. "You know, if you swapped lives with her we'd be roommates."

"Hmm, that would give us a lot more time together, but then everyone would think I'm a girl."

"Not just any girl, a princess."

"I guess we'd both be royalty then. But what about us? Then I'd just be your best friend instead of your boyfriend."

"Well, isn't there a button to handle that? You can just swap relationships with her first."
12233222222122212.title: Link swaps with Peach

choices: One or both of you swap
122332222221222121.content:
"Alright, I guess. Let's do it." Zelda seems amused by the fact that you're actually going through with this. You point the remote at Peach, with Zelda still holding on to it, and press the relationship swap button. Nothing really seems to happen, but you assume it probably worked, and press the life swap button. In an instant, you find yourself transported down the hallway, now wearing Peach's dress instead of Zelda's. Turning back to where you had been standing before, you see Zelda, still dressed in your clothes, talking to Peach, now dressed in Zelda's clothes. You can't here what the two are saying, but soon Peach walks off, waving goodbye. You take that as your cue to walk over and talk to Zelda.

"That is so strange..." Zelda mutters before you can say anything.

"Hm?"

"Just, seeing Peach, dressed in my clothes, and calling her Link. It just seems so jumbled up."

"Well, we could make it less jumbled up," you say, offering her the remote. "You've got the clothes that match her new life, and I've got the body. One or both of us could swap with her. Or we could just leave it all jumbled up and get used to it."
122332222221222121.title: Swap lives (and relationships) with Peach

1223322222212221211.content:
"Let's fix this a little," Zelda says, turning to face you. She holds in a bit of a laugh, seeing you dressed in Peach's clothes.

"Alright, let's do this." You point the remote at Peach, and Zelda takes hold of it as well. "So, how are we going to do this?"
1223322222212221211.title: One or both of you swap

12233222222122212111.content: Which one of you swap with Peach?
12233222222122212111.title: Link swaps/Zelda swaps

122332222221222121111.content:
"I think the main thing is that she doesn't look like you. I'd still recognise you as Link, regardless of what you're wearing," Zelda reasons. "Besides, if I swapped with her, then I would have anything swapped at all."

"Well, okay, I'll swap with her, but we can still find someone else for you to swap with after," you reply.

"Sure, but I think I'll still hang on to your tunic for now."

You aim the remote at Peach, Zelda still holding onto it, and press the body swap button. Within seconds you now had Peach's delicate, feminine body that matched your new life, and Peach was walking away with your body, still wearing Zelda's clothes. "Well, that settles that," you say, a little caught off guard by your new voice, among other things that came with the body.

Zelda turns to face you. "Wow, that really is strange. You look exactly like Peach, but I know you're Link on the inside."

"Yeah, I guess it is kind of weird," you say, putting your hands on your hips. "It feels weird too, being inside a completely different body."

"Didn't you swap with Peach before?"

"Well yeah, but then I swapped genders, so I had a female version of my own body, and I was still all battle ready and everything. Right now, I just feel so... delicate. Anyway, I think it's time for us to find someone for you to swap with."

"Okay then. Where to, my princess?" Zelda says, mocking the fact that you were currently in Princess Peach's life and body a bit.

"How about we check out the..."
122332222221222121111.title: Link swaps

choices: Find someone for Zelda to swap with
12233222222122212112.content:
"Well, your tunic is nice and all, but I think I'd like my dress back."

"Okay. I was thinking of maybe trying out Peach's body for a while. Since I'm living her life and all."

"Alright. We'll do both then. Peach will end up being completely you. That seems so... strange." Zelda presses the clothes swap button, giving Peach your old clothes, and giving Zelda her dress back.

"Well the more we use this thing, the stranger it's probably going to get," you say, pressing the body swap button, feeling your own body replaced with Peach's. You lower the remote, and Zelda lets go. Peach now looks completely like you.

"Strange, but exciting," Zelda says, once again holding back a laugh, seeing someone who looked completely like Peach but knowing it was you inside. "That's certainly something that'll take some getting used to."

You let out a little bit of a giggle, and give Zelda a kiss. "We'll get used to it together," you say, testing out your new voice. Peach's body felt very different to your own, even compared to the female version of you, but that only excited you further.

Zelda gives a smile, although it was clear she felt a little awkward about kissing someone who looked like her best friend. "So, what now?" she asks.

"Well, right now I'm the only one swapped. We could find someone else for you to swap with if you want. Or, we could just put the remote away somewhere in our room and just try to get used to this for now. Your call."
12233222222122212112.title: Both swap

122332222221222121121.content:
"I suppose if we want to go all out, I ought to switch as well," Zelda agrees, taking the remote into her hand. "It'll certainly make for a funny sight atleast. So long as we use the relationship swap, the two of us will still be together, so nothing is likely to go awfully wrong."

"Good!" you exclaim from Peach's body, excited at the prospect of using the remote for more strange adventures. "Any idea who you want to try it on?"

"Well, if we are to keep theme, I should go find a man to switch around with."

"It'd definitely make for the most unique experience," you agree, "but you should just switch with whoever feels right."

"How about this," Zelda says, "for the sake of adventure, I'll switch with the next person we see."

The two of you then set off. Who do you find?
122332222221222121121.title: Find someone for Zelda to swap with

1223322222212221211211.content: As link and Zelda walk down the hallway the bump into Pit. What will Zelda swap?
1223322222212221211211.title: A contestant

122332222221222121122.content:
"I think this is enough to adjust to for today at least. I'll swap myself another time, if you don't mind," Zelda says.

"Sure, that's fine," you reply. You didn't have a problem with Zelda not swapping for now. You knew she just needed a bit of time to get used to your transformation before she undertook one of her own. "So, shall we put the remote back in our room for now so it's safe, then?"

"Sounds like a good idea." The two of you head towards your shared room. On the way, you notice Zelda looking at you from time to time, amused by the fact that this princess in pink in front of her was actually her boyfriend. "Wow, you don't just look like Peach, you're walking like her too."

If Zelda hadn't pointed it out, you probably wouldn't have noticed, but you were definitely swaying your hips as you walked, just like Peach used to. "Well, I pretty much am Peach now. Except that I still live in Hyrule and I'm dating you."

"I suppose so. It still seems strange that you're pretty much a complete different person."

"I'm still me on the inside. I'm just a princess instead of a hero now. Although I can let Peach's personality take over when I want." The two of you make it to the room, and you hold the door open for Zelda. "Ladies first."

Zelda just laughs. "We're both ladies now, silly." As Zelda enters the room, you hear her say, "Oh, that's different." Entering as well, and closing the door behind you, you instantly see what Zelda had been referring to. The room seemed pretty much the same as the last time you had visited Zelda here, except that instead of being on opposite sides of the room, the two beds had been pushed together into the middle of the room, no doubt something you and Zelda had done upon arriving at the tournament in this reality.

"So, where should we put this?" you ask, holding up the remote.

After some thought, Zelda opens up an empty drawer in her bedside table. "Does this seem safe enough?"

You put the remote inside the drawer, and say, "Yeah, it should be fine. I doubt anyone's going to come looking for it anyway.

Zelda closes the drawer again, standing back up with her hands on her hips. "Well that sorts out one thing then, Li-... Uh, should I be calling you Link or Peach now?"

"Well, when we're around other people you'll have to call me Peach, since that's who everyone else thinks I am now. But since we're alone, just call me whatever feels right."

"Well, alright then... Peach."

"So, what should we do now?"

"Well, if we're not using the remote, how about we just go on with our day as normal for now. I still have things I need to do, and you probably need some time to used to being Peach."

"Alright. I guess I'll see you at dinner then?"

"See you then." And with a wave, Zelda leaves the room, leaving you alone. You wondered what you should do now. Now that Zelda was involved, you didn't want to use the remote without her, it just wouldn't be as fun. You could just go out and see how different your life was now that you were Peach. Although, you life wasn't all that had changed, and simply looking down gave you a good idea of something else you could try out.
122332222221222121122.title: Put the remote away

1223322222212221211222.content:
Noticing your reflection in the mirror, you end up distracted by your new body. It was amazing how different it felt to be in Peach's body, and yet how natural it felt, thanks to the remote. Using the mirror, you end up looking at yourself from different angles, just taking in what you looked like now.

Of course, there was only so much you could do while you had your clothes on. You take off your heels and leave them by the bed, followed by your crown and earrings, which were left on Peach's desk, along with her gloves. Now you came to the big part, Peach's dress. Had you still been Link, you wouldn't have known how you've even go about putting this thing on, much less taking it off, but now that you had Peach's life and body, it was no problem for you. Well, maybe no problem was a bit of an overstatement; you still struggled a little with getting it off.

"Wow," you say to yourself. Standing in front of the mirror, dressed in nothing but a bra and panties, you could see your new body in all it's glory. It was still strange to think that this body now belonged to you, but it did, and you were going to make the most of it. You fall back into the bed, ready to do a bit more than simply looking at your new body.
1223322222212221211222.title: Explore your new body

choices: "Well, I'll leave and let you get on with it then."
12233222222122212112222.content:
Before you can go any further, you hear someone trying to unlock the door, and turning the doorknob. Not knowing what to do, you grab the blanket off the bed, holding it up to your chest to cover up your almost-naked body. The door opens to reveal Zelda, who goes straight to her desk, saying, "Sorry, I forgot my..." Then she noticed you on the bed, covering yourself with the blanket, and your dress lying nearby. She closes the door, locking it from the inside. "Really? I leave you alone for a few minutes and this is what you do?" She had her hands on her hips, and her face showed that she was somewhat disappointed in what you had done.

"Oh come on," you plead, pouting with your new face, "I was curious. You'd probably be doing the same thing if you had a new body too." Zelda looked away, knowing she couldn't deny that she'd probably be curious about her new body too, had she switched. "Besides, if I'm keeping this body for a while, I'm going to end up seeing it naked eventually. Might as well just get it out of the way and get used to it."

"I suppose that's one way of looking it at..." She lets her arms drop by her sides. "Sorry about going off at you before."

"It's fine, I understand why you would." You smiled at the argument being sorted out so quickly, although you still felt a bit awkward about Zelda walking in on you.

Judging by her slight blush, Zelda probably felt a bit awkward about it too. After a little pause, Zelda says...
12233222222122212112222.title: An interruption

122332222221222121122222.content:
"How about I join you then?" Zelda proposed with a sheepish grin.

Link's eyes went wide, "what?!" He was shocked that Zelda would ever suggest going that far.

"Would be a waste if we didn't go nuts with that remote while we have it!" She said, her smiling growing a bit more bold. "Now make some room!" she ordered as she kicked off her heels and began to remove her gloves as well. Soon enough, Zelda threw off her dress, and jumped into the bed with you in Peach's body.

It was awkward for a few moments, neither of you totally sure what to do, but soon enough Zelda took the initiative, grabbing you from the back and pulling you close into a kiss. You responded in kind, finding your hands going lower and lower to her rear. Whatever clothes the two of you HAD been wearing were soon discarded as you went wild with passion using your new body. All the sensations were new and exciting; it was titillating in a way you would have never thought. "Keep going!" you tell her as you rolled on your back, your girlfriend on top.

---

Some time later, the two of you had finished up, both lying on your backs. You stared at the ceiling for a moment before turning your head and saying, in Peach's voice, "that was pretty weird, I'm not going to lie."

Zelda considers it for a moment. "It... really was. I would have never done something like that before. I think the remote must have changed my... preferences. I've never been attracted to Peach until now."

"Well, it was a lot of fun," you say, trying to change the mood as you pull yourself out of the bed. You begin to gather up Peach's clothes that were strewn about and redress. With a bit of difficulty, you clasped her bra as you turned to Zelda and said, "we should try it again sometime. Maybe even with more different bodies."

Zelda had begun to get dressed too, and was much faster about it. She was getting back into her dress as she gave an uneasy smile. "Yeah... maybe. I admit I got a bit too caught up in that though. I have to go now - I need to attend to some things." She got her heels on, but forgot her tiara and gloves as she hurriedly rushed out of the room.

You giggled a bit at Zelda's behavior, and her jumps from uncertainty to confidence, as you turned to a mirror. "Well Peach, I gotta say, it definitely is interesting being you." you say, staring at your half dressed reflection. Your hair is askew and messy, but you don't care much at the moment. Looking around, you suppose you ought to redress. You could put your dress back on, but then, you also have the entirety of Peach's wardrobe about to have some fun with. Not to mention, Zelda's clothes are around too if you want to try out something even more different on your current self.
122332222221222121122222.title: "How about I join you then?"

1223322222212221211222222.content:
You decide to not put "your" dress back on just yet. Instead, you go over to Zelda's wardrobe and have a look in there. You're sure Zelda won't mind if you try on something of her's, probably. Looking through the dresses Zelda had brought specifically for the tournament, you notice a variety of different-coloured versions of the same dress. As Link, you'd had a bunch of differently coloured tunics for the tournament, but now that you were Peach, you guessed you probably had a bunch of differently coloured dresses as well. You pick out one that had pink in the place of Zelda's usual purple, and brought it over to the bed. You're not entirely sure why you picked the pink one, but perhaps Peach's body/life knew what would look good on her.

It took you a little while to get the dress on, having no experience with putting on women's clothing, but you eventually succeed. It fit surprisingly well. It feels a bit heavier than Peach's dress, and it leaves your shoulders and some of your chest exposed. You found it kind of interesting how different the two garments felt. Looking in the mirror, you had to admit that it did kind of look good on Peach's body. It wasn't her usual style, and you think it'd still look better on Zelda, but but it does still look good. You let out a bit of a giggle, thinking about how silly it was that you were spending your time trying on dresses. For the time being, though, you were Peach, so this really wasn't that weird at all.

As fun as it was dressing up in Zelda's clothes, you knew you couldn't go walking around outside your room dressed like this, and so you take off the dress and put it back where you go it from. Your eyes return to the dress you had discarded on the floor earlier, before Zelda had accidentally interrupted you. You could get dressed and go do something else, but as your eyes wander back to you and Zelda's wardrobes, you can't help but wonder if there's anything else you want to try on.
1223322222212221211222222.title: Look through Zelda's clothing

1223322222212222.content: What will you do to Palutena with the remote?
1223322222212222.title: Palutena

122332222221222212.content: So, what will it be? A life swap, or a head swap?
122332222221222212.title: Life/head

12233222222122222.content: First, is it a clothing swap?
12233222222122222.title: Relationship/clothes/gender swap

122332222221222222.content: Is it a Relationship or Gender Swap then?
122332222221222222.title: No, Relationship/Gender Swap.

123.content: Peeking around the corner, you spot your girlfriend, Princess Zelda, seemingly heading in the direction of the library. You figure if it had to be a girl you were swapping with, this was the best possible outcome. You consider your options at the moment. All the swaps seem like they could be interesting, but some definitely had more benefits than others. You could use the body swap to get a little alone time with her body without her knowing, although you think maybe that'd be betraying her trust. Alternatively, you could use a life swap. That way, you'd still have your own body and you'd still be dating Zelda, but everyone would treat you like royalty, although you may need to do something about the dress. You make sure that the remote is still set to Swap Mode 1, you didn't really want Zelda to know you were experimenting with something so (possibly) dangerous on her. Once you see that the 1 button is pressed, you point the remote at her and select...
123.title: Princess Zelda

choices: Let Zelda know about the swap (but swap back first)
Swap some more without letting people know
1231.content:
You press the body swap button, and without any lights or sounds, the swap occurs almost instantly. So suddenly, in fact, that you are almost overwhelmed by all the different sensations you are receiving from Zelda's body. Looking down, you see Zelda's breasts sticking out underneath your tunic. You slowly reach a hand up to touch one of them. It's odd, having feeling further out from your body than you're used to. Before things get out of hand, you control your urges. Playing around with Zelda's body here in public wouldn't exactly be the best idea, especially with Zelda right there.

Speaking of Zelda, you almost burst out laughing when you see her. She looks exactly like you, only wearing her clothes and makeup. It's quite a humorous sight. You'd be embarrassed if it weren't for the fact that no one besides you would notice anything wrong. It took away the embarrassment, and left only the humor.

You are about to head back to your room for a little more thorough exploration of your body, but looking over at Zelda gives you an idea. You had been thinking that this might be betraying her trust, so what if you let her know about the swap? That way it'd be a new experience for both of you, and it could certainly lead to some kinky stuff in the bedroom. As long as she was open to the swap, that is. If she didn't want you swapping with her, she might take the remote away from you just to make sure you didn't. Of course, the remote was right there, as was Zelda. Just because you'd finished one swap, didn't mean you had to stop there. You could swap more with Zelda, or even with someone else. You can only imagine how Zelda's body would look if, for instance, you were wearing Samus's Zero Suit.
1231.title: Body Swap

choices: Link and Zelda start swapping for fun after Zelda gets and explaination
Zelda has an idea for a swap involving you
12312.content:
Link heart felt black and corrupted, he raised the remote up, aimed at Zelda, and pressed the body swap button again. In a fluent instant, he was back to his own male body. Link inhaled deeply, and walked over to Zelda, taking the seat next to her and bracing himself for the worst that might happen.

As Link took a seat, Zelda had looked up from her book to see who was sitting down, and seeing you, she gave her little smile, and kiss on the cheek. "Hello Link," she said in a happier tone than normal, but Link knew that wouldn't last very long. "Hi, Zelda," she had her slight look of concern because of your change of tone, and Link knew what she was going to ask, so you just started, "Zelda, I found something."
Zelda laughed a little, "You are always finding things, repees, tools, bad guys, there is no end to the list of your encounter and pick ups."
"This, is something else," He said showing her the remote, and this got her attention, maybe because she hadn't seen anything like it, "It's a remote that allow the user to swap something with the one it's pointed at, and only the user, in most situations, notice the swap."
At first Zelda seemed, intrigued, but she put Link's tone and new gadget together and figure out what you had done, "What did you swap?" she asked, slight little bit of anger in her voice.
The back of his left had glowed brighter and brighter the more this went on, "I swapped bodies, with you."
A her piercing glare was starting to get to Link, and this was a very unsettling feeling for him, "What happened?"
"I swapped, lost control for a second a took a feel, but I felt I betrayed you so I swapped back and came to tell you," Link confessed, and Zelda calmed down for the most part.
"I can understand your curiosity, but you only needed to asked," She said looking calmer, and she had faintly smiled.
Link laughed at his naivety, Zelda had an adventurous spirit to, so her trying this would be hard to resist.
12312.title: Let Zelda know about the swap (but swap back fi...

12313.content: Looking around, you see a lot of candidates who could make for interesting/fun swaps. You still haven't tried out the clothes, life, or head swap option yet. Which button do you feel like testing out?
12313.title: Swap some more without letting people know

123132.content:
After something as drastic as a body swap, you don't think that JUST swapping clothes is enough to up the ante. A life swap could provide a new set of clothes and experiences, and a head swap would be its own kind of crazy, especially since you have Zelda's body/head already.

You decide to test out...
123132.title: Life or Head Swap

1231321.content:
Life swap sounds exciting. You'd be wearing Princess Zelda's body, but with a totally different identity. It just sounds... so strange. Its too interesting a decision to ignore.

But who do you seek out for this test?
1231321.title: Life Swap

12313212.content:
You decide to go looking for Samus, one of your friends from the earliest Super Smash Bros tournament. If you recall, she should be training in the gym. You head over there, taking in every little different feeling you're getting from Zelda's body. You quickly make your way to the gym, and find Samus on her way out, probably heading back to her room after a training session. Instead of her Power Suit, she was dressed in her Zero Suit. If you recalled correctly, the Hands wouldn't let her switch between the two mid-battle anymore, so she was competing twice, once in her Power Suit and once in her Zero Suit. You quickly point the remote at her and press the life swap button. In an instant, you switch places with her.

Before you can react, you hear Samus's voice behind you. "Hey Samus," she says, waving to you. You turn to see her heading into the gym, dressed completely in your clothes.

"Hey Link," you reply, feeling a little weird referring to her by your name. You wave back, and she heads inside the gym, and you begin to walk away, towards Samus's room. As you walk, you take note of how you look. You can't see your face, but you can feel Samus's makeup on your face, and Zelda's hair is pulled up into a ponytail. Looking down, you see Zelda's body clothed in Samus's Zero Suit, leaving nothing to the imagination. You would have probably never seen Zelda wearing something like this, so the fact that the remote made that possible is pretty amazing in itself. But you'd definitely never see it from this angle. To be the one in control of this body, it was unbelievable, or it would be if it wasn't currently happening. Of course, due to the life swap, you were no longer Zelda's boyfriend, you were intergalactic bounty hunter, Samus Aran, except with Zelda's body. And Samus, in your life but still with her body was the hero of Hyrule, dating Princess Zelda, who had your old body. When you think about it that way, reality seems pretty messed up right now, and you've only done two swaps. But thanks to the power of the remote, everyone thought it was normal, so as long as you were okay with how reality was, it didn't matter. You'd just need to make sure you were in a situation you were happy with once the tournament ended, or at least in a position where you could switch things around in a world you were familiar with.

You reach Samus's room. This could be the perfect time to get a bit more acquainted with your new body, provided Samus's roommate wasn't here. You weren't sure where they're be at this time of day. You pull out the key to the room from... somewhere, and unlock the door.
12313212.title: Samus

123132121.content: You enter the room to find it empty. You start looking around and find a mirror you look at your self excited at how sexy you look.you could stay here or you could go out
123132121.title: The room is empty

1231322.content: You decide you want to try a head swap. You'd keep Zelda's head (and with it her voice), but you could put any body you wanted underneath it. You were positively giddy with excitement over the possibilities. You could possibly swap heads with someone to improve Zelda's... assets. Samus definitely comes to mind. On the other hand, you could chose someone that would create a rather ridiculous combination of head and body. For instance, keeping Zelda's head, but putting it on the body of a Pokemon or something. The possibilities were endless. And if you got bored, you could just switch it up again! But for now, you needed to decide which plan you wanted to try out first.
1231322.title: Head Swap

12313221.content: Who do you seek out? The world is your oyster. While Samus, who is very tall an able, jumps to your mind first, there is a plethora of other contestants who you can also pick and choose from.
12313221.title: Improve your "assets"

choices: No, stay like this for now.
Yes, try to get your clothed back.
123132211.content:
While Zelda undoubtedly has the prettiest face you know of, you can't help but think that you could... improve upon a few other areas. After a short search of the premise, you come across Samus working out in the gym, wearing a bit less than a zero suit...

(http://www.hardcoregamer.com/wp-content/...)

Your face turns a bit red as you watch her lifting weights. You suppose one would need to be strong to wear that power suit. You wait for her to finish before lifting the remote and clicking the headswap option.

Everything is dizzy for a second as you feel yourself be launched across the room, and as you regain your senses you feel a lot more of a... breeze around you. Looking down, you find that the switch worked! You now have Zelda's head ontop of Samus's more tall and athletic body, and you're currently wearing Samus's outfit as well.

You look back to where you were standing to see Samus's head atop Zelda's shorter, skinnier body. She's definitely going to have a hard time fighting with Zelda's body and no power suit. You do, however, realize that she's wearing your clothing, and the master sword is on her back. You really like the outfit Samus has on now, but you don't like the idea of someone else taking your equipment. Do you try to get your clothing back?
123132211.title: Samus

123132212.content: Maybe Lucina? With her body, you'd be able to keep using a sword, and you'd get a nice suit of armor out of it too.
123132212.title: Another Smasher

1231322122.title: Someone else

choices: Try to distract Peach/get her to leave
Go with Peach and keep the dress
Try a blind shot (and screw up)
1232.content:
You take aim and press the life swap button. In an instant you are in the hallway instead of the leisure room. You are surprised by how quick it was, and the fact it didn't make any lights or sounds that would indicate it was doing something this amazing. You quickly turn back too look at where you were, and see Zelda, dressed in your clothes, walking off in the direction of the gym, possibly to do the training you were planning before you got distracted by the remote. The swishing feel of the dress on your legs as you turned to look brings your attention to your own situation. Looking down, you see that you definitely still have your own body, but you are dressed from head to toe in Zelda's clothes. You could feel her tiara on your head, the armor on your shoulders, even the cloth she used to tie up her hair was wrapped around your much shorter hair. You could even feel her bra and panties on you underneath the dress. It was an odd experience to say the least.

Before you can think of what to do next, you realise that you no longer have the manual with you. You had put it inside your quiver, which Zelda (who thought she was you) now had. You figure you were planning on keeping your tunic anyway, even with Zelda's life, so you start to aim the remote at Zelda, ready to swap clothes.

"Zelda!" It takes you a moment to realise that the voice is calling out to you, and you turn to see who it is while hiding the remote behind your back. As it turns out, Peach was coming from another hallway, waving to you. You wave back with your free hand, trying not to show that you're a little worried about Zelda getting out of your sight before you can get your tunic back.

"Hey Peach," you say. You do your best to try and sound like Zelda, and strangely it comes naturally. You make a mental note of that. You may have kept your own mind and personality, but the remote had allowed you to mimic Zelda perfectly to help you claim her life.

"You headed to the library?" she asks. You panic for a second. You actually weren't sure where Zelda was headed before you decided to become her, but it did look like she was going to the library. You mind once again fills you in that Zelda was heading to the library, which means that's were you are now headed.

"Yeah, I was just on my way over there." As you converse with Peach, you keep peaking over at Zelda. She was very far down the hallway now, and if you were right, she'd soon be turning the corner into the gym. If she did that, you wouldn't have a clear shot to get your tunic (and the manual) back from her unless you actually went to the gym, which might make Peach suspicious since it was in the other direction of the library.

"Cool. Wanna head there together?" Now you were worried. If you went with Peach, you'd miss your chance to get your tunic back. You'd either have to find a way to distract a bit with Peach or get her to leave so that you could aim without her asking about what you were doing, or just suck it up and wear the dress until the next time you saw Zelda. Alternatively, you could try to swap without aiming so the swap would happen and you wouldn't make Peach suspicious. There was the chance of a misfire though.
1232.title: Life Swap

choices: Speaking of being Link, it's time to track down your old self.
Why go back now? You have so much more to learn!
12322.content:
Come to think of it, there was no reason to hurry. It wasn't as if you didn't see Zelda regularly, anyway. "Sure, Peach, Let's go." You walk with Peach, appreciating the swish of your dress. Walking in heels, on the other hand, is uncomfortable even if you've inherited Zelda's skills in them. It's not too bad, and eventually, you reach the library. "It's so nice to be able to research with another woman interested in the studies," says Peach as she picks out some books. "Uh...yeah," you say. "Likewise." You spend most of the time on autopilot, relying on Zelda's natural skills. You learn a lot about leadership and magic, the two things both girls are interested in. It works for the most part, except for the times where Zelda would talk about something that had happened to her. You don't have her memories.

"Well," says Peach after a few hours. "That was productive, but I have a date with Mario. We should meet here again soon." "It was a pleasure," you say. To your surprise, it's the truth. Not only is learning fun in this life, but you've learned some interesting things for when you go back to being Link
12322.title: Go with Peach and keep the dress

12323.content:
"Sure," you say to Peach, not wanting to make her suspicious. You figure it's now or never, and point the remote at Zelda behind your back. Of course, it doesn't have the desired results, and you have to try and hide your surprise when it happens. Maybe your fingers were positioned wrong, or you just weren't holding the remote right, because you certainly weren't back in your tunic right now.

But the question is, did you swap with Zelda and simply press the wrong button, or were you pointing in the entirely wrong direction and swapped something with Peach?
12323.title: Try a blind shot (and screw up)

123231.content: From what you could tell, you had still swapped with Zelda, but it wasn't what you had wanted. Instead of getting your old clothes in a clothes swap, you had instead performed a...
123231.title: Swap with Zelda

choices: Hurry up and try to find Zelda again
1232311.content:
Looking down, you were definitely still wearing Zelda's dress, but since you had already been wearing it, that wasn't the shock. The shock came from the fact that the dress, which had before been readjusted to fit your body, had now returned it its original dimensions. Of course, the reason the clothes had returned to their original dimensions was because their original body was filling them. You now not only were living Zelda's life and wearing her clothes, but you also had her body. If the manual was right, you should also have her abilities in magic now, in exchange for your weapon skills. There was pretty much nothing of the original you left aside from your mind, which was affected a bit to allow you to smoothly live Zelda's life. You were a little worried about the possibility of loosing yourself and completely becoming Zelda. The manual did mention that aside from a few mental changes to help with the swaps, such as that you were currently experiencing from the life swap, but you weren't sure if you trusted it. In actuality, the manual was correct and you were in no danger of losing yourself in Zelda's personality unless you wanted to, but that didn't stop you from worrying.

"Okay! Let's go," Peach says as she takes your arm and practically drags you in the direction of the library. She always did strike you as very upbeat and enthusiastic. As she takes you along with you, you glance back at where Zelda was. There's no longer any evidence that she had once been Zelda, aside from the fact that you knew she was. You are only able to get a quick look of her before she goes into the gym, but she looks exactly like you now. Since she also thought she was you, she might as well be the real Link now. You would definitely be taking back some of her (or more accurately right now, his) features next time you saw him. But for now, Zelda had gone inside the gym, and you were stuck as Zelda, heading to the library with Peach to pick out a few books.

Once you were there, Peach tells you she's going to look for a new cookbook, and leaves you by yourself. When you reply to her as she leaves, it startles you a little that you have Zelda's voice, but you suppose her vocal chords came with the rest of her body. Not really being one for reading, slowly walk through the aisles, looking for something Zelda might like, since you pretty much are her now. It occurs to you that this could be a good time to head off and find Zelda, but Peach still had a view of the door. You could pick out a few books and then quickly take them back to your (Zelda's) room before Peach was done and then go find Zelda. Alternatively, you could accept that for the time being, you are Zelda, and try messing around with the remote for a bit to see if you can create some humorous results, or improve your situation.
1232311.title: Body Swap

choices: You borrow some books and leave
You find some potential targets for swapping in the library
12323112.content: Looking down at your own body, which was now Zelda's, you think to yourself, 'Y'know what, this might not actually be so bad.' You had originally planned to live Zelda's life but with as much of your old self as possible. Now that you had been forced to discard as much of yourself as was possible with the remote, you were beginning to think that perhaps you were a bit hasty in your judgement. You were pretty much entirely Zelda now, and now that you had stopped worrying about it, it actually felt kind of good. Right now, you were supposed to be picking out some books, but not being much of a reader yourself, you let Zelda's life go on autopilot looking for books, while you yourself looked for potential targets for swapping. Due to the restriction the remote posed that the person pressing the button had to be one of the two people swapped, swapping two other people would be a bit difficult, but it could still be accomplished in three separate swaps.
12323112.title: Experiment with the remote

choices: Swap back and tell Zelda about the remote
Don't swap back and keep it to yourself
123231121.content:
Unfortunately, there weren't that many people at the library, or if there were, you didn't run into anyone. So you just end up roaming the aisles of the library, collecting a few books that you knew Zelda would like, and borrowing them so you could take them back to your room. You had taken longer looking through the books than you had thought, as Peach had already left by the time you were done. You head towards your room (which had originally been Zelda's) to put the books away. You would be on the lookout for potential targets to swap with, but your arms your full at the moment, which would make operating the remote a little difficult.

You eventually make it to your new room, and struggle to open the door while carrying everything. You're about to just put the books down on the floor so you can open the door, when you hear a voice call from a little ways down the hallway. "Hey Zelda."

You recognise the voice as your own, or at least, your old voice. Looking up from your little struggle with the door, you see your old body walking down the hallway towards you. Technically it was still Zelda, who just thought she was you, but really there was nothing left about her that made her Zelda. "Hello Link," you reply, still feeling a little odd talking to your old body.

"Here, let me get that for you," Zelda says as she opens the door for you.

"Thank you." As you head inside and place your books down, an idea comes into your head. This whole thing might be more fun if both you and Zelda were in on it. She might not like that you had swapped with her without her knowing, but you had no doubt she'd be as curious about the remote as you were. Of course, swapping by yourself could be fun too; then you could do whatever swap you wanted without someone bugging you about it.
123231121.title: You borrow some books and leave

choices: "Let's use the remote for something else."
1232311211.content:
You quickly point the remote at Zelda and press the body and life swap buttons, putting you back to normal. Zelda is also back to normal, and she continues putting the books away. "Um, Zelda," you say, finding you need to get used to your own voice again after speaking in Zelda's for a while.

"Hm?" Zelda replies, barely looking up from what she was doing.

"I've got something to show you." That got her attention. You pull the manual out of your quiver, finding it was still where you had put it before swapping. "It's this remote," you say, showing it to her. "It can swap things between people, like bodies and lives and stuff." You then offer the manual to her. "If you want to read how it works, this manual explains it."

"This seems a bit hard to believe, but okay," she says, taking the manual and quickly reading through it. "How do you know it works?" she asks while reading.

"I already tested it." She looks up from the manual for a moment. "I swapped back though."

"What did you swap?"

"Well, I swapped lives with you, and then I accidentally misfired and swapped bodies with you when trying to get my clothes back."

"You wanted to be me?"

"Well I needed someone to test on, and you were there. I thought it might be fun to be royalty for a while."

Zelda nods, understanding where you were coming from. She closes the manual, done with reading it. "So why are you telling me all this?"

"Well, I thought it might be fun if we were both in on it."

"So you want us to swap lives and bodies?"

"Yeah. Well, if you want to. We could always use the remote for something else. I just thought it'd be more fun if we used it together."

Zelda thinks over it for a while, wondering whether she really wanted to be you or not.
1232311211.title: Swap back and tell Zelda about the remote

12323112111.content:
"Really?"

"Yeah. I mean, why not? It seems interesting, and as long as we don't lose the remote we can always swap back."

You grin. You had hoped Zelda would agree to swapping with you, but you were prepared to find some alternatives if she didn't want to. "Okay then. Just hold onto the remote," you say, pointing it at her. She places her hand on the remote, and you quickly pres the body and life swap buttons. Even though you were ready for the swap this time, the sudden switch from being one person to being another still catches you off guard a little. However, already having spent a bit of time in Zelda's body, the shock doesn't last long. Zelda, on the other hand, is completely new to this, and is completely caught off guard as her mind is put into your body and life.

"Woah," she exclaims, looking over her new body, looking fascinated as part that look as if they don't belong to her move on her command. You smile at her reaction; you were definitely going to have a lot of fun with this remote. Once she's done examining herself, Zelda looks up at you in amazement. "Wow, you look just like me!"

"More than that. I am you now. And you're me."

"Wow," Zelda repeats. "So, what now?"

"Well, we could just try to live each other's lives for now. Or," you toy with the remote you held in your hands, "We could do some more swapping."

:"You want to swap more?"

"Well, we're pretty much completely eachother right now. We could always try swapping with some other people."
12323112111.title: "Okay, let's swap with each other."

choices: You're right, and stay like this
Swap back, I want to live your exact life for a while
123231121111.content:
"Let's stay as each other for a while," Zelda says in your voice.
Nodding in agreement, and replying in her voice "Okay, we should take this slowly, doing only a few swaps at a time and not mixing things up too much."
"With one exception," Zelda says, quickly taking the remote from your smaller hand, pointing it at you, and pushing a button, you had managed to get hold of the remote fast enough to notice the swap.

Taking a step back, and looking around, everything seemed the same, "What did you swap?"
"I thought it would make it an easier stepping stone if I swapped relationships with you."
To which you reply...
123231121111.title: Live each other's lives

choices: Zelda's Point of view in Link's life
1232311211111.content:
"You're right, that would make things a little easier for us," you say, "Now, let's stay like this for now. No more swapping," you continue, talking the remote, but struggled to find a pocket in your long purple dress. Zelda laughs a little, "I'll hold on to this for now," she says placing in one of your bottomless pockets.

"So now want should we do?" You ask your swap partner.
"We are living each others lives, we should go out and see what they are like."
Both of you nodded to each other, and left the room, "See you later," you called out to each other.
1232311211111.title: You're right, and stay like this

1232311211112.content:
"I think, if we're going to do this, we should go all the way!" You say to Zelda with her voice.

"Are you sure? It might be hard."

"Yes I'm sure! I'm not afraid, it'll be more interesting this way," you tell her, hands to your new hips. "If I'm going to be in your body, I want to interact with your friends! It won't be as interesting otherwise."

"Well... if you're sure then." Zelda then clicks the button once more, restoring the proper relationships to their respective lives. "So, do you want to break for now and go experience the day as eachother?"

"Sure! We can meet up again in the evening and see if we want to use the remote again then."

"Alright then. I'll see you tonight... Zelda."

"Same to you 'Link'," You say with a wink as the two of you exit the room and go separate ways down the hall.
1232311211112.title: Swap back, I want to live your exact life for a...

12323112112.content:
"I think that swapping lives and bodies would be something interesting to do but we could probably do that even after the tournament itself Link" Zelda reasons out.

"Okay. What do you think we should do then?" you wonder aloud.

"Well...we are competing in a fighting tournament. We could use this remote to give ourselves an advantage over the other competitors." you girlfriend suggests.

"Wow that's a great idea! Let's do it!" you agree. "Now how do we do this? Do you want to go around the area and just swap with people when we see them?"

"Well since there are too many combinations available of bodies, clothes and lives among other things to swap we should probably do that." she states.

"Okay now where do we go first then?" you ask.

"We should probably go to the ________ first. We should run into lots of other fighters there and on the way." she says.
12323112112.title: "Let's use the remote for something else"

123231121122.content:
"We should probably go to the gym first. We should run into lots of other fighters there and on the way." she says.

"Sure let's do that." you agree. "We should run into Lucina, Ike, Samus or Little Mac there."

Unfortunately, you and Zelda don't run into anyone you want to swap with. Upon arriving in the gym however, you see all 4 people that you mentioned earlier as well as the holder of the Triforce of Power, Ganondorf, the Koopa King, Bowser, the savior of the Lylat System, Fox McCloud and the wielder of the Monado, Shulk.

Ike was with Lucina and they were sparring with each other. Samus, who was currently outfitted in her Zero Suit, was using her new jet boots and helping out Little Mac practice fighting against air-borne opponents. Ganondorf and Bowser were alternately trying to show up the other and mocking the other fighters. Fox was helping out Shulk in practice with using the items that the hands had allowed for use outside of matches.

The pair then begin to narrow down the people that you or Zelda would be swapping with.
123231121122.title: Gym

1232311211221.content:
"We shouldn't pick either Bowser or Ganondorf. Remember what they did in the last tournament?" Zelda tells you, reminding you of the events with Tabuu and the Subspace Invasion.

"Yeah I remember." you agree. "Well then I don't really feel like swapping with Shulk and Fox. I'm not swapping with a young kid or an animal."

"Well then that leaves us with Lucina, Little Mac and our old friends, Samus and Ike." your girlfriend states.
1232311211221.title: Lucina/Ike/Samus/Little Mac

12323112112211.content:
"We should use the remote on someone from a world similar to ours. That way we won't look dumb when we mess up after swapping." you say.

"So that would mean that Samus and Little Mac is out for our first swap target." Zelda concludes.

"Okay then. All we have to choose from are Lucina or Ike." you say.
12323112112211.title: Lucina/Ike

choices: Body and Life swap with Lucina
Body or life swap with Lucina
1232311211221111.content:
Link said, "I'd like know what its like to be a Warrior Princess but what do I swap?"
Zelda says, "Body and life is what you should go for or one of those two."
1232311211221111.title: Link

12323112112212.content:
"Since we want to gain an advantage on all the other fighters of the tournament, we should choose to swap with people who have fighting styles as different from our own as we can." Zelda reasons out. "So our current choices in mind, Little Mac and Samus would be our best options for now."

"Okay then. Who do you want to pick first then?" you say.
12323112112212.title: Samus/Little Mac

123231121122121.content:
"We should swap with Samus first. She has two entries into the tournament, similarly to me, therefore, we can learn the abilities of two fighters in one swap." Zelda says.

"Okay then. Do you want to swap with her or do you want to me to do it?" you ask, putting on a brave face. You would prefer that Zelda wanted to swap with Samus herself since they were both women and the transition would be much easier for her than for you even though you had already tried being a woman.

"Why don't ____ swap with her." she answers.
123231121122121.title: Samus

1232311211221211.content:
"Why don't you swap with her?" she answers. "You know her much better than I do. And didn't you want to experience what being a woman was like? Well then who better than Samus?"

"Well...why not? I mean...I have had some experience living as a female." you say, trying to talk yourself into this.

"Okay then. What do you want to swap with her then?" Zelda says.

Realizing that you had unintentionally trapped yourself into swapping with Samus, you now have no say on who to swap with. Now all you could do was decide on what to swap with her.
1232311211221211.title: Link swaps with Samus

12323112112212111.content:
"Well..um...what do you think I should...swap?" you ask Zelda sheepishly.

"Okay. Since she also entered twice and most of her attacks rely on her weapons and armor. You should switch clothes with her." your girlfriend says.

"That makes...sense. Well then...let's do it." you say. "Umm...you need to touch the remote so that you stay aware when me and Samus swap."

As you point the remote at Samus and place your finger on the clothes swap button, Zelda places her hand on the remote. When she does this, you press the button.

Immediately, a rush of new sensations wash over you. The extreme tightness of the suit against your body. The elevation of your feet in the rocket boots. The hair tie putting your much shorter hair in a very loose ponytail. The slight uncomfortable feeling of your very male groin straining against the Zero Suit.

Looking over at Samus, now wearing your tunic and wielding your sword and shield among other things, you see that she is now doing some sparring practice with Little Mac instead of the aerial training she was doing earlier.

"Link?" Turning to look at your girlfriend, Zelda you see the look of shock on her face.

"It really works!" she exclaims. "Wow!"

"Yeah I told you." you say.

"Okay. That looks really weird on you." she states.

"Yeah I know. It also feels really weird too. Especially down there...you know. Can we do something about that first?" you say.
12323112112212111.title: Clothes Swap

123231121122121111.content:
"Well, the outfit is designed for a woman..."

"Do you have any suggestions? I really doubt I can fight properly like this," Link says, hands covering his crotch.

"I guess wearing the power armor might help a bit, but it would really only be a temporary solution. You'd have to take it off eventually," She turns her head to look over at Samus and Little Mac again. "Hmmm," she puts a hand to her chin and thinks for a moment. "Well, I suppose you could claim the body the suit is designed for..."

"Take Samus's body? I don't know if I'd like that!" Link complains.

"Well, you were alright with my body, weren't you?" Zelda asks.

"You're different," he says.

"Well. with your current body, you probably won't be able to fight as well you could. So either deal with it or swap!"

Link looks to the remote and decides to...
123231121122121111.title: Deal with the uncomfortableness.

1232311211221211111.content:
"It feels a bit counter intuitive, but fine, I'll switch with her," Link says. "Grab the remote," he tells Zelda.

Zelda complies and places a hand on the box as Link lifts it up towards Samus, clicking the body swap button. All of a sudden, his center of balance has completely changed, and blonde hair rests in front of his eyes.

"Woah," Zelda mutters, surprised even though she knew what would happen.

Link stared down at his new chest, more than a bit uncomfortable. "Well," he says, taken aback by his new voice, "that solves that I suppose. We both have two entries into the tournament now."

"Yeah, it does," Zelda says, stifling a laugh at Link's expense. "So how does it feel?"

"Uncomfortable in its own way," he tells her. "Atleast she's tall. This suit is just so tight though, I don't know how she's so casual about wearing it. Your dress was more comfortable..."

"You'll adjust! Now I need to go swap with someone to gain an advantage of my own."

"Alright, who are you thinking of?"
1232311211221211111.title: Swap bodies with Samus

12323112112212111111.content:
"Well, since you swapped with Samus, I suppose it's only fair that I should swap with one of the male competitors," Zelda says, sounding a little nervous. You stifle a laugh of your own. Even though it felt weird and uncomfortable being in Samus's body and clothes, but it was nice that Zelda was willing to try and sort of even it out but hopping over the gender fence as well.

"So, anyone particular in mind?" you ask, still trying to get used to your new voice.

"Well, I'm not really sure..."

"How about Samus's sparring partner?"

"Little Mac?"

"Yeah. I mean, you did say we should try to swap with people with different fighting styles to us, and I think Little Mac fits that pretty well."

"Hm..."
12323112112212111111.title: Male

12323112112212111112.content:
"Well, I'll probably swap with one of the other female competitors..." Zelda says.

"Oh, so I have to be Samus but you don't have to be a guy?" you say, crossing your arms beneath your breasts.

"Technically you're still Link, you just look like Samus."

"Well I don't really feel like Link right now," you mumble to yourself.

"I didn't think you'd have a problem with it, considering how willing you were to swap bodies and lives with me before."

"That's different!"

Stifling another laugh, Zelda says, "Samus was competing in the tournament twice, which gave her a better chance at winning. I'm already competing in the tournament twice myself, so it made more sense for you to swap with her."

"That still doesn't explain why I have to change genders but you don't."

"Well you needed to swap with Samus so you could compete twice. I need to do no such thing, so I can gain my advantage without becoming a man."

"...Fine." You couldn't really stay mad at Zelda, even if her plan had made you into a woman dressed in a skintight suit.

"Thank you for understanding."

You uncross your arms and put your hands on your hips. "So, did you have anyone particular in mind?"

"Hm, I have a few ideas. How about..."
12323112112212111112.title: Female

choices: Zelda is competing twice, using the same moveset with different stats.
Lucina is competing twice, once using Sheik's weapons and once hand-to-hand.
123231121122121111122.content:
Zelda points at Lucina, who was currently sparring with Ike. "Well, if you think it'll help," you say, still not used to hearing Samus' voice when you spoke. You offer the remote to Zelda, and she takes a hold of it (without taking it out of your hand, you needed to be able to see the swap too), points it towards Lucina, and presses a button. Just as quickly as your transformation had occurred, Zelda's hylian dress had been replaced with Lucina's clothes, the Parallel Falchion strapped to her hip. It was interesting watching a swap occur that you weren't part of. It just sort of... happened, with no warning.

"There," Zelda says, taking her hand off the remote. "Now i should have my own magic abilities, as well as Lucina's skill with a sword. And her clothes should be a bit more practical to fight in than my dress."

"Hm, not bad." You glance over at where Lucina and Ike were sparring. She was still fighting against Ike, but she no longer had a sword, and she was wearing Zelda's dress. However, something catches your eye. During their little practice fight, Lucina pulls out some sort of needles and throws them at Ike. You recognised the needles as those Zelda used while in her Sheik disguise. "Hey, you can still use your Sheik disguise, right?" you ask Zelda.

"Well, I should be able to. It's not like my ability to transform is linked to my clothes. Why do you ask?"

"Lucina's using your Sheik weapons," you say, pointing at Lucina and Ike's sparring match. Sure enough, Lucina was not only using the needles, but also the Burst Grenades Zelda had prepared specifically for the tournament.

"Huh. How did that happen?"

"Well, the clothes swap does swap all the clothes you own. I guess that included your things from your Sheik disguise. Maybe your Sheik outfit is one of Lucina's alternate costumes or something."

"Let me check something," Zelda says before promptly disappearing into a burst of light. The light fades to reveal Zelda's Sheik disguise, but not as you remembered it. Her hair was still blonde, and she had a more boy-ish, athletic body, but she was still wearing Lucina's clothes. The only difference between her attire as Zelda and her attire as Sheik was that Sheik now wore the butterfly mask Lucina had used to disguise herself when she traveled back in time. "Well, that's strange."

"So you have the same outfit and everything, and probably the same moves too."

"So the only thing that changes is my strength and speed now. Great, I'm a clone of myself." You frown slightly at her use of the term 'clone'. Many fighters referred to fighters with very similar moves as "clones", but when people like Toon Link and Lucina started to take offense to the term, it began to be used less.

"Well, that's if you're even competing twice."

"Oh, you're right. Without two move sets, I might not even have two spots. Is there any way to check?"

"Well, we should have new memories to match the new reality, as long as our old ones."

The two of you think back through your new memories.
123231121122121111122.title: Lucina

choices: Look for a different person to swap with
1232311211221211112.content:
"Well, we just wanted Samus's gear really. I'm willing to bet my body is stronger than hers when the gear is off!" Link insists. "I think switching bodies would lessen overall potential of winning."

Zelda gives it another moment of thought. She looks at the remote's buttons and says "Alright, fine. I think you have two different options then. You can click gender swap with Samus or some other women, and thus still keep your body but fit the suit better, or find a woman who is physically stronger than you and Samus - or who has some other advantage - and take her body."

"Are those my only options?"

"Unless you just want to deal with the Zero suit, yes."

She offers the remote to Link and he accepts it. Looking at the buttons, he chooses to...
1232311211221211112.title: Find another solution

choices: Look for a body that's already female
Just look for a strong body to turn female later
12323112112212111122.content:
"I guess I ought to take a new body since we're out to gain an advantage."

"Alright. The only real requirement is you get a female body so that the Zero Suit is easier to use. You could try to find a body stronger than you or Samus, but the only person who jumps to my mind is Lucina -maybe wii fit trainer- and there's no guaruntee either of them are that much of an improvement," Zelda says.

"Doesn't sound like a lot..."

"Well there are other people around as well. Assist trophies, background charaters, etc. Palutena may be an option too, but I don't know if her powers would be carried along with her body. There is a more creative solution as well..." Zelda trails off.

"What is it?"

"The remote has the power to switch genders. Presumably, you're capabilities are the same no matter which gender you are. So you could take the body of another male contestant and just use the gender swap button to turn that body female, thus making the suit fit."

"That's certainly one of the more involved solutions," LInk replies.

"It is, but it might have the most notable effect depending on who you switch with."

"Alright, let's try..."
12323112112212111122.title: Look for a different person to swap with

choices: Leave and see what else is going on
1232311212.content:
You just found the remote, so you should have some fun alone with it for a while. You thank "Link" for his help and give a wave as he leaves the room, giving you a moment alone.

You looked at the books and gave a laugh. As though you'd read at a time like this. You walk up to the mirror and begin to examine yourself. You do a bit of a spin, taking in the full view of your new body. You put your hands to your hips and give the mirror a wink and blow a kiss while your at it, laughing at the image.

You throw the remote on your bed and continue to mess around. You give a bit of a twirl, feeling the silky fabric of the dress spin all around. It's unusual having clothes this loose. You can feel a bra holding the weight of your new breasts as well as you begin to squeeze at your chst a bit. You mull over what to do now that you have the room to yourself. You c n lock the door if you want, to have your fun uninterrupted. There re all sorts of things you can do in Peach and Zelda's room. You can examine yourself with different outfits... maybe fewer outfits, and maybe try out some of your new abilities. You notice a different part of the triforce glowing on your hand and your curious about how Zelda's powers work. Yu are in her body after all, you need to know how to fight.

You could leave the room too, either with or without the remote. You could explore life as Zelda, or switch some more stuff around with people for fun. The world is your oyster!
1232311212.title: Don't swap back and keep it to yourself

choices: She wants to know what the remote is doing on the bed.
12323112121.content:
After a few minutes fiddling with the dress, he finally found himself staring at Zelda's body in her full length mirror, down to her lingerie. "Huh, she looks good from any angle it seems," Link says with a laugh as he looks up and down, giving his chest a squeeze. "Oh... that feels different..."

Feeling adventurous, he reaches behind his back to try unhooking the bra to get a better look. "Urk, rarely have to take them off like this..."

Finally he finishes the act, freeing his - or I suppose her - breasts for all to see. "Wow! Now we're talking." Suddenly he had unrestricted access to his new body, getting to feel it all.

He was interrupted, however, by a knock on the door.

"Uh, hold on, I'm not uh," Link wasn't sure what to say.

"Its just me, Peach, don't worry."

"Give me a moment!" Link responds. "I'm not dressed."

The doorknob turns anyways. Beginning to panic a bit, embarrassed at his nearly naked state, Link skitters off into the bathroom that Zelda and Peach shared.

"Zelda? You here?" Peach called out.

"Uhm, yeah, I'm in the bathroom... I'm about to take a shower!" Link improvises.

"Ah! I'm sorry. Nevermind me," Peach tells him.

Giving a quiet sigh of relief, Link realizes he can still have his fun in the other room. He turns on the shower water, and takes off what was left of his clothes. Before he can climb into the shower though, he hears Peach ask something from behind the door. What was it?
12323112121.title: Mess around in the room

123231121211.content:
"Whats this on your bed? We don't have a TV, do we?"

"Oh no..." Link mutters. "Uh, its not important, just ignore it!" He prayed that she would listen. Looking around the room, he found a towel, wrapping it around himself. He didn't care if it was suspicious, he wanted to make sure she didn't mess with the remote.

"These labels don't make any sense," Peach said, the remote in her hand as Link opened the door.

"Its sorta hard to explain, but I need it, can you hand it to me?"

"Uh, sure thing Zelda," Peach responded, a bit weirded out. She placed the remote in your hand, and you breathe a sigh of relief, moving back into the bathroom. "Not sure why you'd need it to bathe..." Peach whispers to herself, too quietly for you to hear.

"Gotta keep this thing hidden!" You tell yourself, stowing it away under the sink for now. "Who knows what could've happened." You decide to check yourself to make sure no swaps happened. As far as you can tell, you still have Zelda's body and clothing, but you suppose that the remote makes it impossible to notice anything, which is disturbing.

Did Peach use the remote without you knowing?
123231121211.title: She wants to know what the remote is doing on t...

1232311212111.content:
You still think of yourself as Link, albeit in Zelda's life, so you know it couldn't have been a life swap. Granted, you wouldn't be able to tell, but it's too complicated for Peach to have done while you were in the bathroom.

What kind of change could Peach have done?
1232311212111.title: Peach used the remote

12323112121111.content: Which swap did Peach make?
12323112121111.title: Body Swap/Clothes Swap

12323112121112.content:
It was strange, there was no real way to tell if your life was different. But it seemed right. You were still best friends with Peach and Daisy. Bowser was always harassing you. And you were dating that wonderful plumber Mario. It was all just perfect. Even with worry in the back of your mind, you couldn't be too upset.

As you put on Zelda's dress, you wondered if you should tell one of your friends about the remote. It could be a lot of fun with Peach by your side. Or maybe you could bring your boyfriend into it. It didn't feel right betraying either of their trust.
12323112121112.title: Relationship Swap

choices: You go find an increasingly confused Peach
123231121211121.content: You made your decision: it was only reasonable to let one of the people closest to you. Maybe you could even have more fun. Peach was a lot of fun for being the Princess of Hyrule.
123231121211121.title: Tell a friend

1232311212111211.content:
Peach was baffled beyond all belief. She thought it was weird enough when Zelda had been so weird about that remote. But things seemed different when she walked about the halls. It was difficult to explain, but the looks they gave her were different.

This idea only cemented in her mind when Link was holding a door for her. "Oh, thank you Link."

He smiled with an unusual warmness. "Anything for you, Peach." Before she process that, he gave her a quick peck on the cheek and went on his way.

She touched the spot in shock. The nerve! Flirting with me when he's dating my best friend!

She was in a right mind to chase him down and thrash him when, lo and behold, her friend appeared.

"Peach, I'm glad I caught up to you!"

"I am too!" Peach huffed angrily. "Did you see what Link did?"

You blink in confusion. Was your old body behaving strangely? "He's always been a good boyfriend to you, did he do something wrong?" The fact that, logically, you would've been Peach's boyfriend didn't even enter your mind. Perhaps you believed you swapped relationships and usually Selda would be dating Peach. Or perhaps you couldn't even consider thinking too hard about those differences.

Peach stared at you in surprise. "B-Boyfriend?"

"I can give him a talking to if he bugs you, you know."

Peach slowly shook her head. "...N-no, it's alright. It's, uh, just between us."

Satisfied, you turn to the other matter. "Anyway, I wanted to apologize for not telling you about the remote. I wanted to test it out more."

"Test it out?"

You explain the powers the remote gave you, as understanding appeared on Peach's face.
1232311212111211.title: You go find an increasingly confused Peach

12323112121112112.content:
"That's incredible!" Peach marveled. She felt guilty for the mistake: if she had just told Zelda about pressing the button, this wouldn't have happened. She should've confessed, but... maybe if she could get the remote, she could stealthily get things back to normal.

Plus some fun in the meantime would be nice.

"And I was thinking we could use it together, experimenting and trying it out."

Peach quickly agreed, much to your relief. This would be much more fun with a friend by your side.

"So, where should we start?"
12323112121112112.title: Peach doesn't admit a thing

choices: Keep having fun in Zelda's body
1232311212112.content:
Thankfully, Peach didn't have the time to press one of the buttons, although you were still a bit unsure. You decided to lock the bathroom door just to make sure she wouldn't come in. "I guess I shouldn't worry about it," you mumbled. If Peach kept acting weird, you'd ask her if she pressed it. She'd probably try to swap back soon if she made a switch.

Putting your mind to other matters, you grin as you unwrap the towel from your body, sauntering over to the bathtub which you begin to fill up. You throw off what was left of Zelda's undergarments as the room fills with steam and jump into the large, rather luxurious tub as it reaches fullness.

"Ahhh," you sigh as you lower yourself in. You couldn't recall the water in your room getting this hot. In fact, your bathroom only had a shower - not a tub at all! You supposed this was one of the perks of being a princess. It was very relaxing, and it washed away some of the stress you had felt over Peach nearly discovering the device.

Feeling the hems of your hair touching the water, you suppose you better use the chance to wash off. Holding your breath, you dive underneath the water for a second. When you pull out, you feel your soft hair dripping down your back. Everything just feels soft and different as Zelda, you admit you could get used to it as you move to wash yourself. "Worth it," you whisper as you find a bar of soap and begin to scrub down.

---

Some time later - later than you'd like to admit, you finally got out of the tub, wrapping your towel around yourself once again. Your face was rather red after all the exploration you'd done, but you had plenty of fun in the process. As you dry off, you put your ear up to the door, listening into the room. It seemed that Peach had left, to your relief. "Probably means we didn't swap." You go to the cabinet to pull the device back and return to the main bedroom. "Got to find it a real home..." eventually you settle on what seems to be a jewelry box of some sort with one empty space that just barely fit the remote. The box locks, meaning it'd be hard for anyone to take the remote out.

Feeling dry, you throw the towel off and search the room, eventually finding a bathrobe to cover Zelda's (now yours) naked body. It was a light shade of purple, and was incredibly comfortable. You imagined it was quite expensive. "The princess lifestyle is looking better by the minute."

You continue to look around and find Zelda's makeup table. Sitting down, you realize her hair needs to be completely rebrushed, and her makeup needs doing again. You weren't sure how to address this at all, but suddenly find that Zelda's memories take autopilot, doing her hair up probably and applying her usual light coat of makeup. It was amazing; you were Link deep down, but it was so easy to fall back on Zelda's identity if you wanted too. It was almost as though you were both yourself and her at once.

Staring at your new face up close, you wonder where to go from here. Being Zelda was great! However, you sorta worried for the real Zelda. While you were living her life, she was you, but totally unaware. It was almost like she didn't exist for the moment, which was worrying. You wanted to atleast check on her, even if you don't switch back right away.

What do you decide on?
1232311212112.title: No

12323112121122.content:
"Ahhh there's no reason to rush," you decide. You haven't even had the device for that long anyways; you justify staying as Zelda as a necessity for further learning the remote's powers. You get up from the makeup table and start to redress. You struggle a bit getting Zelda's dress and undergarments on, but once you relax you find that your body puts it all on reflexively. You give one more smile at the mirror, looking completely like your girlfriend, as you saunter out of the room to go socialize as Zelda.

Did you leave the remote in the room or take it with you, though?

You were just going to get the hang of being Zelda in public - you didn't think you'd need the remote, so you left it locked up in the room. As you walked out to the garden to find Peach, you found yourself greatly enjoying the evening air. You felt the fabric of your dress swish around your legs as you swayed your hips, and your long hair tickled against the back of your neck. Everything just felt a bit euphoric after using the remote, and you hoped it wouldn't end any time soon.

You found Peach at her own little vegetable patch, planting turnips. You knew firsthand that those things weren't for eating, they HURT. "Hey Peach!" you call as you approach, prompting her to turn and look at you.

"Oh! Hello there Zelda. Enjoy your bath?" She asks with a smile.

"Yes, I certainly did," you reply. "I just wanted to know if you wanted to go grab something to eat with me? It's already evening and I didn't even have lunch today!"

"Oh! Certainly, just let me finish up," she replied as she continued to go about the replanting. She didn't realize that you were looking her over while she did, making a small list in your head of future bodies to try out whenever you happened to move out of Zelda's. A part of you felt bad for thinking about people that way, but the remote was just too much fun, and you're adventurousness was telling you to keep trying new things out. Eventually she finished up and the two of you chatted genially as you walked, although you were secretly thinking of settings on the remote to use on Peach all the way to the dining room.

While you were gone, did someone discover the remote back in Zelda's room?
