Deciding that at least you have the manual now, you can put it away somewhere safe and then worry about fixing yourself up. You leave Peach and Zelda to their conversation and head back to the rooms. You frown a little as you notice the way you are walking. Now that you had Zelda's body from the neck down, you were moving like she would to an extent. If the feeling of having her body wasn't weird enough, you now also had to put up with her hips swaying side to side as you walked. It was definitely not something you liked now that you were the one doing it.

You almost try to enter your old room, when you remember that you're Zelda now, and thus you should be using the room Peach and Zelda share. You head inside and hide the manual in amongst the other books on Zelda's shelf. Now as long as you didn't switch lives again, and Peach didn't get too nosy, you'd always have access to the manual. Now there was the issue of making yourself normal again, although still with Zelda's life. Right now you had your own tunic, being worn by Zelda's body from the neck down, and on top was your own head, decorated by Zelda's jewelery and makeup. It was an odd combination, but probably not as odd as Zelda now looked, considering she had both her dress and your hat, which really didn't go together, and your male body underneath the dress. You felt like you should do something about this, but you'd have to find Zelda and decide on what to swap first. Finding Zelda should be the easy part, since you had been heading to the gym before you found the package, so she should be there if she thought she was you now.

As for deciding on what to swap, there were a multiple of different things you could do. Now that you had the manual back, getting your tunic was less of a concern, so you could just do a head swap and try out wearing a dress again. However, you were thinking about borrowing Zelda's body before you decided to borrow her life. Sure, you only had her body from the neck down, but it was definitely something. If you left your heads on your new bodies, maybe you should do a clothes swap so that you each had the clothes that matched your body. If you really wanted to get complicated though, you could try to make it so that you had the clothes that matched your life (completely, not just the top or bottom), and the body of your girlfriend. If you switched your heads back, and then swapped your clothes with someone else, then with Zelda and another person, you could swap your heads without getting your clothing mixed up, and you'd just have to swap your clothes back with the people who had used as a reserve to hold your clothes. It was a little complicated, and had the chance of going wrong, but if it worked than you'd completely be Zelda except for your head, which would have Zelda's jewelery and makeup on it. The thought excited you, plus if it worked like you thought it would, whoever you used as a reserve to hold you and Zelda's clothes would end up with the clothing of the other reserve from the neck down. That could mean you would get the Zelda experience, and have the hilarity of seeing, for example, Mario running around in Peach's dress. And then again, you could just go with your original plan before the head swap happened with was to be Zelda, but look exactly like yourself, body, clothes, and all.

Of course, you were the more normal looking one between you and Zelda, so as long as you didn't mind your girlfriend (although boyfriend would be the more correct term right now) looking like a crossdresser, you could just leave things as they were, and maybe go have fun using the remote to mess around with other people. Or you could put the remote away and just enjoy the rest of the day as Zelda. There were a number of different things you could do.

Looking around, you find that Little Mac and Samus, in her zero suit, were both there as well, each working on their own individual sandbags. That meant that if you wanted to, you could do the more complicated swap plan that would get you Zelda's life, body, and clothes. After weighing up the four different options you came up with, you decide that you're going to have...
1232312121.title: Go find Zelda and swap something

choices: Take everything of Zelda's except her head
Be yourself but with Zelda's life
12323121212.content: You decide that you're either going to take Zelda's everything except for her head, or you're going to have everything of yourself except for her life. If you went with your plan to take everything, you'd end up swapping Little Mac and Samus's clothes below the neck, but you didn't really care. It'd be pretty funny actually. Taking a little more time to consider your options, you decide to...
12323121212.title: All or Nothing

choices: Go mess with people with the remote
123231212121.content:
You decide you want to keep Zelda's body, but also take her full outfit, not just the top or the bottom. You position yourself in front of a sandbag and swing your sword at it a few times. That way Zelda shouldn't walk off once you swap heads with him. Speaking of which, you swap heads with Zelda, which causes you to end up with your head back on your old body which was currently wearing Zelda's dress. After walking around in Zelda's body for a bit, it feels a little strange to have your old male body back, but it won't be for long. You check to make sure Zelda hasn't walked away, an sure enough, she's still there slashing the sandbag. You turn around and aim the remote at Little Mac and press clothes swap. This puts you in Mac's tank top and shorts, while Mac continues working the bag in Zelda's dress. You chose to swap with Mac first because you though it would be funny to see him in Zelda's clothes, and you were right, as you have to try and hold in a laugh at the sight. However, you need to make sure your tunic and hat stay together too, so you swap clothes with Zelda, putting her in Mac's boxing outfit, and you in your original clothes. Luckily she hasn't notice you're here yet, because if it had been you (and she is you right now) and you had seen Zelda right now, you would have come over to talk to her at the very least, and that would have messed up your plan.

Turning to Samus, you hit clothes swap again, putting her in your tunic and you in her zero suit. The skin tight suit had a very different feeling to the other 3 outfits, which had been more loose, and probably wouldn't have been to bad if you had been wearing it on Zelda's body instead of yours. As it stood, the tightness on your groin was a bit uncomfortable, but it was definitely something you'd be interested in trying out at a later date once you had acquired Zelda's body. Seeing Samus attacking the bag with your sword, you decide to try out a kick with Samus's rocket boots. The rocket activated just as your foot hit the bag, and you could really feel the power behind the kick. Now you were even more interested in trying Samus's clothes more, but for now you returned to the task at hand. You point the remote at Zelda and press head swap. In an instant, you are back on Zelda's body, now wearing Little Mac's much more loose clothes. You can still feel Samus's hair-tie in your hair though. Now you had the body you wanted, you just needed to get the clothes back.

First things first though, you need to get Zelda back into your tunic. You point the remote at Samus and hit clothes swap. You are once again in your old tunic, and Samus is wearing Mac's outfit, but her hair is back in a ponytail like it was before. You swap with Zelda again, and now she is completely you except for her head, putting you back in Samus's zero suit. You were right in your earlier thought; the suit was a lot more comfortable on a female body. However, that was for another time, because right now you wanted Zelda's dress back, since you hadn't actually worn it on a female body yet. You point the remote at Little Mac and press clothes swap. Just as with the zero suit, the dress feels a lot more comfortable hugging Zelda's curves than it did sticking to your male body. And with that, your plan was complete. You step back to admire your handiwork.

Zelda was hacking away at a sandbag with the Master Sword. She now wore your old tunic and hat, and below her neck she had your strong body. On top of all that, she was living your life, so she believed that she was actually you. Over on the other side of the gym, Samus was punching and kicking her own sandbag. Instead of her zero suit, she was wearing the tank top, shorts, and boxing gloves of Little Mac. Before the swap, she had been entering the tournament twice, once as Samus and once as Zero Suit Samus, but considering all she'd own of the power suit now was the helmet, you weren't sure if that would be the case anymore. Near her was the newcomer, Little Mac. Despite the added power he could have by kicking with his rocket boots, he still seemed to only be using punches. However, even though he wasn't using them offensively, he still maneuvered around the bag in Samus' high heeled rocket boots as if he had been wearing them his whole life, and from his point of view, he had. Since the manual said you'd gain any skills required with your clothing, that meant that Mac probably owned, and knew how to operate the power suit, so he had probably taken Samus' place as a double participant in the tournament. Speaking of double participants, you were now wearing Zelda's full outfit from head to toe, and below your head you had the body that the dress was made for. You were also living Zelda's life, so everyone thought you were her, and you had all of her magical abilities. With those magical abilities probably also came the ability to transform into her alter ego, Sheik, which meant you'd also be having double participation in the tournament.

For a second you think that maybe you can keep Zelda's dress in this form, and take Samus' zero suit in your Sheik for, but you realise that would also give you the power suit, so you'd probably be participating in the tournament three times. The thought intrigues you though. You do still want to try out transforming into Sheik, but you could also go and mess with other people using the remote.
123231212121.title: Take everything of Zelda's except her head

123232.content: You could have sworn you had pointed the remote at Zelda, but somehow you screwed it up and the remote ended up hitting Peach. No doubt Zelda was at the gym now and you'd have to get your tunic and the manual later. Which button did you press to swap with Peach though?
123232.title: Swap with Peach

1232321.content:
Looking down at yourself as the swap occurs, it's clear you pressed the right button, because your clothes certainly changed. However, once you see who's clothes it is, it becomes ever clearer that you must have been pointing the remote in the entirely wrong direction. Instead of your green tunic or Zelda's dress which was at least sensible, you were now wearing Peach's pink, puffy dress. You could feel the change from boots to high heels, the tiara to a crown, the larger earrings now dangling from your pointed ears, the ring on your hand. You can even feel the more subtle change of Peach having more makeup applied than Zelda had, a feeling you doubt you'll ever get used to. You look up again to see that, as you assumed, Peach is now wearing the clothes that belonged to Zelda, and she actually doesn't look too bad in them. It makes her seem a bit more mature, although that illusion is broken once she speaks.

"Okay, let's go then!" Peach snaps you out of your trance by taking you by the arm and practically dragging you along to the library. You do your best to keep up with her, still marveling at how you somehow knew how to walk in high heels. You definitely didn't want to keep Peach's clothing. Not only did you feel ridiculous (and probably looked it too), but the material felt a lot softer on your skin than anything you were used to wearing. It wasn't a bad feeling, it just made you feel a bit weird inside. That said, it was definitely very light and easy to move about in, much more so than your old clothes with your weapons strapped to your back or Zelda's outfit with the armor on the shoulders. You could get used to this sort of freedom, but not if it meant you had to participate in the tournament without any weapons to protect you.

Soon the two of you reach the library. "So," Peach says, "I'm here to try and find a new cook book. What about you?"

Your mind fills in the blanks for you, and you answer in a manner just like Zelda would. "Oh, I'm here to find a few books for some late night reading."

"Oh." Peach almost seems disappointed to hear this. Her pouty expression contrasts with her regal appearance she gained with Zelda's clothes. It's so comical you consider letting her keep the outfit, until you remember that that's supposed to be your outfit right now and you feel a great deal more sensible wearing that, even if it is still a dress. "Knowing your tastes we'll probably be looking on opposite sides on the library. Guess I wasted your time for nothing." You are about to tell her that it's no problem and that she didn't waste your time, because even though she caused the predicament that got you stuck wearing her dress, Zelda would have told her that it was okay. However, before you can get a word in, her mood does a 180 and she seems completely cheerful. "Well, I guess I'll see you later. Bye Zelda!"

As she walks away, waving to you, the fact that she calls you Zelda again catches you off guard and you forget that you need to swap your clothing back with her. By the time you realise that you still have the pink dress, Peach is long gone into the vast maze of bookcases that i the library. You knew she was looking for cook books, but not being much of a reader (or chef) yourself, you didn't know where they would be located in the library. You can't help but laugh a little at how strange this predicament you've gotten yourself into. Here you are, the hero of time, standing in the entrance to the library with a reality altering remote, dressed like Princess Peach with the rest of the world thinking you're Princess Zelda. You couldn't have made this up if you tried.

You think about what you could do now. You still want to get out of this dress, even if you were starting to get used to the softer feel of it, so finding someone to swap clothes with is your primary goal. Zelda was going to be here looking for a book to read, so you wandering around the library shouldn't draw any unwanted attention. You could use that to your advantage to see if you can find Peach in here again, or really anyone with better clothes than this. Alternatively, you do still want to get your old tunic back and the manual, so now that Peach is gone you could head back towards the gym and hope Zelda is still there. You don't think Peach's dress really suits Zelda, especially now that she'll be acting like you, but it'll certainly look better on her body than it would yours.
1232321.title: Clothes Swap

1232322.content: Which button did you press to swap with Peach though?
1232322.title: More Swaps

choices: Wait until you get to the library
12323221.content:
In an instant, your perspective is changed. You are still looking at Peach, but now she has a very manly body underneath Zelda's dress. Looking down at yourself, Peach's breasts sticking out from under her pink, poofy dress, but would could still feel Zelda's tiara on your head, so you assumed the rest of your head was still intact too. You quickly look over at where Zelda was, only to get a quick glimpse of her going inside the gym. Any swaps involving her would have to come later, and that included your clothes.

"Okay, let's go then!" Before you can say anything, Peach grabs you by the arms and starts practically dragging you to the library. Now that she has your body, she's a lot stronger than you, and pulls you along with ease. You definitely don't like the loss of your male body from the neck down, nor do you like having to wear Peach's dress, but you figure it could have been worse. If you had accidentally hit life swap or relationship swap, you would have ended up dating Mario while Peach got your girlfriend. You shudder at the thought. In fact, that thought is making you question whether or not you should swap back right away. You don't want to hold onto Peach's body any longer than necessary, but if it meant keeping Zelda as your girlfriend instead of Mario, you'd keep Peach's body forever. Still, since you can actually look at the remote while doing it if you do it behind her back, there's less of a chance of you screwing up. You decide to...
12323221.title: Head Swap

12323222.content: Which button did you press to swap with Peach though?
12323222.title: More Swaps

choices: Wait until you get to the library
123232221.content:
Within an instant, instead of having your old tunic back, you were still wearing Zelda's dress, but now had a nice female body to fill it out. Specifically, Peach's body. If that didn't feel strange enough, you also had to look at Peach in front of you, who now looked like you dressed in Peach's clothes. You suppose you didn't look any better dressed as Zelda, but you didn't have to look at the head on. Casting a quick glance back to where Zelda was, you get one last glimpse of her before she vanishes inside the gym.

"Okay, let's go then!" It's incredibly weird to see your body acting so girly, but you barely have any time to think about that as Peach grabs you by the arm and practically drags you to the library. Now this she has your body and she has yours, she is much stronger than you and you are helpless to resist as she pulls you along. You figure it could be worse, you could have lost your girlfriend to a life swap or a relationship swap or something. In fact, the thought of that happening is the only thing stopping you from trying to swap back into your own body right here and right now. You can try to swap back with Peach as she drags you, but there's the very real possibility of another mistake. Or, you wait until you get to the library to swap back where you'll have a clear shot. Who knows, maybe on the way there you'll decide you want to keep this body for a while, although you don't think that's too likely. You decide to...
123232221.title: Body Swap

123232222.content: Which button did you press to swap with Peach though?
123232222.title: More Swaps

choices: Make an excuse to not go to the library
Go with Peach to the library
1232322221.content:
In an instant, your perspective has changed. You are still looking at Peach, but she is now wearing Zelda's clothes, and she has a much more relaxed and less comical expression on her face. It takes you a moment to realise, but you're now standing in Peach's spot in the hallway. Looking down, you notice you are now wearing Peach's clothes, which feel a lot softer and lighter than the sort of clothes you were used to, or even Zelda's clothes you were wearing a moment ago. It's not a bad feeling, it just made you feel sorta weird inside, and it wasn't something you really wanted to get used to.

Peach gives you a gentle smile, and says, "Well, shall we go?" It takes a moment to sink in, but you realise that you are supposed to be Peach now, and if it were the real Peach and Zelda in this situation, Zelda would probably have expected Peach to drag her off excitedly to the library. Still, now that there wasn't someone forcing you to go somewhere with them, this could be your opportunity to straighten things out a little. You definitely don't want to stay like this. If you're Peach right now, then that means you're Mario's girlfriend, and that's something you definitely don't want to get involved in. Still, you could still go with Peach to the library and figure out things there. Unless Zelda finds the manual in the quiver and throws it away or something, there's no rush.

You decide to...
1232322221.title: Life Swap

choices: Back to Zelda's life, then back to get your clothes
12323222211.content:
The remote helping you sound like Peach would, you say, "Oh, actually, I just remembered there's something else I have to go do. Sorry."

Staying as calm as Zelda would have, Peach replies, "Don't worry about it. Maybe next time. I'll see you later, Peach."

The fact that she calls you Peach throws you off a little, but you manage to hold your composure and say, "See ya, Zelda." Your mind finds it weird to be calling Peach Zelda, but your mouth does it as if on autopilot. You turn and head in the opposite direction Peach does, but once she isn't looking anymore, you stop and get the remote ready. You're about to swap lives back with her, and hopefully she would continue through with what you said as her and find something else to do so you could go and get your clothes back from Zelda, but another idea hits you.

Maybe you could keep Peach's life. You wanted to see what it was like to be royalty, but why should that mean Zelda has to give up her status as a princess? If you did a few swaps right, you could get Zelda back to her own life an keep Peach's, or maybe give Zelda Peach's life and take Zelda's life as your own. You'd certainly feel less weird imitating the calmer, more regal Zelda than the girly, energetic Peach. You'd just need to switch relationships with Zelda (currently in your life) so that Zelda and Peach's lives would be dating and then make sure that you and Zelda are both in one of those lives. There is always the possibility of you screwing something up though, which is what lead to your current position as Peach, the ruler of the Mushroom Kingdom. Still, if you give Zelda Peach's life, you'll be back in your own and you know where Peach in Zelda's life will be (the library), and then it's just a matter of deciding whether you want to be Peach or Zelda for the rest of however long you decide to stay like that. You take some time to think about which option you like better.
12323222211.title: Make an excuse to not go to the library

123232222112.content:
You decide that you're going to take a risk and try to put into action your plan to get you and Zelda to both be princesses. First things first, you need to back to the gym to find Zelda. You quickly turn away from Peach and head down the hallway to the gym, noting how comfortable you already are with wearing dresses now. Preferably you'd like to get this done quickly, especially so you don't run into Mario. Right now you're considered Mario's girlfriend, but when you swap relationships with your old life you'll still be dating him, so as long as you don't run into him until you're back in one of the princesses' lives, you'll be all good. Over at the gym, you find Zelda hacking away at a sandbag with your sword and shield out. The quiver seems untouched to the manual should still be in there. Once this plan is done your first order of business should be to put it in a safe place in your room. Or, you suppose Zelda and Peach's room, since it'll be your room soon enough. Making sure no one is looking, you point the remote at her and select relationship swap. You find it funny that whichever of you ends up in Peach's girly life is going to be the man in the relationship if the remote works how you think it does. Once that's done, you perform a life swap, and in an instant you are over at the sand bag, back in your old tunic, remote held in the same hand as your shield. Glancing at the door, you see Zelda in Peach's dress walking off to go do something. She definitely doesn't look as good in Peach's dress as Peach looked in her's.

Putting your sword and shield away, you quickly head out of the gym and over to the library Zelda was a princess again, and now she was dating another princess, so now it was time for you to become that princess.
123232222112.title: Let's both be princesses

1232322221121.content:
Luckily you manage to make it to the library without running into Mario. After looking around for a bit, you manage to spot Peach, still in Zelda's life, browsing some shelves. You pretend to be interested some of the books on a nearby shelf while putting the the manual in between some books. That way you could pick up the manual once you're in Zelda's life and it wouldn't still be with your old life. You move away from the manual, so you won't have any trouble getting to it if Peach lingers there too long, and then hit the life swap button while pointing at her. For the fourth time today, you perspective suddenly changes and now you are in front of a different shelf, once again wearing Zelda's dress. Looking back at where you were, Peach is now dressed in your clothes, looking through the shelf you had been standing in front of. Knowing you weren't much of a reader, you knew she should be here too long, so if you wanted to swap any more with her or your old life, you should do it now.

First things first though, so you walk over to where you had stashed the manual and take it. Enough though the remote should have made you best friends, Peach seems so distracted by the books that she doesn't even notice you. You suppose she is the old you now, so that did tend to happen occasional. Since you know where Peach is right now but not Zelda, you think about your options for swapping with Peach right now. If you swapped lives or relationships, all your hard work would have gone to waste and you'd be Mario's girlfriend again. Even though you were a princess, you didn't really want to give up your male body just yet, so that put head swap, body swap, and gender swap off the table. That just left clothes swap. When you had first become Zelda before the double princess plan happened, but had every intention of taking back your tunic, but now that you had spent a bit of time in two different dresses, you weren't so sure you wanted it any more. You were a princess now, and it'd make sense for you to dress like a princess, but that would mean going without your weapons during the tournament. You'd feel better with your weapons, but Zelda and Peach were still very good fighters themselves, and since you would have one of their lives, you'd have their fighting skills without a weapon as well. Granted whatever you chose wouldn't be permanent. You'd still see Peach (or you suppose Link) on a daily basis, so if you felt like doing another swap you always could. For now, you decide to...
1232322221121.title: The plan goes perfectly

12323222211211.content:
You decide that you're actually starting to like the feeling of wearing a dress, so you don't perform a swap and let Peach keep your old tunic to go with her new life. It might take a little getting used to fighting without any weapons, but you're sure the remote will help you out there, and maybe make it feel a bit more natural to you. As Peach begins to wander off, she notices you there.

"Oh, hey Zelda." You're not as shocked to be called Zelda this time. It does feel weird, however, referring to Peach by your old name.

"Hello Link."

"How are things with Peach?" There's another thing you'll have to get used to, referring to Zelda as Peach. Maybe you should take Peach's life and give Zelda her own life back.

"Oh, they're very good. And with Mario?"

"Heh, can't complain. Well, I'll see you around."

"Bye." With that, Peach heads out of the library, presumably to go back to your training, although you suppose you can't really consider it your training anymore since you currently have no intention of going back to that life. But speaking of going back to lives, you were now thinking about whether you should go back to Peach's life. Right now, Zelda was Peach and you were Zelda, and you'd feel a little more comfortable with Zelda being herself instead of having Peach's personality and name. On the other hand, if you gave Zelda her life back, you'd have to be the one in Peach's girly life, and you think you'd feel a little more comfortable imitating Zelda than you would Peach. If you did decide to let Zelda be Zelda and take on Peach's role, you'd have to go find Zelda, and right now you had no idea where she was. In the end, you decide to...
12323222211211.title: Keep the dress

choices: Have some fun with the remote
123232222112112.content: You decide to keep Zelda's life yourself and keep Zelda in Peach's life. As weird as it might be to have Zelda acting all girly and energetic like Peach, but it would be even weirder acting like that yourself. Now that you have your life the way you want it right now, you're not entirely sure what to do. Judging by what your mind is telling you, Zelda (or Peach in Zelda's life) didn't find any books that interested her and was thinking of heading back to her room. You could do that. You still needed to put the manual in a safe place after all. Alternatively, you could try to have a little fun with the remote. Your new life seemed good enough that you didn't want to change it too much, but you could always try out a new outfit (even if you were liking the feeling of wearing a dress), or temporarily trying out a different body. You didn't want to get rid of your male body when you were thinking of what to swap with Peach, but now that you had decided on what you wanted for your life and you had it, you could experiment a little. Since people were going to treat you like a girl for the rest of your life (or until you got bored and changed it), you might as well try and see what being a girl is actually like. You could even just mess with other people using yourself as a middle ground to swap them. Still, perhaps all this shenanigans was enough remote usage for one day and you should just put the remote away for now and enjoy your new life as Zelda. You decide to...
123232222112112.title: Leave things as they are

1232322221121122.content:
You went all the way to become a princess, you suppose you ought to go the extra mile. Looking down at yourself clad in Zelda's dress, you suppose you're rather silly looking in your current form.

You decide to keep swapping a bit more before giving the remote a break. Right now, you're thinking you need a body to better match the dress. You could take Peach's you suppose, but there are other women scattered throughout who can be just as interesting! As you examine the buttons, you also recall there is a gender swap button, which will be nifty if you decide you dont want to go TOO far.

What do you decide to use to become a proper princess?
1232322221121122.title: Have some fun with the remote

12323222211211221.content:
After a bit of mental debating, you decide to just do a body swap.
Of course, that left you with a couple of options. On one hand, you could go find Peach again and complete your plan. But by the same token, doing two swaps in a row could arouse someone's suspicion.
You take a deep breath and decide to go after...
12323222211211221.title: Body Swap

123232222112112211.content:
After a bit of searching, you find Peach sitting in the garden.
Currently, she is just staring off into space. You carefully kneel down behind a bush and press the body swap button. Almost instantaneously, you can feel your body mass shift about, taking on Peach's in place of your's.
Overall, it's an interesting feeling, especially since Peach now looks just like you.
Of course, you could do the relationship swap, but who knows if someone might show up.
123232222112112211.title: Peach

1232322221122.content: As you head out of the gym, you see Mario. Unfortunately, he has seen you. Do you make a swap or try to talk your way out of it?
1232322221122.title: Oh no, there's Mario

1233.content: Even though getting Zelda's body alone and the thought of being royalty is tempting, you decide against it. You aren't really made for the life of a prince (or princess as the case may be), and you don't want to be kissing your own body when you kiss Zelda. Then again, perhaps you could do a head swap. That way you'd still have Zelda's beautiful face to look at, but you'd get her body all to yourself. Alternatively, you could go for something a little less drastic and try a clothes swap. That way you could be sure if the remote works, and you won't screw up your girlfriend too much. You have a feeling you won't be keeping the dress if you do swap it though. Without something like Zelda's magic, you feel like you might have a bit of trouble in the Smash tournament if you'd be fighting in a dress without your weapons. You end up deciding to do a...
1233.title: One of the other options

Zelda notices you hiding the remote
12331.content:
You aim the remote at Zelda and press the Head Swap button. In an instant, your head is transported down the hallway, onto Zelda's body. Everything feels so different, and the contrast between your head and body feels a little strange too. You would have explored a little further, but you heard Zelda's voice behind you.

"Oh, hello Link."

You turn to see Zelda walking out of the leisure room and towards you. Her head looks a little strange on your body, but you suppose you look just as strange. You quickly hide the remote behind your back, hoping she doesn't notice. It does cause your dress to swish a little, which feels sort of odd. "Hey Zelda." You briefly wonder what Zelda would think if she knew you took her body below the neck without asking her.
12331.title: Head Swap

12332.content: You point the remote at Zelda and press the clothes swap button. In an instant, you feel your clothes shift around on your body taking a different form, and you see Zelda's clothes change from her usual dress into your tunic. You couldn't see much of her, but from what you could tell she actually looked pretty good dressed in your clothes. On the other hand, you felt, and probably looked, a bit ridiculous dressed in Zelda's clothes. The dress, the gloves, you could even feel a bit of makeup on your face. Possibly the oddest part was that you could feel you had Zelda's underwear on underneath her dress. It was definitely an odd experience, but at least you knew the remote worked now. You wouldn't be keeping Zelda's clothes, however. It was a good test, but you had no desire to walk around dressed like a girl, and have no weapons to fight with during the tournament. Perhaps at a later time if you and Zelda wanted to try something, but for now, you point the remote at Zelda again, and...
12332.title: Clothes Swap

123321.content: This experience had given a whole new meaning to the phrase "getting into her pants". Sure, you hadn't actually done what the phrase implied, but you had managed to get into Zelda's dress, her underwear, her entire outfit. The situation was actually pretty funny. But for now, you'd be returning to your own clothes. You still thought it was a little embarrassing to to be walking around wearing a dress, even if everyone else thought it was normal, and you'd prefer to have some sort of weapon to use in the tournament. You aim at Zelda and press the clothes swap button again, reversing the earlier swap. Now that you were back in your tunic, and you knew the remote worked, you could try out some other things with the remote. Which led you to your first question; who should you swap with? Zelda was still within sight, so you could still swap with her if you wanted, but you were sure that if you just wandered around for a bit you could find someone else.
123321.title: Swap clothes back with Zelda

choices: Something else or someone gets in the way
1233211.content: What would you like to swap you think about that and decide
1233211.title: Swap with Zelda

12332112.content: A different swap, or does someone get in the way?
12332112.title: Something else or someone gets in the way

1233212.content: You didn't want to mess with your girlfriend anymore out of pure curiosity. You decided to look around in the New comers training area and spotted Lucina and female Robin training together. You didn't want to change up your fighting style too much but were interested in trying to fight with magic. Do you swap with Lucina or Robin?
1233212.title: Find another target

choices: Someone gets in the way and you swap with them instead
Someone tries to talk to you
123322.title: There is an interruption

1233221.content:
You press the clothes swap button, expecting to find yourself back in your own clothes. Unfortunately, that was not the case. Before even looking at yourself, you could tell your clothes still felt all soft and silky, and you definitely still had a bra strapped to your flat chest. Looking down at yourself, you were greeted by the pink dress usually worn by Princess Peach, one of Zelda's friends.

Looking back at where Zelda stood, you saw that Peach now stood with Zelda, unaware of the fact that she was wearing her friend's clothes, talking to her. Apparently Peach had noticed Zelda down the hall and run up to her, inadvertently getting in the way of your swap. So now, Peach was standing down the hallway, wearing Zelda's clothes, talking to Zelda, who was wearing your clothes. And then there was you, the only person aware of the swaps, wearing Peach's clothes.

You felt even more ridiculous in Peach's clothes than you had in Zelda's. Everything was so pink and frilly and stuff. You had to swap back. You point the remote at Peach, only to find that Zelda and Peach were walking off together, and were about to round the corner, out of sight. You'd only have time to swap with one of them, and you probably wouldn't be able to catch up with them too quickly is you were walking around in high heels or whatever footwear you ended up with. You could either swap back with Peach, which would give Peach her own dress back, but leave you in Zelda's dress until you saw her next, or with Zelda, which you give you your own clothes back, but also leave Zelda and Peach stuck with each other's clothes.
1233221.title: Someone gets in the way and you swap with them ...

12332211.content:
You decide to just reverse the second swap, and point the remote at Peach before pressing the clothes swap button. Sure, you had wanted your tunic back, but you didn't want to leave Zelda stuck with Peach's clothes. So instead, as Zelda and Peach rounded the corner and left your line of sight, you were left wearing Zelda's clothes. You could have tried to chase after them and swap back with Zelda as well, but you figure you'd have plenty of time for that later. It wasn't like you'd never see Zelda ever again. You decide to try and put aside your embarrassment at wearing Zelda's clothes and just enjoy the day.

Turning around, and feeling Zelda's dress swish around your legs, you leave in the opposite direction to which Zelda and Peach had left in, further affirming your choice to not swap back yet. However, now that you had gotten a taste of the remote's power, you couldn't help but want to do more with it. Your first test hadn't really gone as planned, leaving you looking like a crossdresser, but you tried not to let that deter you. If fact, you were so determined to experiment more and just enjoy the powers of the remote, that you decided that you'd do the same thing you did with Zelda, and just swap with the first person you saw, although you wouldn't do the swap swap as you did last time. After a while of walking around, eventually getting more used to wearing Zelda's clothes as you went, you eventually found someone else. It was...
12332211.title: Swap with Peach

12333.content: There were only two other options left. You could try the relationship swap, although it'd be a little difficult to see if it actually worked right away. Perhaps if you did it Zelda would treat you the way you treat her, which would be interesting to see. The idea of swapping relationships with her doesn't really appeal to you though, since it would mean hanging out with the girls more than the guys, and having Peach treat you like her best friend. The other option is the gender swap. It certainly would be interesting to see what you and Zelda would look like if you had been born the opposite gender. You're not sure you want to be the woman in the relationship though. Still, you had to pick something, so you aim at Zelda and select...
12333.title: More Swaps

124.content: Around the corner was the aura Pokemon, Lucario. He was a formidable foe, and it would be interesting to perform a swap or two, especially considering he wasn't human, or anything resembling a human. You notice Lucario's ear twitch, alerting you to the fact that he's probably noticed that you're there. You almost forgot he had the ability to sense the aura of living things. In fact, that ability might be interesting to have. If the manual was right, performing a life swap not any gave you their life, but also any abilities required to live that life. So if you did a life swap on Lucario, you'd get his aura abilities, but you'd probably have to try a few other things so that you'd still be dating Zelda. Zelda was an amazing girl and you'd be crazy to trade her away for Lucario's abilities. Alternatively, Lucario was a Pokemon instead of a human. it would certainly interesting to feel what it would be like to be him even without his abilities, so a body swap seemed like a good choice. Of course, those were only two of the swap options available. Before he turns around and asks what it is you're doing, you decide to do a...
124.title: Lucario

choices: The remote hits the floor, causing another swap between you and Lucario
Lucario catches the remote before it hits the floor, and asks you what it is
You manage to grab hold of the remote again, but Lucario asks you about it
1242.content:
Deciding on a body swap, you quickly press the button. After the flash from the remote has died down, you feel very different. Looking down at yourself, you can see that you now have Lucario's body! You are still wearing your normal clothes, but they have been modified a little, to accomodate for your new body's physical configuration; your boots, for example, were changed so they would fit on your new foot-paws, and your gloves had also changed, now being fitted for paws instead of fingers, with a hole to account for the spike on the back of your hand-paws.

You didn't get to examine yourself much more than that, because Lucario had turned around to face you. Of course, since you now had Lucario's body, he had your body instead! It was quite weird to see your former Hyrulian body standing in front of you, buck-naked and talking to you.

"Hey, Link," said Lucario, "what's that you have there?"

Only too late did you realize, that you had forgoten to hide the remote!

"Nothing," you said, as you tried to hide the remote behind your back. But, since you weren't yet used to Lucario's paws, you ended up dropping it!

What happens next?
1242.title: Body Swap

choices: Yes, one of those two, please
12433.content: How about a gender or relationship swap?
12433.title: Something else

125.content: Around the corner was one of the fighters from another galaxy, Sonic the Hedgehog. Luckily, he was walking at a much more leisurely pace, if he had been running there's no way you would have been able to catch him for a swap. Thinking about that gives you an idea. If you were to swap lives with him, you should gain all of his abilities, including his speed. The only issue then would be that you'd end up naked except for shoes and gloves. Still, there was a clothes swap button so you could probably fix that one you had his life. You'd also probably need to do some other adjustments if you took his life, since you don't really want him dating Zelda instead of you. The more you think about it, the more you think life swapping with Sonic might be a bit more of a hassle than you first thought what with all the adjustments. Perhaps a simple body swap would be better. You're not sure if taking Sonic's body would give you his speed, but it's worth a try. At the very least, you won't lose Zelda. Of course, you could always just go for a different button altogether. You decide to do a...
125.title: Sonic the Hedgehog

13.content:
You are the fearless bounty hunter, Samus Aran. You were just heading back to your room after a training session to get your Power Suit. The Hands had said you weren't allowed to switch into your Zero Suit mid battle like you did during the last tournament, but you could still use it if you entered the tournament twice, once as Power Suit Samus and once as Zero Suit Samus. You weren't going to miss the chance to beat some of the guys twice, so you had been training twice as hard to make sure you were just as power without the power suit as you were with it. On the way back to the room, you happened across a small package on the ground. Seeing nobody around who could have dropped it, you decide to take it with you back to your room to see if you can identify its owner by the contents.

Once in your room, you open up the package at your desk to see what's inside. Luckily your roommate, Wii Fit Trainer, wasn't here to question what it was you were doing. Inside the package was a strange looking remote that didn't look like it for any sort of TV, and a manual explaining what the remote was. This remote was unlike any other technology you'd ever encountered before. Not only could it do seemingly impossible things like swapping people's heads, but it also had the capability to completely alter reality to make everyone except a few given people perceive the change as being normal, and believe nothing has happened. Even though you assumed this would work as the instructions told (whereas some other people would have to test it out themselves to believe it), you still wished to see it in action. Perhaps once you had gotten a feel for how it worked you could find out how it created such effects and perhaps weaponise it for your suit (and maybe find a few hidden features if there were any). Leaving your power suit in its charging station, you head out of your room looking for someone to swap with. Even though you wanted something interesting and different, you were pretty much willing to swap with anyone you came across. Turning into a hallway, you spot someone over at the other end, luckily with their back turned to you, making this a perfect opportunity for a swap. The person was...
13.title: Samus

131.content: You spot Mr. big-shot hero of time himself, Link, over at the other end of the hallway. He would be very fun to screw with, and it'd give you a very interesting experience as well. For one thing, you could do a head swap with him to experience what it was like to be a guy, but also get the hilarity of seeing Link's head on your skin-tight suit clad body. However, that might also mean that Link ends up being the owner of your power suit (except for the helmet) and you wouldn't be able to figure out how to add some sort of feature like the remote's power to the suit. Still, you could just leave Link with your body until you wanted to make such a feature so you could continue to have a laugh at his expense until then. A relationship swap could also hold some interesting results. That way you wouldn't lose your power suit or any parts of your body, but you'd still get a very different experience. You hadn't really thought about it much before, but now you're curious as to what it would be like to be in a relationship with another woman, and this remote could let you experience just that, with no long term consequences as along as you didn't lose it. Of course, the other swaps could yield some very interesting results too, so you ultimately decide on a...
131.title: Link

1313.content: You contemplate the other options available to you. Looking at the body swap button, you ponder what life would be like as a male. You also look at Link's sword and wonder what it would be like to swing it around, your hand hovering over the clothing swap button. Or, you could look at the other buttons and see what works...
1313.title: More Swaps

13133.content: You see the last two buttons: Relationship Swap and Head Swap. The Relationship Swap would make you a Hyrulian citizen in a romantic relationship is Zelda. On the other hand, Head Swap could allow for some entertaining possibilities, what with you and Link having different parts.
13133.title: More Swaps

132.content: Over at the other end of the hall was Peach, the princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. You were... sort of friends with her. She was a friend, but she'd often annoy you a bit by trying to force you to do very girly things with her like getting a makeover or something. She wouldn't have been your first choice for someone to swap with, but you suppose it's better than nothing. You figure the most noticeable swap would be a clothes swap, giving you Peach's dress and giving Peach your zero suit. That would unfortunately also give Peach your power suit, but you figure you can always switch back when you need it. You could always do the opposite and keep your clothes but take Peach's the swap probably wouldn't be as noticeable as the clothes swap, but at least it would let you keep all your weapons and such. There were also a few other options you could try if you wanted. You ultimately decide to do a...
132.title: Princess Peach

choices: Someone interrupts you before you can decide
1321.content:
You aim the remote at Peach and press the button for a clothes swap. You are surprised by how quickly it happens, but also how discretely. Aside from the change itself, there was no sign that the remote was doing anything. Across the hallway, Peach was still walking in the same direction she had been before, but she was now wearing your skin tight zero suit and rocket boots. Just as the remote had promised, she seemed to notice nothing different about her change in attire, and kept walking just as normal. Looking down at yourself, you felt a little ridiculous wearing her puffy, pink dress. You could feel everything about her outfit, from the large earrings dangling in your ears, to the high heeled shoes on your feet. Sure, you looked more normal wearing it than if someone like Link had found the remote and ended up switching with Peach, but it still wasn't something you'd wear normally. Of course, the circumstances right now were anything but normal, although you were the only one that knew that.

Now that you had gotten a taste of what this little baby could do, you wanted to find out how it did it. You could take it up to your room to try and take it apart to see inside of it, but you had a little decision to make first. Right now Peach was walking away with your zero suit, leaving you in her dress. The tournament was still a few months away, and you'd see Peach every day at breakfast and lunch, so there was really no rush to get your clothes and suit back. And yet, if you could swap back at any time, why not now and save you the trouble of trying to not feel embarrassed as you walked around in the most girly dress you'd ever seen. It actually was rather comfortable, but you were a little afraid of it ruining your tough image, even though you knew the remote had made it so that everyone thought it was normal for you to be a badass bounty hunter in a princess outfit.
1321.title: Clothes Swap

choices: Find someone else to swap with
13211.content: You quickly aim the remote at Peach and press the clothes swap button again. You had no intention of keeping her dress, at least for the time being. Now there was the question of what to do next. This remote had proved it could do amazing things, so now you could go and find someone else to swap with. Then again, Peach was already right here, and you had only tried out one part of the remote. You could try a different swap, or you could change the setting so that she'd notice the change. The possibilities interested you, even if it was a part of Peach you'd end up acquiring.
13211.title: Get your clothes back

132111.content: You let Peach go about her business as you went searching for a new target. You weren't sure if you want to swap with another girl like yourself or go and explore new possibilities with the opposite gender or even with someone who isn't human.
132111.title: Find someone else to swap with

1321112.content: You initially thought about just swapping with another girl like yourself, but the thought didn't seem as exciting. You wanted something different. Something you wouldn't be able to have without this remote. With that in mind, you go in search of...
1321112.title: Explore new possibilites

132112.content: After a brief moment in thought, you decided to swap with Peach again. But you weren't sure whether you want to swap with Peach unaware or swap with her aware of the changes. You figured you'd need to make up your mind quickly though; Peach wasn't just going to sit around and wait for you to swap with her.
132112.title: Swap with Peach again

1321121.content: After some consideration, you decided to leave Peach unaware of the swaps as you rather not have her freak out. Now you just have to figure out on what to swap. You already tried clothes swap which was interesting enough, but you now want to try something different. Even with that, there are at least five options left. Which one do you want to pick?
1321121.title: Swap with Peach unaware

13211211.content:
You shrugged off the Relationship and Gender swap options as you didn't care for those options. This leaves you with the Body, Head and Life Swap options. You first look at the Body Swap option. You knew that Peach's body, while no slouch in the strength department, is less muscular and more frail than yours. But it would be interesting to have a body in a whole different area of strengths and weaknesses.

Of course if you didn't want to swap bodies with Peach, there's still the Head and Life Swap options.
13211211.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Life Swap

132112112.content:
You decided against the Body Swap option as it wasn't interesting enough for you. This leaves you with the Head and Life Swap options.

You first look at the Head Swap button. Out of all the options on the remote, this is the weirdest one. If you use that option on Peach, you'll not only have her dress, but her body as well. But you'll still have your head and life. You weren't sure if you liked this option as it could get confusing; especially if you swap with others while you still have your head on Peach's body.

You then quickly look at the Life Swap button. Now this option is interesting. If you pick that one, you will have Peach's life along with her clothes, skills and relationships. It's a bit daunting to know that you'll won't be just dressed like Peach but everyone will think that you're her as well. And that's not even getting into the relationship drama between Peach, Mario and Bowser. You really weren't sure if you want to be a princess. But you knew that if you didn't like it you can always just swap back.

After some thought, you decide to go with...
132112112.title: Head Swap/Life Swap

13211212.content:
Shrugging off the Body Swap, Head Swap and Life Swap options leave you with just the Relationship Swap and Gender Swap options. You weren't sure on which one you want to pick.

If you pick Relationship Swap then you'll have all of Peach's relationships including her friends, allies and enemies. Peach was well-liked by most of the residents so you'll have no shortage of friends. But you weren't sure if you want to be dating Mario let alone being fought over by him and Bowser. That's not even getting into the adjustments for the relationship swap to work since you and Mario are from separate worlds. So you'll definitely end up as a resident of the Mushroom Kingdom, maybe as a princess just like Peach.

With Gender Swap on the other hand both you and Peach are girls so you're not sure how much things will change when it comes to your life. But you do know that the Gender Swap function will swap the femininity between you and Peach so you'll probably end up about as feminine as her.

After thinking it over you pick...
13211212.title: Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

1321122.content: Deciding that it would be fun to see how Peach would react, you set the remote to Swap Mode 2 so she'll be aware. But what swap would you choose?
1321122.title: Swap with Peach aware

13211221.content: Which swap would you choose?
13211221.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Clothes Swap

132112211.content:
You aim the remote at Peach and press the body swap button. Almost instantly, your body was replaced with Peach's. However, right now you were more interested in Peach's reaction, so you do your best to ignore the new feelings Peach's body was giving you and focus on Peach. Peach still stood at the other end of the hallway, but now she had your body.

Unlike when you performed the clothes swap, Peach definitely noticed the swap and reacted to it. "What the!?" you hear your own voice say from down the hallway as Peach begins to freak out. "What happened to my body!?"

You can't help but laugh at Peach's reaction, somewhat enjoying how it sounds with your new voice. However, your laughter does not go unnoticed by Peach, who begins to walk down the hallway towards you, a somewhat angry look on her face. Despite her new body, Peach still walks in a feminine way, which only makes you laugh even more.

Once she is close enough, Peach asks, "Samus, is that you? Did you do this to me?"

"Yeah," you said, nodding. With Peach aware of the swap, you figured there was no point in playing dumb.

"How!? And why?"

"Well, I found this remote that can swap things around," you say, showing it to her. "I thought it might be funny to see your reaction to the swap."

"Funny!? You can't just do something like this to people! Give me that!"

Peach reaches for the remote, aiming to take it from you so she can put things back to normal. Of course, not wanting to give up your new toy just yet, you do your best to hold onto it as well. However, with you in Peach's body, and she in yours, she was stronger than you, and she ends up pulling the remote out of your hands, accidentally pressing one of the buttons in the process. Which button did she end up pressing?
132112211.title: Body Swap

1321122111.content: Which button did Peach end up pressing?
1321122111.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Clothes Swap

13211221112.content: Which button did Peach end up pressing?
13211221112.title: Head Swap/Clothes Swap

1321122112.content: Which button did Peach end up pressing?
1321122112.title: Life Swap/Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

13211221122.content: Which button did Peach end up pressing?
13211221122.title: Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

132112212.content: Which swap would you choose?
132112212.title: Head Swap/Clothes Swap

13211222.content: Which swap do you choose?
13211222.title: Life Swap/Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

132112222.content: Which swap do you choose?
132112222.title: Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

choices: Analyse the remote or experiment with it
Leave it for now and head to the gym
13212.content:
Looking down at yourself, and the pink dress you were wearing, you smile a little and say to yourself "Why not." When else would you be able to dress up like a princess and not have the guys make fun of you? Well, with this remote it could technically whenever you wanted, but you had the outfit right now, so why not keep it for now. And that's exactly what you decide to do.

Now there was the question of what to do next. You were still curious about how the remote worked, so you could still take it your room to try and take it apart and analyse it, however that seemed kind of risky if you were keeping this swap. You could potentially end up breaking something inside the remote if you weren't careful, and leave you stuck with Peach's clothes, or worse, perform some sort of random swaps on you without being able to control it. Alternatively, a much safer form of experimentation given the situation would be to actually use the remote. After seeing what it could do you did want to see the other buttons in action as well. Peach was still within view, so you could still swap with her if you wanted, or you could go find someone else to swap with.

Of course, swapping all sorts of things would also make it complicated if you wanted to swap everything back to normal. You could just stick with Peach's dress for now. Supposedly the remote made everyone believe it was normal for you to wear Peach's clothes and vice versa, something you were inclined to believe thanks to Peach's lack of a reaction, so you always just see how much your life had been changed to adjust for your new attire, and your lack of any weapons or your Power Suit. You could try going to the gym to test out how well you could fight in the dress. Without any of your weapons, you'd probably need some new special moves, possibly some of Peach's old ones.
13212.title: Keep Peach's clothes

choices: Try to take the remote apart
132121.content: You decide you're not done with the remote just yet. Sure, taking Peach's clothes had been interesting, but there was much more you could do with this remote. You could swap some more, testing out other buttons, or swapping with other people. You could also try taking it apart in your room to try and figure out how it worked, but that was more risky, because if you broke something, you might end up stuck in Peach's dress, or risk activating some random swaps without being about to control it.
132121.title: Analyse the remote or experiment with it

1321211.content: You decide to go with the safer option of doing more swaps. Peach was still in sight, so you could swap with her more if you wanted. You had already decided to be a bit girly by borrowing her clothes, perhaps you could borrow her petite little body as well. Of course, there were plenty of other people at the tournament, and you could probably find many potential targets in you had a little walk around.
1321211.title: Perform more swaps

13212112.content: You decide you've messed with Peach enough for now, and go in search of someone else to use the remote on. It doesn't take you long before you find someone else.
13212112.title: Find another target

132121121.content: You spot Link down the other end of the hallway. You grin at the idea of swapping something with him. He was one of your friends from the first tournament, but that didn't mean he didn't get a little big-headed at times. You were initially thinking of trying out one of the buttons you hadn't tried out yet, but looking down at Peach's dress which you were currently wearing gave you an idea. Getting to wear Peach's girly clothes without worrying about it ruining your reputation was fun and all, but it would be even funnier for Link to be the one walking around in the dress. You would make him aware of the swap, but right now he thought these were your normal clothes, and he probably wouldn't be as embarrassed as he would have if he knew they were Peach's. Still, even having him act the way he normally did but wearing Peach's clothes would be pretty funny. Although, you had only just gotten this dress, and there were still 5 other buttons you could use.
132121121.title: Link

choices: Leave the remote on the bench
Leave the remote in your gym locker
132122.content:
After thinking it over you decided to not experiment with the remote for the moment as you just wanted to keep things simple for now. But before you went to the gym you decided to stop at your room to put the manual somewhere safe. You decided to hide the manual in your dresser where your roommate the Wii Fit Trainer wouldn't accidentally stumble upon it.

Before you leave you decided to go to the bathroom to see how you look. Checking the full-length mirror at the back of the door, you had to admit that you look and felt kind of cute. The dress was tailored to fit your body along with the rest of your outfit. Your hair was out of its normal ponytail and it's falling loose around your shoulders. You could see the crown on your head along with the large blue earrings in your ears. You also find makeup on your face. It actually look good on you and made your face look feminine. Speaking of makeup, you notice all of Peach's makeup supplies are around the sink, and out of instinct you started to touch up your makeup just like Peach might have. When you're done, blowing to the mirror a kiss while you're at it, you leave your room and head to the gym.

You find the gym to be deserted, and you didn't run into anyone else on the way there so swapping is out of the question for the moment. You were about to put the remote away in your bag or pocket but you realize that with Peach's dress you no longer have any. You couldn't go around hitting anything with the remote in your hand. It could run the risk of accidentally breaking it and you don't know want to know what'll happen as a result.

Since no one was around you could easily just leave it on the bench near the sandbag. But if you wanted to be completely sure that no one would take it or it'll go missing you could always leave it in your gym locker which is the safer option. After some consideration you...
132122.title: Leave it for now and head to the gym

13213.content: Who is it that interrupts?
13213.title: Someone interrupts you before you can decide

132132.content:
You are about to swap back with Peach, when you hear a small voice behind you. "Pika!" You turn around to see Pikachu, the small electric Pokemon, sitting on the floor behind you. He seemed happy to see you.

"Oh, hey Pikachu," You kneel down so that he can climb up onto your shoulder. The two of you had really bonded over the last tournament, with the help of Red the Pokemon Trainer. As he makes his way up into the poofy sleeve of Peach's dress, you give him a little scratch behind the ear, which he seems to enjoy. That does remind you, however, that you still need to swap your clothes back.

"Pika-chu?" Pikachu says, looking at the remote in your hand. It looks like you may have a little bit of explaining to do. But first, there were other matters to attend to.

"Um, I'll explain in a second, Pikachu. There's something I've got to do first." Looking back at where Peach was, remote at the ready, you find...
132132.title: Pikachu

1321321.content:
Luckily, Peach is still within sight, and you are able to swap back into your Zero Suit. "Phew, back yo normal," you say to yourself.

"Pika?" Pikachu looks confused.

"We'll head back to my room, I'll explain there." You head back to your room, Pikachu still riding on your should. Pikachu keeps his eyes on the remote the while time, curious. Once at the room, you hand Pikachu the manual so he can read for himself exactly what the remote does, while you look over the remote for some way of opening it up to see how it works.

"Piiiikaaaa..." Pikachu mumbles in awe. You don't manage to find a way to open up the remote, not a single screw or seal of any sort, but you do manage to find some sort of secret compartment with even more buttons. Unfortunately these buttons aren't as well labelled as the others, so you'd have to figure out what they did later.

You feel Pikachu tapping on your arm. "Pika pi?" he asks, pointing back and forth between the two of your and the remote.

It doesn't take you long to figure out what he's asking. "You want to swap something with me?" Pikachu nods. "Hm..." You didn't really know what to think about this. Swapping something with Peach was one thing, but with Pikachu? It would certainly be a different experience, whichever option he picked... if you allowed him that is. You could always let him try it out on someone else if you didn't want to swap with him.
1321321.title: Peach is still there

13213211.content:
"Okay." You decide it might be fun to try swapping something with Pikachu. You hand him the remote, keeping your hand on the remote so you'll be aware of whatever swap he makes.

"Pika..." Pikachu mumbles as he tried to figure out which button he wanted to try out. You smiled. Eventually, Pikachu leans over and pushes the button for a...
13213211.title: Swap with Pikachu

132132111.content: But what button does Pikachu press?
132132111.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Life Swap

1321321112.content: Which button does Pikachu press?
1321321112.title: Head Swap/Life Swap...

choices: Try to convince Pikachu to swap back with you
Let Pikachu keep your body for a while
13213211121.content:
Pikachu puts his paw down on one of the buttons, and in an instant, your perspective shifts. Instead of sitting on a chair at your desk, you were now standing on the desk itself, however your line of sight was still closer to the ground than it had previously been, and one look at the person in front of you was enough to tell you why. Sitting in the chair in front of you sat your own body, but instead of your human face, Pikachu's head sat atop your neck. It was freaky, to say the least.

"Pika..." Pikachu mumbled, holding his new human hands in front of him.

This prompted you to look down at yourself. You were greeted by the furry yellow body you had grown so used to having ride around on your should while you were here. You hold your paws up in amazement, wiggling the little fingers you now possessed. You try to look behind you at the tail you could feel sticking out of your body, only to almost hit yourself in the face with it, not being used to having an extra appendage to control.

"This is so weird," you say, feeling the fur that now covered your entire body, save for your head. The world looked so much larger from your perspective now. At this point, Pikachu had stood up and was looking around your room, marveling at his new size and dexterity. You try to get off the desk and follow him, to fall flat on your face, due to not being used to your new smaller limbs or rodent body. It certainly didn't help that Pikachu's body, while capable of walking on two legs, was much more suited for running around on all fours.

Pikachu noticed your fall, and rushed over to you, seemingly much more comfortable moving around with your body than you were with his. "Pika pi?" You assumed he was asking if you were okay after the fall.

"Yeah, I'm fine," you say. You'd suffered worse than that. Pikachu had an idea, however. He knelt down and extended an arm towards you, much like you had done to him many times before. Recognising the gesture, you decide to play along, walking on all fours and climbing up what had up until now been your own arm. Your climbing was a little more clumsy than Pikachu's, due to your inexperience with the body, but you eventually make it up to Pikachu's shoulder, resting next to his furry yellow head.

After making sure you had a good grip on his shoulder, Pikachu walked over in front of the mirror in your room, allowing you both to see the strange amalgamations of human and Pokemon you had become. Pikachu couldn't help but laugh, and you even joined in a little bit too. You looked like some sort of science experiment gone wrong, although luckily this should be easily reversible with just another press of a button.

Once Pikachu had stopped laughing, you decided that while this had been fun, you wanted to get back to figuring out how the remote worked, something that would be rather difficult with Pikachu's small body. "Pikachu," you say, making sure not to be too loud since you were right next to his ears.

Pikachu turns to look at you, before deciding it was a bit difficult to have a conversation with you sitting on his shoulder, despite you having done it with him many times before. Instead, Pikachu opted to sit down on your bed, pick you up off his shoulder, and place you down on his lap so he can see you clearly. It catches you off guard, and you have to fight the instinct to wriggle out of his grip and he picks you up. It serves as an unsettling reminder of how small you are.

Starting again, you say, "Pikachu, this has been fun and all, but I kind of wanted to figure out how this remote worked." Pikachu nods silently, not wanting to interrupt you. "But for that, I need my body back."

You see Pikachu's ears droop down, as a sad expression covers his face. "Pika pika, pikachu," he asks. You really wished you could understand him right now, but if you had to guess, you'd assume he probably wanted to keep your body for a bit longer. You weren't sure how to feel about this. On one hand, you had wanted to get back to what you had originally planned to do with the remote, and Pikachu's body made you feel small and vulnerable. But on the other hand, you just couldn't resist Pikachu's sad little face, even when it was attached to your body. Maybe it'd be alright to keep his body for a bit, or play around with the remote some more. What's the worst that could happen?
13213211121.title: Head Swap

choices: Continue with your plan, take the remote apart
Delay the plan, find something else to do for now
Someone else arrives at the room
132132111212.content:
You let out a small sigh. You just couldn't say no to Pikachu, even if you weren't entirely comfortable keeping his body.

"Alright, we stay swapped a little longer."

"Pika pi!" Pikachu cheered excitedly, his ears perking up.

You were quick to dampen his mood, however. "This means you'll have to help me, though. I can't really work my tools with your little paws." You held up your stubby little arms again, as if to demonstrate. Even after seeing yourself in the mirror, and sitting on your old body's lap, it still felt weird seeing those furry, yellow arms enter your field of view, under your own control.

"Pika?" Pikachu tilted his head, confused, and looked over at your desk. Perhaps he couldn't tell what exactly it was you were doing.

"Well, I was trying to figuring out how exactly this remote does this sort of thing, when it should really be impossible. I was planning on..." Your voice drifts off. It suddenly occurs to you that following through with your plan right now might not be the best idea. Even if you could find a way to take the remote apart safely, would it still work correctly once it was put back together? What if you broke it while you'd taken it apart? Then you'd be stuck with your head on Pikachu's body for the rest of your life. Were you willing to risk that?
132132111212.title: Let Pikachu keep your body for a while

13213211122.content:
As Pikachu presses the button, your point of view suddenly shifts. Rather than sitting at your desk, you are actually sitting on top of it, your legs dangling off the edge. More importantly, though, you can feel the cool air of your room on your skin, and the wood of the desk pressing against your bare rear. Looking down at yourself, your eyes went wide as you realised you were no longer wearing your Zero Suit, not anything at all, for that matter. You quickly move your hands to cover up your private parts, face flushing red from embarrassment.

Looking over at the chair where you were once sitting, you notice Pikachu has taken your place, and is now wearing your Zero Suit, resized to fit his little body. Had he done a clothes swap then? Something about that didn't seem right.

"Oh, sorry, I didn't realise that this would leave you naked," Pikachu says, catching you off guard as he suddenly speaks perfect English.

"Pika," you mumble in reply, shocked by the words coming out of your mouth. You resist the urge to cover your mouth, as both of your hands are currently occupied. You had meant to ask how Pikachu was able to speak, but for some reason, that had come out instead.

"Oh, I guess I can't really speak anymore now that you're me," Pikachu explains. Now it all makes sense. He must have done a life swap. Now you were Pikachu, despite looking like yourself, and as a Pikachu, you couldn't say anything except your name.

While it was a fun test to let Pikachu swap something with you, you felt a bit awkward being completely naked, even if no one would notice anything odd about it, and you weren't exactly fond of the idea of being treated like an animal. "Pika pi, Pikachu," you say, gesturing between yourself and Pikachu as best you could without removing your hand from across your chest, trying to ask Pikachu to swap back.

"You want to swap back already?" Pikachu asked, trying to clarify your meaning. You nodded, hoping Pikachu would understand why you didn't want to stay like this.
13213211122.title: Life Swap

132132111222.content:
"Well..." Pikachu mumbles, thinking it over. "You'll have to catch me first!" All of a sudden, Pikachu grabs the remote in his mouth, and uses your jet boots to launch himself off the chair and towards the door, landing hard enough on the door handle to open the door up. This all catches you rather off guard, so by the time you've stood up off the desk, Pikachu is already out the door.

You rush out into the hallway, still self consciously covering your body, and frantically look both ways, hoping to spot the little yellow mouse who's life you were in. Unfortunately, it seemed Pikachu was too fast for you, as he had already disappeared from sight. You let out a sigh. This was definitely not how you'd intended things to go. You didn't want to be stuck in Pikachu's life, but there was nothing you could really do since Pikachu had the remote. You just hoped he wouldn't swap too much without you knowing about it. You could try to chase after him, but with no idea about where he'd gone, you'd just be running around aimlessly in the nude, not something you were keen on doing. Maybe you'd be better off waiting in your room until Pikachu eventually came back.

You hear a click behind you. "Pika?" you mumble in confusion as you turn around. You gasp as you realise that that was the sound of your door closing. You quickly reach for the handle, hoping you can still get in, but alas, the door locked itself behind you, and being in your life, Pikachu is the one with the key. "Piiii," you whine in disappointment.

Now you were somewhat at a loss for what to do. You had two real options. One was to wander aimlessly, hoping to find Pikachu and convince him to swap back, while the other was to wait in Pikachu's room instead of your own, and hope that he'd come find you once he got bored of being you. Neither seemed like a particularly appealing option, but that was all you had.
132132111222.title: Pikachu runs off

132132112.content: Which one of these buttons did Pikachu press?
132132112.title: Clothes Swap/Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

choices: Pikachu wants to stay like this.
13213211212.content:
After a few moments consideration, Pikachu pressed the Swap Mode 2 button.

“That was a good idea,” you said, letting go of the remote, allowing Pikachu to take it. “That way we’ll both be aware of the swap.”

“Pika!” he said with a nod, then pressed a second button on the remote. All of a sudden, you felt as if a weight had been lifted from your chest, and you looked down to find that was quite literal. Your chest was completely flat, and you felt a strange pressure in your pants as something grew tight in your groin. You looked up at Pikachu, and noticed that there was now a small divot in his tail, making his tail look like it had a heart shape to it.

“Pika...” said Pikachu in amazement as he turned around and looked at his tail. You weren’t sure, but his voice sounded slightly higher than normal.

“What did you...” You began, then clapped your hands over your mouth in shocked embarrassment. Your voice sounded so much deeper now. You were almost certain that Pikachu had swapped genders with you, but you still needed to be sure.

Pikachu was having a good giggle at your expense, clearly enjoying your surprise at your new male voice.

You cleared your throat and spoke again. “Did you use the gender swap button?” You asked.
