“Pika,” Pikachu said with a nod once he stopped giggling.

“Huh,” you said. You stood up from the chair at your desk, and held an arm out to Pikachu. He climbed onto your shoulder, and you walked over to the mirror in your room to get a better look at your new male body. You seemed to be about five inches taller, meaning you were about six feet and eight inches tall. You also seemed to be slightly more muscular, though you were still quite slim. Your face was still the same general shape, though your nose and chin were now slightly more square, and the beauty mark on your chin was gone. As you’d noticed earlier, your breasts were gone, and your Zero Suit was tight against your male body, showing off your muscles. There was also an obvious bulge between your legs that was only enhanced by the tightness of your Zero Suit.

Having finished examining your own reflection, you quickly look over Pikachu. To your annoyance, the only visible sign of Pikachu gaining a female body was that his heart shaped tail.

“Well, this is interesting,” you said, and Pikachu nodded. You walked back over to your desk, and Pikachu jumped off your shoulder and onto the desk as you sat down and picked up the remote.

“Do you want to swap back, or stay like this?” you asked Pikachu.
13213211212.title: Gender

choices: Try to take the remote apart.
132132112122.content:
“Pika Pika,” said Pikachu, shaking his head.

“You want to stay like this, then?” You asked.

“Pika!” he said, nodding his head with a smile.

“Okay then,” you said, smiling back at her. “I don’t mind being male for a while.”

“Pika Pi!” said Pikachu happily.

“I would like to swap back later, though,” you said.

“Pika,” he said, his ears drooping as he nodded.

You turned your attention back to the remote, looking for a way to open the remote and examine the insides. The remote was currently set in Swap Mode 2, which was good for swapping things with Pikachu, since you’d both be aware of the swaps. Of course, if Pikachu took the remote and used it on someone else, you wouldn’t know, but Pikachu and his target would. You flipped the remote over, and looked at the hidden buttons. You counted six buttons, a blue button, a red button, a yellow button, a green button, an orange button and a purple button. You wondered what the hidden buttons did, and why they were hidden in the first place.
132132112122.title: Pikachu wants to stay like this.

1321321121221.content: You decided that you needed to figure out what the hidden buttons did. Of course, since the buttons were not labelled, you had no idea what they might do. Maybe you could scan the remote with your Power Suit. That might allow you to learn what the hidden buttons do safely. Or, you could simply point the remote at yourself and press one of the buttons to see what it does.
1321321121221.title: Test the hidden buttons.

13213211212211.content:
With something as powerful as the remote, you figured it was better to be safe than sorry. You stood up, and Pikachu cocked her head quizzically.

“Pika?” she asked.

“I’m going to scan the remote with my Power Suit,” you said. “Hopefully, the scan will tell us what the hidden buttons do.”

“Chu,” said Pikachu with a nod. She sat down and picked up the remote while you walked over to where you kept your Power Suit. You quickly put on your Power Suit, and noticed that it was slightly taller and didn’t press against you chest quite as much. The remote must have altered your Power Suit when you and Pikachu had swapped genders.

Once you were in the Power Suit, you put your helmet on, and Pikachu held up the remote. You pressed a finger to the side of your helmet, scanning the remote. After a few seconds of scanning, you heard a beep, and the results of your scan appeared on your heads up display.

You quickly read through the information that was displayed. The first few paragraphs didn’t include any new information, but the last paragraph was a description of the hidden buttons.

“Okay, it worked,” you said. “I know what the hidden buttons do.”

“Pika?” Pikachu asked, turning the remote over so she could see the back.

“The blue button is the Undo button,” you said. “It undoes the last swap you performed, and the red button, the Reset button, undoes all the swaps you’ve done. The yellow button is the Set button. If you pressed it now, when you press Reset, it’ll undo all the swaps except the gender swap we did.”

“Pika Pi!” said Pikachu, and she pressed the yellow button, locking the gender swap into place.

“Should’ve seen that coming,” you muttered, and Pikachu giggled. “Anyway, the green button is the Scramble button. When you press it, the remote picks a swap at random and swaps everyone nearby. The last two buttons are the Aware and the Unaware buttons. Using the orange button makes someone aware of all the swaps that have happened and that will happen, while the purple button makes them unaware of all the swaps.”

“Pikachu,” Pikachu said, pointing the remote at herself. She pressed the Aware button, then pointed the remote at you and pressed...
13213211212211.title: Scan the remote first.

132132112122112.content:
You blinked a few times. Why had Pikachu bothered using that remote on you? You already knew it didn’t work, despite all the information you’d scanned into your Power Suit. You figured it was all just an elaborate prank one of the other fighters had come up with.

“Pika Pi?” Pikachu asked as you took your helmet off.

“No, I don’t feel any different,” you said. “Why do you ask?”

“Pika, Pi Pikachu!” Pikachu said. She pointed at the remote, then pointed at you, then herself, wagging her tail a few times.

“Are you saying you used the remote to swap our genders?” you asked. “Pikachu, I’ve always been male, and you’ve always been female. I told you, that thing doesn’t work.”

“Pika...” said Pikachu quietly. She sounded awed, rather than disappointed. That didn’t make any sense. You frowned. Apparently, one of the hidden buttons could make the target unaware of any swaps performed. Had Pikachu made you unaware? No, that was impossible. You’d tried the remote earlier, and nothing had happened.

While you were lost in thought, Pikachu pointed the remote at you and pushed another button.
132132112122112.title: The Unaware button.

1321321121221122.content:
You were brought out of your thoughts when Samus put his helmet back on, making sure his ears fitted into the sides of his helmet.

“So this is what it looks like in here,” Samus said. “Hey, I can talk like a person now!”

“Pika?” you asked, tilting your head quizzically. You were sitting on the edge of Samus’ desk, while Samus himself was standing a short distance away, holding something between his hands.

“Oh, right, I made you unaware,” said Samus. He pointed the object in his hands at you and pressed a button.
1321321121221122.title: Pikachu swapped something with you.

choices: "Samus" swaps something else (with you still unaware)
13213211212211221.content:
Samus was sitting on the edge of his desk with his helmet securely affixed around his ears, legs dangling over the edge. He didn't have any other armor on, but this was normal to you. After all, you were Pikachu. You were the one who wore power armor all the time. But what did he mean when he said he made you "unaware?"

"This is amazing," he said, standing up triumphantly. "I never thought something like this could even be possible! Well, apart from Heart Swap, anyway, but that's completely different!"

"Pika?" you asked, putting a paw on your cheek.

"Oh Pikachu, of course you can come along," he responded endearingly. With that the two of you headed out, you on Samus' shoulder. Your blonde hair blew back behind you as Samus raced down the hallway with you.
13213211212211221.title: Another swap is made.

choices: You ask Pikachu to undo the swap.
You ask Pikachu to do a different swap.
You decide to stay like this.
13213211212211222.content:
You frowned. Why were you sitting on your desk, naked, while Pikachu was wearing your Power Suit. Had he swapped clothes with you? That wouldn’t explain why you were sitting on the desk, though.

“Pika?” you asked, then gasped. Why did you sound like Pikachu?

“Sorry,” said Pikachu. “I tested the life swap on you after I made you unaware.”

“Pika! Pikachu!” you said angrily, causing sparks of electricity to fly from your cheeks.

“Don’t worry, you’re aware now,” said Pikachu. “I can undo the swap if you want to, I just wanted to try it out.”
13213211212211222.title: "Samus" makes you Aware.

choices: You and Pikachu go out with the remote.
You take the remote by yourself.
Pikachu takes the remote by himself (Pikachu's POV).
132132112122112221.content:
“Pika,” you said as your cheeks stopped sparking. “Pi Pikachu,” you continued, crossing your arms over your flat chest, reminding you that you were male. Not only that, but when you were unaware, you had thought of “Samus” (actually Pikachu) as being male, even though his body was biologically female, thanks to swapping genders with you earlier.

“You’re more mad at being unaware than at the life swap?” Pikachu asked.

“Chu,” you said with a nod.

“I’m sorry for making you unaware,” Pikachu said. “I just wanted to see if it worked on someone who knew the remote worked.”

“Pika,” you said. That was understandable, though you still weren’t happy at being Pikachu’s test subject.

“So, did you want to swap back?” Pikachu asked.

“Pi,” you said, nodding.

“Okay,” said Pikachu, pointing the remote at you and pressing the Life Swap button. Instantly, you swapped places with Pikachu, and were now standing, dressed in your Power Suit. Pikachu was sitting on your desk, and was still holding the remote in his hand.

“Thanks,” you said, and began taking off your Power Suit.

“Pika Pi!” said Pikachu, waving his heart-shaped tail happily.

As you took your Power Suit off, Pikachu put the remote down on your desk, then hopped off the desk and walked up to you.

“So, what now?” you asked once you’d finished removing your Power Suit.

“Chu...” said Pikachu.

“Do you want to go and use the remote on other people with me?” Samus asked. “Or do you want to take the remote and use it by yourself for a while?”
132132112122112221.title: You ask Pikachu to undo the swap.

choices: Peach is still there, but something interrupts
1322.content:
Deciding it to be the best option to test, you aim the remote at Peach and press the body swap button. Almost as soon as you press it, your perspective shifts down slightly, since Peach was shorter than you were. In front of you, Peach now looks like you, except she was still wearing her own clothes, and had her hair out of the ponytail you usually kept it in. She kept walking, not even noticing that her body had changed.

You, on the other hand, definitely noticed. Looking down at yourself, you see Peach's body, dressed in your zero suit. You felt smaller, more frail, although you suppose that'd only make sense now that you had the body of a princess instead of a bounty hunter. Although you couldn't actually tell whether you were actually weaker now that you had Peach's body, or whether Peach's body just made you feel weaker. The bright blonde hair falling in front of your eyes revealed the changes extended to your head to, although you still had your hair up in a ponytail, even though you had Peach's hair now.

The main thing, however, was that you knew this thing worked. Your test run had been successful, and now you could go back to your room and see if you could figure out how this thing did what it did. But first things first, you wanted your body back. Peach's body was fine to test the remote, but you had no intention of keeping it.
1322.title: Body Swap

13221.content:
Luckily, Peach hadn't wandered off yet, you point the remote at her and press the body swap button again, putting you back in your own body. Now it was time to see how this thing worked. You head back to your room for further examination. Once you reach the room, you head straight for your desk. Thankfully, your roommate was still out.

You get your tools out and have them at the ready as you attempt to find somewhere to start at opening the remote up. You had a much bigger selection of tools back on your ship, but for now you were willing to make do with what you had here. People were less likely to ask why you were in your room than they would if you had gone to the hangar where your ship currently was.
13221.title: Peach is still there

132212.content: While working on what you had believed to be an opening, your hand slips, and your took pierces cleanly through the remote. Apparently despite seeming being made of metal, the remote wasn't actually that strong, and relied more on the user protecting it in order to stay in one piece. You flinch backwards as the piercing occurs, hoping nothing would happen, but you were ready for the worst.
132212.title: Something goes wrong

choices: Nothing happens, the remote is broken
1322121.content:
The remote sparks a little, bit otherwise, nothing seemed to happen. Perhaps something had swapped and you just couldn't see it? Slowly and carefully, you remove your tool from the remote. Aside from the hole, it seems to mostly be intact. Perhaps it would still even work, provided you hadn't hit anything vital inside. Perhaps you should test it.

Peeking outside your door, you see Peach again, although this time she's stopped and is chatting with Zelda. You aim the remote at Peach and press the body swap button, hoping for similar results as your early test.
1322121.title: Nothing seems to happen

choices: But I'll repair it my self" and return to your room
Go with the princesses to they library and get Shulk's help.
13221211.content:
Taking aim, you push the body swap button, intending to swap with Peach, as you have down this swap before when it was intact, you know what the results will be. But to your disappointment, nothing happens. "Oh," you frowned at your misfortune of breaking the most powerful peace of technology you had come across.
Peach and Zelda then turned to you, "Hey Sammy," Peach called out excitedly waving, "Hi Samus," Zelda greeted you.
You walked over to them, and greeted them back. Peach bent over a bit, to look at the device in your hand, which was down by your side "What's that?"
You raised it, "Something I found, but I broke it," you said, turning it upside down, showing the fracture in the casing.
"That's unlike you, normally you are much more gentle with new equipment," Zelda noted.
Peach took hold of it, "What are you going to do with it now?"
"I was hoping to fix it," you reply.
Zelda and peach thought for a second. "Well, perhaps the hands have some books on repairing devices, they have all kinds of book and leisurely activities."
"You could go out and ask for help from the other residents. Shulk could help you, he's good with machines," she suggests, reminding you that she is a people person, and would get to know everyone.
"They could help..." You said.
13221211.title: Nothing happens, the remote is broken

132212111.content:
"Thank you the suggestions, but I'm going to fix it my self," you say, turning and walking off.
"Okay, but if your need help, don't be afraid to ask for help," Peach tells you.
"Good luck," Zelda wishes you, as you all part ways.

Getting back in your room, you sit to your desk, and pick your tools, turn on a lamp, and get to work. You look around the device, looking for somewhere you could dismantle it, take it apart piece by piece so you could try and fix it.
You found a small panel, and using a screwdriver head, wedging it under, and flicked it of, you saw six new buttons, "These aren't going to be much help."
And you continued looking. And after 15 minutes of an in depth investigation, you concluded it was sealed as one piece until you broke that casing.
"How am I supposed to fix this?" you lamented, "Maybe I should take my friends suggestions, from what Peach had said, Shulk would be really helpful, but I don't I should involve him in this whole swapping thing, and the hands wouldn't have book on this.
132212111.title: But I'll repair it my self" and return ...

1322121111.content:
There was a knocking at the room, and you just called out to them, "It's open."
The door opened, "I just saw Peach and Zelda, they said you upset about breaking something."
You sign, "Peach and her gossip," you thought, "Yeah, just some device I found.'
You then turn around to see that the person who had entered was....
1322121111.title: Someone walked in

choices: Stay calm, and think about what happened
13221211111.content:
Turning around, you saw the pale exercise coach, you had not know her for long, but had become friends in the time.
"Hi Fit," you greet, she herself thought 'Wii fit Trainer' was too long, so asked for friends to just call her 'Fit'.
She walked over, and leaned on the desk, "So what does it do?" she curiously.
"Doesn't matter, it's broken," you say sadly trying to do something with it.
"Sorry, but I don't think I can help, but don't be afraid to ask others for help," Fit said, encouraging you to get help before you became stressed or made it worse, as she stood up, and turned to leave.
As she started walking, she put a had on your shoulder, "Good luck," she wished you as she left.

Some time later, you stood up, "This isn't working.' But something felt off.
Looking down, something was very wrong, you weren't wearing you zero suit any more, in it's place was a sports bra and yoga pants of your friend, instead of the rocket heels, you were now bare foot, and feeling the back of your neck, your hair, instead of being in a pony tail, was not trailing down the back of your neck and your back.

"What happened. Why am I wearing her clothes, she didn't use the broken remote?" You say in a bit of a panicked surprise.
13221211111.title: Your room-mate wii fit trainer

132212111112.content:
"How did this happen?" you wonder aloud, pacing back and forth in your room. "The remote's still broken, so she couldn't have used it."

You think back to exactly what happened when Fit had entered your room. Everything seemed like a fairly normal occurrence. Although, she had put a hand on your shoulder before she left. Did the swap happen then? You hadn't noticed because you had been so focused on fixing the remote. But then, how did that work? You had been holding onto the tool you were using when you accidentally broke the remote with it. Maybe that caused the remote's power to conduct through the tool and into you?

"So then, can I control it or not?" The first swap had happened due to Fit touching you, or at least, you think that's how it happened. Would you be forced to swap something every time you touched someone? That would make fighting in the tournament pretty difficult, not to mention that it would be practically impossible for you to return to normal easily, since you couldn't really control which swap occurred. Although, maybe it wasn't the touch that caused it. Maybe you could actually control the swaps with your mind or something. Perhaps you had been so focused on fixing the remote, with the afterthought of Fit visiting you, that you had accidentally triggered a swap between the two of you. Now you needed to be sure. You focus your thoughts on swapping your clothes back with Fit, in the hopes of being able to control this power.
132212111112.title: Stay calm, and think about what happened

1322121111121.content:
After a few seconds of concentrating, you felt a sudden dizziness and your vision blurred. When the dizziness passed and your vision cleared, you looked down at yourself. You were back in your Zero Suit, and presumably, Fit was back in her clothes as well.

"Well, it's nice to know I can control the swaps," you said. There was still a risk of unintentional swaps while you learned to control your new swapping power, but you figured you could live with that. You picked up the broken remote and turned it over. If you had gained the ability to swap people, then you might as well dispose of the remote. However, there was still the matter of the six hidden buttons. The hidden buttons had no labels, and they weren't listed in the manual, either.

An idea struck you, and you walked over to your closet and opened it. Inside was one of your Varia Power Suits. With the press of a button, the suit opened up, and you quickly donned the suit. Once inside your Power Suit, you put your helmet on and fired up the scanner. First, you scanned the remote's manual, and after a few moments of scanning, a digital copy of the manual was now uploaded to your Power Suit. Once you finished scanning the manual, you turned your scanner on the remote itself, and let the scanner work.

After a few seconds of scanning, new information popped up on your heads up display. The scanner hadn't been able to determine how the remote worked, but it did provide a detailed explanation of the six hidden buttons. You carefully read the information about the Undo, Reset, Set, Scramble, Aware and Unaware buttons. You briefly wondered if you could use the powers of the hidden buttons as well. Then again, since you had the powers of the remote, you would presumably be aware of all the swaps you performed.

Once you finished reading, you deactivated your Power Suit and took it off. Once you'd finished taking your Power Suit off, you picked up the remote and the manual, and put them both in the box the remote had come in. With the remote and manual packed up, you decided to take the box and dispose of it by throwing it in the incinerator. Or, maybe you could get some more practice with your new swapping powers, just to make sure you could control them.
1322121111121.title: You get your clothes back

choices: Pick a random person and swap with them.
13221211111212.content:
You tucked the box containing the broken remote into a corner of your closet, where it would be hidden by your Power Suit. You figured there was no harm in keeping the broken remote, since you'd already figured out it didn't work. Instead, you decided to get some practice with your new swapping power. You knew that distance probably wasn't an issue, since you'd done a clothes swap with Fit after she had left your room to get your Zero Suit back.

You briefly wondered what to do. You could just pick a random person from the roster and swap with them, to try and test the distance limits on your new powers. Or, you could go find your friends Peach and Zelda. That way, you could swap with them and see the swaps in action.
13221211111212.title: Test your new swapping powers.

choices: You look for Peach and Zelda at the library.
You look for Peach and Zelda at the gaming room.
132212111112121.content:
You decide to go looking for Peach and Zelda. You wanted to see your swapping powers in action, and you knew the two of them well enough to be able to see any changes that you made to them. Besides, your friends were probably wondering if you'd managed to repair the remote. They didn't know what the remote could do, of course, only that it was an item you had found and broken.

You remembered hearing one of them mentioning that the Hands might have books on technology she could use to help repair the remote, so they might have gone there to find a book you could use. On the other hand, you knew Peach and Zelda had plans to explore areas of the mansion they hadn't been to yet, including the gaming room. They might have gone there instead.

Either way, you were sure that, even if you didn't find Peach and Zelda at either location, you'd find someone you could swap with.

Which way did you go?
132212111112121.title: Go find Peach and Zelda.

choices: You find Peach and Zelda at the library.
Peach and Zelda are not at the library.
1322121111121211.content:
Settling on going to the library, you start heading to your destination. Once you arrive, you look around to see if you can find your friends somewhere. As you do so, you see Lucina and Robin at a table in a far off corner, studying some fairly old-looking tomes, Palutena and Pit who are thoroughly searching a big shelf on the opposite side of the room, probably looking for something specific, and Rosalina with her Luma as well as Olimar who seem to be discussing one of their findings.

However, did you see your friends Peach and Zelda as well or will you have to settle for other targets?
1322121111121211.title: You look for Peach and Zelda at the library.

choices: ...swap something between the two of them.
...swap something between all three of you.
13221211111212111.content:
Finally, you see Peach and Zelda in front of a shelf dedicated to different kinds of electronic devices. They really were looking for something that might help you repair the remote.

Having found those you want to use your new-found swapping powers on, you ponder what you want to swap and with whom to swap it. Although you know that you can't directly swap something between two different people, you yourself can act as a bridge of sorts, allowing for a multitude of swapping combinations.

As it stands, you can either swap something with one of them, swap something between Peach and Zelda, or swap something between all three of you. In the end, you decide to...
13221211111212111.title: You find Peach and Zelda at the library.

132212111112121111.content: Who do you want to swap something with?
132212111112121111.title: ...swap something with one of them.

1322121111121211111.content: Deciding to keep it simple, you choose to only swap something with Peach. Still, you have yet to decide on what it is you want to swap.
1322121111121211111.title: Peach

13221211111212111111.content: What kind of swap do you end up performing?
13221211111212111111.title: Life or Body

13221211111212111112.content: What kind of swap do you end up performing?
13221211111212111112.title: Clothes or Gender

13221211111212111113.content: What kind of swap do you end up performing?
13221211111212111113.title: Head or Relationship

1322121111121211112.content: Deciding to keep it simple, you choose to only swap something with Zelda. Still, you have yet to decide on what it is you want to swap.
1322121111121211112.title: Zelda

13221211111212111121.content: What kind of swap do you end up performing?
13221211111212111121.title: Life or Body

13221211111212111122.content: What kind of swap do you end up performing?
13221211111212111122.title: Clothes or Gender

13221211111212111123.content: What kind of swap do you end up performing?
13221211111212111123.title: Head or Relationship

132212111112121112.content:
You come to the conclusion that you want to swap something between Peach and Zelda, only leaving the choice of swap still open. Considering your options, you think about what might be interesting to watch.

First, you had the options of Life and Body Swap. Both would a similar result with only a slight variation, as both options would lead to the body of Zelda living Peach‘s life and the body of Peach living Zelda‘s life. The only difference would be the inhabitants of the bodies as they would either continue their own life in a different body or a different life in their own body. However, as you are the only one who would notice anything, this would only matter to you.

Next, there are Clothes and Gender Swap. These would also lead to some interesting results, either leaving the stoic Zelda in Peach‘s puffy pink dress as well as the girly Peach in Zelda‘s more practical dress, or swapping their femininity, making Zelda the girly and Peach the more reserved princess. Either way, both options would be interesting to watch.

Lastly, you could perform a Head or Relationship Swap between the two. While the former would be immediately noticeable to you, leaving either of their heads on each other‘s bodies, the latter would only really be noticeable once they interacted with other people.

In the end, you decide to perform a...
132212111112121112.title: ...swap something between the two of them.

1322121111121211121.content: Having narrowed down the possibilities to two options, you finally decide on a...
1322121111121211121.title: ...Life or Body Swap.

1322121111121211122.content: Having narrowed down the possibilities to two options, you finally decide on a...
1322121111121211122.title: ...Clothes or Gender Swap.

1322121111121211123.content: Having narrowed down the possibilities to two options, you finally decide on a...
1322121111121211123.title: ...Head or Relationship Swap.

132212111112121113.content: You decide to perform a swap that affects all three of you, though you are not yet sure who will receive whose trait.
132212111112121113.title: ...swap something between all three of you.

13221211111212112.content: Unfortunately, your friends do not seem to be at the library after all. This being the case, you choose one of the other visitors of the library as your swapping target.
13221211111212112.title: Peach and Zelda are not at the library.

choices: Test out how your power works
Try to find out how to stop your powers
1322121111122.content: After a while of focusing, you open your eyes to find that you still have Wii Fit Trainer's clothes on. You sigh. "So it is through touch then," you say to yourself. "I guess the next question is if I can control it at all." You were a little hesitant to test this theory, though. What if you couldn't control the swap? Then you'd be stuck with not one, but two swaps, and a power that would cause even more against your will. Perhaps it would be a better idea to try and find a way to get this power out of your system. Of course, once you found a way, you'd first have to try and get your clothes back from Fit without swapping things with anyone else before getting rid of your powers.
1322121111122.title: Nothing happens

choices: You tell him the truth about the remote
13221211112.content:
You turned around and saw a blonde hair boy in a red jacket. You have have only seen him once before, "Shulk?" you ask him.
He nodded, "Yes, Princess Peach told me you could use my help," he smiled, putting a large array of tools on the table, "And Zelda sent me with these," he said dropping several book, of varying lengths. "I was going to tell her I may not need them, but I didn't think I should question her judgement."

Shulk pulled up a chair to the desk, "What are you working on?"
You slide the remote over the table to him, and didn't know what to tell him, "A remote I found,"
He took hold of the remote, and looked around it, "Here's the problem," he says, looking at the hole.
"I know the problem, but I don't know how to fix it."
"But we have to get inside and see if you damaged the wiring," he says positioning a lamp above the working area, and selecting his tools.
"But first, I need to know how the wiring should be. For that, I need to know its function."
You look at him, and hesitate to tell him the truth, in the end...
13221211112.title: Shulk

choices: You and Shulk set about fixing the remote
132212111121.content:
"Well..." You sigh. "Well alright, if you're going to help, I suppose I should tell you." You reach into the box the remote had come in and take out the instruction manual, handing it to Shulk.

He begins to read through it, but it doesn't take long for his disbelief to show. "This... This is impossible!" he exclaims.

"Oh it's possible, alright. I tested it before I accidentally broke it."

"But that's... I don't know if I can fix something like this."

"Well, there's only one way to find out, isn't there?" you say, picking up one of your own tools. "I doubt you can mess it up any more than I already have."

Shulk pauses, before saying, "Okay then. I'll see what I can do."
132212111121.title: You tell him the truth about the remote

1322121112.content:
Tossing the remote back and forth in hand, the husk of the device tormenting you.
"This device could have been fun to use, why did I have to break it," you sigh, dropping the box, and resting your head side ways on the desk, glaring off into the distance.

"The swaps I could have done," you frowned as you imagined what the swaps you could have done. You felt your clothes change, but it was immediate, all you could feel was much looser and softer clothes. Standing up, you looked down, you were now wearing Peach's large pink dress, long white gloves, and much shorter, plain hi heels that were much heavier than your zero suit. Looking around, your Varia suit was gone, in it's place was a box containing a frying pan, golf club and a tennis racket.
"How did this happen, I didn't use the remote!" You exclaimed tracing your mind back, you remembered imaging the swap results.
You thought for a second, "If I head swap with Zelda, I should see Peach in my clothes," so you closed your eyes, and pictured your head on top of Zelda's body.

"Hey Sammy," you heard your friend call. You opened your eyes, to see what you had thought you would. You saw Peach wearing your zero suit, which hung to her body, with your paralyser and a toad by her legs, "I guess that makes sense, it is her loyal subject."
"Yes Peach," you replied, and looked down, and saw the shorter body of Zelda's clothed in more sensible purple dress and boots.
"You just seemed to go into a day dream," she said.
"Sorry," you smile, she seemed unaware of everything, as you run your hands though your hair, not finding anything of Zelda's, like her tiara, her earrings or her bands on her bangs. Instead finding a large amount of make-up, large blue earrings, and a small crown that all belong to peach, which you now noticed was absent from Peach's head, with your one hair band holding up her wavy hair in a pony tail, like she normally did when she was doing sport, "Where do you think Zelda is?" you asked, trying to change the topic.
"She said she would Meet us, I don't know what taking her," Peach looked around for any signs of her friend.
Standing up, feeling strange in the softer boot when compared to your rocket heels or Varia suit boots, "Let's go find her," you announced.
You heard something simiar to fire ignition, as Peach used your heels to boost her of the chair and in front of you, "Okay!" she said, racing ahead of you, each foot step clanging against the floor, "Wait For Me Princess!" the toad yelled running after her.

It didn't take to long to find Zelda, she was on her way, "Sorry," she apologized, "I was on my way, when I saw Samus's room. I had to check why you were disappointed early." Zelda had what you expected. Underneath Peach's clothes, you could see your body frame, but on her head, she had less make up then your you, but more than Peach, the cylinder shaped earrings and her Tiara going around the crown of her head.
Peach and Zelda began to catch up, "Excuse me," you said, getting their attentions, "I've got to go somewhere but I'll be back in a few minutes."
"Okay, see you a bit then," Zelda said, as Peach waved as you walked away.

You stepped into a bathroom, "Somehow I must have taken into the power from the remote. When I pierced the remote, did the screwdriver conduct the energy, directing it into me?" You concluded while looking at your self in the mirror, looking like a mash of your friends.
"So what were those buttons on the back then," you asked, putting a finger to your chin, and losing your self in thought, "But first I should...
1322121112.title: Something strange happened

choices: Go with them, practice and get experience on  your new power
Return to your room, make the notes
13221211121.content:
You looked over your mixed up body reflected in the mirror. Lifting a gloved hand to the small crown on top of your head, then down past your face, which was covered in make-up, to your ear lobes, which were pierced with large blue, dangling orbs.
Looking down, Zelda's body which was under your head, covered in Zelda's own clothes. It was odd, but somehow, you kind of liked it.
"These to belong to my close friends, I should undo the swaps," Samus said, and then she black out for a second. When she looked around, she was no longer in the bathroom, she was now in the corridor with Peach, who was still in your clothes, impatiently tapping her heavy rocket boot heel against the ground, "What is taking Zelda so long," she huffed.
"The swap undid it's self as I asked it too. But it didn't say anything in the instruction about voice control, or an undo button. But it didn't say anything about the hidden buttons either, maybe the other buttons have functions too, You thought. "I should undo the swap with Peach too, you thought, noting how Peach now had her pink dress back. "So I can do the undo swap thing just by thinking, and seems to only do one at a time."

You felt a grasp on each shoulder, before you were shaken, "Sammy!" You head a voice call. Shaking your head, it was Peach, "Are you okay, you weren't responding to me."
"Sorry," you smiled awkwardly, "I was rather deep in thought,"
Peach made a little smirk, while raising a curious, nosy eye brow, "What about?" she asked leaning into you.
"Nothing," you lied.
"Nothing you say. Your lying, bit a girl can't be expected to tell all her secret," she pouted, stepping a way, a lighter clacking noise can from her normal shoes.
Looking over your self, you see that you again, but that didn't feel right. It felt hollow, and unsatisfactory, and you had an urge to use this newly acquired power.

"Oh, there you are Zelda," Peach said with a short tempered tone.
"Sorry I took so long. So what are we going to do?" Zelda asked.
"I should go with them, I have been avoiding them, and leaving a lot today. But I have to conduct more research on the remote, and record by current knowledge. of it. But if I do go with them, I may be able to swap with others," that last thought made you eager to follow then to quench that swap hunger you had developed somehow.
13221211121.title: Swap back with my friends,"

132212111211.content:
"Well, before we decide, Samus, what do you want to do?" Zelda asks, taking into consideration your recent behaviour of coming and going.
"I plan to come with you two. I feel like I've been letting you down by coming and going, so I'm going to stay with you two for a much bigger length of time," you replied.
"Yeah!" Peach exclaimed in her cheery attitude, before placing a hand to her chin, to think, "The gaming room. We haven't been there yet," Peach suggests.
"I'm fine with that," Zelda stated her opinion, and then turned to you.
You smiled, "Sounds great to me," and you wall made your way to the gaming room.

It wasn't a long way, so the walk was only a few minutes long, and to your disappointment, you didn't see anyone else to swap with. But that changed once you got into the gaming room.

Stepping in, you could see a large room, filled with a great number of games, with an even larger array of genres and forms. Looking around, there was quite a few of the other fighters here.
In the centre of the room, was several tables. Three of which were in use. One was being used for a game poker, since the currency from each world and time period was different, actual money wasn't used, instead chips were evenly distributed, meaning it wasn't as risky, but more fun and friendly. You could see Shulk and Reyn, Captain Falcon, Wario, and Falco.
Captain Falcon had his arms crossed, and had put his cards on the table. You had played him before, this meant he has a good hand, otherwise, he would be looking at his hand, trying to evaluate the chance of winning.
Wario was greedily pulling in his moustache. You couldn't tell what this mean, was it a bluff, a habit, was he confident? It was hard to tell.
Falco held his cards in front of his face, hiding the smirk visible to you at your angle.
Reyn was growling, "Reyn!" Shulk shouted, "You're suppose to secretive about this."
"Not my fault I got such crumby cards," he complained.
Shulk sighed, head in his palm, "Don't tell them that."

Another table was the snooker table, only two people were there, given that it is a two person game. You saw Chrom waiting by the table, while Dunban was carefully aligning his aiming cue. After doing that, he slide the actual cue on top, and shoved it forward into the balls.
"Nice hit. I'm surprised you can do all that, with just your left arm," Chrom said in a complimenting tone.
"Thank you. Having spent a year using just my left arm, and fighting in many battles with just the one arm, I have grown used to it and found ways to make due."

Another table near by was occupied, but unlike the poker table, being circular for the game, and the snooker table. It was small and square to play one of the many table top games available. Here, you could see, Robin and Olimar playing Chess. It was Robin's turn, as he was looking over the board, tapping a book on his lap, evaluating the next move, while Olimar was standing on the edge of his stool, worrying and anticipating his opponents next move.

And in a further away part of the room, a game table football, was being played, by Pacman, and Mr. Game and Watch, who was moving much more fluently then he did before, and judging by Pacman's large and very expressive face, Mr. Game and Watch was giving a very good game, challenging and competitive enough to be fun, with out getting on each others nerves, something that the hands tried to encourage. This was been demonstrated by most people in the room, with one of two exceptions.

Looking by the wall to your right was a row of arcade cabinets, being played by the Villager, Toon Link, who when he first saw it, was in awe, and ended up being late for the tournament, the same thing happened with Ness, who was also there playing. Bowser Jr. was also there.

Looking around, there was only two other people in the room at the time, Greninja, and Wii Fit Trainer, who were playing twister in the large empty part of the room, the only thing there was a cupboard of a load of games.

"What do you want to do?" Peach asks, only to be replied to with a magical chime as Zelda disguised herself as Sheik, and in a lower voice, which she claimed was habit with the Sheik appearance, "I'm going to join the twister game," prompting you and Peach to follow.
"Mind if we join in?" You asked.
Wii fit trainer shook her head, "No, we were just about to start," she said.
You, Sheik, Fit, and Greninja were around the mat, while Peach manned the spinner.
"Fit, Left hand, red dot," Peach said, and Fit easily did so.

A couple rounds later, "I'm going to look around,: you said.
"Okay see you soon," Peach waved, "Greninja, Right foot, Green Dot."

You stood against a wall, and looked at the other fighters around you, who were still the same as earlier, having either played again, or were still playing. "What should I do, there is plenty of people here to use this power on," you saw, surveying the room, and it's users.
Then you started tapping a couple fingers to your own head, "But what does it allow me to swap?" you say, forgetting the buttons.
"Body, clothes and head," you recite to your self, but then the rest just kind of flowed more naturally to you, "Gender. Relationships. And lives."
"So many choices," you start imaging the possibilities.
"I haven't tried it yet, so why not a relationship swap. But who with?" you asked your self spotting Shulk. You grin, "Maybe I could swap our relationships with Shulk's group here," you think, then making swap map combination, knowing that the swap only works between you and the target.

Many swaps later, "There... That's done." You say, nothing much seemed to change, on the surface, the only change is the toad by Reyn's leg.
"Hey. Sammy," you heard Peach shouting, you noted the change in tone, feeling more like the relationship between the two guys, but with bit of respect put in.
You shook your head, "Yes, Peach?" You replied, feeling more nature with this response.
"You seemed to be a little spacey, are you all right?" she asked, being as concerned for your well being as she normally is.
"Yeah... Yeah," You rub an eye, "I'm fine."
"Okay then, if your sure," Zelda says, in her Sheik voice, before continuing their game, the three of them looked pretty twisted up.

Stepping aside, you slump down into a chair, and started formulating swap patterns you could do.
"So many choices," you sighed, "Too much, if only I could swap everyone at once, without having to decide. Or coming up wit them, that way I would be able to react to them as an observer." To that thought you smiled, and laughed a little, "Yeah, if I could Scramble everyone's traits."
When you opened your eyes, you gasped in shock. Over by the twister mat, in the ninja's clothes, was the imspression of the frog ninja, the clothes hugged tighter to his smaller, longer, frog like frame. Peach's dress laid flat against the black block that was Mr.game & Watch's body.
The Wii Fit trainer was Still wearing her Sports bra, and Yoga pant, but now she was wearing Reyn's body.
This was getting very confusing, as you stood up, the whole room looked bigger, as your fat rippled. This feeling was an unfamiliar too you, and cycling though the people in the room, your pace turned pale.
Looking down, you saw the Zero suit being stretch out around your new obese frame.
Looking to the poker table, Wario was still greedily smirking with your face, and fiddling with the blonde hair trailing down his back.
"Urgh," you grunted in the much bigger voice, disgusted to be in the body of the one person, aside from Mother brain and Ridley, who were also invited, you couldn't stand.
A flat circle rested on your shoulder, causing you to turn around, "Samus," A concern flat voice said, "You really don't look to well. Maybe you should some sleep, or talk to one of the medics," Peach recommended.
"Okay," you grunt in the lower tone, casing you to cringe, "If only I could reset all this, and undo all the swaps."
"Would you like me to walk you to your room?" a voice you never expect to be so glad to hear. Turning to Peach, she was back to normal, in her own body, talking to you as one woman to another as an equal.
You yawned, and stood up, the experience and sudden exhaustion caused your legs to quiver. And nodded.
Peach smiled happily, "Okay, glad to see that your beginning to see reason."
She called out to Zelda where you were going, before stepping out, pulling you by holding your hand, walking slowly and carefully to your room.

While it was the same walk as early, but due to your state, it took longer, you never would have expected it, but you were thankful to have Peach there. Sure she was one of your closest friends, but at times she could be annoying, and the things she tried to get you too do, and you never expected her to be this dependable and helpful.

Arriving at your room, Peach laid you down on your bed, closing the blind to keep out the late afternoon soon.
"Do you need anything else?" she asked, sitting at the end of the bed.
You shook you head, "Well, get some sleep. Don't be afraid to ask for help, everyone does at some point, even powerful people like you."
She stood up, and as she walked out, "Sweet dream," she smiled gently, turning out the light, and closing the door.
"Thank you, Peach," you whispered, tiredly.
"Why am I so tired?" you asked your self as you nodded off.
132212111211.title: Go with them, practice and get experience on  y...

choices: Peach coming back to check on you
Ness, wanting to make sure your alright
1322121112111.content:
Opening your eyes, you were in your bed. The room was dark, so you got up, heavy heels clanging on the floor, you opened the blind, the sun was starting to set, "So it's not long until meal time. And Peach was right, I do feel a lot better."

Turning around, your desk with the remote was undisturbed. "Maybe I should make some notes," you said as you sat down with the remote, paper and pen.
"So far, I have been able to swap relationships, bodies, clothes and head, by imagining the outcome. I am yet to do a life swap or a gender swap."
You picked up the damage device, "It seems as if the power can be transferred from one body to another, by using some kind of conductor," looking around it, you saw the panel over the hidden buttons and the swap modes, "I can use the hidden functions by saying or saying their name or use. So far I have discovered the buttons, Scramble, undo and reset."
Your eyes opened wide, you had just sat all the functions, looking around, nothing had changed. Taking a deep breath, you thought rationally. "I haven't done any swaps, so nothing could be undone or reset. And no one is around so I couldn't scramble people."
"But I haven't yet discovered how to change the swap mode yet," she says, writing this all down, while fiddling with the swap mode on the remote husk.

The door opened, and someone walked in.
"Your looking better," the person said, greeting you happily.
"Yeah, I am feeling much better," You replied turning around too see.
1322121112111.title: Waking up later on

1322121112112.content:
You eyes forced them selves closed, and you drifted off.

Meanwhile with Peach (switching to her point of view).
Gently closing the door, as not to disturb your friend, "I hope she's all right," you worry, "She only looked tired, but I've never seen Sammy like that before."
You made your way back to the games room. Walking in, you saw that Sheik, Greninja and Wii fit trainer were cleaning up the twister mat.
Sheik walked to you, but in mid walk, changed back.
"So how is Samus?" Zelda asked, just as concerned about her friend.
"She seemed quite tired, so I took Samus to her room, and laid her in her bed. I told her to talk to an on side medic if she didn't feel better when she woke up."
Zelda nodded, "I wonder what caused that, She's never been like before," Zelda put a hand to her chin, "And it came on so fast. She looked fine when we saw her."
"Maybe we should have Dr. Mario check up on him," You suggested.
Zelda agreed, "We should go find him, he may be in his office, giving check ups, the gym, training, he hasn't been to a tournament in years, or in the library studying up on medical practices."
You and Zelda started walking out, the clanking of your rocket heels becoming an ear sore, and the tight blue suit getting uncomfortable, but you had to get used to it, as you may have to fight like this.

Meanwhile, back with Samus.
Her room was empty and quiet, except for Samus's bed. In the bed, Samus tossed and turned in her sleep, dreaming.
In her dream:
Samus was on an orbiting space station, it was large, large enough to have all her friends with her.
She was approach by Zelda and you, as a puppet to Samus's subconscious. But something was off, but being a dream, n one took notice.
You were wearing the Zero suit with the rocket heels and paralyser, and Samus was wearing the large pink dress.
"Hey Sammy," the dream you called out.
"Hi Peach," Samus replied.
The conversation played on as any would between you two.
A light tapping came from behind Samus.
"Hey everyone," the Wii Fit trainer called out, Causing Samus to turn around, she muttered a few words, but dream you didn't think anything off it, Samus then waved a very pale, small hand to her blonde haired friend.

Meanwhile in the games room.
"Which should we check first?" You asked, tapping your head with the blue coated hand.
"Could I come with you?" you head Samus voice ask, but you associated it the wii fit trainer.
Turing around to her, "Okay," you smiled, seeing nothing out of the ordinary, "Were should we check first, Fit?"
"Well I thi...." Fit was cut off by a shriek from Zelda.
You and Fit quickly turned to her, Zelda was looking over at her self in a panic, and pulling at her large pink dress, lifting the edge of the dress, and looking at her red heels.
"What wrong Zelda!?" you asked alarmed, and confused.
"My clothes are gone, and I'm wearing Samus dress," she said, clearly distress by the surprise.

Back in Samus dream
"Samus, can I talk to you for a moment?" Zelda asked pulling Samus aside, into a nearby room.
The door opened automatically opened, and the two entered.
Samus went to stand in the middle of the room, While Zelda stood by the door. It slid shut, and the inner mechanism locked. Pulling of her elbow glove, Zelda put her bare hand to the door interface, and said "Lock," it turned red, Zelda removed her hand.
"Samus, can you swap clothing with me?"
Samus looked at Zelda's purple dress, then over her own Pink dress.
Samus nodded. Moments later, They were fully dress in the others clothes, and finishing of by putting the gloves on.

Back with Zelda, Fit and yourself
"Zelda, that's your dress, Samus wears that purple dress," You tried to reassure her.
"Why isn't anyone else seeing this as abnormal," Zelda thought, "Okay, maybe we should split up, and meet back outside Samus's room."
"Okay, I'll go with Fit here, and you can call us with your psychic powers if you find him," You said, going off to find Dr. Mario.
Fit hesitated, but agreed and went off, to catch up with you.
1322121112112.title: Meanwhile, with Peach (Peach's POV)

choices: Try to get her to believe that you don't know why either
13221211121122.content:
You felt someone shake you awake, so you sat up.
"Samus, I need to talk to you!" you heard Zelda's voice call to you.
You opened your eyes, "Zelda, why are you wearing Peach dress?" you asked.
"What, I thought you would be unaffected to as you were involved, but you seemed mistaken too," Zelda said, feeling secluded and alone, "But why do you think this is Peach's dress?"
"Because Peach wears the pinkest things of us," You say sitting up. The bed didn't feel right though, instead it was soft and covering both of your arms. Looking down, you saw Zelda's dress, and flashed back to your dreams, and some of the events that happened in them "Because you wear the pink dresses, I wear the purple dress and ninja garb from Hyrule, while Peach wears those advanced suits."
This was making less and less sense, Peach wearing your clothes, Zelda wearing Peach's, and You wearing Zelda's. It got worse when you saw the inside of your arm, in between Zelda's pieces of armour and clothing, it was pale. Pealing of your glove, you noticed that this hand was not your's.
"What happened?" You ask, just as confused as Zelda.
"Well, you got tired, so Peach brought you here, and while you were sleeping, we somehow switched clothing."
You sighed, thinking of how to get out of this predicament.
13221211121122.title: Zelda waking Samus up (Samus's POV)

choices: Zelda wanted to see more swap, which was surprising to you
132212111211221.content:
"I should tell her the truth," You thought to yourself.
"Zelda, I think I know what happened," you started off, and she leaned in closer, "Can you go and get the booklet and the remote from my desk?"
Zelda did exactly that, and you rubbed your tired eyes. Zelda sat down an the get, and handed them to you.
"I found this," you said holding up the remote, "According to the instructions," you said, placing a hand on the instruction booklet, "It allows the holder to swap one of six features."
Zelda looked a little sceptical, "It real, I tested, but then swapped back. But no one notices as it changes reality to match the change, only the user notices."
Going from her scepticism, Zelda faces turned to a mix of disbelief, and awe. "However I broke it," you signed, cringing at your blunder, "But somehow the power went into me, and allowed me to swap. A did a few, and reset," You explained to her.

"So say this is all true, what's changed?" Zelda asked, seemingly questioning everything she knew.
"I don't know, I reset everything before going to sleep. But in my dream, some swaps happened, but I can't remember them all."
"How do you undo the swaps?" She asks looking for a way out of her predicament.
Pulling off the panel, "This buttons have other functions, one can undo, and one can reset the swaps."
"Will you undo it?" She asked hopefully.
"I would, but then you would see the new thing as odd. If only I could make you aware of the changes," You replied.
Zelda stared wide eye at you, "Was another change, body swapping with Fit?"
You nodded, "I guess aware is another function," you say, going and writing that down.
"So I guess you can see at the swaps then?" You ask her.
Zelda put a finger to her chin, and thought about the people she knew, testing her two sets of memories.
"Reset," You commanded.
Zelda lost her train of thought as her clothes changed back, and did everyone else.
"So what will happen next?" Zelda asks you.
Shaking your head, you confessed you don't know.
"Well, Peach and Fit are looking for Dr. Mario, because of your sudden exhaustion earlier, it raised concern."
"I think it was the swap power, a lot of swaps happened, the energy must have come from somewhere, I guess I was the source," You explained your theory.
132212111211221.title: Tell Zelda the truth

choices: Tell one of then, or neither
1322121112112212.content:
Before you go any further, Zelda places a finger on your lips, while putting another hand to her long, pointy ear, pushing it out further, as if to hear something. You did the same, you could hear a light skipping, following that was a light patting, then a normal foot step.

The door, which was already open, opened further, as Peach attempted to sneak in, she tip toed around the room, holding up her dress with index finger and thumb, looking to her side as she avoided anything that would make any noise. As if trying not to wake me up.
She was followed by Wii Fit trainer, she walked in normally, her index and middle finger on one side of face, her thumb on the other, while the last fingers were curled up. Peach tried to be friends with just about everyone everyone, this often worked, she had a cheery tone would often win others over, others would be won over eventually when they realized her charm, while others couldn't stand her. Fit was in the second category, at first, she could stand Peach but in the couple months she had been here, she grew to like Peach, but still found her hard to cope with at times. She seemed to know I was wake, and was irritated by Peach's unique obliviousness.
Dr. Mario then entered normally. He then walked to my bed side, as Fit pinched Peach's chin, and turned her head towards me. Peach then hurried over to a nearby seat, as Fit then stood at the end of my bed.

Dr. Mario slowly made his way up to me, "Wii Fit and Princess Peach expressed their concern for your health, would you tell me about it?"
You nodded, "Well, I was up in the games room, I played a bit, but then stepped back, and soon I started to feel tired, and I couldn't think straight that well and struggled to walk properly."
He hummed, "Well, it sounds like sudden fatigue. Were you stress, are you eating right or over exerting yourself?" He asked gently and slowly.
Thinking back, the swaps were causing stress, but your training but you into a healthy daily regime, to make sure you were at the height of physical and mental health.
Zelda subtly shot a look, telling you to keep it secret.
"I've been eating healthy, and my exercise I do each day aren't physically detrimental."
"How do you feel now," he says thinking over the information he has.
"I'm feeling much better after a little sleep."
He nods, "Well, because I have a limited understanding of your chozo DNA you, I don't know your how to solve your problem. If you have anything more to tell me, see me, and hopefully we can make you better if this happens more often," he says taking his leave, as do Peach and Fit.
"We'll be back in a bit," Peach says waving.
Before she leaves, fit tells you to look after yourself better.

Alone in the room, Zelda brought something to mind.
"Do you want to tell them. Peach is our best friend, and Fit is a new friend and your room mate, it could be more helpful for her to know about this."
You thought about it, then...
1322121112112212.title: Peach and Fit are back

13221212.content: After pressing the button, it was clear the remote still worked to a certain degree. It had definitely swapped you with Peach, but it had done one of the other swaps instead of a body swap. Which swap occurred?
13221212.title: The remote works... sort of

13221212121.content:
Once the swap had happened, you were looking at something similar to what you had seen when looking down after the last swap; Peach's body wearing your zero suit. Only this time you weren't looking down. Peach was over there, talking to Zelda, still in her own body but wearing your clothes.

Looking down, you find you still have your own body, but you're now dressed in Peach's puffy, pink dress, and everything that went with it. Clearly something most have gone wrong, because a clothes swaps had happened when you pressed the body swap button. Perhaps all the buttons were mixed around now? You press the body swap button again, hoping it will give you your own clothes back.
13221212121.title: Clothes Swap

choices: Peach sees the remote in your hand
132212121212.content:
"This should give me back my clothes," You say, pointing the remote at Peach, and pressing the button again.

In an instant, you had moved. You were now stood in front of Zelda.
"Are you alright, Samus?" She asked, "You just blanked out for a second,"
You nodded, "I'm fine," you reply, glancing down, you were now in your zero suit, but you felt much shorter,and arm weren't as long. YOu concluded that this was a head swap, you head had been placed on Peach's body, which was wearing the zero suit.

"You don't sound like your alright," she said, looking concerned. You heard a light tapping, as Peach arrived, "Hi," she said cheerfully, you and Zelda both greeted her back. Peach now stood a little more than half a foot taller than you, as her head was on top of your body, wearing her own clothes.
"I could try to swap back, but who knows what will happen," You thought to your self, not allowing your friends to see that you were conflicted and felt defeated, "How could I undo all this."
132212121212.title: A different swap happens

132212122.content: Which swap did you end up with?
132212122.title: Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

choices: You are aware of all the swaps
You are unaware of all the swaps
1322122.content:
You watch in fear as the remote begins to emit a bright light, and make a gentle humming sound. However, it quickly increases, and it's not long before you find yourself having to avert your eyes from the light, and and the humming fills your ears, blocking out all other sound. If you had to guess, you'd say the remote was either blowing up, or it was releasing all the energy it used to execute swaps.

Little did you know, your second guess had been true, and when the light sound faded, the tournament grounds would be a rather different place. But since you had been the one to pierce through the remote yourself, would you actually be able to see the swaps or not?
1322122.title: Mass swapping

13221221.content:
As the light began to fade, you realised the full extent of what had happened, and you were definitely still aware of all of the changes. This is what you had been afraid of. Now, unless you could somehow fix the remote, or the swaps somehow reversed themselves, you were trapped in this bizarrely altered reality, being the only one who could see anything different.

But what exactly happened to you? (Option chapters have been added to allow for more variety.)
13221221.title: You are aware of all the swaps

132212211.content: But what exactly happened to you?
132212211.title: Option 1/Option 2

choices: Test if the remote still works
1322122111.content:
Things were seriously messed up. First off, you were no longer in your room, you were in the gym, standing in front of a sandbag, the broken remote held in your hand. You now had Ike's body, Rosalina's clothes, and from what you could tell from your new memories, you were living Link's life. Link's relationships and gender didn't seem to have been changed, but Zelda's relationships now belonged to Marth, or whoever it was living his life right now. Your new memories told you that "Marth" now had Charizard's body, and a male version of Wii Fit Trainer's clothes.

You sit down on one of the benches that were in the gym. Luckily there was no one around, so there was no one to interrupt your thoughts. Your new clothes weren't too bad, but it felt very strange wearing them on your new body. Ike's body felt big and strong, but it was still very strange compared to your old one. Your head was filled with both your old memories as Samus, and your new memories as Link in this vastly altered reality. At least you weren't going into this world blind, but you would have preferred to be yourself.

You looked down at the remote in your hand, which was still sparking a little. You had to try and fix this thing; there was no way you were going to sit idly by and just deal with this warped reality. But where would you even begin? All your hi-tech tools were back with your old life as Samus, Link didn't have anything like that. Maybe the Hands had some tools lying around you could use. Although, the remote still seemed to mainly be in one piece, aside from the hole your tool put through it. Perhaps it still worked. If it did, perhaps you could just fix reality by hand. It would obviously take a while, but it'd be better than being trapped like this forever.
1322122111.title: Option 1

1322122112.content:
The damaged done to the remote had caused a mass swapping though out all of the tournament grounds. Looking around, you were no longer in your room. You were in another section of the gym, which instead of having sandbags and fighting rings had wide open spaces, you recognised this as a room used for calmer excise, often used by you're room mate, Wii fit trainer. Thinking back, and racking your brains, you found that you were now living Fit's life, which made you wonder, how else had you changed.

Looking around, you saw that one of the walls covered in a large mirror, which provided the chance you needed to get a good look at your new self. In the mirror was a strange sight. Your reflection depicted a bit of a humiliating mesh of your bros. as the hands put it.
You were no longer in your zero suit, you were missing your paralyser and rocket boots. In there place was a red t-shirt with a blue "1" with white out lines, black shorts and blue shoes. "Are these, the Villagers clothes?"
Another massive change, partially concerned by the clothes, was your new body. It was a body you could Identify more easily, it's long furry blue arms with black paws and a spike protrusion on the back, the black canine like lower legs with thicker thighs than the lower half and your old ones with thicker coating of blue fur, sharing it's colours with your arm fur, and lifting up your T-shirt, you could see a bleach colour white fur covering your torso. "And is this, Lucario's body."
"Thankfully, there is one thing that I kept," you saw putting a paw to your face, which was still your, but lacking the hair band, causing it to fall down your back.

Sitting on the floor was a little uncomfortable as your new legs and strange positioning to them, and started to think aloud. "What should I do now?" you ask your self, looking at the remote in your... paw, it was broken, and the buttons were no longer luminous. "I could return to my room an try to fix it, but how with these," you say looking over your new appendages. "I could get help, but no one would believe me. And who could I get, my relationships would have changed. But whose relationships have I got?" you ask, thinking back to who you spend most time with. Thinking back, you saw the angel Pit serving you happily.
"So I must have Wii fit trainers life, Villagers clothes, Lucario's body, my own head, and Palutena's relationships. Thankfully I now some of what going on"
Sighing, you slip the remote into your pocket and then....
1322122112.title: Option 2

132212212.content: What exactly happened to you?
132212212.title: Option 3/Option 4

choices: ...examine your new self closer. A woman's view on being a boy.
...find a way to get back to normal. You really don't want to be a boy for long.
1322122121.content:
You were well aware that the remote had caused a mass swapping throughout the tournament grounds. The most obvious indicator of this was that you were no longer in your own room.

Looking around thoroughly, you recognized the room as being the one that the Villager shared with R.O.B.. That alone indicated that you had at least swapped lives with one of them.
Searching through your memories, you found that while you still had your own, you also saw images of working together with Isabelle, the anthropomorphic dog that was also an Assist Trophy in this tournament.

This meant that you must have swapped lives with Villager. In a way this was comforting; although you technically had the life of a young boy, it was at least better than having the life of a robot.

Wanting to see what else had been swapped, you hurried over to the mirror in the room. As you looked at your reflection, you began to feel worried. As far as you could see, there wasn't anything left of yourself physically!

The incredulous face staring back at you certainly wasn't yours. Not only was the spiky brown hair on your new head a far cry from your own long, blonde hair, but the face itself was distinctly that of a young boy; a face that you recognized as belonging to Pit!

The clothes you were currently wearing weren't yours either. You had a red baseball cap on your head, a blue and yellow striped t-shirt was covering your torso, your legs were clad in a pair of blue shorts, while your feet were tucked into a pair of white socks and red sneakers. You also noticed that you were carrying a yellow backpack.

There was no doubt about it; these were Ness' clothes!

You were now starting to freak out a little. So far, you had discovered that you had ended up with heads, lives and clothes of young boys! You hoped this pattern wouldn't continue, but had an odd feeling that it somehow would...

Your new body also seemed familiar. You lifted up your new t-shirt to get a better look at the body you now had. You recognized that too, although it had been a while since you'd seen its owner; it belonged to Young Link!

The fact that the remote had given you the body of a former fighter was somehow more worrying than the fact that you were now basically male; if the remote could even affect those who had been fighters in the past, and perhaps even the trophy characters, then getting everything back to normal would be next to impossible!

You had to give it a try, though. It would be going against everything you believed in if you at least didn't try to set things right. You looked through your jumbled-up memories again, hoping that perhaps you had at least kept your own relationships.

Unfortunately, you saw images of relaxing alongside Bowser, whom you now somehow felt a familial feeling towards.

Your feelings of worry became something approaching panic as you fully realized how you had been mixed-up by the remote; with Villager's life, Pit's head, Young Link's body, Ness' clothes and Bowser Jr.'s relationships, you had in essence gone from being the woman Samus Aran, to being a young boy in every way!!!!!

Thanks to your training by the Chozo, you managed to calm yourself down quickly, but now that you knew how you had been changed, you were more aware of how different you felt.
The most obvious changes were your new, shorter height and the small, but noticeable new 'addition' between your legs.

You saw the reflection of your new face (formerly Pit's) blushing as you felt said 'addition' slighly pushing against your new shorts.
Being a boy felt very different from what you were used to and you weren't quite sure that you liked it.

Then again.....

Thanks to the malfunctioning remote, you were now technically experiencing something that no other woman had before: being a young boy!
From a scientific standpoint, you could gain some valuable knowledge if you decided to examine this situation more closely.

Setting Pit's face into a thoughtful expression, you began to think about the best course of action. Eventually, you decided to...
1322122121.title: From Female Bounty Hunter, To A Young Boy!!!

choices: Test the remote in its broken state
1322122122.content:
Instead of your room, you now found yourself in the garden. This makes something else very apparent, as the cool breeze blows against your back. Looking down confirms it, you're naked. You see your body, your own body. And yet something else seems off, as you put a hand to your head and feel fur. Finding a reflective surface, you see Fox's head on your body.
Looking back on your memory for a possible life or relationship swap, you're almost relieved. You're still living your own life, albeit with no clothes and a fox face. But then you "remember" a romantic relationship with, of all people, Little Mac. He's barely recognizable as Mac, though, with the head of Rosalina and your zero suit over his still-male body.
This was going to be a bizarre day, and if you didn't fix it you'd be living this bizarre life forever. At least you had memories of the new life to cross-reference and knowledge that something was wrong. How awful it'd be if you didn't realize this happened.
1322122122.title: Option 4: Revenge of the Options

13221222.content:
The light from the broken remote soon faded, as did the gentle humming noise that the remote had been making while it was releasing its energy. You looked at the broken piece of machinery in your hands, then looked yourself over. You didn't feel different, but considering the remote's ability to change reality, that was little comfort. In fact, you felt slightly panicked, since, for all you knew, the remote had altered you when it broke, and you were simply unaware of the changes the remote had made.

(While Samus herself did not know what had happened to her, her suspicions were correct. The remote had performed a massive series of swaps with everyone at the tournament, and Samus was completely unaware of what had happened to her, and to everyone else. The question is, what swaps were performed?)
13221222.title: You are unaware of all the swaps

132212221.content: While Samus herself did not know what had happened to her, her suspicions were correct. The remote had performed a massive series of swaps with everyone at the tournament, and Samus was completely unaware of what had happened to her, and to everyone else. The question is, what swaps were performed?
132212221.title: Option 1/Option 2

choices: Try the remote on Lucas and Fit to see if it's still nonfunctional
1322122211.content: Everything seemed the same. You were still an electric Pokémon, Lucina was still your angelic servant, and you were still wearing the striped t-shirt and shorts you came in with. You look down at the remote in your froggy fingers wondering if it's truly broken. Just in case, you check the mirror but everything still seems in order there as well. Your black hair still spiked to the right so you knew it wasn't a body swap at least. Perhaps it didn't do anything after all. Leaving the gym, you see Lucas and Fit talking about something inconsequential. Although you weren't very close with either of them personally, they looked just like you remembered them. Lucas still had the robes perfectly tailored to his curves and Fit was still the fox she was on day one. How odd it was, trying to find change where there was none.
1322122211.title: Option 1

1322122212.content:
Fearing for the worst, you turn to look at the mirror. You were in the gym so it wasn't hard to find one. Looking in the mirror, your fear washes away. You are you. You are the Wii Fit Trainer. Your angel wings flutter as you fill with relief. Heading back to your room, you see your room-mate Samus Aran leaving, clad in her iconic zero suit. You were always a little jealous how well it fit over the many curves of her dragonly body, but seeing it now filled you only with more relief that the worst you'd expected was not the case.

"Oh hey Fit, what's going on?" Samus warmly asks, noticing your unusual amazement at seemingly existence itself.

"Oh, uh, it's nothing," you respond, realizing how weird you probably looked gazing in awe at absolutely nothing. Samus didn't seem to fully believe you but she let it be.

Your room looked normal too. Samus' technology took up a wall and your bow rested by the door. While you're in there, you throw the remote in the dust bin, knowing it doesn't work now. It flashes when it hits the bottom but you know the remote doesn't work anymore so it doesn't worry you.
1322122212.title: Option 2

132212222.content: While Samus herself did not know what had happened to her, her suspicions were correct. The remote had performed a massive series of swaps with everyone at the tournament, and Samus was completely unaware of what had happened to her, and to everyone else. The question is, what swaps were performed?
132212222.title: Option 3/Option 4

13222.content:
To your dismay, when you were ready to swap back, Peach, and with her your body, was nowhere to be seen. It seemed that during your examination of yourself, Peach had continued going wherever it was she was going, and was now out of sight. This was definitely not good. If you didn't have your own body, you didn't want to be dismantling the remote in order to find out how it works, and risk breaking it and being stuck like this.

Right now, you weren't entirely sure where Peach was going, so if you wanted to look for her, you'd just be wandering around aimlessly. Still, you did want your body back, and you wouldn't be getting it back until you found Peach. The next time you'd see Peach would probably be at dinner, if you didn't run into her by chance. Perhaps you could just wait until then.

Although, if you dismantled the remote, there was no telling what would happen. Maybe it would just break normally, leaving everything as is. Maybe it would cause random swaps throughout the tournament grounds, creating some sort of messed up reality that no one was aware of, or worse, with you being the only one aware. Perhaps it was safer to simply leave it as a remote. Then you wouldn't have to be as worried about when you got your body back from Peach, and you could afford to experiment with different swaps a bit more.
13222.title: Peach isn't there anymore

132222.content: Curiosity got the better of you as you decided to do a little more experimenting. However, as there were currently no potential targets in sight, you had to go search for them. At this time of the day, there were only a few places were you were guaranteed to find multiple other competitors, so you decide to go to the...
132222.title: A little more experimenting

choices: She was offering for you to join her yoga session
13223.content:
It was a simple decision to attempt to swap back, but it was at this time that there was an interruption. Wii Fit trainer had walked in front of you, from outside of your tunnel vision which was focused on Peach, stood tall in your body, taller than you now in her body, over a foot shorter than you are used too.
"There you are, Samus," she said in her own gentle tone, which was great for calming people during her yoga sessions, but if often made it difficult to tell how she was feeling behind her relaxing demeanour.
You felt startled as she stepped into view, and blocked your aim of the swap remote. You needed to keep this remote a secret, and in thanks to your warrior nature you could keep a calm face in this surprise.
"Hi Fit," you said, masking your surprise, "Were you looking for me?"
