You asked pleasantly as you tried to look around her to see Peach, which was much harder because you were now shorter, having to tilt your head up to make eye contact, a very new experience.
"Yeah I ...."
13223.title: Peach is still there, but something interrupts

132231.content:
"Yeah, I was wondering what that remote you're holding is for."
You weren't sure how to answer. Fit was your roommate and as a newcomer to the tournament she didn't really make that many friends so far. You initially wanted to keep the remote a secret to explore its abilities without anyone noticing, but sharing it with her could help you two grow a little closer. Maybe experimenting as a pair could even help you understand the remote a little more.
However, there was still the fact that you and Peach were currently occupying each others bodies. If you kept the remote to yourself, you would have to figure out a way to get your body back in case Peach was gone by the time Fit left. If you told her however, she could help you in that regard.
In the end, you decide to...
132231.title: She noticed the remote

choices: Join Fit in her yoga session
Excuse yourself and go after Peach
132232.content:
"Yeah, I was wandering whether you would like to join in on my next yoga session over in the garden."
This caught you off guard, as it had been the first time she made such an offer. On second thought though it made sense, seeing that as one of the newcomers she still had to get in touch with the other competitors. Even you as her roommate hadn't really spent that much time with her yet, never really surpassing a friendly but brief conversation.
As you thought about that, you wondered what you should do. On one hand, you could join Fit in her yoga session and get to know each other more, on the other hand, you saw that Peach was beginning to move out of sight, taking your body with her. You had to make a decision.
132232.title: She was offering for you to join her yoga session

1323.content:
Deciding not to wear Peach's dress or switch bodies with her, you look at some of the other options. You see two more buttons on it which are Life Swap and Head Swap. You thought over on which button you should press.

If you pick Life Swap, you will have Peach's life along with her clothes, skills and relationships. It's a bit daunting to know that you'll won't be just dressed like Peach but everyone will think that you're her as well. And that's not even getting into the relationship drama between Peach, Mario and Bowser.

On the other hand if you pick Head Swap, you will not just be wearing Peach's dress but you'll also have her body with it. But you'll still have your head and your life too. You find this swap to be the oddest one of them all so far.

But you'll know that none of these swaps will be permanent if you don't want them to be as you'll have plenty of time to swap back. After thinking it over, you decide to go with...
1323.title: More Swaps

13233.content:
After deciding against swapping lives or heads with Peach you decided to look at the last two buttons on the remote which are Relationship Swap and Gender Swap.

If you pick Relationship Swap then you'll have all of Peach's relationships including her friends, allies and enemies. Peach was well-liked by most of the residents so you'll have no shortage of friends. But you weren't sure if you want to be dating Mario let alone being fought over by him and Bowser. That's not even getting into the adjustments for the relationship swap to work since you and Mario are from separate worlds. So you'll definitely end up as a resident of the Mushroom Kingdom, probably as a princess just like Peach.

With Gender Swap on the other hand both you and Peach are girls so you're not sure how much things will change when it comes to your life. But you do know that the Gender Swap function will swap the femininity between you and Peach so you'll probably end up about as feminine as her.

After thinking it over you pick...
13233.title: More Swaps

choices: Swap back or swap more with Peach
Stay this way and enjoy your feminine bounty hunter ways
132332.content:
More on a whim than anything, you pointed the remote at Peach and clicked the gender switch, just to see what would happen.

Even knowing that you'd become more feminine didn't prepare you for the sudden wealth of knowledge popping into your brain. Sure, you baked lots of meals for yourself during those long stretches of empty space, but you definitely didn't know so many cake recipes before now. Coordinating outfits, proper make-up techniques, and how to curtsy all seemed to come naturally. You still knew how to use your power suit but you had the feeling you'd be more graceful about it.

You undid your ponytail, letting the hair fall freely. You felt so much better letting it sit on your shoulders. Fittingly enough, Peach was fixing her hair into a ponytail as she strolled by.

"Oh, Peach," you waved. "I don't suppose I can borrow a dress of yours later?"

"No problem." Peach's voice was warm and pleasant but less excitable than it was just minutes ago. "I only wear them for special events or diplomatic meetings. I can get it to you later, I have some royal papers I need to sign."

This was really weird.
132332.title: Gender Swap

1323321.content:
You didn't mind being this girlish, but maybe you should set things right. This was a large part of what made Peach... Peach. Not to mention it could get in the way of your work.

On the other hand, Peach's dress was gorgeous. Another swap couldn't hurt, right?
1323321.title: Swap back or swap more with Peach

choices: Swap with Peach again/Find someone else
13233211.content: After some thinking you decide to swap back to normal. You point the remote at Peach and press the gender swap button again, relieved as you feel everything return to normal. Now there was the question of what to do next. This remote had proved it could do amazing things, so now you could go and find someone else to swap with. Then again, Peach was already right here, and you had only tried out one part of the remote. You could try a different swap, or you could change the setting so that she'd notice the change. The possibilities interested you, even if it was part of Peach you'd end up acquiring.
13233211.title: Swap back to normal

132332111.content: You thought about whether you should swap with Peach again or find someone else. On the one hand, you only tried one part of the remote on Peach and there are plenty of options for you to try with. You could try a different swap, or you could change the setting so that she'd notice the change. On the other hand, there are plenty of other people out there with far more interesting results if you swap with a man or someone who isn't human. After some thought you decide to...
132332111.title: Swap with Peach again/Find someone else

132332112.content: While you were thinking of what to do next, you decide to walk down the hall. As you went down the hall, you began putting your hair back in the ponytail you usually put it in. Unfortunately you were so preoccupied that you didn't notice that you were about to...
132332112.title: Something bad happens

choices: You find the remote on the floor
You find someone else with the remote
1323321121.content: Unfortunately, it seemed Diddy Kong had passed through here earlier, as there was a banana peel lying in the middle of the hallway. However, you were a bit too preoccupied with tying up your hair to notice, and end up stepping right on it and slipping over. As you fall, the remote flies off your hand, and skids down the hallway. Getting up a little slowly due to the pain of your unexpected trip, it slowly dawns on you that you've lost your little reality altering remote. You frantically look around for it. Luckily, the hallway is straight, so there's only really one way it could have gone; the way you had seen Peach headed. You quickly make your way through the hallway, scanning the ground for any sign of the remote.
1323321121.title: Slip on a banana peel

13233211212.content: Fortunately, you do find the remote. Unfortunately, it was currently in someone else's hand. That person was...
13233211212.title: You find someone else with the remote

choices: Tell the truth about the remote
132332112121.content:
You gasp, seeing that your former target was now the one holding the remote. "Peach!" you shout, quickly making your way over to her. She looks up, a little shocked. "Oh, thank god you found it. I've been looking for that everywhere."

She looks down at the remote and back up at you. "This is yours?"

"Yeah," you said. "I found it earlier today and it fell out of my hand when I tripped just now."

"Oh? So, what's it for then," Peach asks, looking at the remote once again and the symbols that labelled the buttons.

You think about whether you should tell Peach about the remote. If you lied about it, and she believed you, then you'd still be able to keep the remote to yourself and you could do whatever you liked with it. But on the other hand, perhaps letting Zelda know about the remote might not be so bad. It might be interesting to have a partner to join you in your swaps,
132332112121.title: Peach

1323321121211.content:
After some thought you decided to not tell Peach about the remote. "Oh it's nothing, just a toy I made for a friend," you lied, as Peach gave you the remote back.

As you looked at the remote, a thought came over you. Did Peach use the remote? There's a possibility that she did even though you were the only who had the instructions for it. "You didn't press any of the buttons, did you?"

Peach hesitates slightly, before saying, "Um, no."

"Peach..."

"I promise I didn't. Why would I go pressing buttons on some random remote I found anyway?"

"Okay." You internally breathe a sigh of relief, since it didn't seem like Peach was lying.

"Thanks. Well, I'll see you later."

"Bye."

You turn and walk away, taking the remote with you. You briefly look over yourself, but you see that the remote is still set to swap mode 1, so even if you had been swapped you wouldn't see anything out of the ordinary. For now, you just accept what Peach told you as the truth, and go back to finding new targets as you had been before.
1323321121211.title: Lie about the remote

13233211212111.content: However, unbeknownst to you, Peach had actually swapped something with you, and was now laughing as you walked off. She was a little worried about the fact that she couldn't swap back unless she somehow got the remote back from you, but for now she was content to enjoy it as her own little secret joke. She had done a...
13233211212111.title: Peach swapped with you

132332112121111.content: Which swap did Peach pick?

1323321121211112.title: Head Swap/Clothes Swap

1323321121212.content:
"It's a remote that can basically let the user swap bodies, heads, lives, clothes, relationships and genders with whoever the remote is pointed at." you said explaining it clearly to Peach.

"Wow," she said stunned. "And this thing works."

"Yes. I already tested it on you, but I swapped back." you said

"So you just used this thing on me without my permission," Peach said with a frown on her face.

"Yes, I'm sorry Peach. I'll make it up to you." you said with a look of regret on your face. The frown on Peach's face disappeared as her bubbly demeanor returned.

"Hey, it's okay Sammie. I know what you can do to make it up for me," Peach said as she took a long look at the remote.

"Really, what is it?" Now you were curious. What exactly is Peach planning?

Peach quickly turned to you and said...
1323321121212.title: Tell the truth about the remote

13233211212121.content:
"Let's swap with each other. It'll waste less time than trying to find someone else to swap with." Samus knew what Peach said was a good idea. It was simple and easy to do. She then pressed the Swap Mode 2 button.

"There, I pressed the Swap Mode 2 button. According to the manual, in this mode, only the user, the target, and anyone else holding the remote will be aware of the swaps." Samus quickly handed the remote to Peach. "Now do you want to pick what we swapped or should I?"
13233211212121.title: Let's swap with each other

132332112121211.content: "Yeah, I'll pick. You had your fun for now." Peach took the remote out of Samus' hand and began to think about which option she wanted to pick. There's at least six options: Body, Head, Clothes, Life, Relationship and Gender swap. All of them sound interesting, but she didn't know which one to pick.
132332112121211.title: Peach picks

1323321121212111.content:
Peach shrugged off the Life, Relationship and Gender Swap options as they weren't things she wanted to swap with you at the moment. This left her with the Body, Head and Clothes Swap options.

She first looked at the Body Swap button. She knew that if she picked that option, not a whole lot would change when it comes to her life and personality. But it would change how she felt in her body. Mostly because your body is more muscular than hers and is built differently for certain skills than what she has. But if she didn't like it, she can easily swap back with you and there's two more options in store if she wasn't interested in swapping bodies with you.
1323321121212111.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Clothes Swap

13233211212121112.content:
Deciding the Body Swap option wasn't for her, Peach was left with the Head and Clothes Swap options.

The Head Swap option was by far the most bizarre option on the remote. She will still have her head but on your body. It sounded like a very weird option, one she wasn't sure she want to try out with you.

The Clothes Swap option on the other hand was far more mundane. It would be kind of amusing to see you dressed as her and vice versa. It would be an interesting experience to wear your Zero Suit and Power Suit.

After some consideration she decided on...
13233211212121112.title: Head Swap/Clothes Swap

1323321121212112.content:
Peach shrugged off the Body, Head and Clothes Swap options as they weren't things she wanted to swap with you at the moment. This left her with the Life, Relationship and Gender Swap options.

She first looked at the Life Swap button. If she picked that option she will have your life which includes your skills, clothes and relationships. It's a bit daunting to know that this option will not just make her dressed as you but also make everything she's you as well.

Of course she knew that if she didn't want it, there's the Relationship and Gender Swap options she could use instead.
1323321121212112.title: Life Swap/Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

13233211212121122.content:
Deciding that she didn't want to use the Life Swap option all, this left her with just the Relationship and Gender Swap options.

First's there's the Relationship Swap option. If she pick this option, she'll have all of your relationships including your friends, allies and enemies. She genuinely wasn't sure whether she wanted to go through with this since she didn't know what friends or enemies you have. But it would be nice to take a break from being fought over by Mario and Bowser. She'll let you deal with it.

Then there's the Gender Swap option. Both you and Peach are girls so she doubt that things will change much when it comes to their lives. On the other hand, that option will swap femininity between Peach and you. So Peach knew that if she pick that option, she'll be about as feminine as Samus (Which isn't much) and vice versa.

After some thought Peach decided on...
13233211212121122.title: Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

13233212.content:
You couldn't resist, switching your zero suit out for Peach's dress. The sensation of fabric flowing around you is just heavenly.

You have to stifle a giggle as you undo your ponytail and second time while Peach ties up hers. Maybe you should've done this before the two of you changed your hair, but what's done is done.

You feel a girlish playfulness think of new ways to use the remote, with your more professional logic suggesting more tests as well.
13233212.title: Clothing Swap

1323322.content: You feel overwhelming content right now so you think you'll just experience this new perspective on life for a while. Maybe you could make a treat for someone? Or maybe a makeover session with your Wii Fit roommate?
1323322.title: Stay this way and enjoy your feminine bounty hu...

choices: Swap with the Wii Fit Trainer
13233222.content:
The Trainer was unsurprised when you suggest a night of goofing off and so on. You didn't have any interest in this sort of thing when you were raised by the Chozo, but your memories tell you that you found comfort in it now.

With Pikachu lounging contently on your lap, you easily applied a polish to the Trainer's nails. "This color will look great on you Fit."

"Thank you, Samus. Although I don't see how this could help my training."

You giggle at her confusion. "Maybe it'll get the attention of new recruits? Besides, you need something more than training for your time off."

The Trainer looks uncomfortable. "Perhaps. But I'm not entirely sure where to begin."

Your roommate may be a renowned fitness enthusiast, but you couldn't help but notice she lacked some serious social skills. You yourself didn't have a chance to gain many friends in the bounty hunter business, but a trainer? They couldn't keep her that busy!

"Well, I'll help you any way I can!"

Fit attempted a smile. "Much appreciated."

Of course, helping the Trainer would be much easier with the remote. You could swap with her right now and help her socialize. Or you could find someone else and swap with them to help her.
13233222.title: Girls Night

132332221.content:
The answer was clear: you needed to help improve Fit's social situation. People largely avoided her, so you needed to make sure Fit was the one to reach out.

The question was how.
132332221.title: Swap with the Wii Fit Trainer

1323322211.content: Life swap would involve you taking over Fit's life and socializing for her. But a relationship swap would give her some long friendships in an instant. Either way, you'd have to work to befriend people.
1323322211.title: Life swap or relationship swap

choices: The Trainer left early to exercise
The Trainer left early to exercise and the remote is gone
1323322212.content:
Maybe your newfound sensitivity was the key to Fit's problem. Giving her this delightful perspective would no doubt greatly improve her social stature.

There's a click of the button and everything changed in your head.

That was a strange one. Why would gender swap change your behavior, especially that drastically? It had to be because of Peach. The princess was so girly and feminine, swapping those habits had to bring over some personality traits. Especially traits where she enjoyed all those things.

Before you could reflect on this theory, Wii Fit Traimer grasped your hands. She was smiling brightly, with more emotion than you've ever seen from her.

"Now that you've done my nails, we need to do your nails."

Oh good lord. "That's not really necessary."

"Of course it is!" She clasped her hands tobgether. "The better you look, the better you feel. That's why training is so much fun!"

You weren't entirely sure how those two ideas connected. But Peach's femininity meeting Fit's determined training nature was too much for one bounty hunter and you give in. You manage to evade staying up all night, but your nails were painted, your hair was braided, and you had to wash off some lipstick before bed.

You had planned on finding a way to fix this in the morning. Really. But when you woke up...
1323322212.title: Gender swap again

13233222122.content:
If there was one thing in life that never changed, it was the Wii Fit Trainer's dedication to fitness. You were pretty unsurprised by her absence in the morning.

The disappearance of the remote was much more alarming. You spent several minutes desperately searching the room, overturning pillows and sheets, scattering supplies everywhere. Where was the damn thing? It was right here last night! Pikachu was still in your room, watching in puzzlement, so he couldn't have messed with it. The only person who could've taken it was-

Oh no.

You quickly march over to the fitness center, trying to maintain some degree of composure. Just gotta keep your cool, keep your cool...

And certainly, there she was, stretching and execising just like usual...
13233222122.title: The Trainer left early to exercise and the remo...

choices: Pikachu is still in your room.
132332221221.content:
Wii Fit Trainer smiled brightly as you approached. “Hi Samus! Last night was really fun, wasn’t it?” she asked as her long yellow ears perked up happily.

“Fit, I’m in a bit of a hurry,” you said, looking around quickly. “You didn’t happen to see a remote in our room did you?”

Fit shook her head, causing her well-groomed yellow fur to ripple slightly. “No, I didn’t see any sort of remote,” she said, her flat-tipped tail swaying from side to side as she stretched. “Why do you ask?”

“Long story,” you said, thinking back to when you’d searched your room. You were absolutely certain that the remote wasn’t there, but you didn’t think that Fit was lying... Unless that wasn’t actually Fit you were talking to. You suddenly remembered the life swap option on the remote. Had Fit swapped lives with someone? Was the woman standing in front of you actually Pikachu? Or was it actually your body, living Fit’s life? You had to find Pikachu and ask him if he’d seen the remote.

“Samus? What’s wrong?” Fit asked, and you suddenly realised that your mouth had dropped and your eyes had widened while you were lost in thought. You snapped your mouth shut quickly.

“I just remembered something,” you said quickly, turning to leave. “Gotta go!”

You turned and left, walking as fast as you could without breaking into a run. Hopefully, Pikachu hadn’t left your room yet...
132332221221.title: ...in a fitness outfit

choices: Try to get Fit and Pikachu back to normal.
1323322212211.content:
You opened the door to your room, and, thankfully, Pikachu was still there. Pikachu was stretching his arms as you opened the door, but hurriedly dropped his arms to his side as you entered.

“Pikachu,” you asked. “You haven’t seen a strange remote around here, have you?”

“Pika, Pikachu,” said Pikachu, shaking his head as his light grey eyes avoided your gaze.

“Really?” you said, raising an eyebrow. “And why were you stretching in the same way that Fit usually does when I came in?”

“Pi...” said Pikachu, scratching the back of his neck as he blushed, bringing a little colour to his blank white skin.

“You’re not really Pikachu, are you, Fit?” you said.

“Chu,” said Pikachu as his shoulders slumped in defeat. He reached behind him and pulled out the remote, which you snatched from him quickly.

“Pi Pika, Pikachu,” Pikachu said as he crossed his arms over his breasts.

“You did a life swap with Pikachu, didn’t you, Fit?” you asked as you pulled out the remote’s manual and quickly reread the section on the life swap.

“Pika,” said Pikachu, nodding.

You frowned. Pikachu looked the same as he always did, with his featureless white skin, light grey eyes and dark grey hair on his head. But, knowing that Fit and Pikachu had swapped lives, you guessed that Pikachu’s current body belonged to Fit, and Fit’s body was actually Pikachu’s.

“Wait,” you said. “If you’re actually Fit, why are you talking like Pikachu?”

“Pika Pika, Pi Pikachu,” said Pikachu, looking rather upset.

“Hmm,” you said. “Pikachu can’t speak English, which means that when you swapped lives with him, you had to speak like Pikachu. Am I right?”

“Pikachu!” said Pikachu, nodding. “Chu.”

“Guess you didn’t think this through, huh?” you said, looking at the remote in your hands. Maybe you should try and figure out a way to return Fit and Pikachu back to normal. Or, maybe you could just take the remote and leave Fit in Pikachu’s life.
1323322212211.title: Pikachu is still in your room.

132332221222.content:
The Trainer smiles a brilliant smile as you approach. "I was hoping you'd come today! Don't you feel more energized after last night?"

This was getting annoying. "Trainer, I'm in a hurry, you didn't see a-"

"Remote? Oh that thing is wonderful. It has so many amazing powers and abilities! It's so fun to play with!"

You drag a hand down your face. Sweet mercy, this woman was going to be the end of you.

"That thing is dangerous, Trainer. It had me thinking weird for hours. Please tell me you didn't do anything too crazy with it."

The Trainer, it occurred to you, was extremely naive. Maybe it came with being so hyper focused on fitness. Even with Peach's newfound energy and hobbies within her, the Trainer was exceedingly awkward at dealing with people.

Judging from the way her eyes darted anywhere but yourself, she was still a horrible liar. "N-noooope. Nothing too crazy!"

You crossed your arms, keeping a stern look. "What did you do."

She had the decency to look sheepish. "I was just having fun! No one noticed anything yet!"

"What did you do."

"I was just messing around!"

"Who did you swap things around with?!"
132332221222.title: ....in a pink dress

1323322212222.content:
You blinked.

"Say that again?"

She shrugged with an awkward smile. "It was just so funny to see you switch around in your sleep! You aren't mad, right?"

You find yourself looking in the mirror. You had been changed? You didn't feel any different. But how would you tell? You couldn't even work up the anger, really. This was you, for all intents and purposes. Being someone else seemed... weird.

You took stock of your features. Same as always. You looked...
1323322212222.title: "Just a couple people.... and you...."

choices: The Trainer swapped your relationships around too
13233222122221.content:
Decked out in your typical racing helmet and form-fitting uniform, you couldn't see anything wrong. You were the legendary Captain Falcon, the greatest female bounty hunter and racer in the galaxy. Your were tall, with long blonde hair that covered one of your eyes, but that was hardly any trouble on the tracks. If anything, it just proved the other competitors couldn't keep up with your moves.

"You better not be joking, Fit, because I don't see anything wrong."

She giggled despite herself. "Oh, it's impossible for you to see the differences as you are now. But I switched your life and clothing with Captain Falcon."

You pinched the bridge of your nose. "I'm Falcon, Fit."

"Oh. Oh!" She giggled again. "No- you're Samus! Your life is just Falcon's now."

"The plumber?"

She laughed again. "Sorry, I've switched around so many things! Mario has your life now."

You crossed your arms. Well, at least you were always a bounty hunter. Although you doubted Mario could reach the pinnacle of success you've reached, greatest Federation bounty hunter or otherwise.

"Please tell me I didn't look like him."

"Oh no, your original body is.... somewhere. But you're still a woman!" Hmph. You hoped you were a good-looking one. You took great pride in your appearance and moves. Did you always feel this way? Or was that just a Captain Falcon thing? You certainly felt strong and powerful as Falcon.

"Is that everything?"
13233222122221.title: She swapped numerous traits about you

13233222122222.content:
You looked at your reflection in the mirror. You had the same pure white skin and dark grey hair you'd always had, and your light grey eyes were the same as always. You were wearing your blue form-fitting Zero Suit, with your Paralyzer strapped to your hip and your Rocket Boots on your feet.

"Well, I don't look any different," you said slowly, turning to Fit.

Fit giggled. "You, um, you actually have my body."

"Really?" you said, looking Fit up and down. Fit was a tall woman with pale skin, and she had long platinum blonde hair that covered her right eye, and her eyes were a light blue.

"So... you have my body?" you asked.

Fit giggled again and shook her head. "Oh, no, this is Rosalina's body. She has your body now."

You frowned, thinking. Rosalina had your body? So that meant that you had originally been a tall woman with blonde hair and dark blue eyes, instead of a woman with featureless white skin. Thanks to the remote, you honestly couldn't imagine yourself looking like anyone else, but you were thankful you were still a woman. At least, you thought you were still a woman. You remembered switching genders with Peach, then with Fit, so Fit had Peach's gender, Peach had your gender and you had Fit's gender. At least, you thought so. Did gender change with body swaps? You thought back to last night, when you'd given Fit Peach's gender. She'd become much more comfortable in the pink dress she always wore after you'd given her Peach's gender, and she still seemed to be acting as she was last night. You guessed that meant she still had Peach's gender, even if she had what was supposedly Rosalina's body.

"You didn't swap my gender around, did you?" you asked slowly.

"What? No, no, I wouldn't do something like that," said Fit. "Don't worry, you're still a woman, and so is Rosalina. I'm still a woman, too."

You nodded slowly. "Anything else?"

"Well, I did swap clothes with Peach," said Fit, giggling and blushing with embarrassment.

You frowned again. That pink dress belonged to Peach? Even when she'd still had her original gender, Peach always wore a tank top and yoga pants. Then again, if Fit was telling the truth about the swaps she had performed, you had no way of knowing if that was how things always were or not.

You shook your head. "Is that everything?" you asked.

"Yep, that's everything," Fit said, and you were certain she was telling the truth about the swaps she had performed..

You sighed, and dragged a hand down your face as you mentally recapped the swaps so far. First, you had swapped genders with Peach, and later with Fit. If Fit was telling the truth, then after Fit had taken the remote, she'd first swapped bodies with you, then swapped bodies with Rosalina. After that, she'd swapped clothes with Peach. That meant that Peach had your gender and Fit's clothes, Fit had Rosalina's body and Peach's gender and clothes, Rosalina had your body and you had Fit's body and gender. This was an absolute mess.

"Do you still have the remote?" you asked, feeling incredibly tired all of a sudden.

Fit nodded, and pulled the remote out from the folds of her dress. "I'm really sorry for taking the remote without asking you," she said. "Do you... do you want it back?"
13233222122222.title: She only swapped a few traits around.

choices: Try and get everything back to normal.
Leave things as they are for now.
132332221222221.content:
"Yes, I want it back," you said, holding your hand out.

"Okay," said Fit with a sigh as she passed the remote to you. "I'm really sorry for taking it without asking."

"I know, I know," you said as you took the remote from her. "I'm not really mad at you. I just want to make sure the remote isn't found by someone who might abuse it."

"Oh," said Fit as she returned to her stretches. "I didn't think of that." Fit was quiet as you briefly studied the remote in your white hands. It was still in swap mode 1, which meant that Fit was the only person aware of the swaps she had made.

"Did, um, did you want to return things to how they were before the swaps?" Fit asked.

You paused as you gave Fit's suggestion some thought. It might be a good idea to try and return things to normal. On the other hand, apart from the new attitude Fit had received with Peach's gender, you honestly couldn't remember ever having Rosalina's body, which was supposedly your real body. Of course, trying to swap back could be even more trouble than it was worth...

What did you decide?
132332221222221.title: Take the remote from Fit.

choices: Go to your room and study the remote.
1323322212222212.content:
To your surprise, you weren't as worried about the swaps Fit said she had caused as much as you thought you would be. You were apparently still a woman, as was Fit and Rosalina, and Fit's dress, which apparently used to be Peach's, was a better match for her current gender than Peach's workout clothes.

"No, I'll leave things as they are, at least for now," you said.

Fit laughed happily and gave Samus a big hug. "Oh, thank you thank you thank you!" she said in a rush.

"You're welcome," you said, awkwardly trying to push Fit back. Thankfully, Fit soon released you from her hug and stepped back.

"Is it alright if I use the remote again in the future?" Fit asked.

You sighed. "I suppose so, just remember to ask first," you said.

"I will, I promise," said Fit with a nod. "Thank you."

Fit went back to her morning workout as you walked out with the remote in hand. As you walked, you looked down at the remote in your hands and wondered what to do next. You could go and find other people and test out some swaps on them, although, considering you had Peach's gender and what was apparently Fit's body, any swaps you did would mess things up even further. Or you could take the remote back to your room and study it, and see if there was any way to figure out how the remote worked in the first place.
1323322212222212.title: Leave things as they are for now.

135.content:
At the other end of the hallway, you spot one of the newcomers in the tournament, Mega Man. You had wanted something "interesting and different", and with Mega Man being a robot, he could certainly provide that. You had spoken to him a bit, but he'd initially mistaken you for a robot due to your power suit, which had made things a bit awkward.

Your first thought was to just do a body swap. It was the first swap listed in the manual, and would certainly provide you with an interesting experience; giving you the body of a robot. You kind of wondered how that would actually work, having a robot's body but living the life of a human. Would you still need to eat and drink like a normal person? Would Mega Man still function as a robot despite having a human body?

Another idea was to try the clothes swap. This one was also a pretty straightforward function, exchanging any clothes the user and the target owned, adjusting it to fit the body of the wearer. However, Mega Man was a robot. He appeared to be wearing armour that was something like a simplified version of your own power armour, but it wasn't something he was wearing, it was a part of him. Would the remote count that as part of his clothes or part of his body? If the latter, would the remote simply leave her naked and give all her clothes to him?

Both features would provide an interesting test of the remote's capabilities, but they weren't the only ones available. There were still four other swaps to choose from if you decided to not try either of these.
135.title: Mega Man

choices: Stay naked and examine the remote
Find someone else to swap clothes with
1352.content:
Deciding to test out exactly how the clothes swap would react to someone like Mega Man, you aimed the remote at him, and pressed the clothes swap button. You were admittedly a little anxious about doing this, knowing it could very easily leave you naked in public, even if reality would adapt to make it seem normal. As the swap suddenly took effect, it would seem your fears were well founded, as you felt a light breeze over your whole body.

Looking at Mega Man, it wasn't difficult to tell why. Mega Man was still walking through the hallway, now with your Zero Suit stretched over his mechanical body, your jet boots fitted over his boot-like feet. It was rather odd to see him wearing clothes like that, considering his body already looked like it had armour on in some places. Regardless, Mega Man continued walking as if nothing had changed, confirming the reality altering aspects of the remote.

Looking down at yourself, you confirmed your expectations. While Mega Man had received your clothes, he had also kept the armour-like parts of his body, and thus, had given you nothing in return. You were left completely naked, not a single article of clothing adorning your body. Even your hairtie had vanished, letting your hair fall loosely down your back. You shivered a little, having nothing to protect your body from the elements.

You were pleased to see that the remote did in fact work as advertised, but you were more than a little embarrassed to be standing around naked in the hallway. Even if reality had adjusted to make it normal for you to wear no clothes, that didn't stop your from feeling rather self-conscious about having your body on display for all to see. It also didn't help that you were currently part of a tournament, and if the remote's manual was to be believed, this swap would have given Mega Man all your weapons. It would probably be best to swap back with Mega Man. This had really just been a test of the remote's capabilities, after all. Now that you'd seen the remote in action, you could just swap back and try to figure out how the remote actually worked.

Averting your attention from your own body, you look back up at where Mega Man was, hoping to swap back with him. Unfortunately, it seemed to had spent a little too long lost in thought, as Mega Man was nowhere to be seen. The hallway was empty, besides you. Mega Man must have left to go where he had been headed before you swapped with him, unknowingly taking your clothes with him. Where others might have panicked in this situation, you instead did you best to keep calm and think over your options. The tournament grounds weren't so large that you weren't able to navigate them, and Mega Man couldn't have gotten too far. It probably wouldn't be too difficult to find him, but if you headed off in the wrong direction, you'd be stuck wandering around naked for longer than necessary. On the other hand, the world considered this to be normal now, despite your embarrassment. Mega Man had your weapons, but you probably still had your tools, so you could still go back to your room and try to analyse how the remote actually worked, and then swap back with Mega Man the next time you saw him. If course, this would mean remaining naked until then, and the possibility of being stuck without clothes if you weren't careful during your examination and messed up something with the remote. Finally, you could use the remote again, but on someone else. Just because you didn't have clothes right now, that didn't mean you had to get your own clothes back immediately. You could find someone else to swap clothes with, and then decide whether to go searching for Mega Man or to examine the remote. Of course, this final option meant that the person you swapped with would wind up naked, and Mega Man would ultimately end up wearing that person's clothes. However, the world, save for yourself, would see it as normal, and the person left naked wouldn't be embarrassed about it like you currently were, so you didn't see that as such a big consequence.
1352.title: Clothes Swap

1353.content: Ultimately, you decided against performing a body swap or a clothes swap. However, that still left four other swaps to try. The life swap, the relationship swap, the gender swap or the head swap.
1353.title: More Choices

13531.content:
A life swap with Mega Man could be very interesting, since he was a robot and you were a human. Would swapping lives with Mega Man make him a human and you a robot? Or would you still be a human that could somehow access Mega Man’s robotic abilities?

You could also try a relationship swap. However, since Mega Man was a newcomer, he wouldn’t really have any friends present, except for maybe his roommate, Villager. If you swapped relationships with him, you’d lose all the friendships you’d made over the previous Smash tournaments, and would have to start over and make friends with everyone again.

Which do you choose?
13531.title: Life Swap/Relationship Swap

choices: Mega Man was still a robot.
Mega Man was now a human.
135311.content:
You aim the remote and press the life swap button. As soon as you press the button, you find yourself standing where Mega Man had been, and you instantly realise your body has become a robotic version of yourself, as your mind, now your processor, is flooded with a torrent of new data. Mega Man had been walking when you had swapped with him, and as you were busy acclimating to the new data flowing through your circuits, you stopped. However, you soon realised that your thoughts were moving at lightspeed, rather literally, and your software was unhindered by the limitations of your robotic body’s new hardware. As you lowered your foot, you managed to adjust to the data constantly streaming in, and were able to run a complete diagnostic on your body. Your new robotic body had the same dimensions as your old human body, and matched it down to the last detail, with your hair now being a single piece of sculpted metal. You were also completely naked, but since you were mechanical, it didn’t really matter much, and your new robotic body didn’t have any attributes, so to speak. You were also able to briefly skim Mega Man’s memories as you came to a halt, learning the basics of his life, in case you decided to continue living as Mega Man.

Despite the fact that your robotic brain was working at the speed of light, you were still able to process sensory input at the same speed as a human, and heard the distinctive sound of your Jet Boots behind you. You turned to face Mega Man, who was now living your life. As Mega Man entered the field of view of your optic sensors, you saw that...
135311.title: Life Swap

13532.content:
Swapping heads with Mega Man had some potential. Your head would be on Mega Man’s body, giving you a mostly robotic body but with a human head. How would that combination of woman and machine even work?

The gender swap option was also interesting. As a robot, Mega Man was technically genderless, but he clearly thought of himself as male. While the gender swap would certainly make him a female robot, would you become a male human, or would you somehow be genderless?

Which do you choose?
13532.title: Head Swap/Gender Swap

14.content:
You are Kirby, inhabitant of Dream Land and hero of Planet Popstar. You like eating, sleeping, and the occasional act of heroism. The hands invited you to this tournament and you came because why not?

It's fun. You've met a lot of nice people and not-people, and they have a lot of food here. They even have that spicy curry you like. And you can suck them all up and gain a lot of funny powers.

You're walking down the halls when you find a small cardboard box. You look at it for a bit, waddling around it. You have no idea what it was, but that was easy enough to find out. You took a step back and opened your mouth wide. Using your Inhale ability, you sucked the box into yourself and tried to swallow.
14.title: Kirby

141.content:
After swallowing the object, you spit it out in the form of a star.
Well that didn't work.
141.title: Nothing happened (object is swallowed).

choices: Find someone who knows more about this sort of thing
Someone else comes along while you were thinking
142.content: You attempted to swallow the box, but for some reason you couldn't get it all down. Maybe this was something you couldn't eat? You spit it out, but to your surprise, what was spat out was not a cardboard box, but a small TV remote-looking thing. The box must have been swallowed, and this was what was inside of it. The problem was, if there was any sort of instruction manual with it, you swallowed that too. Maybe you should show it to someone who knew more about these sorts of things. Alternatively, you could always just try pressing random buttons and seeing what happens. That could always be fun.
142.title: Nothing happened (cheeks still full).

1422.content: While you could have brought the remote to someone who understood it better, you couldn't exactly hold off your curiosity, which wasn't surprising considering your first instinct had been to eat the thing. The remote had buttons, and buttons were for pressing. You start by pressing one of the orange buttons with the numbers of them with your stubby arm. To your disappointment, nothing happened, so instead, you turn your attention to the blue buttons with the strange pictures. You reach out to press one, just as someone steps around the corner. Unfortunately for whoever it was, they just stepped right into the line of fire of the remote. But which button did you press?
1422.title: Try pressing random buttons

1422121.content:
While pressing buttons, there is ______
passing by.
1422121.title: Kirby

143.content:
In a flash, you gained the powers of the remote. Six symbols, three numbers, and six colored circles were now on your remote-colored skin. Because of your Copy Ability, you knew instinctively what your new abilities were, even the hidden ones that the manual didn't cover.

You weren't sure what to do. Your first instinct was to swap with someone who ate a lot, or who at least had a lot of food, but that was kind of mean. Still, as long as you switched back before everyone left, that should be okay, right? Maybe you didn't even have to. If they weren't aware, then it would be like you didn't do anything bad.

Maybe instead you could play with your friends, like King Dedede and Meta-Knight. You're sure you could have a lot of fun with them and the remote.

All this thinking was making you hungry. Maybe you could spawn a helper and ask them what to do.
143.title: Gain the Remote ability.

choices: Tell Meta Knight about the remote.
1431.content:
Your brain hurt from all the thinking you were doing. You decide to get some food to relieve your mind. As you waddle down to the cafeteria, you run into Meta Knight, who stops to greet you.

"Hello my friend. How are you today?" He asks. You simply smile and say "Poyoh!" Meta Knight gives you a funny look. "I have not seen you in this form before. What did you swallow now, my little pink friend?"

Though you want to tell your friend about the remote, you don't know how to do that without swapping with him. Or you could simply wave your arms and spout gibberish until he leaves it alone. Ultimately, you decide to...
1431.title: Thinking with your stomach.

14312.content: "Poyo poy!" Meta would just nod despite not knowing what the puffball stated, he knew Kirby could speak but when he becomes excited it gets difficult for him to do so and considering there's food around...excitement is still there. "Well I'll just ask about it later, enjoy your meal Kirby." Should you try swapping him with someone else before he leaves?
14312.title: Make random noises.

1432.content:
you wonder around, finding Lucas, sitting down eating a sandwich. He say hi to him, but he frowns.
You wonder if he'd have fun being Kirby for a while.
1432.title: Look for friends.

14321.content:
Kirby looks at himself with awe. Kirby gets up and Pat's himself, while Lucas stood there, mouth hanging down.
Kirby runs out of the room.

He finds meta knight, who asked what he is doing.
14321.title: Swap with him

choices: Stuck around, waiting to be told what to do.
Ran off! Kirby chases it down!
Ran off! Kirby can't catch it! (Switch to Swapper's POV)
1433.content:
Normally you weren't supposed to make helpers of the other tournament members, but you figured that because the remote wasn't in the tournament (you hoped) then making a remote helper couldn't hurt.

You concentrate. Motes of light slowly drip off your body and into the space above your head as the Remote ability left your body and re-coalesced.

The result landed next to you. It looked a lot like a Gim (http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20081...), but its metallic skin, cap, and shoes were much darker, the color of the remote. Its cap had the six symbols, and each shoe had three colored circles apiece. The hole where Gim's arm would normally come out was sealed with a steel square on which the numbers 1, 2, and 3 were printed, and its white-gloved hand came disturbingly out its back. And finally, it had a red-tinted glass eye instead of a blue one.)

You guessed that this helper (which you decided to call Swapper) worked by holding someone with its gloved hand and "firing" from its tinted eye. The one held by its gloved hand was probably the "user" and the one being fired at was probably the "target," but you weren't quite sure.

Swapper looked at you for a bit, and-
1433.title: Make a Remote Helper

14333.content:
You are now Swapper, the helper with all the powers of the Swapping Remote. Having just woken up, the first thing that runs through your head is the desire to switch something, anything. But you can't switch yourself, only others.

You take one look at the pink puffball and something inside you makes you decide to ditch him. He could be a user or a target, true, but there's something about him that makes you feel... unsafe.

You extend your gloved hand to Kirby's stubby one. As Kirby shakes it uncertainly, you go into a breakdance. Spinning around on your head like a top, you gather enough momentum to fling Kirby far down the hall. You pick yourself back up, race down the hall in the opposite direction, and disappear around a corner before Kirby can even come to.

Now that you're free, you can go back to doing what you love. But this place is strange to you, and you're not sure where to go. You wander as fast as you can, hoping you can find some switches to make.
14333.title: Ran off! Kirby can't catch it! (Switch to S...

143331.content: Is the person you run into male or female?
143331.title: Run into someone who's alone.

1433312.content: Is the woman you see royalty?
1433312.title: Female

143331211.content: Is it the Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, Princess Peach? Or it the Princess of the Stars, Rosalina?
143331211.title: Peach/Rosalina

143331212.content: Is it the Princess of Hyrule, Princess Zelda? Or the goddess of light, Palutena?
143331212.title: Zelda/Palutena

choices: Some other Smash character that is usually fast
1433312122.content:
You walk along the hallway until you finally meet somebody, Palutena the goddess of light stands before you and stares down and you curiously. "Of all the creatures I've ever witnessed, you are by far the strangest one of all, little one" She said in a calming voice while she kneels down next to you and you begin to feel extremely giddy, this was your first chance at swapping someone aafteral! You stare back into Palutena's large green eyes waiting for anyone to pass by sow you could swap them with the powerful female Deity.

Just then, someone rounds the corner in a rush, you cared not for who it might be you immediately got to work, not caring which swap you would use you swapped Palutena with the Other Smasher. After you finsihed you sat down and admired your work, only now noticing that the one you had swapped Palutena with was...
1433312122.title: Palutena

143332.content: As you wander through the halls of this strange place you've found yourself in, you happen to come across two people. That was perfect! One user and one target, just what you needed. Since you had only just woken up here, you obviously didn't know who these people were, but they seemed to be...
143332.title: Run into a pair.

1433321.content: Which couple do you run into?
1433321.title: In love.

1433322.content: You saw two people who seemed to be having an argument with each other. Who were they?
1433322.title: Having an argument.

14333222.content:
You couldn't hear much of their argument, but the two people you could see were a woman with blonde hair and a pink dress, and a giant turtle-like monster. As you approach the pair, the woman stops arguing and redirects her attention towards you. It doesn't take long for the turtle to notice he's no longer the cente of attention, and he notices you too. "Huh, what's that weird thing?" the turtle says.

"I think it's kind of cute," the woman says as she crouches down to talk to you face to face. "What's your name?" Unfortunately, you had no vocal chords, or any kind of audio synthesizer, so you just tilt your head and blink at her question. "Are you one of the new competitors in the tournament?" She probably realised you couldn't speak, but asked anyway since it was a yes or no question. You didn't really know what this tournament she was talking about was, but it certainly wasn't what you were made for, so you shake your head.

"Then why are you here?" the turtle rudely asks, having watched everything that was going on up until now. This was your time to shine. You would have explained exactly what it is you do, but alas you had no voice, and that pink creature probably ate the instruction manual. Instead, you'd have to explain with a demonstration. You extend your hand to the woman, who understands what you're trying to do and grabs your hand with her own. You then face the turtle, the 2 on your chest glowing, making sure they'd both be able to see what happened, and activated a swap.
14333222.title: Bowser and Peach

143332221.content: Which swap did you use?
143332221.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Clothes Swap

1433322211.content:
With the remotes awareness setting put at Mode 2, you click body swap, causing Peach and Bowser to trade bodies, but not clothes. Suddenly, the giant koopa was clad in a pink dress, and the Princess was wearing nothing but spikes bands around her neck and arms.

"What the heck just happened!" Bowser shouted, horrified at his high voice.

"Oh my gosh, why is my body naked - why is my voice so deep?!" Peach exclaimed, equally horrified at being in Bowser's body.

The two began to panic, shouting at eachother but not seeming to listen to one another. "Get out of the dress, someone might see you!" Bowser shouted.

Peach looked around nervously, trying to make sure no one could see Bowser in her naked body.

"Did you do this?" She asked the device.

It gave a small nod in the affirmative.

"Fix it now!" Bowser demanded.

How did the remote interpret their request?
1433322211.title: Body Swap

14333222112.content:
The device gives the two another quick zap, and to the outside perspective, it looks as though the swap was undone.

"All you did was give me her dress!" Bowser-in-Peach shouts. "I want my body back you idiot!"

"Bowser, stop yelling," Peach insists, trying to calm down the former-king.

"Hell no! I'm gonna make him fix this!" Bowser rushes at the remote arms out to grab it, but underestimates the length of his new gown, and trips face first.

The remote, feeling distinctly threatened, turns tail and runs down the hallway, disappearing from sight as Peach helps Bowser back to his feet.

"Are you alright?"

"Yeah, probably." Bowser replies, straightening Peach's crown back on her head. "Did you see which way it went?"

"No..."

"Well isn't that fantastic!" He yells with a sarcastic snort. "We're trapped!"

"How are we going to handle interacting with others..."

"I don't know. Can we even act like eachother at all?"

Before continuing, did the remote switch their lives or their clothes?
14333222112.title: It just swaps their clothes/lives

143332221121.content:
After a little bit of thought, Peach says, "I think I have your memories."

"What!?" Bowser practically screams. However, soon he realised that he also had Peach's memories, along with his own. "Oh my god, I have yours too," he says, gripping his head.

"Well, I guess that might help us act like each other if we really are stuck."

"I am not being stuck in your body!" What might have looked menacing in Bowser's own body merely looked like he was throwing a tantrum now that he was in Peach's body, which wasn't too far from the truth actually. "We are going to find that thing, and make him fix this!"

"Okay," Peach agrees, not wanting to be stuck in Bowser's body either. "Where should we start looking?"

"We'll cover more ground if we split up. You go that way," he says, pointing down one of the hallways, "I'll go this way," he points in the other direction, "and we'll meet up at the leisure room afterwards if we find him, or to think over our plan of attack if we don't."

Peach just weakly nods, not used to this sort of thing. The two head off in the directions Bowser indicated, hoping to find Swapper so that they can change back to normal. Meanwhile, having run off, Swapper was looking for more people to swap, maybe someone less mean than last time.
143332221121.title: Lives

1433322211211.content: While Swapper went searching for people to swap, Peach and Bowser went in search of Swapper, neither entirely comfortable with their new body.
1433322211211.title: Follow Peach/Bowser

choices: You spot something down the hallway
14333222112111.content:
You are Bowser, the king of the koopas, although you were currently trapped within the body of Princess Peach. Some strange thing had noticed you and Peach arguing, and because Peach had gotten curious about what it could do, it did this to you. You had gotten mad, as anyone would do in this situation, but because you weren't used to Peach's clothes, you had tripped and the thing had escaped. So now you and Peach were searching for the creature so that it could change you back. You didn't want to think about what would happen if you couldn't find it. You felt so frail and small in Peach's body, but trying to deal with her life and act all nicey-nice seemed revolting.

Even though Swapper's powers had given you all the skills needed for Peach's clothing, you still found her outfit rather cumbersome. You found yourself fumbling with her heels as you stomped around the halls, and trying adjust her dress to make it more comfortable. You'd love to go take this off and find something more comfortable to wear, but somehow you don't think Peach would appreciate that. Normally you wouldn't care what Peach thought about what you were doing, but right now she had your body, which made her a lot stronger than you.

Still, there was one good thing to come out of this trade, you note while looking down at yourself. While you had never wanted to be the one inside this body, now you could play around with it whenever you wanted. Of course, this was only a small upside to a larger drawback, and you wanted your body back as soon as possible. So, trying to ignore the clicking of Peach's heels on the floor, you continue through the hallways, searching for that thing that did this to you.
14333222112111.title: Follow Bowser (in Peach's body)

choices: You find two other people freaking out
143332221121111.content: As you walk, you notice something else going on down the other end of the hallway. Walking as fast as you could with Peach's outfit, you investigate what it was.
143332221121111.title: You spot something down the hallway

choices: Haul the Swapper back to the meeting area with Peach
1433322211211111.content:
You take a deep breath as you see the little monster padding around the hall. It seemed he didn't see you, and you had the element of surprise. How could you catch him though? You were so weak as Peach!

Suddenly, you recalled that Peach had other abilities as well. Using her memories, you reached downwards, and suddenly produced a turnip in your hand. I have no idea how that worked, you muse to yourself as you examine it closely. The root had a stitched up face, something you'd felt many times before in the previous tournaments. One hit should be enough to stun the little guy.

You slowly creep forward, careful to have your steps be soft. Halfway through though, you lost your patience and made a dash for him, your heels clicking across the tiles, He turned to you, locked in fear as the turnip nailed him in the face.

"Ah hah!" You shouted, as you dived on the swapper, "Now I gotcha!" It struggled, but couldn't get away. Turned out it was a weak little thing.

"Now, you're going to do exactly as I say and I probably won't hurt you, got it?"

It gave a slow nod in understanding.

"Good! Just do everything I tell you and everything will be fine..."

Bowser suddenly realized he had a lot of power at his disposal. He could easily fix the swap, but now that he had the Swapper under his command, other thoughts came to his mind. He could easily use the current swap with Peach to his advantage, or just swap with someone else as well.

What does he decide to do?
1433322211211111.title: You find Swapper wandering around

14333222112111111.author_name: Just an Anon in a non world
14333222112111111.content:
Bowser decided that it was in his best interest to make his way back to the meeting area, and spun on his heels, quickly trotting off back from where he came. True, the Swapper was a powerful tool, but his first priority was to get his old body back before things any weirder. Then he could force the little guy to do whatever he wanted.

Unfortunately for him, he didn't realize that the Swapper was becoming increasingly uncomfortable in his grasp. The Swapper was comfortable in the presence of the cute pink-dressed woman, but he already knew that she currently had the mind of the towering brute of a lizard. Although he wanted to perform swaps, he certainly didn't want him to be his user. So with no other way to get out of his grasp, he decided to perform a swap on Bowser, swapping him for someone else in order to escape.

With the number 2 on his chest dimming as the number 1 begins to glow brightly, the Swapper grabs Bowser by the arm before immediately swapping him with someone he just so happened to walk past...

Unfortunately for him, and the unaware swappee, he just so happened to pass by...
14333222112111111.title: Haul the Swapper back to the meeting area with ...

143332221121111112.content:
After the little creature who had put you in Peach's body grabbed your arm, you suddenly found yourself in a different part of the hallway. It seemed like you still had Peach's body, but you were now dressed like Palutena, the Goddess of Light, and holding her staff in one hand. Taking advantage of your confusion, Swapper quickly runs off.

"Hey, get back here!" You yell, almost tripping over Palutena's heels in an attempt to catch up with it again. You briefly wondered why Palutena hadn't had any verbal reaction to the swap. Peach had definitely reacted to the swap between the two of you, and both of you had been aware of that swap, regardless of which of you was holding onto that creature. Perhaps it had different settings, changing who was aware of the swaps of something. After all, no one seemed to think it odd that Peach was running around in Palutena's clothes right now. Although, you noticed you no longer had access to Peach's memories, and instead had Palutena's. So now everyone thought you were Palutena, even though you looked like Peach? It hurt your head just thinking about it.

As you give chase, you also wonder how Peach and Palutena would be affected. If Palutena hadn't reacted to the swap, she probably thought she was Peach. But was she just Peach, or did she think she was you trapped in Peach's body? And Peach, she'd still think whoever was in her body was you. You can only imagine how strange it would be if Peach confronted Palutena, thinking she was you, only for Palutena to think she was really Peach and have no knowledge of the swap.

Weak as he was, that little creature was pretty fast on it's feet, and not being entirely used to walking in high heels, even after walking around in Peach's shoes (quite literally) for a while, you were having difficulty keeping up.
143332221121111112.title: Lady Palutena.

1433322211211112.content: As you approach, you notice two people, sort of freaking out. Almost like you and Peach did when that thing swapped you! Perfect, you'd just need to follow the trail of chaos that thing left behind and make sure you got to it first. That way you could get back into your own body before anyone even knew you were in Peach's. Speaking of Peach's body, you could probably use this opportunity to ask if the pair in front of you had seen the little monster, and which way it went. People would probably be more wiling to give information to Peach than they were to Bowser. You supposed being Peach did have its advantages after all. But who were these people freaking out over seemingly nothing?
1433322211211112.title: You find two other people freaking out

14333222112111121.content:
As you get closer to the pair, you can see that they are Zelda, the princess of Hyrule and one of Peach's friends, and Ganondorf, one of the villains at the tournament, also hailing from Hyrule. You slow your approach, so as to listen in on their conversation without interrupting.

"Come on," 'Ganondorf' says, "We need to go after that thing that swapped us so we can get back to normal!" It seemed your guess had been right, and the pair had been swapped. Zelda was in Ganondorf's body, and Ganondorf was in Zelda's.

"And why would I want to do that?" the real Ganondorf replies, a devilish smirk on his face.

"You mean you actually want to keep my body for the test of your life?!"

"What body I am in doesn't really matter, but now I have your piece of the Triforce. All that remains is Courage, and with this body, it shouldn't be too difficult to get Link to drop his guard."

Zelda shakes her head. "You might have my Triforce of Wisdom, but I now have your Triforce of Power." She holds up her hand, Ganondorf's piece of the Triforce glowing.

Ganondorf seems taken aback, but quickly regains his composure. "No matter. So long as Link still believes I am Zelda and you are Ganondorf, he will still strive to protect me and to defeat you. And should the day come where he eventually defeats you, I shall claim what is rightfully mine."

"Urgh, fine. I shall search for that thing myself." Zelda walks off in what was probably the direction the creature had gone in. You could follow Zelda, as she would probably lead you straight to it, but with Ganondorf in a similar predicament to you, although much more willing to go along with it, perhaps he could help you out.
14333222112111121.title: Zelda and Ganondorf

choices: Give up the chase and stay as Peach
143332221121111212.content:
You approach Ganondorf, who was currently in the body of Princess Zelda. "Ganondorf," you say, still not quite used to Peach's high pitched voice coming out of your mouth.

He turns to face you, but not knowing you had also been switched, he believes you to be the real Peach. "Ah, you overheard our conversation did you? I suppose you want to lecture me about stealing Zelda's body or something?" His sinister tone sounded a little odd being used with Zelda's voice.

"I'm not here to lecture you... because I'm not Peach."

Ganondorf seems a little shocked by this. "Oh? So Zelda and I were not the first victims of that strange creature?" You nod in reply to his question. "So, who are you really then?"

You hesitate, but eventually answer. "...Bowser."

You notice that Ganondorf seems to be holding back a laugh. "Well, it seems I'm not the only villain turned princess then."

"How are you so happy about this? You hot got turned from a big, strong villain into a dainty little princess!"

"Not as dainty as you." You cross your arms in frustration. "This body can help me achieve my goals, so I'm willing to use it to my advantage and make the most of it. Isn't it the same for you in Peach's body?"

"I WANT Peach! I don't want to BE her!" Luckily there wasn't really anyone besides Ganondorf around to hear your outburst.

"Perhaps if you weren't so closed-minded, you'd see the advantage of this. As Peach, you can break up with Mario, which gets you over one hurdle. Then it's just a matter of convincing Peach that that creature is long gone, and getting her to succumb to the same feelings that made you want her in the first place. And if you fail, at you you can always look at her body whenever you want."

"But... But then I'd still be Peach instead of me, and I'd be dating my old body."

Ganondorf let's out a big sigh. "Fine, suit yourself. I've shown you why keeping Peach's body might be good for you, but of you still don't want it, do what you want. I know I'd prefer you didn't swap back so I wouldn't have to deal with the real Peach. But of you want your body back so badly, the thing went that way," he says, pointing in the direction Zelda had headed. "Do try to find it before.Zelda does and make sure she doesn't get her hands on it."

You don't leave to follow Zelda immediately. Ganondorf had.put forward some good points. Perhaps it really would be easier to get together with Peach while you were swapped with her. Although you weren't sure you were too keen on being a princess for the rest of your life, or going out with your own body.
143332221121111212.title: Speak to Ganondorf

choices: Gave up on finding the device, and went to find Ganondorf.
1433322211211112121.content:
You thought about what Ganondorf had just said, it was tempting, "This incident may be a blessing in disguise, imagine the possibilities that are now open to you. And as Zelda, I may be able to come up with far greeter plans," he smirked contently with Zelda's face.
You looked over Peach's body, which you inhabited. Causing you to think, "Do I want to be like this forever. You growled in Peach's softer voice, turning your head. You ran, turning to catch up with Zelda, who was in Ganondorf's body. A quick look back showed that Ganondorf gave an evil sneer as if to say "Wrong choice," but instead of calling you back, he went on his way.

As you stomped quickly down the corridor, you were surprised that the area wasn't shaking under your weight, but the lighter feel of your smaller, hi heeled feet remind you way, and made you all the more eager to get out of the princess body, and back into your own.

Ten minutes later of running around in a dainty body which was flinging it's hips around, looking high and low, left and right, you finally....
1433322211211112121.title: Keep searching for Swapper

choices: It tries to run from you
14333222112111121212.content:
The ten minutes you had painstakingly been searching every nook and cranny with Peach's dainty gloved hands, had felt like an eternity, but you felt like your goal was in reach, you saw the strange metal thing that had put you in this predicament, you tipped toed up to it, trying your best not to alarm your only away of putting things straight again.

You were getting closer and closer to it, you could feel your human heart beating faster and faster as your get closer to it. But when you got closer....
14333222112111121212.title: You found the device

choices: It out everything back to normal, undoing the swaps
It swapped something else, further complicating things
143332221121111212122.content:
You got closer and saw several people around the swapper. You saw the tall body of Ganondorf, cornering the swapper, but it didn't seem to be acting malicious, but instead it was trying to be more diplomatic. While their were two others in the area, but were arguing and were further away from the swapper, seemingly obvious of the environment, you could see the angel Pit along with his evil twin or sometihng, he looked similar but was black in places of white and brown.

You decided to leave them be, and deal with Zelda and the swapper, you approached them.
Zelda turned her borrowed head to you, "Stay out of this Bowser," she demanded.
"Don't think you can order me around Princess," you growled back, only to be grabbed in the right hand on the much taller Ganondorf, "Don't do that with Peach's face!" she ordered fiercely before dropping you, "Then help me back to my body, I don't want to be like this either."
"Don't touch or mislead it," she said turning around. And knelled to the swapper.
"Can you swap us back?" she asked again, but the closer she got, the more it backed down, and tried to make it's self smaller.
You did the same, crouching down, and putting a hand on it, being more gentle then you thought was possible for you, and stroked it, it looked up, and seemed more comfortable, but still in fear as you had scared it off early.
You slowly lifted it, Zelda began paying closer attention to you, readying a hand preventing you from taking advantage.
"Hey," you said friendly while smiling, this grossed you out, but you knew it was the only way, "Could you swap us back, so everything is normal."
It seemed to think about it for a few moments, and each one past made it harder for you to hold this façade of lovely, smiley princess, until...
143332221121111212122.title: You saw something

1433322211211112122.content:
Looking down at the human, female body you had acquired, and the pink dress and heels you were wearing. Could you really get used to being like this permanently? The plan Ganondorf had laid out seemed to make sense, so the only thing stopping you from going through with it was your apprehension about getting used to this. Perhaps that would come in time. "Maybe, this won't be so bad," you say, still a little unsure of yourself.

"There, you go! That wasn't so hard now, was it?" Ganondorf says, patting you on the back. "Hopefully the real Peach and Zelda don't find that thing, or notice that they've both been swapped. with them working together with our bodies, it may be a little difficult for us to fight back." As he says this, he looks over your body. It made you feel weak again, something you supposed you'd have to get used to now that you were Peach.

"Okay, so I'm Peach, you're Zelda, what now?" you say, quickly changing the topic.

"Well, how about we go do something together, just us 'princesses'? If we're to pull this off, we could probably do with a little practice imitating our new lives."

As much as you hated acting like Peach, you supposed Ganondorf was right. If you wanted to get this to work, you'd need to learn to imitate Peach perfectly, so perfectly that not even Mario could tell the difference. You meekly nod, and say, "Okay. What did you have in mind?"
1433322211211112122.title: Give up the chase and stay as Peach

choices: You suggest the two of you track down the Swapper
14333222112111121221.content:
"First off, we ought to familiarize ourselves with our new living space," Ganondorf says as he walks down the hall, motioning for you to follow. "I imagine our new room will be quite extravagant, seeing as how we're princesses."

You nod slowly, following Ganondorf to Peach and Zelda's room. This was all so surreal now that you weren't rushing to find the swapper. You guess you'd have to share a room with Ganondorf? That would be odd and probably annoying - you couldn't imagine him as a good living partner. It was a concession you would have to make if you really were to keep Peach's life though.

Ganondorf opened the door, and motioned for you to move in. "Ladies first," he said in Zelda's voice with a chuckle. The Princess of Hyrule seemed... unnerving with Ganondorf at the helm. For both of your sake, you hoped he'd at least pretend to be her when the time came.

The two of you eventually made your way into the large room. It was decorated mostly with purples, whites, and pinks. You could tell pretty easily which side of the room housed which princess. It all looked... rather comfortable. Silks, cloths, and cushions scattered all over in addition to a lot of space. Both princesses seemed to have sizable wardrobes and closets as well.

"My my," Ganondorf mused, "much nicer than the little dungeon the hands gave me in my old body." He ran a hand through the soft curtains that hung around Zelda's bed before looking into a mirror. "She's got quite the face as well..." He put a hand to his hip and cocked his head to the side.

You decided to ignore Ganondorf's narration and narcissism and went about examining your new quarters in silence. While Peach had very nice and expensive looking items, she seemed to have packed relatively lightly. She had several dresses that were identical to the one you were wearing in all but color, some more casual attire that seemed fairly sporting, and a trunk full of tennis rackets, golf clubs, and the like, but otherwise didn't seem to be tied down by too much. You half expected to find Toad locked away in one of her drawers, but you suppose he'd just have a small room to himself with the other minor characters. You avoided looking in the mirror for too long - Ganondorf's presence just made it too uncomfortable.

You turn back to your new roommate to see them slowly going through drawers and cabinets. "Are you done?" You ask from afar.

"There's little rush," he replied. "Unless you want to be somewhere."
14333222112111121221.title: Ganondorf takes you somewhere

choices: You lie your way out of this
14333222112111121222.content:
You hear a voice from down the hallway. "There you two are! I've been looking all over for you."

The two of you turn to find the source of the voice; Samus Aran, a bounty hunter, and a friend to both Peach and Zelda. Ganondorf seems slightly annoyed, but masks it well. You, on the other hand, were more worried about whether you could imitate Peach well enough, or whether someone else would find out about it being you inside this body.

"Did you two forget we planned to meet up today or something?" Samus asks as she comes to a stop in front of you. She was currently wearing her zero suit, rather than her power suit. Since she was planning to meet up with friends rather than do any sort of combat practice, she probably didn't think it necessary to bring her full arsenal. She did keep her Paralyser with her though, which you eyed nervously.

"Uh, yeah, something like that," you say, avoiding direct eye contact. Not having delved too deep into the memories you had acquired from Peach, you hadn't known about this little meet up, and you really would rather not go through with this.

"Are you two okay? I mean, I'd almost expect something like that from you, Peach. But Zelda, you're usually on top of these sorts of things."

"I... had other things on my mind." You suppose Ganondorf paused in order to come up with an appropriate response. Even though he seemed more comfortable in Zelda's body than you were in Peach's, he still needed practice imitating Zelda's personality.

Samus looks over the two of you, noting your nervous behavior and Ganondorf's cold demeanor. "Okay, what are you two hiding?" she asks somewhat playfully. She knew you were hiding something, but probably had no idea of what was actually going on.
14333222112111121222.title: Someone else notices you

choices: The Hands' minions interrupt the conflict
Swapper shows up, seemingly drawn to the conflict
143332221121111212222.content:
"Oh, it's nothing," you say as innocently as you could muster, although your worry was probably apparent.

"Peach is right. We have nothing to hide," Ganondorf says, a good deal more confidently than you.

"Oh really? Nothing at all?" Samus says, getting up in your face. Her tone was no longer as playful, sensing that something was wrong. Having been friends with Peach since the second tournament, she could probably tell that you were acting differently to how Peach would usually act.

Trying to avoid her gaze, you say, "I'm not hiding anything, I promise!" She looks over at Ganondorf, who simply nods in agreement with what you had said. You almost think she believes you, when suddenly she takes a step back and pointers her Paralyser at you. Between your nerves at being discovered, and the fact that you were currently in Peach's life, Samus's sudden change in mood catches you off guard enough to make you let out a small scream. Even Ganondorf lets out a bit of a gasp in surprise. "You- You wouldn't shoot me, would you, Samus?"
