Samus's voice had turned cold and unforgiving. "You're right, I wouldn't harm Peach unless we were against each other in a match. But you are not Peach. And you," she points the paralyser at Ganondorf, "are not Zelda."

"Wha- How did you...?" Ganondorf asks.

"Peach is terrible at keeping secrets," Samus replies a little smugly. "If you were really Peach, you would have blurted out whatever you were hiding the moment I got up in your face. And the fact that you supported her and went along with it would mean that you were in on it too. So you should blame your little doppleganger friend here. Now who are you really!?" Ganondorf seemed ready to fight back, while you looked like a deer caught in headlights, not sure how you could possibly fight Samus with Peach's frail body.
143332221121111212222.title: Samus finds out the truth

1433322211211112122222.content:
Just as a fight seems ready to break out between Samus and Ganondorf, you heard the metallic clanking of robotic footsteps approaching. "That's..." you utter, as you see the thing that swapped you in the first place. Samus remains wary, but Ganondorf crouches down to look it in the eye, and uses the most gentle tone of voice you had ever heard him use.

"Well hello there. I must thank you for giving me this body. My friend Peach is grateful as well," he says. The thing looks at you, seemingly a little afraid after you lashed out at it when it had first swapped you. You give it a nervous wave. "But our friend Samus here doesn't seem to think it was such a good idea. Perhaps you could do the same for her? Could you find her a new body where she wouldn't bother us so much?"

"Wait, then that's," Samus says, realising what this thing was. Before she can finish her thought, the creature nods, just happy to be of use, and runs up to Samus and grabs her arm, catching her off guard. Although Ganondorf had asked it to swap her with someone where she wouldn't be as much of a bother, it just swapped her with whoever he saw first, aside from you and Ganondorf, of course.

Who ended up in Samus's body and life?
1433322211211112122222.title: Swapper shows up, seemingly drawn to the conflict

choices: Samus goes to find the real Peach (Samus' POV)
14333222112111121222222.content:
Swapper seemingly disappears, being repositioned in reality so that he was still standing alongside Samus in her new life and body. Whoever was in Samus's body seems rather shocked. "What the? Where am I?" her body says. She looks down at herself. "What happened to me!?"

Before you or Ganondorf can try to calm whoever was in Samus's body down and reason with them, you hear another shout from down the hallway. "Get back here and change me back!" All three of you look in the direction of the voice to see Swapper running towards you, being chased by an angry-looking Bowser Jr. in his clown car.

"Woah... That's my body," Samus's body mumbles. It seemed that Swapper had ended up swapping Samus with Bowser Jr.

"Wait, Junior!?" you shout, shocked by this turn of events.

Ganondorf is a lot more calm about this than you are. "Hm, having him in Samus's body would probably benefit your goals."

"No way! We are not leaving him in Samus's body!"

"And why not?"

"Samus isn't from my world, I don't want to send my son off to a different world on his own!"

Bowser Jr. catches on to what you just referred to him as. "Wait... Papa?" he asks.

After a bit of a pause, trying to overcome your embarrassment, you answer. "Yeah, Junior, it's me."

Bowser Jr. just stares, wide eyed. "This is sooo weird."

"Hate to break up your little family reunion," you hear Samus say, "But I'm not about to let my body get stolen like that." In the time it had taken for you to have the little conversation, Samus had chased Swapper all the way to you three, and now Swapper was cowering behind Ganondorf. "I should have known you'd be in on this, Bowser."

"Well, if you want your body back, you'll have to go through us," Ganondorf says, seemingly charging some sort of fire magic in his hand. "Do you really takes us on 3-on-1, in an unfamiliar body?" You weren't entirely sure you could fight like this, but Junior confidently holds out the paralyser in his hand, pointing it at his old body.

As much as she wanted her body back, she knew she wouldn't be able to win this fight. "You won't get away with this," she says, before turning the clown car around and heading off. You weren't entirely sure where she was going, but at least she was out of your hair for now.

"Alright, now let's swap Junior back," you say.

"Bowser, your son won't be sent off to Samus's world until the end of the tournament. You'll have plenty of time to swap him back later when Samus won't be as much of a threat," Ganondorf reasons.

"You're putting an awful lot of faith in that little creature. Who's to say it won't just run off again? We should use it while we still can!"

"Hey, don't I get a say in this?" Junior interrupts. "Maybe I don't want to swap back."

"You want to stay in Samus's body!?" You are honestly a little shocked by this.

"Well, for a while at least. This is kinda cool." He rests his arm on your shoulder. "Plus, I'm taller than you now." You didn't like being reminded of how small you were in Peach's body.

"See? You had nothing to worry about," Ganondorf says.

"So, why did you steal Peach's body, anyway?" Junior asks.

"Well, I guess you deserve to know..."
14333222112111121222222.title: Bowser Jr.

143332221121111212222221.content:
"...And that's pretty much everything up until this point," you finish explaining.

"Wow. So it was all just an accident, but you're taking advantage of it. Cool, and evil!" Junior replies.

"So, you planned to meet up with Peach after searching?" Ganondorf asks.

"Yeah. If either of us found that thing, we were going to bring it back with us so we could swap back. But now I'm not going to swap back, so..."

"I think you should still go anyway, otherwise Peach will get suspicious. Just tell her you were unable to find the creature who did this to you."

"Alright, I guess I should go then."

"Good, in the meantime, I'll see if I can convince Ridley or Mother Brain to take Samus's body when the time comes."

"But wait," Junior interrupts, "If Samus is in my body, and she knows that you're in Peach's body, won't she go find the real Peach and tell her about our plans?"

"Pfft, she doesn't know anything worthwhile. Peach'll just think that creature's been swapping more people," you say.

"Actually, she knows that you're keeping Peach's body, and that that little creature was cooperating with us."

"Your son is right," Ganondorf says. "Samus may prove to be a problem to our plans yet. Especially if they're also able to figure out who I am. We may need to swap her into one of the villains from her world sooner than expected. Bowser, you continue with your plan. Hopefully you'll get to Peach before Samus does. Junior, try to find Samus and lure her back to the area where the assist characters are staying. I'll do my best to convince Ridley or Mother Brain to cooperate so that we can swap them once you arrive with Samus."

"What about the creature that swapped us all?" Junior asks, gesturing towards the small, metallic creature waiting around at Ganondorf's feet, wanting to be used again.

"Take it with you. It should help with luring Samus to where we want her to go. Does everyone understand their role?" You and Junior both nod. Even the creature who swapped you does a feature reminiscent of a nod. "Good, then let's do this." The three of you head off in separate directions, all with your own goal to complete.
143332221121111212222221.title: Bowser explains what happened (Bowser's POV)

1433322211211112122222212.content: The three of you head off in separate directions, all with your own goal to complete.
1433322211211112122222212.title: Follow Ganondorf or Bowser Jr.

14333222112111121222222122.content:
You are Bowser Jr., the prince of the Koopas, although you currently had the body of Samus Aran. Thanks to a little robot thing, which was currently following you around, you dad had stolen Peach's body, and Ganondorf had stolen Zelda's, and when Samus started causing trouble for them, you ended up in her body by accident. Not that you minded; you actually thought this was kind of cool, but you wouldn't be able to keep this body for too long. You needed to get Samus out of your body and into someone where she wouldn't be able to tell Peach about what was going on. And since you doubted whichever villain from Samus's world would want your body, that meant going back to your own body.

You noticed the little robot starting to get anxious. "No swapping yet," you remind it. "We don't wanna mess things up for dad." The creature, which you decide to call Swapper, since he swaps things, seems sad, but refrains from performing any unnecessary swaps. You hope your dad lets you borrow someone else's body once Samus was out of the way. You wanted to try out more of this, and Swapper clearly wanted to do more swaps.

After some roaming around, looking for Samus, you eventually find...
14333222112111121222222122.title: Follow Bowser Jr.

143332221121111212222221221.content:
"Hey," you hear someone yell. Turning in the direction of the voice, you notice Samus, still in your body, charging towards you in your Junior Clown Car.

"That's our cue to run," you quietly say to Swapper. "Follow me." You turn and run in the direction of the living quarters for the assist characters. Hopefully Ganondorf had managed to convince someone to take Samus' body. Swapper turns and follows you.

Noticing that you were running from her instead of standing your ground as you had before, Samus calls out, "Ha! Not so tough without your dad, huh? Get back here and give me my body back!" She could probably have caught up with you if she had thought to use the car's kart form, or attacked you with one of the car's many weapons, but you suppose that either she didn't know about them, or she was just too furious to think of that. Either way, it helped your plan that she wasn't catching up.

As you run, you eventually find the downside of swapping with Samus. While all she had to do was keep the clown car moving forwards, you actually had to run, and your legs were beginning to get tired. Luckily, you spot Zelda in the distance, or more accurately, Ganondorf in Zelda's body. He notices your approach, and opens the door to...
143332221121111212222221221.title: Samus in your body

choices: Swapper goes with you in your Clown Car
Swapper goes with Ganondorf to Peach and Zelda's room
1433322211211112122222212211.content:
Ganondorf unseals the large door Master Hand had put in place for Ridley's room. Normally, if a villain tried to enter, the door wouldn't let them, for fear of them letting Ridley escape, but right now, the door didn't detect a villain, it detected Zelda, princess of Hyrule. If Samus was more vigilant and less furious, she would probably have noticed that you were approaching the room of her nemesis, but she continued to chase you regardless.

A large purple claw extended from out of the door. "Swapper, you know what to do," you call out. Taking notice of his new name, Swapper runs over to the claw, grabs onto it with his hand, and turns around to aim at Samus, who was still charging towards you. All of a sudden, Swapper was back standing beside your body, and the claw recoiled back into the room. Ganondorf quickly resealed the door before she could escape. Loud screeching could be heard behind the door, as well as the sound of claws scraping against metal.

"Don't worry about her," you hear your old body say as it approaches, Swapper by his side. Ridley was inside your body. "She can't escape. Trust me, I've tried." He turns towards you. "Now, I believe you have something that belongs to me."

You nod. "Right. Swapper, do your thing." Swapper grabs onto Ridley's hand, and soon you found yourself back in your own body.

"Hmph," Ridley says, taking stock of his new body. "I'm still not convinced this is a good plan, but at least Samus will suffer because of it." He turns to face Ganondorf. "Do you know how that thing works yet?"

"I'm afraid not. This plan was hatched by accident, to tell the truth. Why do you need to know?"

"If my pirates were able to replicate this technology, I'd be able to reclaim my own body later while still holding Samus captive. I suppose I'll have to work on that later," he says, eyeing down Swapper, who promptly hides behind your clown car. "In any case, I need to contact my pirates to let them know that I'm in Samus' body so they don't attempt to ambush me upon leaving the tournament, if I'm even still in this body by then. I'll talk to you about these 'plans' later."

As Ridley turns away and walks towards Samus' room, Ganondorf turns to talk to you. "Thank you for coming through with your part of the plan, Junior. I know you wanted to keep Samus' body longer, so if we need someone to swap with someone else, we'll keep you in mind." You grin at the thought of getting to swap with someone else. "As for you," he kneels down to Swapper's height, "We need to find somewhere to keep you safe, to make sure neither of the princesses, or anyone else, finds you and tries to undo our work."

"There's room in my Clown Car," you suggest. "He can ride around with me until we find a safer place."

"Hm, perhaps it would be safer for him to stay with Bowser and I. If he stays with you, then we risk Peach finding him."

"Well, what do you think, Swapper?" you ask, deciding that if Swapper was being forced to work with you, he should at lest get a bit of choice in where he gets to stay.
1433322211211112122222212211.title: Ridley's room

choices: He wants to swap over people
14333222112111121222222122111.content:
"What do you want, Swapper?" You asked, leaning over the brim of the clown car. Swapper reached out his hand, taking hold of yours, and pulled himself up on the the edge, and hopped inside, snuggling behind you.
"So that what it wants," Ganondorf grunted, folding Zelda's arms, "But I still think it would be safer to have him with your Father or I."
"But in my clown car, he'll always be in the move, and could outrun Dad's body," You laughed.
Ganondorf glared at you, the evil streaming of her face was intimidating, like a monarch sentencing someone to death, "Fine, but keep him safe, and away from the princesses and Samus, I don't think I need to remind you."
"No, Sir!" You shook you head, saluting him, and Ganondorf, took his leave, walking away.

You turned around too swapper, "So it's just me and you now."
It nodded, it eyes closed, giving the impression of a smile as it chirped happily.
"So what do you want to do?" You asked, stroking it.
Swapper jumped up, spying over the brim of the clown car.
"Do you want to look around, or are you looking for someone?"
14333222112111121222222122111.title: Swapper goes with you in your Clown Car

143332221121111212222221221112.content:
As soon as you said "look for someone to swap" swapper instantly looked excited, indicating that he wanted to do that
You: all right, but where should we look?
143332221121111212222221221112.title: He wants to swap over people

1433322211211112122222212211121.content:
Even though Swapper seemed to want to swap other people around, and you were still curious about having another person's body, you weren't sure that letting Swapper do his thing was the best idea. You had seen how angry Ganondorf seemed to be, you didn't want to make him mad by messing things up for his plans. Especially since your dad was now having to share a room with him.

"I dunno if that's really a good idea. Mr. Ganondorf might get mad if we mess around with more people. We don't want more people finding out about you, y'know?" you say to Swapper, hoping he'd understand.

Swapper seemed to think about it for a while, before reaching his arm around to point at the numbers on his face. The number 1 seemed to light up. You had no idea what it meant, or what Swapper was trying to tell you. You sighed, and kept moving through the hallway, until you noticed a clock hanging on the wall.

"I'M LATE!" you shouted, quickly turning your clown car into its kart mode, and racing towards the Boxing Ring stage. Swapper seemed confused, but you didn't have time to explain. With all the commotion involving Swapper, you'd completely forgotten about the newcomer training session that was going on at around this time. The Hands scheduled them to help newcomers get used to the kind of fights that went on in the tournament. Since you were a newcomer, you were supposed to be there. And now you were late.

When you finally reach the stage, it seemed all the other newcomers were already there. At least, all the ones you knew about. There were all lined up in front of the ring that made up the main part of the stage, and you couldn't tell who the instructor was from the way the other newcomers were standing in front of him. At the very least, it seemed they hadn't started the actual training yet.

As you approached, Swapper popped his head over the side of the Clown Car to try and see who was here, and what he could do with them. Now that he'd set his swap mode to 1, he figured it'd be fine to swap, since you'd be the only one who'd see it happening and Ganondorf couldn't get mad then. Since he remembered you saying how you'd wanted to keep Samus' body, or something to that effect, he specifically took interest in the female newcomers at the training session.

"Swapper, get down," you said quietly, trying to get him to hide back down in your clown car again, "We can't let people see you." Before you manage to get him down, Swapper grabs your arm, and takes aim at one of the other newcomers. But who did he swap you with?
1433322211211112122222212211121.title: The Newcomers Training Session

143332221121111212222221221112112.content:
As Bowser Jr was about to yell and release himself from Swapper's grasp, he suddenly found Swapper wasn't holding him anymore. Instead he found himself holding something in his arms. He looked down to find a strange creature nestled into his chest. It was yellow and round, and had the resemblance to a star. He yipped when the creature moved in his arms and matched his gaze.

Everyone looked at him as he quickly released his arms from the star and grasp at his mouth. His voice was so high! Much like it had been when he had become Samus. In fact, looking down at his clothes, he realized that he was now wearing mostly blue, same again as Samus, but this time a dress and heels! And that the thing he had been holding in his arms was a Luma! The Swapper had swapped himself and Rosalina!

Bowser Jr was quick to look in the direction of her old body. She looked and saw a slumped over body in her old clown car, which had been hovering in place. She squinted and saw as best she could with this hair in her face, that the Swapper was also unresponsive.

The Luma was quick to dart into her field of vision, interrupting her investigation and began trying to communicate with her. Its began to point to the bodies she had left behind and gestured to themselves. Bowser Jr stared blankly at the creature suddenly acting out. It did this several times before Bowser Jr was able to understand what it was saying.

"Uh, sorry guys. I gotta go!" Bowser Jr said in a very un-Rosalina like fashion before running off with Luma grasped in her hands. Boswer Jr ran out of the stage and down the hallway, trying to get in as much distance as possible before stopping around what looked to be a secluded corner. She then turned to Swapper who had made itself comfortable in her grip. Bowser Jr pulled Swapper into the air in front of her.

"What did you do dat for? Mr. Ganondorf said he doesn't want us caught!" She stuck her finger into Swapper's face. Swapper's eyes softened and began to water a little at the sudden scolding. It tried to explain itself by pushing it arms in different directions, floating up and down, and doing twirls. Bowser Jr could only stare blankly ahead. She knew that the Luma was trying to tell her something, but she could even begin to piece it together.

"I don't understand! Wh-!" but before Bowser Jr could offer up response, another voice cut her off and began to ask.

"Hey-a Rosalina! You and Luma having a fight?" Bowser Jr quickly grabbed Swapper and shoved it behind her back before twirling in the air to see the newcomer.

Oh no! It was Luigi!

"Uh..."Bowser Jr hesitantly stammered out. This was a problem. Pops had told him about the dangers of being around Mario and what it could happen to him. He didn't mention it as much, but sometimes Luigi was talked about in the same way. Bowser Jr had to find a way out of this. "Nope! Me and Swa...Luma were just...hanging out?" she offered up. Luigi didn't say anything for a second and Bowser Jr though for sure she was caught. She was sure that Luigi was squinting at her, sizing her up, before he adopted a dopey grin and nodded his head.

"Okay then! As long as you guys are okay! See ya!" he said waving off and then rounded another corner, out of sight as quickly as he came. Bowser Jr gave a weak little wave at the space he was standing in. Her grip on Swapper relaxed, and it was able to fly in front of her face. It began to gesture to Luigi and then back to her. Her eyes then widened in understanding.

"Oh! I get it now! If me and you are Rosalina and Luma, no one will be suspicious as much!" Swapper let out a little sigh before nodding its head in conformation. Bowser Jr jumped into the air with relief and joy, "This is perfect! We need to go tell Pops and Mr. Ganondorf about this!" she said. She grasped Swapper into a tight hug and flew off down the halls to find the two men turn princesses.
143332221121111212222221221112112.title: Partners In Crime

1433322211211112122222212211121121.content:
Bowser Jr flew himself and Swapper down the hall, with other contestants and assists looking at her go. She flew as fast as she could, not only to be able to find her father, but also looking around in case she sees someone like Peach or Zelda. Surprisingly, she didn't see the either of them. She tried her best not to think about it and made her way through a few more arches before finally setting on an alcove on the side.

She approached the double doors, who she knew was now her father's and Mr Ganondorf's new room. She balanced Swapper in one hand and raise her other to knock, when she notice delicate feminine voice drifting out. She lowered her hand down and brought an ear up to the door.

"More like this?" She heard. That was Peach's voice, or her father's new voice.

"No, now you are pressing too hard. You're going to break the stick. Here, give." And that was Zelda's/Mr Ganondorf's

"Hey! Watch it! You're gonna mess up the rest of my makeup!"

"You've already done that yourself."

Bowser Jr giggled to the sight he walked in to. Sitting at a vanity at the end of the room was Peach's body with Bowser inside. She had her eyes clenched shut and lips perked as Zelda's body with Ganondorf inside was gripping Bowser's face and applying lipstick on her. Bowser growled as Ganondorf removed her hand from her face.

"How about now, huh? Good enough?" Bowser said pouting, crossing her arms. Ganondorf rolled her eyes and gestured to the mirror behind her seat, "See for yourself." She swung around in her chair. Looking back at Bowser in the mirror was a normal looking, albeit pouty Peach, who looked more adorable than threatening. This realization only caused Bowser to pout further, which only caused her to look more adorable.

She adverted her eyes from her face in embarrassment and saw what appeared to be Rosalina and Luma standing in their now open bedroom door. Bowser went wide-eyed and quick spun back around to directly look at them. Ganondorf also looked behind him to see what had Bowser so concerned about and went still.

"Uhhhh, Rosalina! Luma!" Bowser was able to stammer out. "This isn't what this looks like! Gan-Zelda was just showing me..." she trailed off, any excuse coming up short of a real explanation. Ganondorf herself remained silent, and choose to watch Rosalina, trying to gauge her reaction and any move she would make. She didn't need to look hard as soon Bowser Jr and Swapper began to giggle again at her father's lack of composure.

"Relax Papa, its me." Bowser Jr says through her fits of laughter. Bowser gives out a small sigh of relief, but the embarrassment still remains. Ganondorf becomes more relaxed at learning about who she really is. She then walked over to the boy now cosmic princess, and was a little surprised to see the dramatic difference in height, as she had to look up to met her eyes.

"Junior, I thought we agreed that we wouldn't cause attention to ourselves? We need to keep this plan quiet if we want to get anywhere." Ganondorf said, slightly scolding the boy's actions. Bowser Jr only nodded in agreement before gesturing down to the Luma still in her arms. "We were! But then I told Swapper how I missed Samus body, and how we need to not get caught, and then it saw Rosalina at practice..." her list trailed off but Ganondorf was able to get the message. She was about to speak again before Bowser Jr cut him off.

"Oh! And then we ran into Luigi!" she said suddenly. Quickly Bowser, who had forgotten his embarrassment, leaped off of his vanity and ran over to her son. It was quite comical to see the petite Princess Peach having to stare up at the towering princess. But this didn't deter him. "What?! Luigi?! What happened!? I told you not to go towards him!" It was now Bowser who was scolding him, but Bowser Jr again nodded to agree, "I didn't! He came towards me and started to talk to me and he thought I was Rosalina and didn't do much and then he left!"

"Hmm" Ganondorf said, bring a hand to her chin. Bowser glared at the Hylian princess with suspicion, seeing that look before, but now on Zelda's face. "What are you scheming over there Zelda?" she asked in a mixture of sarcasm and anger. Ganondorf looked up at her and smirked.

"Well Peach, I think I just found a solution to our problem." Both Bowser and her son looked confused at his internal answer. Ganondorf began to pace the room between them. "We both have secured Princess Zelda and Princess Peach's bodies and lives." She gestured to both herself and Bowser. Bowser took a seat at the vanity again for his speech. "However, we still have problem's despite this accomplishment." She then pointed out the door.

"Ridley has managed to do the same as we have, securing Samus Aran's body and life... but also managing to keep the real Samus from exposing him." Ganondorf then gestured back to them. "We have not been as successful, and we have both yours and my previous bodies on the run, looking for help in stopping us, with no way for either of us to interact with them." She then began to stride over to Bowser Jr, who still stood in the middle of the room.

"But, say the princesses were both to stumble upon a familiar face. Say, another princess? Friendly. Helpful. Mother of the stars?" she asked to everyone in the room. No one else needed to say anything. Bowser and Bowser Jr looked on with realization.

Ganondorf then crossed the room back to Bowser. She placed her hands on her shoulders and they both looked on at Bowser Jr. "Assuming that becoming a Luma hasn't removed its swapping abilities?" Bowser Jr looked down at Swapper who shook its body in response. "No, it says it can still swap things." Ganondorf nodded, "Good, then bring them both to our old quarters. Bowser and I will take care of the rest." Bowser Jr nodded her head and flew out of the room in search of her 'friends'.

Bowser looked up at Zelda's form who still had her hand on her shoulders, "What are we going to do in our old rooms?" She was silent at first, but then Bowser felt pain. Ganondorf was applying pressure down onto her. She looked down at her and grinned.

"We're going to be in distress..."
1433322211211112122222212211121121.title: Meeting up with the girls

choices: Arriving at Bowser and Ganondorf's doorstep
Zelda begins to question Bowser Jr
14333222112111121222222122111211211.content:
Swapper enjoyed the feeling of being carried through the air by Bowser Jr's new body. They both flew down hallways and corridors, looking for the two princesses turned villains. Bowser Jr wasn't sure on how much progress she was making as she couldn't find a trace of either the two of them.

She slowly floated herself down on a passing bench, taking a rest from all the levitating she was doing. She allowed the Luma in her lap cuddle into her new body, and allowed herself to stare off into space. She knew that the two of them were looking around for the remote, but Bowser Jr had the remote falling asleep in her lap, so that didn't help much in locating them.

Maybe she could use her new body to find out where they are? She knew that this body had magic, as she had been using it to float around subconsciously, and only just found out how to actually land. She shook her arm a little and felt a small stick in her sleeve. A little more shaking brought a thin wand out of it and into her hand.

She gave a few experimental flicks of the wrist and watched little lights and stars float out of it. They slowly danced in the air before fading as they hit the ground. Bowser Jr was surprised to see how easy it was to use magic in this body. She tried to give a bigger motion, waving her whole arm, and watched as the light and stars were bigger and actually shook the area. The Luma in her lap stirred a little by her magic, but kept itself asleep.

Bowser Jr was amazed by this new power of hers, and felt that this new body might be better than the Samus one she had once yearned for. Samus's body had been nice, but her new body was easily comparable. Same height, fit body, long blonde hair. But now she had not only her companion who could travel with her indiscreetly, but magic to boot!

Her comparison of her new life was interrupted by two heavy sets of footsteps making their way towards her. She placed her attention at the noises and turn down the hall where they were coming from to see who it was.

"It was somewhere down here. I felt magic-...Rosalina!" The body of Ganondorf said, with a look of joy and relief that didn't belong on his face. Trailing behind him, making their own set of heavy steps was Bowser's body, who held the face of sadness and confusion, but also looked relieved to see her. Not knowing that she wasn't the real Rosalina, Zelda and Peach approached her and Swapper.

"Rosalina, I'm so glad we found you! Listen, I know how this looks, but neither of us are actually Bowser and Ganondorf!" Zelda said frantically as the two of them both stood in front of you. Bowser Jr sat there silent, couldn't believing her luck, but also trying to figure out a way to emulate Rosalina. She let her hand drift over Swapper's sleeping star body, and slowly began to stroke it.

"Please Rosalina!" Peach began, her giant claws clasped together in pleading, "The real Bowser and Ganondorf stole our bodies! And our lives! We need to get them back! Please believe us!" Both of them looked at the cosmic princess expectantly, hoping that she would believe them and help them to safety. Neither of them had any clue that Bowser Jr were not only not Rosalina, but the creature causing their troubles was asleep in her lap.

She decided this was the best possible time to start the plan her father and Mr Ganondorf had asked of her, and slowly nodded her head, "No, it's okay...I, uh, believe you two..." Bowser Jr was trying her best to sound like Rosalina. Hopefully they didn't catch on in time. "I talked to, I guess, the real Bowser and Mr Ganondorf just now. They seemed, kinda weird?" she 'explained' to them.

Zelda seemed a little confused at Rosalina's strange behavior. Normally she wasn't this expressive or unsure of herself. But then again, the whole situation seemed less than normal, and he didn't think that she was fully able to handle it. He overlooked this inconsistent change, and was just relieved to hear that Rosalina believed the two of them. Peach also shared his ease.

"Thank you Rosalina! You have no idea what we've been through! Everyone is treating us like criminals! Even Mario..." he trailed off. He stopped his speech and frowned as his tears began to well up. Zelda walked over and gave him a small squeeze on the shoulder in comfort. Bowser Jr was a little unsettled by seeing her father's body act in such a way, or seeing Ganondorf being affectionate towards it. Luckily, Zelda took his confusion for Peach's story than anything else.

"Mario acted in a particular way towards her. And seeing as she looks like Bowser..." he left the rest up to Bowser Jr's imagination. She nodded only to appear like she understood and was on their side, but was internally laughing at her discomfort. How does Princess Peach feel to be treated like her father and herself! Take that prissy!

"But back to the problem. When you were talking to Bowser and Ganondorf, did they happen to mention a creature with them? Or where they were going? Anything suspicious?" Zelda dug for answers. Bowser Jr knew that this was the perfect time to begin the next part of the plan. She nodded her head, and pointed in a direction down the hall. "Yeah, they both said that they were heading to their-uh...your rooms?" Too many bodies to remember and too many pronouns to get anything out.

Good thing Zelda nodded his head in understanding and gestured to his and Peach's bodies, "I suppose they mean that they were going to their old bodies room." He cupped his face in his hand and thought to himself out loud, "But what are they looking for in their quarters...? Maybe the creature? But we had already checked their rooms..."

He shook his head and grabbed Peach's hand. "Rosalina, we need to stop those two before anything else happens. Can you help us?" he asked, offering her his other hand. Bowser Jr was doing back flips in his mind. The plan was coming together so well. She let her small hand fall into the large gloved one that Zelda now owned and nodded. "Of course. I'd be happy to help" she offered an internally insincere smile.

Zelda didn't seem to notice and pulled her up, with Bowser Jr moving Swapper under her arm to allow it to keep sleeping. Zelda took the helm as he marched them towards the direction of their current bodies room. Peach following him closely behind, looking timid in Bowser's large reptile body. Bowser Jr took up the rear, unknowingly leading them into a trap.
14333222112111121222222122111211211.title: Good Princess Hunting

14333222112111122.content:
The small electric mouse Pokemon, Pikachu, seemed to be frantically looking itself over, even chasing its tail in circles to get a better look, only to fall flat on his face. Meanwhile, intergalactic bounty hunter Samus Aran seemed oddly fascinated by her own hands. "This is so weird," you heard her mumble to herself.

Taking the opportunity, you walk up and greet Samus, since you were unable to understand Pikachu even if it did have some information. "Hey Samus," you say, doing your best to imitate Peach. Oddly enough, it seems to come natural to you.

Samus seems caught off guard by this. "Oh, er, hi Peach," she says, a nervous smile on her face giving away the fact that she wasn't really Samus on the inside. Although right now you could care less about whether she was Samus or Pikachu; right now you only cared about getting yourself back to normal.

"You wouldn't have happened to have seen a little grey monster, about this tall, would you?" you ask, making gestures to get your point across.

"Um, yeah..."

"Great! You didn't see which way it went, did you?"

"I, uh... I think it went that way?" 'Samus' says, unsure of herself. It was a good enough answer for you, though.

"Thanks! Well, I've got to go now. See you later." You turned and walked in the direction 'Samus' had pointed you in, waving back at her. You hated acting like Peach, but it got the job done. Now, you had a monster to catch.
14333222112111122.title: Samus and Pikachu

choices: Pikachu and Samus go look for Swapper
Pikachu doesn't want to swap back yet
143332221121111222.content:
As 'Samus' watched 'Peach' walk off in the direction the creature had gone, 'Pikachu' got up from the floor, and started scolding 'Samus'.

"Why'd you tell her? We need that thing to get us back to normal!" Just as Bowser had suspected, Pikachu and Samus had also been swapped by Swapper, so Samus was trapped as Pikachu, while Pikachu got to be Samus.

Unfortunately, now being in Samus's body, Pikachu was no longer able to understand other Pokemonn, so what Samus had said just sounded like gibberish to him. He did notice, however, how much smaller everything looked now that he was Samus, his old body included. Reaching down to pick Samus up, he said, "Wow, you're so small and cute now!"

"Hey! Put me down!" Samus tried to squirm out of Pikachu's grip, but it was no use. The ground looked a lot further away now that she was so small. Pikachu was practically giggling like a schoolgirl. "We need to go find that thing that swapped us," Samus shouts, pointing in the direction the creature had gone in.

"You want us to find that thing so we can swap back?" Pikachu asked, somewhat understanding what Samus was trying to say. Samus nodded.

((Samus's dialogue is in italics to indicate that she is not speaking English.))
143332221121111222.title: Follow Samus and Pikachu

1433322211211112222.content:
Even though Samus desperately wanted her body back, Pikachu was actually enjoying the swap. "Aw, can't we stay like this a little longer? I was just starting to have fun."

Samus could barely believe this. The two of you were trapped in each other's bodies, and Pikachu thought this was fun? Samus didn't really like the idea of hurting her own body, but in this case it seemed necessary, espcially since Pikachu was still holding her up above the ground. Drawing on the electric energy stored in her cheeks, she let out a quick burst of electricity, enough to make Pikachu fall over and drop you.

As Pikachu gets up, he finds Samus slowly walking over to him, getting used to walking on all fours. "So," she asks, "Ready to swap back yet?"

Even though Pikachu could no longer understand her words, he had a pretty good idea of what she was asking. He slowly got up from the ground, and picked Samus up again, saying "Alright, let's go." Although she didn't like being picked up like this, and reminded of how small she was now, but at least Pikachu was holding her close to his body now rather than dangling her out above the ground.

However, it didn't take her long to figure out something was wrong. "No, Pikachu! The other way!" Pikachu was walking in the opposite direction to which Swapper had run off in. It seemed he definitely wasn't ready to swap back yet.

As Samus tried to struggle out of Pikachu's grip once more, Pikachu started petting her right behind the ears, which seemed to calm her down. "Shhh, it'll be alrught," Pikachu said. "You'll see, it'll be fun." Samus wanted to fight back, but the calming effect of Pikachu's petting was really getting to her.
1433322211211112222.title: Pikachu doesn't want to swap back yet

14333222112111122221.content: while samus was being pet by pikachu it was having a calming effect on samus until eventually she fell asleep in the arms of pikachu in her body. good said pikachu as he carried her to...
14333222112111122221.title: Pikachu takes Samus somewhere else

143332221121111222211.content: when pikachu arrives at the trainers room he looks around for a minute before...
143332221121111222211.title: pokemon trainers room

14333222112111122222.author_name: Just an Anon in a non world
choices: ...Someone else who just had an encounter with the Swapper!
14333222112111122222.content:
Samus felt strangely calmed as Pikachu gently stroked her much smaller body, in a way that concerned her. She liked the way it felt so much, though. She just wanted to stay in Pikachu's arms for a while, and let him keep doing that...wait, no! Was Pikachu really this easy to control? Was she really this easy to control? And was she really going to let Pikachu keep her body?

Samus began to struggle in Pikachu's grip, and Pikachu responded by holding her even closer, shushing her and telling her everything would be "Alright". Everything would not be alright! This was not alright! And if Pikachu wasn't going to help her, she'd have to fix this on her own! Giving Pikachu a light shock, she jumped out of his hands and ran down the hall, heading in the direction she thought Peach was going in. "She was looking for a 'little grey monster', right? That must be the thing that did this to me... I'll make it fix me! Somehow!"

Samus ran down the hall as fast as her tiny legs could carry her, passing by a few shockingly large fighters that she wasn't used to seeing so much bigger then her. Although she knew Pikachu was strong, she felt weak in this body, uncomfortable with being looked down upon by others. "Gotta fix this, gotta fix this, gotta fix-oof!"

In her haste to get away, she had slammed face first into something much bigger then her, and was sent sprawling backwards. As a shadow began to loom over her, she looked up to see the face of...
14333222112111122222.title: Samus fights back.

143332221121111222222.content:
You look up to see Palutena, the Goddess of Light, standing over you. She seemed a little shocked by the sudden run in. "Oh, sorry," she said, although it seemed her mind was elsewhere. She seemed very nervous and distracted by something. However, before you could properly react, she seemed to get an idea. "Hm, let's see if I can do this right," she mumbles to herself as she crouches down to see you face to face.

"Huh?" you wonder aloud, although it ended up just sounding like "Pika?"

You hear a voice echo inside your head. You knew Palutena was capable of communicating telepathically, but this voice sounded different, but you couldn't quite tell who it belonged to. "You haven't seen a little grey robot-thing around here, have you?"

"Wait, you mean it got you too?!" you think, hoping this was a two way thing and she could read your thoughts as well.

"Yeah. It caught us by surprise when it swapped us, and ran off before we could do anything to stop it. Even with Lady Palutena's powers, I haven't been able to find it."

"'Lady' Palutena? So then, you're Pit?"

Palutena/Pit looks away awkwardly. "Yeah, it's me. And judging by your voice, I guess you're Samus?"

You nod. "Yeah. It swapped me and Pikachu and then ran off. I wanted to chase after it, but Pikachu thought having my body was fun, so I was distracted for a while trying to deal with him."

Pit sighs. "So you don't know where it's gone?"

"Well, I went in the direction we saw it run off in, but I don't know where it went after that. Oh, and Peach asked us if we'd seen it, so she's probably been swapped too."

"The more people looking, the sooner we find it, I guess. Although that also mean more people getting put into the wrong bodies."

"And then once we find it, I've got to convince Pikachu to give me my body back."

"Alright, we'd better get back to searching."

"Right," you think, nodding your small head, ears flopping around a bit. "Should we split up or should I stick with you and help the search that way?"
143332221121111222222.title: ...Someone else who just had an encounter with ...

choices: Could you teach me how to be a woman, at least until we swap back?
Do you think you can help me use the ladies' room?
I have another couple of friends that I want to check up on.
1433322211211112222222.content:
"Perhaps we should stick together," Pit said. "Four eyes are better than two, and with Pikachu's senses you might be able to spot it quicker than I can."

"That sounds like a plan. Thanks, Pit!" Samus replied telepathically.

"Also, if it's not too much trouble..."

"What is it?"

"Well, the thing is..."
1433322211211112222222.title: Stick together

143332221121112.content: While searching, you hear a voice call out behind you. "Peach!" It takes you a moment to realise the voice is calling out to you, since you were currently Peach. You turn around to find the source of the voice to be...
143332221121112.title: An interruption

1433322211211122.content:
"Uh - er- hey there... Zelda," you respond, taking a moment to recall the strange woman's name.

"How's it going Peach? I've been looking for you."

"Its been - fine? I'm a bit busy," Bowser responded. 'This is her friend I guess?' Using Peach's memories made Bowser a bit uncomfortable, but a quick scan of them confirmed that Zelda was indeed a close friend to Peach.

"Oh? What is it?" She asked.

Suddenly Bowser was backed into a corner. No one was allowed to know that the Koopa King was trapped in the body of a fragile Princess!

"Uh, oh, nothing important?" He said, with a shrug of his shoulders and a nervous smile. He instantly regretted it.

"Well in that case, I have something to show you, come on!"

"Wh-what!?"

"Its a new wing of the facilities they've been working on. Its supposed to be for the tournament, but everyone's just been using it to kill time and have fun. You'll love it, its a..."
1433322211211122.title: Zelda

14333222112111221.content:
"A pool?"

"Yes! It's right off the gym. Its meant as an exercise thing, but no one's really enforcing that yet. We should go look at it."

Zelda had grabbed Bowser by the arm at this point, and she took him to the room they shared. It was all whites, pinks, and purples; Bowser could hardly stomach it. "I really don't know about all this."

"Why? You said nothing was happening, right?"

Bowser held his breath for a moment. He really didn't know any valid excuses that would get Zelda off his back. He just had to hope an opportunity would arise. "Fine, I'll go."

"Great! Now go find a swimsuit," Zelda told Bowser as she grabbed some towels and her own change of clothes.

Reluctantly, Bowser went through Peach's wardrobe. As he searched through it though, he couldn't help but grin as all her clothes were suddenly available to him. 'Suppose this is the only perk of the situation.' If he was still like this by the end of the day, he'd have to atleast check out Peach in some of her getups. Eventually, he found a simple swimsuit; two piece and hot pink. The pink made him gag a bit, but he'd have to make do for now.

"We'll change when we get there," Zelda said, opening the door, "now come on!"

As they walked, Bowser kept his eyes and ears open. The little swapping monster had to be somewhere in the facility, and it was his ticket out of this situation. Did the two of them encounter it?
14333222112111221.title: Pool

1433322212.content: Which swap do you use?
1433322212.title: Head Swap/Clothes Swap

14333222121.content:
You activate the swap, causing the woman and the turtle to swap heads. You had also been repositioned so that the woman was still holding on to you with her new reptilian hand, and so that you were still facing the turtle with his new feminine body.

"WHAT THE HECK!?"
"Oh my..."

The two of them recoil a little in shock. The woman catches on quicker to what has happened, and asks you, "Did you do this?" You nod, proud of your handiwork. "Wow." She seems to be quite amused at the fact that her head was now atop the turtle's large body.

The turtle was less pleased. "Well change use back then!"

"Aw, come on Bowser, this could be fun," the woman says.

"No way! You are NOT keeping my body!"

"Oh, alright." The woman awkwardly kneels down to your height, not used to her new body, and asks, "Can you swap us back?" Even though you didn't like reversing your swaps so soon, this woman was kind to you, so you nod, and reach out your hand to her again. She grabs your hand once again, and soon the pair are back to normal.

"Well, I'm out of here before that thing does anything else weird." The turtle monster, who was apparently named Bowser, stomps away. That left you without a target, but you still had a user; the nice woman in pink.

"Well that was fun," she says. "I'd ask you to swap me with someone else again, but they might get mad like Bowser did." You shake your head, pointing to the 1 on your chest, which glowed as you switched awareness modes. "What does that mean?" she asks, before slowly realising what you were trying to say. "Can you make it so they don't notice I've swapped or something?" You nod happily. The woman seems even happier, as she hugs you. "This is going to be so much fun!"

The woman, who's name you still didn't know, pondered what to do with you, thinking aloud. "I don't think I've seen you around here before. Maybe I should ask Master Hand if it's okay to keep you. Although... can you write? I want to know what else you can do." 15.content: Well you're definitely not any of those four. Maybe you are...
15.title: More Characters

151.content:
You are Fox McCloud, the leader of the Star Fox team and expert spaceship pilot. As a veteran of Smash Bros., you had seen your fair share of odd individuals as well as interacted with them. Hailing from a multitude of different worlds, the paticipants were many and varied, with strange and unique backgrounds and fighting styles. However, it was also the reason why you sometimes had difficulties making friends with newcomers.

One of the most recent additions had been particularly hard for you to become friends with; a young adult human boy who went by the name of 'Joker'. From what you could gather, he came from a world where certain individuals could harness the power of something called a 'Persona'; a kind of manifestation of someone's hidden inner strength, or something like that.

You could certainly attest to his prowess; you were currently on your way back to the room which you presently shared with Mewtwo, having just been defeated by Joker in a match.

You sighed. Even Mewtwo was more sociable than Joker was at the moment. Of course, as a veteran of previous tournaments, Mewtwo had had a lot of interactions with other Smashers, (yourself included), and while he could seem to be grumpy most of the time, he was certainly not unsociable. It was just tricky to find something to talk to him about.

Joker, on the other hand, had not had many interactions with other fighters yet; not that surprising since he literally only joined the roster yesterday. He still seemed to be a little on edge with some of the other fighters; mostly the non-human ones. You strongly suspected this to be because of the fact that he was often fighting against bizarre creatures called Shadows back in his own world. Some of these Shadows could take the forms of knights, animals, mythical beings, ect. Since there were plenty of Smashers that fit those descriptions, you could understand why he might feel a bit uneasy here. If only there was some way to help him to understand the other fighters a little better...

Your thoughts were interrupted when you felt one of your boots hitting something. It was some sort of package. With your curiosity being peaked, you decided to open it. The package contained an odd-looking remote and a piece of paper with instructions. As you read through the instructions, you were a bit dubious at first; a remote that could allow whoever was holding it to swap bodies, clothes, lives and other things with someone else, seemed to be completely ridiculous! Then again... You had seen Master Hand and his crazy brother making all kinds of weird stuff happen during the Smash Tournaments. A remote with such power wouldn't be out of the realm of possibility in comparison.

You felt your tail swish with anticipation as you realized what this meant. Perhaps you could use this remote to help Joker feel more at ease with everyone! The only question was how to best go about it...
You thought hard about the options available. You could of course try to swap bodies between Joker and yourself, or with one of the non-human fighters, but you didn't think that this was a good idea. It might make things worse for him instead of better.

You could also try to swap yourself with one of the human Smashers and then approach Joker that way. Sure; you might feel weird if you decided to swap bodies with a human, but it might be the best way to make Joker feel completely home here.
As you stood there in contemplation, it suddenly struck you that you didn't even know if the remote actually worked; it could still be a prank! And even if it wasn't, there was no guarantee that it could even reverse any possible swaps that was made with it! You certainly didn't want to swap Joker with someone, if you were unable to swap him back again.

You had no choice; you had to test the remote with yourself to see if it was reliable enough. You just had to find someone else to swap with. You didn't have to speculate about whom you should test it with, as your keen ears picked up approaching footsteps coming down the corridor. You decided to make the test-swap with whoever it was. The footsteps got gradually closer and closer before making it around the corner and you saw that it was...
151.title: Fox

152.content:
You are Pit, the personal angel of the goddess Palutena. You had just gotten done flying around the tournament grounds, and you were tired and ready to relax. Well, not exactly flying, but the Hands' power did let you use a limited version of the Power of Flight without Palutena's assistance, so you were using that. You were on your way to the leisure room when you bump your foot on something. Picking it up, you find it's a package with a remote and instruction manual inside. You have no idea what it is, or who could have left it here, but since no one seems to be around to pick it up, you take it with you to the leisure room.

Once you get there, you flop onto the couch, exhausted. Flying was a lot of fun, but also a lot of hard work. Since no one was around to question what you were doing, you decide to go through the manual to see what the remote is for. To your surprise, the remote is not for a TV or something like that, but for switching around aspects of reality between a given target an the person using the remote. This really intrigued you, especially the part about altering reality so that nobody notices the change, or just accepts that it's normal. Would it even work on Viridi and Palutena? Could the power of this remote even defy the gods? You really needed to test this out.

Your energy seemed to have miraculously returned. You throw the box in the bin and race over to your room to put the manual away somewhere safe, all the while formulating a plan. You'd swap something with the first person you came across. Swap something so obvious, so ridiculous, that it would be impossible for Lady Palutena to not see and not laugh at you for. Then you'd go find her and see if your changes would get any reaction out of her. If she didn't have a laugh about your head on someone else's body or you wearing an outfit that looked ridiculous on you, you'd know for sure the power of this remote. Of course, you'll have the remote set to swap mode one. You wanted to test out it's mind altering capabilities, not freak people out with the swaps.

You head back out into the hallway and slow your pace. The remote might make the swaps seem normal, but they might still question why you're pointing a remote at them out of the blue. Doing your best to stay quiet even with all the excitement, you look for someone and try to make sure they don't see you so you can do the swapping. Peeking around a corner, you've found someone to swap with, and it's...
152.title: Pit

1521.content: You couldn't have asked for a more perfect test subject. The goddess who's perception you wanted to test would be the person you swap with. You briefly considered your options, you didn't want Palutena to walk away or notice you. You did want something really obvious and ridiculous, and what could be more obvious and ridiculous in this situation than your head on Palutena's body? Plus there were certain other advantages to having a body like that. Maybe her powers would even come with it. Although if you really wanted her powers, you could go for a life swap. That way even if she could see through the changes, she wouldn't be able to do anything about it. Although maybe if you gained her powers, she wouldn't have the power to see through the swap, and you'd have to go see Viridi in the living quarters for assist and background characters to test it. No doubt Viridi would laugh until she cried if she saw you dressed up like Palutena. She was actually pretty nice once she got over the whole "kill all the humans" thing. Of course, these were just two of the six options you had available to you, and the other options would probably be just as good. You end up deciding to go with...
1521.title: Palutena

15211.content:
You aim at Palutena, press the button, and without any special noises or light, you find yourself in the hallway where Palutena was standing. You can still feel your laurel on your head and your short hair, but looking down revealed that you had Palutena's godly body beneath your neck. It felt very different to your old body, a feeling you were interested in exploring, but now that you knew the remote would actually swap swap things, you had to know whether the reality altering would even make the gods think that this was normal. Luckily since you had left your body around the corner, Palutena spotted you and walked over. You did your best not to laugh at how she looked. Her hair was dragging on the ground because your body was shorter than her's.

"Hey, Pit. Have you been training?" she asks. She probably assumed you were slacking off.

"Of course," you replied, putting your hands on your hips. "In fact I just got back from a training session."

"Right." The sarcasm is thick in her voice. "Well unlike you, I've got to get to training with the other newcomers. I'll see you around."

She begins to walk away in the direction she was headed before you look her body. "See ya." If Palutena could really see what happened, she would have been mad, or at least laughed at the sight of your head on her body. Palutena didn't act any different than usual, so now you know for sure you can play around with the remote as much as you liked without anyone being the wiser, not even gods. Before Palutena is out of sight, however, you consider whether you should get your own body back. You were definitely interested in the different feelings you were getting from Palutena's body, even without her powers, but you weren't sure you liked the feeling of not having wings. That said, you could use a limited version of the power of flight while on the tournament grounds, and when Palutena used the power of flight for her attacks, she grew a pair of wings, so maybe you could do that. Before she disappears from the hallway, you decide to...
15211.title: Head Swap

152111.content:
Looking back and forth between Palutena walking away with your body below her neck, and the lovely view you got from simply looking down, you make your decision. "Yeah, I'm definitely keeping this," you mumbled to yourself. You could get your body back at any time, right now you wanted to explore and experiment. Considering what you could do now as Palutena leaves your view., you decide that you want to get a better look at how you actually look with your head on Palutena's body. You turn around and head back the way you had come, heading to your room. You notice that your hips sway back and forth as you walk, which for some reason brings a smile to your face.

When you get to your room, before you can even check the mirror, you notice some of Palutena's clothes lying around in places where your old clothes had been. You suppose that since you took Palutena's body below her neck, you got all the clothes and such that came with it. You lean Palutena's staff against the wall where you usually put your bow, and leave the remote on your bed, and head to the bathroom so you can look at yourself in the full length mirror that was on the back of the door. As soon as you see yourself, you burst out laughing. Your head looks utterly ridiculous attached to Palutena's body. You make a few silly poses, which only makes you laugh even harder. As you start to calm down, your attention starts to be drawn away from your head and to the body below it. You run your hands down your body, feeling every curve, and giving yourself a little pat of the butt. You give your breasts a little squeeze, and can't contain yourself. "Ooooohhhhhh..."

You start to think about whether or not you should really be doing this. You were still very loyal to Lady Palutena, and this was her body you were playing around with. "Well, it's my body for now," you say, sounding like you're trying to convince yourself. "I can do what I like with it." Your roommate, Fox, should be busy with other around this time of day and wouldn't be back until later. You can use the time to explore and experiment with this body a bit more. Perhaps without the clothes. Then again, the remote was still sitting on your bed, you could go an experiment with that instead.
152111.title: Keep Palutena's body

1521112.content: You wanted to explore more, but the remote is a more interesting prospect. You were happy with your current body, which narrowed down your options. You think about what kind of swap you want to do, before deciding:
1521112.title: Experiment with the remote

15211121.content: Will you do a Head Swap or Relationship Swap?
15211121.title: Head/Relationship

152111211.content: You were having fun with Palutena's body, but your head was still a problem. Sure, nobody else noticed, but having such a goofy looking mismatch and hearing your normal voice got in the way of said fun. You had a few options: you could either take Palutena's head, giving you her whole body, or choose someone else's head, giving the new Pit a unique body.
152111211.title: Getting A Head

1521112112.content: You decided to go with someone else's head. You liked the idea of the new you having a new look, even if you were the only one who would know about it. Now, who to pick? Not long after the thought crossed your mind, Lucina passed by. Will you swap with her?
1521112112.title: Someone else

choices: Experiment with the remote some more
15211121121.content:
You pointed the remote at Lucina and hit the Head Swap button. Immediately, you changed places, with your head on Lucina's body, and Lucina's head on your (Palutena's) body. You then hit the Body Swap button to put you back in Palutena's body, now with Lucina's head. You now had a fully female body, so you decided to make one more change. You pointed the remote and Lucina and hit the Gender Swap button. Not much changed for you, physically: you already had a completely female body after all. Your name had changed, apparently you were now known as Priscilla. Your clothing was also now closer to a feminine gown than the chiton you wore previously. Lucina, however, was a different story. He now lacked the breasts he once had, and had a noticeable bulge in his pants. He was now known as Luke. His clothing was even more similar to Marth's now.

Now that all that's done with, what will you do now?
15211121121.title: Swap with Lucina

152112.content: You decide to swap back with Palutena. You did serve her after all, so it would be wrong to take her body from her even if it she wasn't aware of it. Before she can leave, you quickly point the remote at Palutena and press what you thought was the head swap button. In an instant, the swap takes place and you immediately knew that something was wrong. You realize that in your panic to swap back, you pressed the wrong button by accident. What button did you press?
152112.title: Get your own body back

1521121.content:
It seemed you had your finger a little too far to the left, and had accidentally pressed body swap instead of head swap. So now instead of having your head on top of Palutena's body, you had your own body from the neck down, and from the neck up you had Palutena's head. The swap had also left your clothing as is, aside from altering the size to fit the different body, so you still wore your laurel on your head, and Palutena's dress now clung to your male body.

"Guess I really screwed up with this," you mumble to yourself, a little shocked that Palutena's voice comes out instead of your own. You need to fix this as soon as possible; right now you were a jumbled mix of Pit and Palutena, and the same could be said for Palutena herself, since she had acquired the parts you no longer had. You ready the remote to swap again and hopefully put things back to normal.
1521121.title: Body Swap

15211211.content:
You breath a sigh of relief, seeing that Palutena has not yet left the hallway. However, as you raise the remote to reverse the swaps, you notice she is about to turn the corner, giving you just barely enough time to perform one of the swaps. But which swap to do?

If you reverse the body swap, you'll have your head back, but you'll have Palutena's body until you see her again, since you doubt you'll be able to run and catch up to her while wearing her hi-heeled sandals. It was better than nothing, but you really wished you could reverse both swaps. Perhaps if you did this one first, you could sneak over to the newcomer training session and reverse the swap there before anyone noticed you.

On the other hand, if you reverse the head swap, the two of you will be less jumbled up, but you'll also completely have Palutena's body, albeit dressed in your clothes. You liked this idea even less, but it would swap your position with Palutena's, so if she took the same route to the newcomer training session, she'd end up crossing paths with you again and you could swap your bodies back. But if she took an alternate route, you'd lose sight of her, and be stuck with her entire body until you could find her again.

Making your decision, you point the remote at Palutena, and press the...
15211211.title: Palutena is still there

choices: Palutena is nowhere to be seen
152112112.content:
You decide to reverse the head swap first, since it would mean a better chance at being able to reverse both swaps. You press the button, and in an instant, you find yourself over at the other end of the hallway. You now have your own clothes back, but you also have Palutena's body.you had previously taken her body below the neck, and then accidentally ended up with her head on your body, that didn't make having her entire body any less awkward, especially considering you still wearing your old clothes, which provided little to no support for your female body.

You quickly turn around to see where you had been standing before, needing to move some of your long green hair out of your face in the process. You had hoped Palutena would take the same route to go to the newcomer training session so that she'd be walking towards you instead of away from you, and you could sort this mess out for good.
152112112.title: Head Swap Button

1521121121.content: Palutena is taking the same route to the training session, but she started to turn the corner and enter the session! You barely have enough time to concentrate, so do you hit the body swap button, or do you push the wrong button under pressure?
1521121121.title: Palutena takes the same route

152112112121.content: After a flash of light, you are greeted to.....palutenas body still? You are confused for a second until you realize you were wearing her clothes as well. You start to hope that this was a clothes swap, but then captain falcon greets you and brings you into the newcomer training session! This means you had palutenas life! Palutenas everything! You dont know how you are going to get throgh this, so do you try to make an exuse to leave, or stay and try to be palutena?
152112112121.title: Life swap

1521121121211.content: You decide to stay, since this was a big thing for palutena and you didnt want to mess it up for her, or you, at the moment. Captain falcon then directs every neecomer to show him their neutral special. You got some time since you were lined in alpabetical order, but you still have no idea whar her special is! You think and think, thrn suddenly your head gets filled with palutenas memorys. From her life as a goddess, her powers, and some "other stuff" you didnt really need to know about her...Then you remember not only her neutral special, but her entire moveset! As its your turn to show your attacks, captain falcon yells "Palutena, show me your moves!" And you do exactly that. You show him every one of palutenas moves and he is greatly impressed. He then tells everyone they will be in the next tournament, which wont be for a while, and that they are dismissed. You feel happy with yourself. You showed the captain your entire moveset and impressed him. Now you can go home, relax, maybe play with yourself, wait, what?!? You then snap out of it and then realize you were still pit trapped in palutena! You then try to think if you should go find your body and switch back, or wait until tomorrow.
1521121121211.title: Stay

choices: You take up Falco's offer, you were definitely in a rush
You walk away, still mad over what he said earlier
15211211212111.content:
You decide to go find your faithful servant pit!...wait um no...guiding mentor Palutena! You once again had to shake your head to stay on track, this wasn't your body, nor head, nor life, nor clothes, it was Palutenas and you needed to return it so you could go back to normal like this never even happened, right? You decided now wasn't the right time to begin thinking about that, you hadn't even left the newcomer training room which you now notice is a lot more empty than when you walked in here earlier, you look over to see Captain Falcon doing some warmups and practicing his own overpowered move set while giving himself compliments as he did. You scoff at his actions and think why he would be so...so....you stop, realizing that you are judging him like Palutena usually does when peering down to look upon the mortals, you even notice you're radiating her heavenly glow that circles her during her judging making him look extremely intimidating....you need to find Pit...wait, damnit Palutena.


You quickly rush out of the room hoping she isn't too far away so you could quit feeling so conflicted, you look around the surrounding area in hope of that but unfortunately don't find her. "Ugh, why am I so fast when I want to go somewhere! Is this how Lady Palutena always feels?" You ask yourself as you walk down the corridors looking for her. Luckily you spot one of your friends, Falco, talking with the Pokémon Pikachu about recoveries, it seemed pretty heated: "look all I'm saying is you really shouldn't spam your recovery, eh? What do mean I do the same thing!" You didn't want to hear the rest of the conversation so you cleared your throat (hang on, do goddesses even need to clear their throats?) to alert them of your presence, They stop arguing and turn to face you with Falco looking at you strangely, "uh do I know you?" he said scratching his head. "Well to my knowledge, no, but I'm one of the newcomers Palutena, you may know me from my servant Pit?" You say with Palutena's feminine and beautiful voice, Falco's eyes grow wide in realization, "oh yeah! Hey sparky, look its the girl Pit keeps talking about!" Falco turns to Pikachu and points towards you like, "get a load of this guy". Pikachu merely waves and smiles (actually I think that's all Pokémon can do to communicate without saying there name) and motions to Falco to continue the conversation, "oh yeah, sorry. So, uh, whaddya need Palutena?" Falco asks with his trademark sly grin.

"Well, I'm actually looking for Pit right now and I was hoping you could tell me where he is right now, if you could I would be very thankful" you answer while they both look around to check the coast, "thankful eh? alright I'll help you find ol' wingboy on one condition" Falco answers holding up one feather to drill in the point. "You meet me at the smash park tonight so we can get to know each other better, we can get better acquainted for the tournament I mean" You were now aware that he was scanning your body ("PALUTENAS BODY FOR THE LAST TIME" you think to yourself) and apparently he was liking what he was seeing. Now you knew you weren't exactly the sharpest arrow in the quiver, but you knew what Falco meant to do with him, you meant Lady Palutena, that night and were half tempted to smite him now for even bringing that up, but you knew that Lady Palutena would soon be kicked out of the tournament for smiting another smasher. "What if I refuse this...offer?" You asked curiously and straring daggers at the anthropomorphized flacon, you were left in shock as Flaco shrugs and says "eh, nothing off my back, you can just leave right now and I'm sure you'll find him eventually. But if you wanna find him sooner than later, I suggest you take my deal" he said once again with a sly grin.

What do you decide on?
15211211212111.title: Find pit!...er..palutena!

choices: You decided to stay as Palutena, and walk into the room to "meet" Fox
152112112121111.content:
You reluctantly said, "fine...just tell me where Pit is" you really were in a hurry to find him...her, you meant. "Great to hear, lady, now as for the time how about....9:00?" he said as you began to sigh and tapping your foot impatiently "sure, whatever, now tell me where to find Pit!" You said after a monent of silence. Falco points towards the right and says, "I heard he was going to hang with my buddy Fox 'till dinner, in fact I was gonna head over there once I was done with this electrified fuzzball" he finishes, Pikachu looking up angrily at the strange insult.

You thought on it for a moment, you did recall saying you wanted to play some games with Fox the other day, did he invite Falco along? You decided to thank Falco for the answer before heading towards your room, "thanks, Falco, for your time and answer. If it's true that is" you added with a bit of spite and he once again flashes his sly grin and says,jueh no worries, just don't forget about tonight, lady, I'll be there on time and I'll be expecting you!" he reminds you once again as you sigh and turn towards the right to head to your shared room with Fox, hoping that the gods would bless you this day with good fortune.


You walk passed many other Smashers some of which you knew but would be pretty weird if you talked to them knowing so much about them as Palutena so you just say, "hello, there" and wave to them getting mixed responses as you did. Finally you find yourself standing in front of your door where you could hear sounds of playfulness inside, you smiled as you heard Pit's usual whine as Fox outbests him at whatever he was doing....oh damnit, "man I really need to swap back with him...I mean her, I mean...ugh this is soooo frustrating!" you say to yourself aloud as you fall to the ground in confusion. This was Palutena's everything, and you had stolen it for your own selfish purposes, it was your duty to return it...or at least it was your duty, you felt anger at your indecisiveness, you could eadily just walk away with Palutena's life, not even she knew what she had lost. But...there was still doubt...

"Hey...Lady Palutena?" you heard Pit's voice say as you looked up to see, well, your body or Pit's body...ugh. "You alright? You seem...upset" he asked softly. You knew you should swap back but who would know if you chose to become Palutena instead of playing the part for a while and giving it all up, you were conflicted.


Finally, after another moment where the real Palutena decided to sit down next to her "mentor" to comfort her, you decided and stood back up. "Pit..." you said feeling your large heavenly eyes begin to water, "yes, my lady?" he asked a little confused.
