You then tell the captain that you think you ate a poison mushroom and feel sick. He lets you go back to your room, only because he knows how much of a pain they can be. On the way back to palutenas, now your, room, you try to look for your old body but cant find it. When you finally get to your room you go in to see her room is empty. As you sit in her room you think to yourself. "What now?" As you walk around your room you feel your breasts jiggle up and down. "At least im trapped in a good body, this could have been way worse" you think. Just at a curiosity, you squeeze your breast, to find it very senitive. Do you keep going with this or stop?
1521121121212.title: Make an exuse

choices: You make it to the stadium
You meet someone along the way
15211212.content:
"No," you mumble to yourself, still not used to hearing Palutena's voice instead of your own. Palutena was nowhere to be seen. You try to run down the hallway where Palutena had left, only to almost trip and fall thanks to Palutena's high heels. Walking as fast as you could without tripping, which wasn't very fast, you make your way down the hallway to try and catch up with Palutena, but as you came to a crossroads in the hallways, there was no sign of her.

You let out a big sigh. For the time being, you were stuck as this strange amalgamation of Pit and Palutena. Palutena didn't have it much better than you did, but at least she was unaware of the changes so she wasn't bothered by them. You, on the other hand, felt very strange. Sure, you didn't have a female body below the neck anymore, you could still feel the changes. You could feel the weight of Palutena's long, green hair pulling down on your head, weaving its way around your wings, and resting on the floor. You could feel Palutena's dress clinging tightly to your body, somehow holding itself up despite your male body. You could feel the heaviness of all the armor and gold trinkets Palutena wore, and the staff and shield you held. You could feel your balance getting unsteady, as you wobbled on Palutena's heels. You tried moving your wings, only for your hair to get in the way and make things difficult.

"I have to do something about this," you think out loud. But what could be done? You could go over to the newcomer training session; that's where Palutena had been heading before you lost sight of her. Maybe you'd be able to find her there. Then again, you were pretty sure veterans not in charge of the session were only allow to spectate from the stands. Your aim would have to be pretty good to swap with Palutena from up there, and if you swapped heads with her, it'd cause some confusion as to why you were in the session, so you'd only really be able to reverse the body swap. Still it was probably better than nothing.

However, you were a little worried about the possibility of someone seeing you like this. Sure, they wouldn't see it as anything out of the ordinary, but you'd prefer to avoid having to talk to people while you looked like this. You also didn't want to risk being dragged off somewhere else while trying to swap back, or accidentally swapping with someone else. Then again, you didn't see much of a choice, so slowly and unsteadily, you head towards the stadium in which the training session was taking place.
15211212.title: Palutena is gone

1521122.content: Did you press Clothes Swap instead?
1521122.title: Other Button

15211222.content: Did you press Life Swap?
15211222.title: Other Button

152112221.content:
You knew you had messed up, but you had no idea how you messed up this badly. Maybe Palutena's nails had got in the way or something? Either way, you now found yourself across the hallway where Palutena had been, just like you would have if you'd performed a headswap. However, you still had Palutena's body below your neck. On top of that, your laurel and Palutena's dress had now been replaced with Palutena's tiara and makeup and your own tunic, which provided little to no support for your female parts. A quick look through your memories confirms what you had suspected had happened; you had somehow swapped lives with Palutena instead of heads.

Between the mismatch of body parts, clothing, and having two sets of memories in your head, you had been turned into a strange jumble of Pit and Palutena. "Wow, I really messed up big," you say to yourself. You turn back to where you had been standing previously, hoping to undo the swaps and fix this, but are shocked to see that Palutena was nowhere to be seen. You run over to where you had been standing, the bouncing of your chest making you somewhat uncomfortable, and look around, but there was no sign of Palutena, or where she had gone.

"This is bad, this is really bad," you mumble as you pace back and forth. "What do I do now?" You really wanted to swap back, but to do that you'd need to find Palutena first. The big problem, though, was that right now, Palutena was supposed to be at the newcomer training session. Not going could get Palutena in trouble, and if the Hands thought a newcomer wasn't performing to a certain standard, they could be kicked out of the tournament. If you got Palutena removed from the tournament while trying to find her (currently occupying your old life), you'd be sent back to Skyworld in her place, and you'd be stuck as this Pit-Palutena abomination until the tournament was over. Could you really go to the training session in her place, though? Sure, you had attended similar training sessions during the last tournament, and because of the swaps, you'd still have your own weapons, but you weren't used to Palutena's powers or her body. Although perhaps the remote could do something to you help you out there.
152112221.title: Life Swap

152112222.content: Did you press Relationship Swap or Gender Swap?
152112222.title: Other Button

choices: One of Palutena's friends interrupts you
1521122221.content:
"Huh? Why didn't it work?" you ask aloud. You were aiming at Palutena, and you pressed the button, but nothing seemed to happen. You still had Palutena's body below your neck, and she was still walking away with yours. Was the remote broken? Would you be stuck like this forever?

It was at that point you noticed what button your finger was on. Your finger and been down a bit from where you had thought it was, so instead of performing a head swap, you had performed a relationship swap instead. Strangely enough, this meant that despite Palutena still being a goddess, and you still being an angel, Palutena would now be serving you. Or, maybe she was just loyal to you while you still did the missions? The manual hadn't really been clear about how much would be swapped.

However, now you knew why the swap hadn't worked, and you could correct it. Or at least you could have if Palutena was still there. "What!? Where'd she go?" You run down the hallway, stumbling as you weren't used to your new center of gravity or wearing high heels, hoping to find where Palutena had gone. Unfortunately, during your freakout over the remote possibly not working anymore, Palutena, blissfully unaware of what was going on, had left, leaving you stuck with her body and her relationships until you found her again.

You do your best not not freak out again and try to think calmly about this. Palutena had been going to one of the newcomer training sessions, so she would likely be heading over there. However, after swapping with her, you had her staff and her shield, so she had probably gained your weapons. You didn't have your bow with you when you swapped with her, so maybe she'd gone back to her room to get it first. Even if she wasn't at her room, you probably still had enough time to check if she was there, and then make it to the newcomer training session before it ended.

"Alright, you can do this Pit," you say to yourself, taking a deep breath. "Time to go get your body back." Walking as quickly as you could without tripping, you head towards Palutena's room to see if she's there.
1521122221.title: Relationship Swap

15211222211.content: Once you get to her room, is she in there?
15211222211.title: At Palutena's Room...

152112222111.content: As you walk in, you can see palutena in her room getting ready for the training. She says "hi, sir pit!" . Must be another thing from the relationship swap, you think. As you greet her, you aim at her and fire the relationship swap button to start to get things back to normal, or did you mess up even more?
152112222111.title: Yes

choices: Go to the newcomer training session
15212.content:
You decide to swap lives with Palutena. You had spent a lot of time serving her, so swapping roles to let you be in charge would be pretty nice. You aim at her, and press the button for a life swap, and almost instantly find yourself across the hallway, where Palutena had been. In one hand you were holding the remote, but in your other, you were holding Palutena's staff. Looking down at yourself, you blush out of embarrassment to find that you are wearing Palutena's clothes. Her dress, her heeled sandals, her armor, it was all there. The manual had said this would happen, but in the excitement of the moment you hadn't really thought about that. You move around a little, feeling the dress swishing around your legs. It was an odd experience, but you figured you might as well keep it for now. You wanted to be the one in charge, and a goddess need a fancy dress... or something like that.

You hadn't heard any screaming or anything, but you still wanted to see with your own eyes if Palutena was unaware of the swap. You walk over to the corner you had been peeking around, finding it slightly amusing that you were now walking flawlessly in Palutena's heels, and take a look around the corner. Walking down the hallway in the opposite direction was Palutena, dressed in your clothes, and seemingly finding nothing wrong with this situation. If she still thought she was herself, she'd probably be heading to that newcomer training session that was apparently going on, but she seemed to be headed in the other direction. She really thought she was you!

However, you didn't think this could really be considered a true test of whether the gods were immune to the mind altering effects, since you had stripped her of her god status when you stole her life. That said, you wanted to keep her life for a while, so you wouldn't be swapping back just for the sake of figuring it out. As long as Palutena was in your life, it didn't really matter if she could notice or not. Now that you had her life, and any bonuses that came with it, you needed to decide what to do next. You had thought about the newcomer training session before, and it might be nice to try out your new powers on the battlefield. On the other hand, you were still curious as to whether gods could notice the swap, and Viridi would get a kick out of seeing you dressed as Palutena. She was staying in the living quarters for assists and background characters, so you could go over and see her.
15212.title: Life Swap

152122.content:
You decide to and visit visit Viridi to see if she'd notice the swap or not. It'd be a good opportunity to talk to her anyway. The two of you were actually friends once the whole war against the Underworld was over, and you (and several others) had managed to convince her not to exterminate the human race. You begin to head over to her room, still finding it somewhat amusing that you were walking around dressed as Palutena.

Reaching her room, you knock on her door. You didn't have either hand free, since you were holding Palutena's staff in one hand and the remote in the other, but you manage to knock using the hand holding the remote. From inside, you hear Viridi call out, "Come in!" She didn't really sound happy. She had told you before that she was annoyed at the Hands for not letting her go anywhere for long, and she was probably being moody about that. You open the door and come inside.

Viridi was laying on her bed, looking rather bored. "Oh, hey Palutena," she says.

That was exactly what you wanted to hear. Even Viridi thought you were really Palutena! The gods could be fooled with this remote! Not thinking, you mumble to yourself, "It worked!"

Unfortunately, you had mumbled loud enough for Viridi to hear. "Huh? What worked?" she asked.

"Oh, uh, nothing!" you say, sounding a little too panicky. You try to position your arm so that the hand holding the remote was hidden behind Palutena's shield. Of course, while trying to hide it, it just made it obvious you were trying to hide something.

Viridi got off the bed. "Out with it," she demanded, "What are you trying to hide?"

If you were really Palutena, you'd have no problem standing up to Viridi. But... you were Palutena now, right? Maybe you could just try to bring her personality out and take charge of the situation? Then again, it might be more fun to show Viridi the remote and use it together, although you'd have to find a way to make her see who you actually are. And if she tried to take the remote from you, well, you were a goddess now, you should have no problem stopping her.
152122.title: Go see Viridi

choices: You go find Palutena to switch back
Your godly foresight lets you find the secret buttons on the remote
1521222.content:
You decide to just get it out in the open, and show Viridi the remote. 'It's this remote. I has the power to change reality."

"Oh puh-lease. Like I'd fall for that one," Viridi scoffs.

"It's true! I already used it to swap lives with Palutena."

Viridi raises an eyebrow. "Oh? So who are you really then?"

You place your hands on your hips, as best you can with both hands full. "I'm Pit."

Viridi looks more than a little skeptical. "Oh really? Prove it."

"Well..." You honestly didn't know how to prove that you were really Pit. Maybe you could go find Palutena and switch back with her and then come see Viridi. You can't help but feel like the remote should really have a feature to deal with this, to make people you wanted immune to the mind altering effect.
1521222.title: Show Viridi the remote

15212222.content:
Before you answer, you sense that there's some sort of secret panel on the remote. Palutena's powers kicking in? You weren't sure. Sure enough, you find a slit in the remote that you manage to pop off using the longer fingernails you got with Palutena's life. Behind the panel were 6 buttons, and thanks to Palutena's powers again, you knew what they did. "So, this should let you see how things really are."

"Huh?" Viridi asks. But before she can say anything else, you point the remote at her and press the orange button. She blinks a few times, before bursting out laughing. She points at you and attempts to say something, but she's laughing too hard to say anything. You join in the laughing too, looking down at how ridiculous you look wearing Palutena's clothes.

After a while, you both calm down, and sit down on Viridi's bed. You explain to her how you found the remote, and what it could do. "So," she asks, "Is this why you came to see me?"

"Well, I wanted to see if the mind altering effects of the remote would even work on gods, and since you thought I was Palutena when I came in, I'd say it works."

"Couldn't you have just talked to Palutena to see if she thought she was you?"

"Well, since I took her life, she's not really a goddess anymore, so I didn't think that would be a proper test." Viridi nods, understanding your logic. "So, do you want to try it out?"

"Really? Like, swapping with each other or with other people?"
15212222.title: Your godly foresight lets you find the secret b...

152122221.content:
"How about we just swap with each other for now," you suggest.

"Okay then, Palutena," Viridi says, teasing you a little about the fact you were currently in Palutena's life instead of your own. "What are we going to swap?"

"Hmm, how about you decide?" You first point the remote at yourself and press the orange button, allowing you to see swaps without holding the remote as well, and the hand the remote to Viridi. She wastes no time in pointing it at you, and not long after the two of you have already swapped. Which swap does Viridi choose?

1521222212.title: Life Swap/Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

15212222121.content:
In a flash, the two of you have switched places on the bed, and you now wore Viridi's dress, while Viridi was wearing Palutena's. "Another life swap?" you think to yourself. You had been kind of hoping you'd get to try out one of the other buttons. Before you can say anything, Viridi gets up off the bed, remote in hand.

"Sorry to do this to you Pit," she says, "But you know how much I hate being cooped up in here."

It takes you a moment to realise what was going on. Viridi had swapped lives with you so she wouldn't have all the restrictions the Hands had imposed on her weighing her down, which unfortunately left you in her shoes, barely being allowed to do anything. "Wait," you say, almost shouting, "You're just going to leave me here?"

"Well it's either you or me, and I'm fed up with being stick in my room."

"Can I at least have the remote so I can swap with someone else who comes to visit?"

"No way! This thing is way to powerful to let it go to waste sitting here with you. Besides, who's to say you wouldn't just swap back with me here and now?"

"But... but..." You felt somewhat betrayed. You thought Viridi was your friend, but now she had taken the most powerful device you had ever seen and stuck you in her life, trapped under the restrictions the Hands had set down for her.

Viridis makes her way to the door while you stumble over your words. "Sorry I have to be leaving so soon, Viridi," she says, once again playing along with the lives the two of you currently occupied. "Maybe next time I'll bring Pit along so you have someone to swap with too. Bye bye." And with that, Viridi left, taking the remote with her.
15212222121.title: Life Swap

15212222122.content: Which swap does Viridi choose?
15212222122.title: Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

152122222.content:
"I think swapping with other people might be more fun. Plus I might need a different life, since Palutena is supposed to be at a training session for the newcomers."

"Good," Viridi says jokingly, "I can't really take you seriously while you're dressed as Palutena." The two of you have a little laugh. "But really, if we're doing that I'll probably need to do a life swap too so I don't have the Hands breathing down my neck about going back to my room all the time."

"Good idea," you reply. "And if we're both gonna be swapping around like that, I should probably make it so I'm aware of all the swaps we do too." You point the remote at yourself and press the orange button. You get up off the bed, "Okay, let's go."

"Sure thing, Palutena," Viridi says, getting up herself. You both have a little giggle at that, but quickly compose yourself. You both leave Vidiri's room and head back towards the area where all the competitors stayed. "I'll probably need to swap first," Viridi says, "You're supposed to be somewhere else, but I'm flat out not allowed to be here for too long."

"Okay," you say, handing her the remote. You trusted her not to run off with it, and even if she did, you were aware of the swaps now so you'd be able to find her. "We just need to find two people together so we can swap into their lives." You were a little too excited about all this to worry about how everyone's lives would be getting mixed up, although none of them would really notice. If Viridi realised that everyone would be getting mixed up, she didn't seem to care.

After wandering the halls for a little while, Viridi pointed down one of the hallways. "There!", she said. Down the hallway was two competitors in the tournament that the two of you could swap with. They were...
152122222.title: With Other People

1521222221.content:
"Looks like we're going from Goddesses to Princesses, huh," Viridi says. Down the hallway, where Viridi is pointing, were two of the Princesses competing in the tournament, Princess Peach of the Mushroom Kingdom, and Princess Zelda of Hyrule. They seemed to be having a bit of a conversation, and would probably be distracted enough for you to be able to swap with them without them noticing.

"Uh, I dunno," you said, unsure about whether you wanted to swap with one of them.

"What's the problem now?" Viridi asks. "You already swapped with Palutena, so people already think you're a girl. You're even wearing a dress."

"I know but, Palutena's single. Both the Princesses have a boyfriend."

"Oh. OH!" Viridi exclaims as she realised what you were getting at. "Well, I'm sure we can sort that out with a relationship swap or something. Or we could just do another life swap if we find someone better."

"O-okay." You were still a bit uneasy about this.

"Viridi puts a hand on your shoulder. "Look, if your boyfriend tries to pull a move on you, I can just intervene by swapping something with him. Life, relationship, whatever works. Okay?"

"Okay." You nod, and regain your composure. "Let's do this."

Viridi smiles. "Alright, so here's what we'll do. I'll swap with one of them, and then my old life will probably leave to go back to my room. Then, you can rush past like you're late for the training session, and I can quickly slip you the remote then. And then, you just swap with the other princess and they run off in Palutena's life to the training session. How does that sound?"

"Sounds like it'll work. Good luck." You both nod to each other and Viridi points the remote at the pair of princesses. She presses the button, and is instantly transported down the hallway into one of their lives. Now occupying Viridi's life was...
1521222221.title: Peach and Zelda

15212222212.content:
Standing next to you was Zelda, dressed in Viridi's clothes, and with her hair in a ponytail like Viridi wore hers. "Well, this has been fun," Zelda said, "but I should probably get back to my room before the Hands throw a fit. See ya." She turned around and began walking back towards Viridi's room, waving to you as she left. You waved back to her.

Looking back at where the pair of princesses were standing, you saw that Peach was unchanged, but she was now talking to Vidiri, who was wearing Zelda's clothes and had her hair down. She seemed to be doing her best to keep up the conversation until you came. You had a feeling she was going to take Zelda's life. She had been laughing about you being in Palutena's life, so of course she'd leave the much girlier life of Princess Peach for you. You begin to quickly walk towards the pair.

"Excuse me", you say as you near them. "Coming through." Peach takes a step back for you to pass, and Viridi quickly passes you the remote as you walk past. Once Peach turns back to talk to Viridi, you quickly point the remote back at Peach and hit Life Swap.

Peach continues to walk off quickly, dressed in Palutena's clothes. Meanwhile, you were now standing with Peach, dressed in her clothes, feeling a little silly wearing something so girly. Viridi had a bit of a giggle at you too.

"Well, that worked pretty nicely," Viridi says. "What now, Peach?" She laughs a bit as she uses your borrowed name.

"Well, Zelda, we could try out some of the other swaps. So far we've only done life swaps, we haven't actually changed our bodies at all. Or, I guess we could try to sort out the boyfriend situation."

Viridi thinks the options over.
15212222212.title: Zelda

choices: Swap relationships with a random competitor

152122222122.content:
"Well," she said, "Since you were kinda worried about the whole boyfriend thing before, I think we should probably sort that out first before we experiment more."

"Alright. So, I guess we just swap relationships with someone else who's single so we're not dating anyone anymore," you say, recounting your plan.

"Well, I guess we could do that, if we found two people who were friends so we'd be able to stick together without people thinking something's wrong."

"Do you have a better idea?" you ask in response to her musing over your idea.

"Well, if we manage to find Mario or Link, we could do a relationship or life swap so that we'd be dating, or at least the lives we're in would be. Then we'd have the perfect excuse to hang around together all the time and no one would question it."

You blush a little at her suggestion, thankful that Peach's makeup covered it up even a little. "You're really suggesting that we..."

"Become boyfriend and girlfriend? Well, it helps give us a cover to experiment with the remote." She turned away as she said that. You had a feeling there was more to this than just wanting a cover story, but you didn't want to pry too much. Not yet at least. "Well, you found the remote, it's your choice."
152122222122.title: Sort out the boyfriend situation

1521222221222.content:
"Well, if you think it's a good idea, let's do it," you say, blushing a little harder. Viridi smiles.

"Okay, let's go find one of them then." She takes your hand and starts leading you down the hallways as you look for Link or Mario. As the two of you walk, you can't help but think back on the events of today. This morning you had woken up as Pit, and so it would have stayed until you found that remote. Since finding it, you had become Palutena, in turn turning her into you. Then you discovered those secret buttons, making you and Viridi able to see every swap that occurred, even if you weren't holding the remote. Now, you were Princess Peach and Viridi was Princess Zelda. Peach was Palutena, Palutena was you, and Zelda was Viridi. It was crazy to think about how you had somewhat messed up reality in such as small space of time, jumping from life to life. And now you were going to mess it up a little more. Although it did make you think about how you were going to straighten this all out, if you were going to at all.

"Hey," you ask, "How long are we going to keep these lives?"

"Huh? What do you mean?"

"Well, we only got these lives so we could have a bit more freedom to roam around; there are plenty of other lives with the same freedom. Even my old life has that. And what about when the tournament ends? Are we going to try and get everything back to normal, or are we just going to leave everything as is, and maybe not even go back to our own world?"

Viridi thinks silently for a bit, still walking around looking for Link or Mario. "I dunno," she finally answers. "I guess we'll figure out what we want to do when the time comes. If we find a life we like better than these, we can take it then. And when it's time to leave, we can just see who we want to be and swap before we have to go."

You nod. "Sounds good." Just swapping whenever you wanted, it seemed like an interesting life. Or really, lives, since you didn't need to stick to one life.

"There!" Viridi snaps you out of your thoughts. It seems she's spotted one of your boyfriends. She is pointing at...
1521222221222.title: Swap relationships/lives with Mario or Link

15212222212222.content:
It was Link, who was currently Viridi's boyfriend. "Alright," Viridi says, "Looks like it's up to you to decide. Relationship swap, or life swap."

It was a surprisingly difficult decision to make. A life swap would make you a guy again, and the only thing jumbled up would be lives so you could follow the chain back pretty easily. On the other hand, you had already gone from being Pit, to Palutena, to Peach, all in a matter of minutes. Were you ready to change again so quickly? Maybe you should just stay as Peach for a while and change other things. Viridi did seem to find it amusing that everyone thought you were Peach. You aim the remote at Link, and press the button for a...
15212222212222.title: Link

1521222222.content:
"That dog, he's one of the competitors, right? How come he's not at the newcomer training session?" Down the hallways, where Viridi was pointing, was the dog and duck team known only as Duck Hunt. You found it to be a somewhat odd name, considering they were working together, and not one hunting the other, but that's what the Hands insisted they were called.

"Oh, they only arrived recently, so they're excused from today's training session," you explained, "You're not really thinking of..."

"Well there's two of them," Viridi interrupted, "And we won't draw any attention if everyone just thinks we're a dog and a duck."

"But if we life swap with them we'll be naked, and we probably won't be able to speak properly."

1521322.content:
You end up deciding that a gender swap would probably be interesting, while still keeping things somewhat normal. You peek around the corner, aim the remote at Palutena, and press the gender swap button. With no flashy lights or sounds, everything changed. Palutena was no longer the Goddess of Light, but rather the God of Light. You were viewing her from a distance, and from behind, but she seemed taller, and a little more muscular. Her hair was shorter, and sort of spiky like yours used to be, although it was still green. Her clothing had changed as well, becoming more like a tunic rather than a dress, although it was still adorned with a lot of the gold trinkets she had previously possessed. Her sandals had also lost their heels, becoming simpler and more practical. She still had her staff and shield with her, and was continuing on towards the newcomer training session as if nothing was wrong. Palutena was unaware of the swap.

"Yes!" you whisper excitedly, but noticing that the voice coming from your mouth was undoubtedly a female one. Just as Palutena had becoming male, you had become female. Looking down, you were greeted by two mounds of flesh pushing out from under your tunic, although your tunic had also adjusted itself to your new gender, becoming longer and more like a dress, while still being practical enough for your missions. Your new breasts weren't as large as Palutena's used to be, by they still looked pretty big from your point of view. Your arms and legs had become more slender and feminine, and your nails had been neatly manicured. Your hair was no longer spiked up, and now ran down your back, stopping just between your wings. The strangest part, though, aside from the breasts hanging from your chest, was the emptiness you were feeling between your legs.

"Well, it works," you mutter to yourself, not sure you like how your new voice sounds. This all felt very foreign. It was like you were you, but at the same time you weren't you. Stranger still were your memories. Along with your original memories, you had gained a second set of memories where you had always been female.

This was getting a little too weird for you. You peek around the corner again, looking for Palutena so that you could swap back.

You could kill two birds with one stone by doing a head swap, so Palutena would recognise your face and you'd still get to have a robot body. Of course, some of the other options could work too, but you think these two are your best choices. In the end, you decide to perform a...
1522.title: Mega Man

1523.content: Around the corner was the princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, Peach. The two of you had become unlikely friends during the previous tournament. Perhaps it had had something to do with her filling the void left when you had to go solo without Palutena for the first time in a long while. Regardless of how you had become friends, you were friends now, but that didn't mean you'd be going back on your plan to find someone else to swap with. In fact, Peach made the perfect candidate for swapping because swaps with would certainly end up being obvious and ridiculous. You could always borrow her dress for a while with a clothes swap. Palutena would definitely have a laugh at that one. You could also up the ante by doing a head swap. That way you'd get the dress, but also the body to go with it. You're not sure how you'd feel about losing your wings though. You're sure the other options would provide good results too though. Ultimately, you end up choosing to do a...
1523.title: Peach

15231.content:
You raise your arm to aim the remote at Peach and press the clothes swap button. You didn't really want to mess up Peach too badly, and you weren't sure you wanted to lose your wings yet. A clothes swap should get the desired reaction from Palutena anyway. In an instant, the swap is done. No lightshow or fanfare, it just happens. Peach is now walking down the hallway dressed in your tunic. She even has your sandals on her feet and your laurel on her head. It was amazing to see the change happen so instantly, and Peach treating her now outfit as if it was completely normal and she had been wearing it her whole life. It actually didn't look to bad on her.

As for you, however, you probably looked as ridiculous as you had hoped for. Just as Peach had received all your clothing in the swap, you had received all of her's. From the pink dress and heels, to the crown and large earrings, to the white gloves and silky underwear you could feel under the dress, it was certainly a very different experience to what you were used to wearing. You could even feel what you assumed to be makeup on your face. Looking at your back, you find that the dress has not only adjusted to fit your smaller male body, but it has also adjusted to allow your wings to come out the back. You let Peach go about her business, and go off to go find Palutena. Whereas you would have been running to find her before, somehow you knew exactly how fast you could walk in your new heels without hurting yourself or tripping. Not being able to walk in heels was the main issue you saw with taking Peach's clothes, but now that the remote had helped you out there you saw no real downside to keeping Peach's clothes for an indefinite period of time. Maybe you'd even keep it after the tournament when you went back to your own world, it was certainly comfortable enough.

After a while of walking around looking for Palutena, all the excitement from the remote starts to wear off and your exhaustion from your earlier flying starts to come back, and the heels certainly aren't helping. You figure there was no real rush, you'd see Palutena in a few hours at dinner time anyway, and if she could see through the changes, she'd come see you if she saw Peach. The thought of going back to your room to rest for a bit is looking very good right now. But you do still want to know the extent of the remote's powers of deception. You don't want to go making a complete mess of yourself with swaps only to have Palutena know about the swaps and scold you for messing everyone up. You end up deciding to...
15231.title: Clothes Swap

choices: Get bored and go do something.
152311.content:
You head back up to your room to relax a bit and maybe get your energy back. It'll be interesting to see how you look anyway. Opening the door, you are glad to see your roommate, Fox, wasn't here. That'd let you explore the changes without him asking what you were doing. The first change you notice as soon as you walk into the room is that your bow that had been sitting in the corner of the room has been replaced with Peach's parasol. You figure that means you're going to be fighting in close range in the tournament then. A pair of your tights that had been sitting on top of the washing pile were now a pair of pink panties. Your other weapons on the shelf had been replaced with Peach's frying pan and golf club. Peeking inside you wardrobe, you notice that all of your clothes, not just the ones you had been wearing, had been replaced with Peach's. You even have the palette swaps of her dress replacing your palette swap clothes.

You go inside the bathroom to check the full length mirror, but the first thing you notice in there is the variety of makeup littered around the sink. You suppose that's yours now, and if your experience with the heels is anything to go by, you should know how to apply it. Ignore that for now, you close the door so you can see the full length mirror on the back of it. Just as you would have assumed from looking down at yourself, you are wearing Princess Peach's complete outfit. You hadn't noticed when looking down at yourself, but the bra actually created two small bumps on your chest. If your hair had been longer, you would have sworn the person you were looking at in the mirror was a girl. The outfit would probably have worked better if you had blonde hair like Peach, but you weren't planning on dying it any time soon. Since you had still been wearing the heels, you kick them off and lie down on your bed. You had originally just planned to borrow Peach's clothes to test out if Palutena could see the swaps, but now you weren't sure you wanted to give them back.
152311.title: Rest in your room

1523111.content:
You were bored, but you knew that nothing will be solved if you just lied down on your bed. You didn't want to go around swapping with people at the moment and you weren't interested in working out at the gym because while you liked the dress and all, you weren't sure if you wanted to wear it all day especially with the heels.

So you decided to go take a look at your wardrobe to see if there's anything more practical you could wear. Among st the outfits in the wardrobe you find several dresses identical to the one you're currently wearing, only colored differently - fairly standard among st contestants. You find several garments for sports - all pink. Your favorite color wasn't pink but you had to make do with what you had.

Among the latter outfits, you find a leotard, a short tennis dress, a t-shirt and athletic shorts, and a few go-karting outfits. You decided to wear the t-shirt and shorts combo as it's the most practical. But first you had to take the dress off, you quickly ran over to the bathroom for privacy. You slowly feel your way around your body, tugging the dress. "I need to get this off..." you mutter, and you finally just pull it over your head, throwing it to the ground. You further struggle with the leggings and all of the other trappings of your dress. Now you were down to your underwear which consists of a frilly pair of panties and a bra.

You quickly put on the t-shirt and shorts, they feel a lot more simple/practical compared to the dress you just took off. You quickly scan yourself over in the mirror with your new outfit, and notice that you look slightly more masculine with them on. Obviously, it's because the t-shirt and shorts show off a bit more of your muscles. The t-shirt is also adjusted to allow your wings to come out of the back just like Peach's dress.

Now then, since you don't have any fights to go to for a day or two, you could go show off the remote to Viridi or Palutena. You haven't seen Viridi much since she originally came to the mansion but you could go see Palutena as you originally planned.
1523111.title: Get bored and go do something.

choices: You finish talking to Peach and go look for Palutena
Peach notices the remote in your hand
15232.content:
You aim the remote at Peach, press the button, and in an instant you are standing in the hallway where Peach was. No lights, no fanfare, just your head suddenly appearing on Peach's body. It felt very different to have Peach's body under your neck. Not a bad different, but it would definitely take a bit of getting used to. Now you just needed to find Palutena and see if she noticed anything out of the ordinary.

"Hi Pit!" Since you had been peeking around the corner when you swapped, that put Peach where you were. And when Peach was put there, she saw you, and decided to say hi. It caught you a little off guard, but you soon relax knowing she should see nothing out of the ordinary with this head swapped situation.

"Hey Peach. How's it going?"

"Pretty good." You can't help but smile at this odd situation. Peach's head didn't seem too ut of place on your body. It still looked a bit weird, but not as weird as you probably looked.
15232.title: Head Swap

choices: Peach lets you go find Palutena
Peach wants to play around with the remote more
152322.content:
"Hey, what's that?" Peach asks, pointing at your hand which had the remote in it. You freeze. You had been so worried that Peach might notice the swap that you didn't even think about her noticing the remote.

"Um, it's nothing," you say nervously, trying to but it behind your back.

"Piiiiit. What are you hiding?" she asks in a teasing tone. You knew she wasn't going to give up on this, so you might as well come clean.

You hold it up for her to see. "It's, um, this remote I found in the hallway."

"What does it do?" She looks at it curiously.

"It can swap different aspects of people around, like their bodies or their clothes, but it makes it so no one will be able to see the change, or they'll just think it's normal or something, if you have the right setting on."

"Cool! Have you swapped anything yet?" Peach looks really excited by this. You wonder how she'll react to knowing that you used the remote on her, but you figure you should tell her anyway.

"Yeah. Actually, you were the first person I tested it on."

She gasps. "Really?" She starts looking over herself for something that seems different, but finds nothing wrong, since the remote changed reality so she thought she always had your body. "Is there a setting that can make me see the swap?"

You think back to the manual, and how Swap Mode 2 makes the target also aware of the swap, but still makes everyone else unaware. "I think there is. I'll just need to swap us back on this mode and then switch us again on another mode."

"Okay! Please do." She waits patiently for you to do it. You point the remote at Peach and press head swap again, putting you back on your own body. Peach makes a confused expression, thinking nothing has happened, before she realises that the remote just made her think nothing happened. Then, you press the button labeled 2, and press head swap again.

This time when your heads swap, Peach makes an incredibly shocked expression, looking all over at her body, or more accurately, your body below her neck. "Wow! This is amazing!"

"I know right?" You can't help but laugh at her enthusiasm. And now you're not afraid to react because she actually knows what's going on.

Peach gives your wings an experimental flap, something she is amazed by. She turns you you and asks, "So, everyone else thinks it's normal for us to have eachother's bodies?"

"Uh huh. Well, since you didn't notice it before I think so."

"Um, if I hadn't come and talked to you, how long do you think you would have kept my body?"

"I... I don't know. I was really just looking to swap something obvious so I could test if even gods like Palutena would be unaware of the swaps. I guess I would have just kept it until I felt like trying something else out."

"Well, if that's the case... can I maybe keep your body for a while? I'm liking how it feels to have wings, even if I can't fly with them."

You are honestly surprised by this. Why would Peach want your body? She had a great one of her own. Although you suppose she did state her reason, the wings. Still, if Peach wanted to have your body, that'd mean you could keep her's, and you certainly had no objections to that at the moment. "Um, sure."

Peach's face lights up with excitement. She pulls you into a tight hug, which feels a little weird with her body pressing up again your new breasts. "Yay! Thank you!"

"Hehe, no problem." The two of you looked like a bit of an odd pair with your heads on each other's bodies, but you were both having fun so you didn't really care. "So, what should we do now?"
152322.title: Peach notices the remote in your hand

1523222.content:
"Is there a way for people who aren't involved in the swap to be aware of swaps?" Peach asked. You think you knew where she was going with this.

"Yeah, if someone else holds onto the remote while you do a swap, they'll be aware of the swap too. Do you want to go have a little fun trying out the remote on other people?"

She nods. "Yep! You let me in on one swap, but now I kinda want to see what else it can do."

"Hehe, okay then. This can be our little secret. Let's go find someone to swap with." Peach seems very excited as the two of your walk down the hallway to find someone you could try the remote on. You were actually liking the idea of sharing this experience with someone else. That way you wouldn't just have to think about what you could do, or laugh about the results, in private, you could actually talk about it with someone. While looking around, you hear Peach giggling to herself as she looks at your body (which was actually Peach's body, but you were thinking of it as yours since you were going to be keeping it until either you or Peach felt like swapping it back). "What's so funny?" you ask.

"Hehehe. It's just, you're walking the way I used to walk. Hips swaying and everything." You look down at your body as you walk, and find that she's right. You are in fact walking with a very feminine wiggle in your hips. Not only that, but you realised that despite having never worn them in your life, you are somehow walking perfectly in Peach's high heels.

"Heh, I guess I am. This remote really does do some amazing stuff." Peach is still laughing a bit as you come across someone who could very well be your test subject. That person is...
1523222.title: Peach wants to play around with the remote more

15232221.content:
You hold a hand up in front of Peach to getting her to stop. She looks a little confused, before she looks up and sees what you see. Peach's boyfriend, Mario, had just turned into the hallway, and he had his back to the two of you, which made it a perfect opportunity to try and do a swap with him. You point the remote at Mario and and offer it to Peach.

"Here, you can pick which swap you want to do." She also puts a hand on the remote, so no matter which of you swapped, you'd both be aware of it. She points to the button with a sillouette of two hands holding eachother.

"What does that one do?" she asks.

"That's the relationship swap button. It swaps your relationships with people, like your friends, rivals, even your boyfriend of girlfriend. So like, if I swapped that with Link, Zelda would be my girlfriend and Ganondorf would be my mortal enemy. I think it also swaps your position in the relationship."

"So then, if I did this..." She presses the button while the remote is pointed at Mario. It gives no indication that it worked. "I'd be friends with all of Mario's friends, and he'd be friends with mine? And instead of being my boyfriend, he'd be my girlfriend?"

"I think so. You'd have to check with one of your friends who was unaware of the swap. Although I think that means we aren't really friends now."

"You weren't friends with Mario?"

"Not really. We just didn't click."

"Well, I guess you can swap relationships with one of Mario's friends so then we'd be friends again." She suddenly gets a very sly grin her face as she realises something, and speaks in a very teasing tone. "Oooooorrr, you could swap relationships with Mario, and become my girlfriend." She winks at you as she says this.

You can't help but blush at this. Peach was clearly a bit older than you, at least in terms of your physical age, and she seemed to be in a very happy relationship with Mario. Why was she suggesting that she give that up and let you become her partner? Was the remote affecting her mind? No, that couldn't be it. The manual promised that your personality wouldn't be affected. Maybe she actually had a crush on you and her relationship with Mario had gotten stale? You really had to think about what you wanted, but you also had to make your decision before Mario left, in case you did want to get Peach's relationships from him.

If you swapped relationships with one of Mario's friends, then you'd be friends with Peach again and things would be normal in that regard, but you'd also have a completely different set of friends, and possibly some other kind of relationship. It really depended on which of Mario's friends you chose to swap with. On the other hand, you knew exactly what you'd be getting into if you swapped relationships with Mario. You'd end up being Peach's girlfriend, but you'd also end up losing some of you old friends, being replaced with friendships with mostly the female participants of the tournament. Peach did have friends outside of just the girls, but she did seem to spend the most time with them. Not that you'd mind, you were mostly a girl now anyway. After a lot of thinking, you decide to swap relationships with...
15232221.title: Mario

152322211.content:
You say to yourself, "Why not." Making sure Peach's hand is still on the remote, you point it at Mario and press the relationship swap button. Once again, nothing seems to have changed.

"Well, I guess that makes us boyfriend and girlfriend then," Peach says as if this sort of thing was an everyday occurrence.

"Yeah, I guess it does." You can't help but blush at the thought. You can't believe that with the click of a button, you've suddenly become Peach's boy... er, girlfriend. Peach notices your blush and giggles, before giving you a kiss on the cheek. This, of course, just makes you blush even harder.

"Is there any real way we can check if it actually worked?"

"Well, we could go talk to someone to see how they treat us. Or we could just go look for some 'physical evidence' like a letter or something."

Peach thinks for a bit, which gives you time to look over her current form. You had earlier thought her head didn't look too out of place on your body, but the longer you look, the more you think she might look just as ridiculous as you do. With her long blonde hair, her princess crown and earrings, and her makeup, her head doesn't really fit. You prefer it this way though, so that you're looking at Peach's face on your body instead of your looking at a copy of yourself. Although you do now wonder how it would look if you completely had eachother's outfits, instead of just what was worn below the neck.

Peach snaps you out of your daze as she suddenly exclaims, "Oh, I know! C'mon, I'll show you." She takes you by the arm and starts running in the direction that you presume leads to the garden. At least, that's what you can tell from where you're headed, and the fact that you're supposedly headed somewhere where there'll be evidence of your relationships changing. As you ran alongside Peach, you once again marveled at how well you were moving around in Peach's heels and dress. If you had simply worn her clothes without the remote to help you adjust, you would be tripping over the hem of the dress and wobbling in her heels, probably hurting your ankle. This way, not only were you able to try out these sorts of things without any long term consequences, but you don't have to take a long time adjusting to them.

Just as you had suspected, Peach leads you to the garden, and over to a specific tree. "When I joined the tournament, Mario and I carved something into this tree." She walks around the tree, looking for the carving. "There!" You walk around to where she was standing, and find a heart carved into the tree, with the letters "P&P" inside it. "When Mario and I carved it, it had 'M&P' in it, for 'Mario and Peach'. I guess now it stands for 'Peach and Pit'."

"We really did swap relationships then." You can't help but smile a little. This remote had truly changed your life, and if you didn't like it, you could just change it again. Peach gives you a hug from behind.

"Looks like you really are my girlfriend now."

"Yeah, I guess I am." The two of you just stand there for a little while, enjoying the moment under these odd circumstances. After a while, you start to move around the remote in your hand, and ask, "So, what should we do now? I think I'm pretty happy with where our lives are at right now."

"Yeah, me too. I don't think I want to change anything about us just yet. Although, I guess we could still use ourselves as a middle step to swap two other people and mess with them."

"We could get some pretty funny results with that. Although we could just put the remote away for now and enjoy our life as it is for a while."

"Hm, I'm fine with either. You can choose."
152322211.title: Mario

choices: Everything was the same, even to Peach, but she had found something
Peach had a list of swaps she thinks would be fun
1523222112.content:
Pit looked down of his pink dress clad, princess body, and over to his... Boyfriends angel body. "I want to enjoy this life for a little while."
"Okay, honey," She smiled sweetly, bending over slightly to kiss you on the cheek, and taking hold of your gloved hand, "What should we do?" She asks while dragging you with your stronger body. "Oh, we could go to our couples room!"

Not far from there, Peach had slowed down a little so you were walking on your own, but Peach still had a hold on your dainty hand, and you were still amazed with how ell you were moving in hi-heels. You were stood outside the door, which had on the slide Peach and Pit. Peach giggled, "Even more evidence," and entered. Inside it the room was the necessities for two, like other rooms, but had one large bed, and it had all of Peach's Dresses and arsenal, which now belong to you, and your possessions, which now Belong to to Peach, except Headgear.
Peach let go of your hand, and it fell by you side, she turned on the heel of her sandal, "So Pit," she winks, and then jumping backwards onto the bed, "What do you want to do?"
Pit walked over to her, causing peach to grin slightly at how you walk, laying down and resting a head on Peach chest. Pit though about the situation, he was currently, laying on a couples bed, resting a head on his boyfriend's, Princess Peach, chest, which was his own, as the man in the relationship, if you could call him the man with a princesses body, he should be the one being rested on. But Pit disregarded the thought, as because of the remote, he couldn't say what normal was. Peach took hold of the remote, and smiled a little, "Don't swap without me," Pit said drowsily. Peach turned to him, smiled, and shook her head as Pit feel asleep. When Pit woke up...

152332.content:
You point the remote at Peach and press the life swap button. Instantly you are transported down the hallway to where Peach was. Looking down, you find you still have your own body, but it is now dressed in Peach's clothes. Her dress, gloves, heels, jewelry, you could even feel her makeup on your face. It was an odd experience to say the least. But that wasn't the only part of the swap.

"Hi Peach," you hear Peach's voice say behind you. Turning around, you see Peach dressed in your clothes coming around the corner where you had been before. Since she referred to you by her own name, it would seem she thought she was you, as the manual had promised.

"Hi Pit," you reply, feeling a little odd calling her by your own name. You had originally intended to go find Palutena as soon as you did the swap, but with Peach right here you couldn't exactly just run off without giving her a good reason.
