1523322.title: Peach (in your life) notices the remote in your...

153.content:
You are Donkey Kong, the hero of DK Island. You have been a participant in the tournaments since the very beginning, being joined by your best friend Diddy Kong since the third tournament. You had been heading to the gym to get in some more training. That was, before you felt your foot bump into something on the floor. Looking down, you saw a strange package with a picture of a remote on it. Your curiosity piqued, you opened the box right there in the hallway.

You examined the strange book that came out of the box. It had some writing apparently corresponding to the pictures on it. While you couldn't speak the language, you could certainly read it well enough. According to the manual, the remote was capable of switching bodies, heads, even lives. While you didn't quite know how any of that would work, you were curious about the small remote that looked like a toy in your giant hands.

You then heard footsteps. Making sure to stand in a way that obscured the box from view, you peeked around the corner and decided that you would switch with...
153.title: Donkey Kong

1531.content: Peering around the corner, you noticed the Wii Fit Trainer. But which gender was it?
1531.title: Wii Fit Trainer

1533.content: Peering around the corner, you noticed the half-dragon prince, Corrin. But which gender was it?
1533.title: Corrin

154.content:
You are the electric mouse Pokemon, Pikachu. As one of the earliest competitors in these tournaments, you had grown used to the events that generally came before the actual fighting. You had already caught up with some old friends and intended to do some training, but in the meantime you were heading off to the leisure room.

Rather, you were; until you found yourself face-to-face with an abandoned package someone left on the ground (being only about a foot and a half tall had its advantages and disadvantages sometimes). Inside, there appeared to be a remote, along with a manual describing its usage. Glancing over the booklet, you're surprised to learn what the purpose of this object truly is.

Dragging the box back to your room, you wonder about the capabilities of your find. While you had long believed that such feats could only be done by Arceus himself, it wouldn't surprise you if the Hands had decided to include something this powerful to the tournament (after all, they made use of Manaphy's Heart Swap ability in the last tournament, so the idea sounded similar). But at the same time, there wasn't any way that this thing could change everything without anything noticing. So of course you had to test it and make sure that it could do what it said. Just to make sure.

While the fact that Lucario did not appear to be in your shared room made the process of storing the box and manual unnoticed rather easier, it did mean that you were out of a test subject. Not that those were exactly hard to find. In fact, if you just went about your day you were certain that you would eventually find someone to try the remote out on. In fact, you could hear footsteps approaching right now, and you were fairly sure that the results would be interesting regardless of who it was.

Looking across the hallway, you aim the remote at...
154.title: Pikachu

1543.content: What did you end up doing, a head swap, a body swap, a life swap, or clothes swap? You know Pikachu would look cute in Zelda's clothes. Well what do you want?
1543.title: Zelda

15431.content: So is it a head swap or body swap? Either way, Pikachu can gain access to the royal life as a result.
15431.title: Headswap/Bodyswap

choices: Find a way to swap back
154311.content:
Suddenly you found your furry head on top of Zelda's elegant body with the remote still in your hands. You look down and saw the Hyrulian Princess looking shocked and distracted with your fur at the same time. She looks up at you as you were surprised for what just happened.

"Pikachu, is that you? Why am I'm all furry and cute?" said Zelda.

Because you don't speak human, you only replied with a pika.

"That remote" noticed Zelda, "Maybe that caused it. As much as I want to keep this body, I'm afraid we need to swap back. We don't want to upset anyone."

As a Pikachu, this sort of means freedom from being captured by the humans. You can just say that you are Zelda and Ganondorf cursed you again. It's fool proof. Then again, you are not that evil. So in the end...
154311.title: head swap

15432.content: So shall it be a life swap or a clothing swap?
15432.title: Lifeswap/Clothes swap

155.content: Okay, you're not any of the first 8 characters revealed for the tournament. Might as well continue in order. You are...
155.title: More Characters

1551.content:
You are the ferocious king of the koopa clan, Bowser. You were just heading to the gym after a rather late lunch to do a little workout. You loved the Smash tournament. It let you beat up on Mario and other pesky heroes, and no one would get mad at you for doing so. While thinking about this, you don't notice a package on the floor, and end up kicking it. Having not expected it, it startles you a little, but seeing what you kicked, you grin.

"Finders, keepers," you mumble to yourself, as you go and pick the box up. Looking through the contents of the box, you find a strange looking remote and an instruction manual. You quickly flip through the instruction manual with one hand, holding the box in the other. It seemed to say the remote was capable of altering reality or something. Now this definitely interested you. Maybe you could finally beat Mario. Maybe Peach would finally be yours!

Unfortunately the remote didn't merely alter anything you wanted, it swapped things between people. You still think it might be interesting to try and maybe it could give you the edge against Mario. Even more unfortunate was the fact that it seemed your fingers were a little large for the buttons. You could always try pressing the buttons with your claws, but you didn't want to accidentally have your claw go through the remote and touch the inside workings of the remote. Who knows how much that would screw you up with its reality altering powers. For now you figure you'll just try to press the buttons with your fingers and hope you press the right one. You decide you'll test it out on the first person you see, since you don't even know if it works yet, and you can always swap back if you do something bad... hopefully. Heading around the corner of the hallway, you notice someone else up the other end of the hallway with their back to you. Looks like you have your test subject, and it's...
1551.title: Bowser

15511.content:
Mario! That annoying, little plumber had always seemed to get everything you wanted especially peach and it was if he was slanted to always win against you as some cruel joke of fate. But now you had the power to take that all away from him. It seemed almost fitting that he'd be your first target. "Oh hi Bowser!" Mario said waving his gloved hand as he walked past completely ignoring the fact that you were mortal enemies!

looking at the device in your hand you began to think exactly how you'd go about using the remote, deciding the ultimate goal would be making peach yours and disgracing the name of Mario. The body and head swap options seemed less than ideal. You were proud of your muscular reptilian body and had no desire to become anything like that little runt. But maybe it could be useful maybe peach actually found Mario attractive? who knows maybe that will be what he needs to win peach over and you could go masquerading as Mario for a while.
15511.title: Mario

15512.content:
Peach was not the person you wanted to see. You considered going back on what you decided about using the remote on the first person you saw. You wanted to use the remote to get together with Peach, not to swap something with Peach. However, you soon realised that this could work out in your favor. If you swapped lives with Peach, you could pretend to be her and break up with Mario, then get together with your old life. Maybe then if you swapped back into your own life, Peach would still be interested in you. Although really you wouldn't even need to switch back, you could just stay as Peach and leave Peach in your life, at least you'd still be together with Peach. The only problem then would be that you'd have to deal with being friends with the girls instead of the villains. Regardless, you decide it's a good idea to try, and press your large finger on the life swap button and hope you don't nudge any other button and it performs that swap instead.

Which swap activates?
15512.title: Peach

1551221.content: With the awkward way you were holding the remote, your arm nudges the body swap button while you're pressing the life swap button, so the first one activates instead. Without any warning like a sounds or light, reality suddenly changes. Now you're still looking at Peach, but now Peach looks exactly like you, only wearing her clothes. Your eyes practically pop out of your head at this sight. You look ridiculous in Peach's clothes, although it's not really you its Peach with your body, and it's definitely not a sight you wanted to see. Seeing that Peach has your body, you look down at yourself, and your eyes near pop out again. Your body has been replaced with Peach's, but since you didn't wear any clothes except for your collar and arm bands, you were now looking at Peach's near naked body, and blushing madly. With Peach's smaller fingers you could certainly press the buttons easier and you could swap back, but now you weren't sure you wanted to. You could still go through with your plan to break Mario and Peach up and get Peach together with you, but now even if that failed, you could look at Peach naked now whenever you wanted. Still, if your plan did work, you weren't sure you wanted to be dating your own body. You also felt a lot weaker and more frail inside of Peach's body. It was a big change from your manly Koopa frame. Right now you decide to go through with your plan to try and life swap with Peach again, while...
1551221.title: Body Swap

15512211.content:
Using his new, dexterous fingers, Bowser clicks the life swap button and suddenly finds Peach's body reclothed. "Well... I can remove them later," he decides, a bit disturbed by how high pitched his voice had become.

As far as anyone could tell now, Bowser was truly Princess Peach. Even Peach herself no longer knew who she was, as she believed herself to be King of the Koopas. Bowser was blown away by the power of this device as he began to run his gloved hands through his new hair and pat down his new curves. "Amazing."

However, he realized that the hallway was a bad place to be so 'adventurous'. He didn't want people to get too suspicious, so he swiftly walked off to a more secluded area, Peach's room. It seemed to be empty, so he had all the time he needed to plan and have fun.

He looked at himself in the mirror for the first time, noting his new make-up and jewelery. He gave his new rear and chest a few long squeezes and laughed. "This is the ultimate kidnapping!" Bowser exclaimed with glee. "I didn't steal Peach, I stole her body, and even she doesn't know it!"

He gives a little jump for joy, but quickly cuts the festivities. He's still the Koopa King! This is very serious! Now he can execute his plan perfectly. Using Peach's body, he can easily have her break up with Mario. And since Peach thinks she's him, he doesn't have to worry about convincing her of anything. And he has all the time he wants to 'have fun' in the middle as well.
15512211.title: Keeping her body

155122112.content:
First things first: this outfit has to go. Peach is beautiful and all, but so long as you're her you aren't going to be wearing a dress. You may have the body of a princess, but you have the heart of a king. It'll help you feel more at home.

With the remote control in your gloved, dainty hand you march into the hallway in a rather unrefined manner, making loud stomps along the way. You clicked all the way to the main hall in Peach's heels and took a long gander across the room, scoping out some targets. In addition to claiming THEIR clothing and items, you'd have the added satisfaction of watching them walk around in Peach's dress, so this was fun all around!

Whose clothes do you switch with?
155122112.title: Have fun first

1551221121.content:
Out of the targets you had spotted, you decide to swap with Lucina. She may still be a princess, but her outfit was a lot more practical than Peach's dress and heels. Not to mention you'd get a pretty good sword out of the swap too. You aim the remote at her and press the clothes swap button. Just as quickly as the other swaps had occurred, you now find yourself wearing Lucina's clothes, her sword sheathed at your hip. Taking your attention away from yourself, you hold in a feminine giggle as you see Lucina now wearing Peach's outfit, looking a lot less like a battle-ready warrior and more like a damsel in distress.

"What to do now," you ponder, starting to get used to Peach's feminine voice coming out of your mouth. You had taken Peach's life, and her body, and now you also had Lucina's clothes. You did have a plan you could go through with, but now that you were Peach, you could do that any time. Perhaps you could still have a little more fun before proceeding, with your new body or the remote.
1551221121.title: Lucina

15512211212.content: You could break Peach and Mario up anytime you wanted since you were Peach right now. For now you could have some fun. It was then that you saw Ganondorf enter the main hall. He had become your good friend since you both joined the tournament at the same time. Like you, he was also trying to take over the kingdom from the universe he belonged to. Also like you, he also frequently resorted to kidnapping his universe's princess. You consider letting him in on the remote to help him with his plans. You decide to...
15512211212.title: Have some more fun first

15512212.content: As much as you liked being able to see Peach's body naked whenever you wanted, you didn't like how small and weak you felt while in Peach's body. Saying goodbye to the lovely view you got from looking down, you aim the remote at Peach and press the body swap button, finding it to be much easier with Peach's smaller fingers, and find yourself back in your rightful body. You noticed that while you had been freaking out about pressing the wrong button, Peach had continued on her way to wherever she was going. In fact, you'd probably only get one more shot at swapping with her before she was too far away. Now you somewhat regretted swapping back to your own body, because that mean you once again had fingers too large to easily press the buttons. Hoping you wouldn't screw up, you aim at Peach and attempt to press the life swap button.
15512212.title: Getting your own body back

155122122.content: "Why hello bowser!" ganondorf suddenly cried. Startled, you pressed the wrong button. Which button was it?
155122122.title: You screw up again

choices: She's still in the hallway- you can try again
She's disappeared- you're stuck like this for now
15512221.content:
Thanks to the size of your fingers, you end up pushing the clothes swap button before the life swap, so instead of finding yourself in Peach's place, you suddenly find that the two of you have switched outfits. And to be honest, it's a bit of a dilemma.

On one hand, Peach was wearing nothing but your collar and armbands, and you really do appreciate the view.

On the other, you look and feel ridiculous. While the size of her clothing had adjusted to fit your frame, you felt odd in her dress and heels, and you're fairly certain that you're wearing her bra and panties as well. From what you can tell, you even have her makeup and crown.

Most importantly, this couldn't possibly help your plan. While obtaining Peach's clothes would have been part of the life swap, everyone still sees you as yourself, and your hands are still large enough that you're not completely sure that whatever button you press will be the right one. But before you try anything else, you're pretty sure that you should try to switch back first.

You point the remote up at Peach and-

Where is Peach, anyway?
15512221.title: Clothes Swap

155122221.content:
Within second, you find yourself further down the hallway, where Peach had been standing. You though it had worked, but how small your hand looked told you otherwise. Looking down at yourself, you could tell you certain didn't still have your own body. You had Peach's feminine body, clothed in her outfit. You weren't entirely sure what went wrong, until you feel your head, and realise it was still your own, and not Peach's. You had accidentally performed a head swap instead of a life swap. Everyone still thought you were Bowser, but now you had Peach's body below your neck. It was definitely more than a little strange.

"Good afternoon, Bowser," you hear Peach say behind you. You turn around to see Peach's head on top of your large, reptilian body, giving a somewhat dainty wave with your clawed hand. You give a small wave back. Even with how frequently you tried to kidnap her, Peach was still very polite to you outside of kidnappings. As she stomps past you, heading to wherever it was she was heading before you swapped with her, you realise this is your chance to swap again. With Peach's smaller fingers, you could easily make sure you pressed the button you wanted to press. But on the other hand, it felt rather strange to have your head stuck on Peach's body, and it looked strange having Peach's head on yours. You aim the remote at Peach, and the the button for a...
155122221.title: Head Swap

1552.content:
You as the oddly named child from the town of Smashville, Villager. You were currently heading over to the garden to plant a new sapling before you had to go train with the other newcomers. Unfortunately, there happened to be a small parcel in the hallway which you tripped over, dropping the sapling. You frown when you see the pot you were carrying the sapling in has smashed. Looks like planting will have to wait. You put the sapling in your pocket to prevent further harm, and take a look at the package you tripped over.

Inside there is a strange looking TV remote and an instruction manual that no doubt explains how to use it. You read the manual on your way over to the Boxing Ring stage whether you and the other newcomers were going to train. The remote could apparently alter reality in interesting ways, and you'd be the only one who knew, unless you changed the setting. This struck you as a great opportunity. You didn't want to mess with your friends too much, but you really did want to try some things out. You could always swap things back if things get a little crazy.

When you make it to the stage, you see that most of the other newcomers are already there, but you're certainly not late. You had wanted to try out the remote, but you didn't run into anyone on the way here, so now seemed like the perfect opportunity to you. Since you were a boy, you wanted to try something interesting by switching with one of the girls. Mega Man, Pac-Man, and Greninja would have also been interesting, but they didn't seem to be here yet (Although Greninja could very well just be hiding in the shadows).

You weighed up your options. Wii Fit Trainer, or Fit as you called her, was a very good friend to you. You were both newcomers in the tournament, and everyone seemed to underestimate you. By sticking together, you eventually got everyone to realise that you were just as worthy a fighter as the other competitors in the tournament. Rosalina, the princess from outer space, was a very kind, motherly person. You personally thought she was very pretty. Palutena, the goddess who seemed to taunt Pit a lot, was the most recent newcomer. If you managed to get some of her powers, you were sure no one would ever underestimate you again. In the end, you decided to swap with...
1552.title: Villager

choices: Talk to Fit, either gain a partner in this, or miss out on this opportunity
15521.content:
You pointed the remote a Fit, and thought about what the swap, but the more your thought, the more this didn't feel right. Wii fit trainer was a close friend, swapping without her permission, whether she knew about it or not, just didn't see like the right thing to do, and it could be more fun to do it with someone else in on the swaps.
So you took a couple steps closers while lowering the remote, then another thought came to mind, she was quite a by the book person, and at time strict, so she might refuse to swap, and might even force you to return or destroy the remote.
During this conflict, you had a flashback, showing how you are constantly working and doing things for the good of others, maybe it was time for you to be a little selfish, and doing it for yourself.
You questioned yourself "What should I do?"
15521.title: Wii Fit Trainer

155211.content:
"I can't do it without Fit's permission," You say, walking over, thinking of the best to sell the idea of swapping to the wii fit trainer.
You were stood by her, "Hey, Fit," you say getting her attention, she turned to you, "Hi, Villager. What that in your hand, I've never seen a remote like that,"
You sigh, and think about the best way to explain it, "Fit, I found this remote and it allow the user to do a swap with anyone, while everyone else remains unaware."
Wii fit trainer looked both interested, and concerned, "Have you swapped yet?" She asked, looking over her self, for anything out of place, she gave the expression that she had lost trust in someone close.
You shook your head, "No, but I was going to swap with you, but I didn't want to feel like I betray you." Fit gave a sigh of relief, "If you want to swap with me, I'm okay with it, but I want know about the swap."
You nodded with a thank you, and told her to hold onto the remote.
She took hold of the remote and you swapped...
155211.title: Talk to Fit, either gain a partner in this, or ...

155212.content:
After a moment of thought, you decide to go for it. It'll be just for a moment, after all: you justify to yourself. Then you can switch back right after.

Now, how do you choose to swap with the Wii Fit Trainer?
155212.title: Be selfish and swap

1553.content: You weren't any of those. You are...
1553.title: More Characters

choices: Keep the remote as is and go try it out
Destroy the remote to add the swapping to your coding
15531.content:
You are the super fighting robot, Mega Man, or at least an older model thereof. You had actually been out of commission for a long while before the Hands requested your participation in the tournament. You had just had a training session together with the other newcomers and were now heading back to your room to relax for a while by yourself, since you knew your roommate, Villager, wouldn't be heading back to the room for a while. In the hallway leading to your room, however, you find a mysterious parcel sitting abandoned on the floor. Since there didn't seem to be anyone around who could have dropped it, you decide to pick it up and take it into your room.

You sit down on the bed and examine the contents of the parcel. Inside is a device that looks like some sort of TV remote and a manual that likely explains what the device is. After reading through the manual, you are amazed by what it does. For robots such as yourself, it shouldn't be too hard for anyone with a decent knowledge in robotics you take apart two robots and put them back together with eachother's heads, or program two robots to make them think they were eachother. However, that would be far from the instantaneous switch the manual promised. Not only that, it supposedly worked on anyone, including living beings. Perhaps it could even mix and match and put your robot head on a biological body. This was something you definitely wanted to see for yourself.

You are about to get up and test it out on someone, but another idea strikes you. If you had to take the remote with you everywhere if you wanted to perform swaps, it might eventually be seen and someone would demand an answer. However, you had a very special way of fighting, the variable weapons system. With this, you would be able to utilise the weapon of any defeated foe, and in fact, that was how you had pieced together your moveset for the tournament. Theoretically, if you shot and destroyed the remote as you would a robot master, you might be able to copy the remote's reality altering properties into your own coding. You would do so without thinking, if not for the fact that it may not even work, or if it did the functionality you receive might be limited to only one mode or only a few different types of swaps. Even if it did work completely, you were worried you'd get carried away with the swapping and find yourself in a situation you are unable to return from. For instance, a life swap transferred all skills required to be a certain person to the person now occupying the life, and that would include all your various weapons. If you were to perform a life swap through your variable weapons system, you would have no way of returning to your old life or performing more swaps, as the remote would be destroyed and its functionality would be trapped inside whoever was in your old life.

You way up the pros and cons of keeping the remote as is and destroying it to add it to your variable weapons system. After carefully considering the options, you decide to...
15531.title: Mega Man

155311.content: Deciding you don't like the risk of getting stuck inside of someone else's life permanently, you keep the remote as a remote and decide to go find someone to swap with. Luckily, there are two perfect candidates right outside your door, as two of your fellow newcomers are entering their rooms nearby. On your left, the beautiful princess of the stars, Rosalina. On your right, the stealthy water/dark type pokemon, Greninja. Each could make for some interesting swaps, but for now you decide to start with...
155311.title: Keep the remote as is and go try it out

1553111.content: You decide that Rosalina will be your first subject. Thinking over each swap, you decide that head swap may be the best decision in this situation. This way you can experience what it feels like to be human, as well as test the limits of the remote by seeing if it can combine your mechanical head with a biological body, and vice versa. You could also have done a body swap to see what it feels like to be human, but since you are a robot and don't wear clothes, that would leave you in Rosalina's body, naked, and you feel like that might be invading her privacy. That said, just because this might be the best option, doesn't mean it's the option you want to try out. You decide to try a...
1553111.title: Rosalina

155311122.content: How about the life swap button?
155311122.title: More swap choices?

choices: Swap back to your own life.
1553111221.content:
You aimed the remote at Rosalina and pressed the Life Swap button. In an instant you found yourself in Rosalina's place, wearing her light blue dress and crown. "Wow," you said to yourself. You tried to do a self-diagnostic, but nothing happened; now you were a human. To confirm, you put your hand over your new heart to hear the heartbeat. That the remote worked was incredible, and a whole world of opportunities was now open to you. You felt your hands. It was bizarre - your hard robotic skin was now soft human skin, but had retained its shape and color.

It was then that you noticed that a small star-like creature was floating in the air near you. "Are you okay, mama?" it asked.
1553111221.title: Life swap?

choices: Do more with your Robot Rosalina.
Swap lives and speak the phrase, remaining Rosalina's owner.
15531112213.content:
"Yes, I'm fine," you lie. "Go back to my room, please."

The Luma looked sad, "I want to stay with you, mama."

"I will be there in a little while, so please wait for me."

"Oh. Okay." The Luma flew off.

With no time to lose you aimed the remote at Rosalina in your life and pressed the Life Swap button. In a moment you were back to your own life, and the first thing you did was chase Rosalina down. "Hello? Miss Rosalina?"

"Yes?" asked Rosalina. "Can I help you?"

"I just need a little of your time. Could you help me please?" you asked.

Rosalina looked at the Luma that was flying off, "Well, I really should go back to my room."

"Please. It'll just take a second," you pleaded.

"Well, okay," she said.

**

You led Rosalina back to your room. Fortunately Villager was still gone. You quickly pulled out a computer from one of the drawers and began typing with lightning speed.

"So how can I help you?" asked Rosalina.

"Just give me one moment, please." You finished typing and then opened the light blue hatch that was on your head, revealing a port. You took out a cable, attaching one end to the computer and the other end to the port.

Rosalina turned around, "I really apologize, but I"-

You pressed a key on the computer, then aimed the remote at Rosalina, hitting the Life Swap button again. You turned around and saw that what the first part of what you had done was successful.

Rosalina was standing still, her naked body rigid in the position you were in when you had used the remote. You walked towards her and saw your reflection in her glassy eyes, the cable entering her head nestled in her hair. She was now a deactivated robot.

Noticing something, you check the mirror. It appeared as if your scalp was smooth, with your helmet and the squares on it flattened into a tattoo-like covering. That was interesting, but there were more important things to confirm.

You approached the computer. A dialogue box on the screen said "Program installed. Press OK to re-activate." You open another window - it was a text program with the following:

1. When someone says "I am your owner, Roy. G. Biv." in my presence, I will erase all prior "Owner" designations and designate the speaker as my "Owner."
2. I may not injure my "Owner" or, through inaction, allow my owner to come to harm.
3. I must obey the orders given to me by my "Owner" except where such orders would conflict with Rules 1 and 2 of this list.
4. I must protect my own existence as long as such protection does not conflict with Rules 1, 2, and 3 of this list.

You nod. You had converted these rules to a program, and now the program had been installed in Rosalina's programming. You press the OK button. Rosalina shuddered briefly. You waited a second and then gave your first orders, "I am your owner, Roy. G. Biv. Remove the cable from your head, turn to face me, and state the designation you have for me."

Rosalina robotically removed the cable and then turned to face you. "Owner," she said with a monotone voice.

"Good," you replied. Your idea had worked.
15531112213.title: You get an idea...

choices: Have your robot Rosalina call Roll over.
155311122131.content:
You look over your handiwork: Rosalina was now living - so to speak - your robotic life and had been programmed to designate you as her owner. Now you were considering your options.

"Is there anything I can help you with, owner?" Rosalina asked robotically.

"Hmm." It seemed that without orders, Rosalina would act on her own, channeling your helpful personality. "Have a seat on the bed and don't speak." you ordered her.

Rosalina did as she was told.

You approached her, holding her arm in your hand and really looking at it. It was the same color but not the same texture. It was a metallic arm, cold and hard. You squeezed the arm in your hands, taking in the coldness with your new human hands that were capable of taking in such coldness. "Interesting," you tell yourself. You then start stroking her hair to get its texture and realize that you have no prior reference. You wonder if your sister Roll's hair felt the same way, or if Rosalina's hair was now somehow different then the hair of other humans. Next was her eyes. Rosalina's eyes were glassy screens, the way yours had been, displaying images of eyes at an intensity suitable for the ambient light conditions.

You step away and get the remote. You aim it at Rosalina and press the body swap button. As expected, you find yourself a little taller, and raising your hands shows you Rosalina's hands. But their texture isn't human - it's metallic. You look at the bed and see that Rosalina was now in your humanized body. Not only that, but Rosalina was still on the bed. Even though she was in a human body, she was still following her programming. Those were definitely interesting and useful results.

Since you were a robot, you did a thorough scan of yourself. Interestingly, you found data that was separated from the rest. Scanning it, your analysis indicated that the data was there but did not come up on basic searches and reads. Finding this data without the through scan you had just done would have taken quite an effort - an odd concept for you. But now that you found it, reading it indicated that it was all the data for Rosalina's life.

You used the remote to perform another body swap, then tried again to access Rosalina's memories. It was doable, but it definitely took more effort than accessing your own memories. You considered what to do next. If you wanted to make use of your current resources, you had some options. With Rosalina's life, you could invite some of her friends over. You could order your robot Rosalina to call your sister (or her sister now, you supposed) Roll over. Or you could try another option.
155311122131.title: Do more with your Robot Rosalina.

choices: Give her a trigger phrase so you can control her whenever you want.
155311122132.content:
You contemplate what to do with Rosalina when an idea comes to you: see if her new programming carries over into her original life. Just as a test, you were quick to remind yourself, remembering your vows as a hero.

You click the life swap button, causing you and Rosalina to swap positions.

Suddenly, Rosalina shook briefly, before appearing to awaken from some sort of trance. Quickly taking in her surroundings, she spoke.

"I really am sorry, but I must-"

You interrupted her with the trigger phrase. "I am your owner, Roy. G. Biv. State your designation.

Against all odds, Rosalina actually turned your way, and said "Master.".

Had you been an organic creature, you must likely would have been shaking out of anticipation at having a goddess at your command. But you were made of metal, so you did not.

Mulling over the possibilities, you think about what you should do with her next: Do you seize the chance to perform an experiment on her? Do you give her another phrase so you can control her whenever you want? Such possibilities!
155311122132.title: Swap lives and speak the phrase, remaining Rosa...

choices: Rosalina becomes a robotic version of herself.
Rosalina's body becomes a shrunken paper version of itself.
1553111221321.content:
"Sit down and do not speak or act unless told to, or unless you must do so to maintain your biological functions."

Rosalina did as she was told, and you immediately began processing what just happened. The program you had installed in Rosalina for the short period of time that she was living your life had been given the deepest access to one's robotic programming that could be allowed.

There had been a risk that when you swapped lives back that the program would remain in the life of Megaman, but that had not occurred. It was if the program was now part of Rosalina's core... whatever was analogous to a living being's core programming. A soul? In any event, you could reasonably calculate that the programming would thus remain a part of Rosalina regardless of what life she was in.

The "Master" designation was also an interesting emergent event. Rosalina's mind probably designated "Master" as the human's equivalent of "Owner." In her mind, one was a Master of people but an Owner of property. It was a minimal divergence, but also a reminder that reprogramming people could have unpredictable consequences.

You decided to test something else. You aimed the remote at Rosalina and pressed the Body Swap button. As expected, you found yourself a little taller, and raising your hands showed you Rosalina's hands. But their texture wasn't metallic - it was human. You looked at the bed and saw that Rosalina was now in your still robotic body.

That was also an interesting interaction. In theory, having a robotic life should have converted Rosalina's body into a robotic chassis when you acquired it, and vice versa. But then again, nothing in either of your particular backgrounds required it - You could have been an artificially-created lifeform, and Rosalina a crafted one.

You switched your bodies back and continued to hypothesize - were there circumstances under which the remote would perform such a conversion during the exchanging process?

Your locked the door, pulled out a printer and hooked it up to your computer. "Remove your clothing rapidly, stand, and rotate slowly," you ordered. You had to act fast, as you lacked the data on when your roommate would return. As Rosalina did so, you opened up a graphics program and quickly composed a graphic consisting of Rosalina as a nude robot based on the input you were receiving. "Place your clothing back on," You ordered.

You printed out your graphic. Once Rosalina was fully clothed, you gave her the order, "Point the remote at this graphic and use the Body Swap button. It is this one."

You gave Rosalina the paper with the graphic on it and the remote. She carried out your command.
1553111221321.title: Perform an experiment on her.

15531112213211.content:
You saw the results instantly in Rosalina's glass-screen eyes. Her size and shape had remained, but now she was a robot as you were.

You mentally archived this new data and put away the graphic which now held Rosalina's human body. You knew what you had to do now. You were a hero, yes, but you weren't going to let an opportunity for good like this slip by. There were many powerful fighters in this tournament, and if their robotic forms incorporated the powers they possessed in their lives it would advance robotic technology by decades if not more.

Of course, you had to prepare them before they could be converted. You found the port in Rosalina's head and plugged the cable in. You began programming again. You connected Rosalina to the wi-fi network you were using and programmed Rosalina with a new set of instructions. Whenever she saw someone who had not been exposed to the program, she would override her current functions to swap lives with them and stand still until the process was complete. The log of the button press would be transmitted via the network to your computer, which would then install your Roy G. Biv program into the core programming of whoever swapped into Rosalina's life before instructing them to use the remote to swap lives back. The computer would then transmit instructions to Rosalina to resume normal functions.

You unplugged the computer and gave Rosalina the remote. "Rosalina, you are to carry this remote. You are not to reveal this remote or any data regarding it to anyone other than myself unless overridden. You are to resume normal functions."

Rosalina's glass eyes flickered slightly. "Oh. Master, I-"

"Refer to me as Megaman," You order.

"Megaman, I will resume normal functions now." Rosalina looked at the remote for only an instant, as if to make a visual confirmation that she was carrying it.

You nodded your head, "Do so."

Rosalina left the room, remote in hand.
15531112213211.title: Rosalina becomes a robotic version of herself.

choices: Use the Villager as a test subject.
Leave the room and find someone else.
1553111221322.content:
Suddenly, you knew of all the possibilities this remote held. There was so much you could do!

But suddenly, you sensed your roommate, Villager, walking down the hallway. He must be returning back. You figured.

Thinking fast, you get the idea to give Rosalina a trigger phrase so you would be able to bring her back any time more experiments were due.

Plan in mind, you turned to her body, still standing, waiting for orders. "Now, Rosalina. Take a command. When I say 'revert', you will return to your previous state of mind, with no memory of any experiments I have performed on you or anyone else."

"But when I say 'Roy. G. Biv' you will return to this obedient state once again, ready to take orders from me alone. If I am not present, seek me out. Understand?"

"Understood." Rosalina's response was to the point.

"Now, 'revert'".

Rosalina awakened, taking in her surroundings once again.

"I really must leave now. I hope we can continue whatever you wished from me another time." She said as she left, oblivious to her unwitting participation.

You were thinking about what to do now. Now that you know what this remote can do, there's so much to do. You think about using the remote on someone else. Maybe your roommate could make for a nice test subject...
1553111221322.title: The possibilities...

1553112.content: You decide that Greninja will be your first test subject for the remote. Considering each option, you think a life swap would be very interesting, so it's a good thing you didn't destroy the remote and get tempted by the thought. If you swapped lives with Greninja, you'd lose access to any weapons already stored in your variable weapons system, but in return you'd gain access to his Pokemon moveset. You think it could be interesting to work with a completely different set of moves for a while. There were, however, other options that could also yield interesting results. You decide to perform a...
1553112.title: Greninja

15531122.content: You then decide to do a...
15531122.title: More Swaps

choices: The remote is destroyed with no powers granted
155312.content: You decide that it's better that no one sees you holding the remote and get suspicious. As you fire your blaster, a thought comes to you: What if you gain no powers and the remote is destroyed? That would obviously mean no swapping for you or anyone else. But you've already fired the shot, so there's no backing out now. As the blast hits it, the remote is obliterated to nothingness. Now you wait to see if it works.
155312.title: Destroy the remote to add the swapping to your ...

1553121.content:
Get equipped with SWAP REMOTE
You gain the remotes powers, you turn gray as the remote was, now you need to find a person to swap with.
As you walk down the hallway you see two people who you could potentially swap with
Zelda, the princess of hyrule and Mario, the plumber who is rarely seen doing any plumbing
Who do you swap with?
1553121.title: You gain the remote's powers

15531212.content:
You contemplated which of the two would be the most interesting and newer experience. Taking the note that you were made a a boy robot, that swapping with a human, or similar at least as Zelda is Hyrulian, female, would lead to the more intriguing swaps.

Having set your focus on princess Zelda, "Now what to swap, it might be fun to get a live body from the head or body swap, or maybe I could swap something from our lives with life or relationship swap, or maybe something to do with our cultural past and swap clothes. Or I could remain a robot and swap gender. So many choices, which would be good first?"

It took a few minute of thinking, as Zelda had sad down on a near by chair with a book, once the three of you had walked into a lobby, you swapped...
15531212.title: Zelda

155312121.content:
If you swapped lives you would be come the princess of Hyrule and gain her powers of her magic and the triforce, and have the alter ego of Sheik.
Or
Relationships, so you would still be treated as royalty of Hyrule, best friends with Peach and Samus, and more.
155312121.title: Lives or relatioships

choices: Talk to Zelda/reflect on your new life and situation.
1553121211.content:
"I wonder what it would be like to swap lives with Princess Zelda," without you noticing, because there no flash, no steady transformation, just an instant, and very fluent transition, from looking at Zelda to looking at the pages of her book, but it felt like you had already been reading this book for several minutes , but as you were very deep in thought, you didn't acknowledge the change, and continued as nothing happened "But if I swapped lives with her, I would lose my powers and be unable to swap back, so that isn't an option," you thought to your self looking up, hoping inspiration for a good swap, and closing the book, your robotic face, turned white now it was in the life of living being, as you saw a naked princess Zelda standing where you were, as if this was normal and she had always been mega man.

"Oh, no, what did I do?" You thought looking down to see your self in Zelda's dress. "I accidentally swapped with Princess Zelda! And I can't swap back!" you scream in your own mind.
You panicked not knowing how you could undo this, "I could talk to Zelda, but I'd either have to trick her, or I'd have to tell her the truth. Maybe I could keep this life. I just wish I could undo this swap."
1553121211.title: Lives

15531212111.content:
Again, the instant, and fluent transition took you back your own life, but this time, you noticed immediately, you saw Zelda, back in her own dress, stand up, and walk off, believing that she was the one who closed the book, and she had something urgent to do, although she didn't look nearly as stressed as when you were playing Zelda's role. While you, stood back where you were before the swap, were confused, why did you swap back, the power was part of Mega man's life, so why could you use it as Zelda, then a line from the manual came to mind, "When you swap with someone, the remote will follow you to the new reality, so if your were to swap lives with someone, it would be in your hand after the swap, as it would if you swapped heads, it would be in your new hand" You recalled "So maybe power still follows me with the swap."

You began to whisper to your self, "I want to use this new ability, I could push my luck, and test out this theory, but I could really get trapped, or I could just swap other things and be safe."
15531212111.title: The swap was undone

choices: Talk to Zelda, and get you life back.
15531212112.content: It didn't take long for you to realize that sitting around flustering, would not only look strange coming from Princess Zelda, but it was getting you no where. After taking deep breath, maybe as you were now alive, you would breath despite having no lungs. After calming down, you said quietly to yourself, "Okay Megaman, What are you going to do, get your life back, or do you want to live a Princess Zelda?"
15531212112.title: Talk to Zelda/reflect on your new life and situ...

155312122.content: The life and relationship swap options were very interesting but you wanted to try out something more visual for your first test of your new abilities. You opt for...
155312122.title: Body or head/Clothes or gender

1553121221.content: Although the clothes and gender swaps also intrigued you, what really caught your attention was the fact that you could be partly or completely human or Hyrulian as the case may be. So you choose...
1553121221.title: Body/Head

1553122.content: As you wait, you realize that it's been taking longer than it usually takes for you to gain a new power from a robot master. You then realize that it didn't work and the remote is now destroyed. You walk away somewhat disappointed, but figure that it might not have been worth it anyways. Meanwhile, Master Hand feels like the strange sense of dread that had been bugging him since he handed the package to Crazy Hand has disappeared.
1553122.title: The remote is destroyed with no powers granted

15532.content:
You are the Wii Fit Trainer, the white-skinned personal trainer who's only real purpose in life was to train people. It was kind of a boring life, training day after day, but you had grown accustomed to it. Being invited to the Smash Bros tournament was a whirlwind of excitement for you, breaking from your old daily routine. If only the other competitors took you seriously. A few of the fighters claimed you were no match for them, because despite your daily fitness training, you had no real combat experience. You had actually been heading over to the gym now to get some practice in on one of the sandbags, since the Hands wouldn't let you train on the actual stages unless there was a scheduled training session, when you stubbed your toe on something. You grunt a little in pain, and sit down against the wall, taking a look at what you hit your foot on.

It was some sort of box, unlabelled, but clearly opened before. There was no one around, so whoever had dropped it clearly didn't care about it too much, so you didn't feel too bad about snooping a little and seeing what was inside. Inside, you found a strange TV remote, and a manual explaining what the remote did. Since your toe didn't hurt anymore, you continue your trip towards the gym, taking the box with you and reading the manual on the way. You could barely believe what you were reading. This remote claimed to alter reality in unimaginable ways. This could take you out of your boring old life of being a trainer completely. You really wanted to try it out, so you were pleased to hear the sounds of other people working out when you neared the gym. Peeking inside, you see that you have two possible candidates to swap with. Both could provide pretty interesting results, but you just needed to first use one of them to test whether the remote would work. After thinking it over, you point the remote at...
15532.title: Wii Fit Trainer

155321.content: Changing from a Trainer to a racer/bounty hunter seemed like the easiest way to add spice into her life. Still, did she really want to switch lives with him? Training was a big part of who she was after all. And maybe it was best to do just a little change.
155321.title: Captain Falcon

1553212.content: Life and relationships would certainly get her that excitement she craved. Gender swap wasn't that big a deal for her, she never felt particularly attached to being a girl, but perhaps it would be funny to see how Falcon would change.
1553212.title: Life/relationship/gender swap

15532121.content: Live Falcon's life or simply enjoy the respect and admiration he seemed to get.
15532121.title: Life/Relationship Swap

choices: Explore the life of Captain Falcon
155321211.content:
One click later and you can't help but find the room much darker than usual. After a moment's thought, you quickly realize the source: Captain Falcon's tinted visor. Sure enough, you've found yourself next to the weights, wearing a familiar, albeit loose-fitting uniform. Exactly what Falcon was wearing and exactly where he was standing.

You look back to where you were standing just a second ago. Yep, there was Falcon, wearing your Wii Fit tank top. At least you think its him, you've never seen him without his helmet. You briefly wonder if you hit the Clothing Swap, until he moves to grab a yoga mat. Before long, he was going through your daily routine.

He glanced over at you and offered a small smile. "Hello there. Ready to work out today?"

That clinched it, you'd definitely switches lives with Falcon. No one else started conversations like that. You wonder why that is. It got right to important business.

In any case, how would Falcon answer that? He never attended training sessions... but he had some kind of phrase he said somewhat frequently, right?

"No thanks. I don't need to see anyone else's moves." That sounded right and the Falcon-that-thought-he-was-you agreed, nodding politely.

So the remote worked! You had all the reputation and exciting life of Captain Falcon himself. You felt a little guilty skipping a day of training, but if you swap back later, it would be like you did the exercise anyway. Falcon/Trainer could handle it. Now the question was whether Falcon's life was the only thing you wanted to enjoy. Maybe there'd be something you could borrow from someone else?
155321211.title: Life Swap

1553212111.content: You look for somebody to swap with and come up with a few choices
1553212111.title: Swap with someone else

1553212112.content:
Leaving the gym, you immediately notice a difference in treatment. People give you a wider berth when they walk past you. Villains like Bowser give you glares while heroes give you much more friendly smiles. The Ice Climbers even approach you to playfully imitate a Falcon Punch. You try to pose appropriately, to give a sense of resounding Falcon Support and the kids run away excited.

Everyone really respects Falcon. You don't get why they don't feel the same way about training and exercise, but what can you do?

You hear a call for Falcon at one point and you naturally turn around to see...
1553212112.title: Explore the life of Captain Falcon

choices: Samus sees Falcon as a fellow bounty hunter
15532121121.content:
It's your roommate, Samus. Although it occurs to you the description of roommate is much less accurate right now. Even she's looking at you differently, although you can't quite parse the expression.

How does Samus feel about Captain Falcon again?
15532121121.title: Samus

155321211211.content:
As far as you could figure it, Falcon and Samus were just bounty hunters. Which you believe meant they "caught bad guys" as Samus once explained to you. Did that make them co-workers. You'd known a few other trainers and a Wii Balance Board who probably fell under that title.

"Police just put out a warrant for some thug out on the run. Might be working with Space Pirates or Blood Falcon. I figured you'd be up for a team-up."

Oh, you had teamed up with Samus in practice matches before. Maybe bounty hunting was like that?

"Sounds perfect!" You attempt the most Falcon tone possible. "Anything to stop a dastardly criminal!"

Samus seems to buy it. "Alright. We'll head out around 8 or so." With a professional nod, she heads out on her way.

You're not 100 percent sure what you just agreed to.
155321211211.title: Samus sees Falcon as a fellow bounty hunter

155321211212.content:
You recall that Samus and Falcon spend a lot of time together, but you didn't consider any of that your business. Besides, it wasn't relevant to diet and exercise so why bother?

You wish you paid more attention now, although something in the back of your mind (Falcon's memories?) tell you Samus and Falcon were definitely close.

"I got free time tonight, you want to do something?"

"Do something?" You're completely puzzled.

"Yeah, we could get a bite to eat, catch a movie, whatever suits your fancy. Just no driving. I spend enough time flying around in space to enjoy it on the ground."

You desperately search for a response. "...Exercise?"

She blinks in surprise before snorting and shoving you playfully. "Smooth talking, Mr. "Show Me Your Moves". You pick up you're flirting skills from Fit?"
155321211212.title: Samus is dating Falcon

choices: Go back to training the eager kids and others for now
You explore and encounter other Falcon relationships
155321212.content:
You may be tired of the Trainer life, but you could never abandon it. You dedicated your whole life to training. It's such a key part of who you are, it's in your very name! All you really wanted was for people to respect the title more.

Encouraged by your own loyalty to the position, you press the Relationship Swap button without hesitation. At first you aren't sure anything has happened. How would you tell? It occurs to you that relationships might be a little more complicated than you thought. You pocket the remote and go about your daily routine, looking for any difference.

Before long, two children enter the gym. You vaguely recognize them as other fighters. Ness and Lucas was it? Lucas is significantly more nervous as he follows behind Ness, but both of them have looks of admiration as they approach you.

"M-Ms. Trainer!" You've never been called a Miss before and it startles you enough to stop your exercises. "W-We're big fans and we were wondering if you could train us. Just a little!"

You can't help but grin in excitement. "Of course! Exercising every day is the key to a healthy lifestyle!"

Overjoyed, the kids follow your lead and complete your daily routine. You haven't had any students since you arrived at the Tournament, but now not only did you have students, they were big fans as well! Was this the kind of admirers Captain Falcon received regularly? You could get used to this.

Going about your day, the other differences become clear. Heroes would treat you with respect and give encouragement as they passed you by. Villains would glare and mumble something about "do-gooding trainer, improving people's health". It was wonderful! This was exactly what you had hoped for: a world that valued training as much as you.

You wondered what else this world could offer you.
155321212.title: Relationship Swap

choices: The remote falls out of your pocket
1553212121.content:
Now that you had students, you had to give them plenty of attention. In a delighted mood, you return to the gym....

Only to stumble into someone once you arrive. Losing your highly trained balance, you fall forward.
1553212121.title: Go back to training in the gym

choices: Back to your room to see Samus
1553212122.content:
You had already done today's exercises, so you felt reasonably safe looking around and talking to people. The question was where to go first.

The cafeteria was sure to be full of people and it was important to eat a balanced menu. On the other hand, you wanted to see how your roommate Samus was doing. Maybe she would like exercising with you now?
1553212122.title: Explore with Falcon's relationships

choices: The Trainer has lots of awards and commemorative photos
The beds have been pushed together
15532121222.content:
You decided to go back to your room. A brief rest from your new popularity sounded perfect. Plus, you wanted to see how your room might have changed.

Opening the door easily, you blink in surprise. You were expecting something different but this wasn't what you expected at all...
15532121222.title: Back to your room to see Samus

155321212222.content:
You approach the beds cautiously. Maybe one of those Metroids Samus worried about got into the room and she trapped it between the beds? But a quick check showed that wasn't the case. Then what was the change? What about Samus and Falcon's relationship meant that this new life would involve beds pushed together.

As if on cue, Samus entered the room, drying off her hair from the shower. "Oh, Fit, you're back. I didn't expect you to be done with training for a while."

You smile at Samus easily. Even her tone is different, less annoyed with her fitness talk and more warm. "Oh, I decided to take a break."

She's surprised. "You? A break?"

"After helping some students, I thought a breather would be the perfect rest period."

"And so you came back to see me?"

You nod, missing any flattered implications in her voice. Samus smiles and makes her way over to you.

"Well, I just finished up my own work. I could take a break too."

Oh, you get to spend some time with Samus. She was always so busy, she never had the time to talk. Granted, you usually didn't either.

"How was your work?" You ask politely.

She explains something about searching for Space Pirate activity that goes over your head, but you pretend to understand. She doesn't seem to buy it, but she at least appreciates the effort.

"And you?"

You gush about the progress from your new students and how exciting it is to see children interested in training. It isn't until you've finished talking that you realize how close Samus as gotten to you. Her arm is curled around yours and her smile is the warmest you've ever seen it.

"Is something wrong?"

She shakes her head. "Oh no, it's just after a day of combing through angry mugshots, seeing you so excited was exactly what I needed.

That was nice of her to say. "It good to see you happy."

She laughs lightly. "Well, you bring it out of me." And she gives you a peck on the cheek.

Oh.

Ohhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.
155321212222.title: The beds have been pushed together

choices: Samus would rather keep this relationship
1553212122222.content:
You had never been in any kind of relationship like this and you weren't entirely sure how they went. But you knew that honesty was essential and you were already reluctant to lie to someone as nice as your remote.

You slip you arm away from Samus. "I need to tell you something."

She blinked in puzzlement. "What's that?"

You explain how you encountered the box on the ground and how inside was the remote and the manual. You show her the evidence yourself and fiddle with your hands nervously as her expression becomes harder and harder to read.

"...And so you switched relationships with Captain Falcon to become more respected."

"Yes..."

She rubbed her temple. "If you weren't such a bad liar, I wouldn't believe any of this." It was true, you had trouble coming up with any believable if it didn't involve fitness.

"So what do you want me to do?"
1553212122222.title: Tell Samus the truth immediately

15532121222222.content:
The bounty hunter sighed. "I remember telling you about who I was raised by. Did that happen?"

You nod. "The Chozo, right?"

That seemed to ease some tension. "Well, even if parts of it aren't real, I still like you for you. And I'd rather not lose that. If you want to keep this going, I mean."

You weren't expecting that but you can't exactly say you aren't interested in this world. "I'd like to try that."

She grinned. "Well in that case..."
15532121222222.title: Samus would rather keep this relationship

155321212222222.content:
"Let's mess with this remote together," Samus said.

"Really?" you said. "Are you sure?"

"Are you kidding?" Samus asked. "I wouldn't want to miss out on a chance to use this thing myself."

Samus smiled at you, and you felt your heart flutter a little when she did. You smiled back at her, feeling relieved that she wasn't mad at you.

"Do you mind if I have a look at the remote and the manual?" Samus asked.

Your good mood soured slightly. "What? Why?"

"I just want to see how it works," Samus said. "I won't use the remote on you, I promise."

You hesitated. As your roommate (and now, technically, your girlfriend), you had plenty of respect for Samus. However, you were slightly wary of giving her the remote. In the end, you decide to...
155321212222222.title: "Let's mess with this remote together."

1553212122222221.content:
Since you've never really been in a relationship like this before, you're kind of scared that you might do something to screw this up. However, since honesty and trust had served you well so far, you decided to take a chance.

"Okay," you said, holding the remote out to Samus. "Here you go."

Samus accepted the remote and looked the front of it over carefully. She also picked up the manual and began reading through it.

"If I set the remote to Swap Mode 2, would you be okay with swapping something with me?" Samus asked.

"That means we'd both be aware of the swap, right?" you asked.

Samus nodded. "There's six swaps to try. What kind do you want me to do?"
1553212122222221.title: ...let Samus have the remote.

15532121222222211.content: What kind of swap do you ask Samus to perform?
15532121222222211.title: Body Swap/Head Swap/Clothes Swap

155321212222222112.content: What kind of swap do you ask Samus to perform?
155321212222222112.title: Head Swap/Clothes Swap

choices: Samus is able to summon the Power Suit.
Samus fails to switch into the Power Suit.
1553212122222221122.content:
"Let's just stick with something simple," you said. "Do a clothes swap."

"Alright," said Samus. "One clothes swap coming right up."

Samus pressed the Swap Mode 2 button, then pointed the remote at you and pressed the Clothes Swap button. With no fanfare whatsoever, you found yourself wearing Samus' skintight Zero Suit, and Samus was now wearing your workout clothes.

"Oh, wow," you said. "I had no idea this suit was so... tight."

"Speak for yourself," Samus said, lifting her now bare feet off the floor and sitting cross-legged on the bed. You looked at her curiously.

"I don't normally go barefoot," she said. "Do you have any idea how cold the floor is?"

"I honestly never noticed," you said. You looked down at the high-heeled Jet Boots that now covered your feet. "I don't normally wear shoes, and I've certainly never worn high heels before."

"The manual says that any skills involving the clothes we wear are transferred during the swap," said Samus. "You should be able to walk in them just fine."

You decided to test that, and walked a quick lap around the room. Sure enough, your balance was perfect, even with the new shoes, and you could still comfortably get into the Tree pose, though the feel of the metal heel of your new Jet Boots was a little strange.

"Hey, Sammy," you asked. "Did the clothes swap give me access to the Power Suit, or is that still yours?"

"Sammy?" Samus asked, arching one of her eyebrows.

"Uh... well, I-I um, er..." you stammered, wobbling a little as you blushed profusely.

Samus giggled as you quickly regained your balance. "It's okay, I don't mind," said Samus, standing up. "As for your question, I have no idea. I'll try summoning the Power Suit, and we'll see what happens."
1553212122222221122.title: Clothes Swap

choices: Her visor is able to scan the remote, including the hidden functions.
Her visor either fails completely or doesn't pick up the hidden functions.
15532121222222211221.content:
Samus reached down and tapped her wrist where her bracelet would've been, but ended up just tapping skin.

"Right, I'm not wearing my bracelet," said Samus. "Guess I'll have to put the suit on manually."

Samus walked over to her wardrobe and opened it, revealing sets of her new exercise clothes, in green, red and yellow, as well as her standard orange, yellow and red Varia Power Suit. She touched a hidden button on the chest of the suit, causing it to open up. Samus turned around and stepped into the Power Suit, and it closed up around her. Samus walked out of the wardrobe, rolling her shoulders around a few times.

"Still fits like a glove," she said as she reached into the wardrobe and retrieved her helmet. She turned her helmet around a few times, then glanced back at you.

"You know, my Power Suit has a scanning function," said Samus. "We might be able to learn more about the remote if I can scan it."

"If you think it'll work, give it a try," you said.

Samus nodded, and donned her helmet. There was a soft hiss as her suit sealed, and she turned her visor towards the remote and tapped a button on the left side of her helmet.
15532121222222211221.title: Samus is able to summon the Power Suit.

155321212222222112211.content:
After about ten seconds of scanning, Samus removed her finger from the side of her helmet.

"Huh," she said. "Well, that's interesting."

"Did your scan work? What did you find out?" you asked excitedly.

Samus pulled off her helmet and smiled at your enthusiasm. "Well, I didn't learn about how the remote actually works or where it's from, but I did learn about a few hidden buttons on the remote."

"Really?" you said, picking up the remote.

"Yeah," said Samus as she placed her helmet on her bed and walked into her wardrobe. "There's a secret panel on the back of the remote, near the bottom. If you pull it off, you should see six buttons."

You turned the remote over in your hands and looked at the back. You didn't see anything, so you rubbed your hand along the back of the remote, and found a small crease. You traced the outline of the crease with your finger, and finally spotted the thin line showing the edges of the panel. She started to pull it off when a loud hissing noise in Samus' wardrobe startled you.

"Sorry," said Samus sheepishly as her Power Suit opened up. You turned your attention back to the remote, and pulled open the hidden panel open as Samus stepped out of her wardrobe, now wearing the workout clothes she'd been swapped into, which were looking a bit worse for wear after being in the Power Suit.

"Okay, I see the buttons," you said. "Now, what do they do?"

Samus sat down next to you and pointed at the first of the buttons.

"This blue button undoes the last swap you did," Samus explained. "If you used it now, it would undo our clothes swap. The red button next to the undo button is the Reset button, which undoes all the swaps you've ever done."

"That could be handy if we went crazy with the swaps," you said. "What's the yellow button do?"

"That's the set button," said Samus. "It basically locks in all swaps that happened before pressing it, so they won't be undone if you press the reset."

"Is the set position permanent?" you asked.

Samus shook her head. "If you want to reverse all your swaps, you can press the set button again to remove your set position."

You nodded, then pointed at the green button. "What's this button do?"

"That's the scramble button," said Samus with a grin. "Press it, and everyone in the room gets swapped around, depending on what mode you have it set to."

"Wow," you said quietly. "That could be really fun... and really confusing."

"Yeah. Anyway, these last two buttons are the aware and unaware buttons, respectively," said Samus, pointing at the orange and purple buttons at the bottom. "They make the target either aware or unaware of any and all swaps you perform with the remote, depending on which you use. Speaking of which..."

Samus took your hands and pointed the remote at you and pressed the aware button. You didn't really notice anything different, but before you could say anything, Samus pointed the remote at herself and pressed the aware button. After pressing it, Samus blinked a few times and shook her head.

"Are you okay, Sammy?" you asked, setting the remote down and taking Samus' hands in yours.

"Yeah," said Samus, sounding slightly breathless. "Yeah, I'm okay. Didn't mean to scare you. It's just..."

"It's okay," you said, giving Samus' hands a gentle squeeze. "Take your time."

Samus smiled, and leaned over and gave you a quick peck on the cheek. "Thanks, Fit. I was just hit by all my memories of my old relationship with Captain Falcon, that's all."

Oh. This could be a problem.

"Hey, don't worry, Fit," Samus said. "I'm not going to go back to him or anything like that." She smiled. "Besides, I'm more interested in seeing where this goes, where we go."

Your jaw dropped slightly, and you felt your cheeks burning bright red, which caused Samus to giggle.

"You're cute when you blush," said Samus, as her own cheeks started to go a little pink and she leans in closer to you. "Do you... do you mind if I kiss you?"

"Um, no," you managed to say as you start leaning closer to Samus as well. "I don't mind at all."

You closed your eyes and leaned in a little closer. You felt Samus' lips against yours, and Samus raised one of her hands and tilted your head a little to get into a better position for the kiss. You weren't sure how long the kiss lasted for, but your head was spinning when Samus pulled back from the kiss. You opened your eyes and blinked a few times as a stupid grin spread across your face.

"Wow..." you said. "That was..."

"Amazing," said Samus. "Now..."

She was right; Samus' workout clothes were looking rather crumpled from being in the Power Suit, despite the fact that Samus had only worn the Power Suit for about a minute.

"Yeah, your clothes were not designed with the Power Suit in mind," said Samus.

"I can tell," you said. "Do you want to swap back with me?"

15532121222222211221112.content:
"Okay," you said, picking up the remote. You pointed it at Samus and pressed the Clothes Swap button. Just like that, Samus was wearing her Zero Suit again, and you were back in your workout clothes, which were still rather messy. Apparently, when the remote performed a clothes swap, it kept the clothes in the state they were in when the button was pressed, even if that wouldn't make sense after the swap.

"Thanks, Fit," said Samus. "Feels so much nicer to be wearing my own clothes again."

"Speak for yourself," you said. "Now I'm the one who has to get changed."

"Yeah, sorry about that," said Samus.

"It's fine," you said, walking over to your wardrobe and opening it. There were a few sets of your standard blue clothes, as well as copies in green, red and yellow; palette swaps, you think the other fighters called them.

"I recommend the red," said Samus as she walked over to her own wardrobe. "If we're going to be training together, we might as well match."

"Training...?" you said, slightly confused. Then, one of your new memories came to the surface. When you'd first arrived for the tournament, Samus had asked for some private fitness lessons from you. That was how you two had started your relationship... or rather, how the remote had rationalised giving you Captain Falcon's relationship with Samus.

"Right, now I remember," you said. Then you realised Samus had said something about matching. You looked over your shoulder at Samus, and noticed that she'd taken an orange sports bra out of her wardrobe, as well as a pair of short shorts and boots in the same colour. You turned back to your wardrobe, and grabbed a red tanktop and a pair of sweatpants to match. As you turned around to head to the bathroom, you saw that Samus had already unzipped her Zero Suit, and had already pulled her arms out of the sleeves. The upper half of the Zero Suit was now hanging around her waist as she reached down and took her Jet Boots off, giving you a good look at Samus' exposed breasts.

"Sammy!" you said, feeling your cheeks heat up again as you tried to keep your eyes away from Samus' breasts.

"What?" said Samus. "We're both women, aren't we? Besides, you're probably going to see me naked at some point in the near future."

"Uh, yes, well," you stammer, before you get your composure back. "A little warning would be nice, next time!"

"Okay, okay," said Samus, standing up and pulling her Zero Suit down past her hips. Your cheeks got even warmer as Samus stepped out of her Zero Suit, completely naked, so you turned and quickly walked into the bathroom. You took a few deep breaths to calm your heart rate, then took off your blue workout clothes and got dressed in the red clothes you'd brought with you. When you walked out of the bathroom, Samus was wearing the orange sports bra and short shorts she'd taken out, and was putting her Jet Boots back on.

"You ready to go?" Samus asked.

"Of course," you said, tossing your dirty clothes into your wardrobe. "I'm always ready for fitness training!"

Samus smiled warmly. "That's the fitness trainer I know and love. Come on, let's go."

Samus took your hand, and you used your free hand to grab the remote.

"Wouldn't want to forget this, would we?" you said, showing Samus the remote.

"No, we would not," said Samus. "Come on, let's go."

1553212122222221122111212221.content:
It took a few seconds, but you recognised the blue wolf-like creature as Lucario, one of the Pokémon competing in the tournament. You didn't really know Lucario all that well, other than the fact that he was one of the only Pokémon here that could speak human languages, so he tended to act as translator for the other Pokémon. You did know that he was polite and respectful with pretty much everyone, and you vaguely remember hearing someone say that Lucario was friends with Meta Knight, for some reason. You watched as Lucario continued to attack the Sandbag, and it looked like he was going through each of his moves.

"Looks like he's testing out variations of his special moves," said Samus quietly.

"It's always good to know your limits," you said. "That way, you can avoid straining yourself."

"Well, yeah, but my point is, all his attention is on that Sandbag," said Samus. "If you want to swap something with him, now's the time."

You looked down at the remote in your hand. Swapping with Lucario could have some very interesting results, but you weren't sure if you were ready for such a drastic change in your life. What do you decide to do?
1553212122222221122111212221.title: Lucario

You decided you wanted to see what Lucario's body would be like, so you also ruled out the Clothes and Gender swap. That left the Head and Body swaps. You pointed the remote at Lucario and pressed...
15532121222222211221112122211.title: Swap with Lucario.

155321212222222112211121222111.content:
As soon as you pressed the button, you felt completely different. For one thing, you were taller, although that's probably because Lucario walked on his toes. You looked down at your hands, or rather, your paws. With only three fingers, and no thumbs, using the remote could be tricky. You also noticed that your snout was visible in the lower part of your vision. Still, you figured that, with your knowledge of how bodies work, you could used to this body fairly quickly. The only two things that were really strange about this body were the tail that was now sticking out of your backside, and the feeling of something very different between your legs.

"You look good as Lucario," Samus said encouragingly.

You turned your head to face Samus, and saw her smiling at you, so you smiled back. At least, you thought you were smiling. It was a bit hard to tell in this new body.

"Thanks," you said, in Lucario's decidedly male voice. That surprised you a little, even though you had suspected it would happen. You weren't sure you could get used to having a male voice as well.

You looked back over at Lucario, and you clamped a hand over your mouth to keep from laughing. Lucario was still practicing his attacks against the Sandbag, but he now had your old human body, which was now completely naked, since your clothes hadn't swapped with your bodies. Since Lucario still hadn't realised you and Samus were there, you figured you could probably get another swap in if you were quick...
155321212222222112211121222111.title: ...the Body Swap button.
