Ultimately, you decided you'd much rather be a woman, so you pressed the Gender swap button. The differences weren't really obvious on your new body, though you immediately felt much more comfortable now that you were biologically female again. The changes were much more obvious on Lucario, though. While he still had your white skin and dark grey hair, his hair was now cut much shorter, and he was slightly more muscular. His chest now had well-defined pectoral muscles instead of breasts, and it was fairly obvious that he had male equipment between his legs, so to speak. With the swap complete, you wrap your paw around the remote and drop your arm to your side, hiding the remote in your blue leg fur.

With a yell, Lucario released his Aura Sphere into the Sandbag, knocking the Sandbag back several feet. Lucario nodded in satisfaction, and glanced over his shoulder at you and Samus.

"Samus, Wii Fit Trainer," Lucario said as he turned to face you. "I didn't notice you there."

"That's okay," Samus said. "We only just got here."

Lucario nodded. "Will either of you be needing the Sandbag?" he asked, pointing over his shoulder with his thumb at the item in question.

"No, thank you," you said. "We're just doing some fitness exercises together."

"Ah, I see," said Lucario knowingly. "Then I will return the Sandbag to storage. Enjoy your time together."

Having finished speaking, Lucario walked over to the Sandbag and picked it up easily, slinging it over his shoulder and walking over to the storage area.

"Well, that went well," you said quietly, looking down at the remote. It was amazing just how powerful such a small item could be.

"I know, right?" said Samus. "You'd better put that thing in your gym locker while we're training, though. Wouldn't want anyone to take it while we're not looking, would we?"

"Good idea," you said. "I'll be back in a few minutes."

You glanced over your shoulder to make sure Lucario wasn't watching, then made your way over to the locker area. You find your locker, which was marked with your symbol. Normally, your symbol was a silhouette of you in the Dance yoga position, however, it had changed slightly. While the silhouette was still in the same pose, it was now of a Lucario in the Dance position. You put the remote in your locker and headed back out. When you walked out of the gym room, you noticed that...

155321212222222112211121222111121.content:
Samus was stretching her arms as you returned from the locker room. She smiled at you as you walked up to her.

“Ready to go?” she asked.

“Of course!” you said. “Just let me do some stretches and warm up first, then we’ll start the training session.”

Samus nodded, and returned to her stretches. You also started doing various stretches and warm up exercises, getting a feel for your new Lucario body. The first big difference was your tail. It changed your centre of balance, but once you figured out how to control it, you were able to use it as a counterweight in your yoga poses. The second major changes were to your legs and feet. While Lucario’s upper legs were similar in size to your old body’s upper legs, the lower legs were very short, and what appeared to be a backwards knee was actually your ankle. Even though you hadn’t noticed the difference while walking, you still had to occasionally remind yourself to use your tiptoes when switching between yoga poses, rather than a flat foot. Lucario’s blue, cream and black fur was a little itchy at first, but you soon stopped noticing it. You were also surprised you didn’t scratch yourself with the sharp metal spikes sticking out of your chest and the backs of your paws. It was also a little difficult to adjust to essentially losing a thumb and a finger on your new three toed paws. Even so, an hour later, as your training session with Samus came to a close, you had fully adjusted to being in Lucario’s body, and were actually starting to consider it your body, rather than his.

“All right, that should do it for today’s session,” you said. “Excellent work, Samus. You are one of the fittest people I’ve met.”

“Heh, thanks,” said Samus as she wiped a hand across her brow. Her face was slightly flushed and sticky with sweat, and a few strands of hair had come loose from her ponytail. “I had a lot of fun today.”

“That’s good,” you said. “Fitness should be fun, and I’m glad more people are starting to see that.”

“Yeah, and it’s nice to have someone to work out with,” said Samus. “Anyway, I think some of the newcomers have organised a training session here in a few minutes, so we should probably grab the remote and go.”

You nodded, and the two of you started walking towards the locker room. “Do you want to head back to our rooms and have a shower? Or would you rather head to the cafeteria?”

“Let’s head to the cafeteria,” said Samus. “I could do with some food.”

“Of course,” you said as you walked over to your locker and started undoing the lock. “A balanced diet is an important part of staying fit and healthy.”

Samus giggled. “Yeah, but I was thinking more about finding someone to swap with.”

“Oh,” you said as you undid the lock and opened the locker. To your relief, the remote was still inside the locker.

Who picked up the remote first?

Apparently, a short tongue was not a requirement in the life of Samus Aran, which was interesting. Still, you had your own life and body back, even if it had been altered by being in Greninja’s life briefly. And, since you’d successfully swapped Lucina and Greninja’s lives, you considered this a successful test of the remote’s capabilities, albeit one with an unexpected side effect.

You put the remote in your pocket and walked up to Fit, who was still talking to Lucina and Greninja about her earlier training sessions.

“Hey, Fit,” you said, slipping your hand around one of her paws. “Ready to get something to eat?”

To your surprise, you weren’t slurring your words as you had expected you would. It seemed your body was now designed so you could talk normally with your tongue hanging out.

“Oh!” said Greninja in Lucina’s life. “Hello, Samus.”

Lucina in Greninja’s life nodded at you and said, “Gre, ninja.”

“Hey, Lucina, Greninja,” you said. “I’m not interrupting anything, am I?”

“Not at all,” said ‘Lucina’. “Miss Trainer was simply telling us about her training sessions earlier. Oh, that reminds me. Did you find what you were looking for?”

“Huh?” you said, before remembering that you’d claimed that you’d left something in your locker. “Oh, yeah. I was just picking up my paralyser. I’d put it in my locker before we started our training session.”

“Yes, speaking of training, Greninja and I have to prepare for our own training session,” said ‘Lucina’. “If you’ll please excuse us.”

“Of course,” you said, stepping to one side to allow the two past.

“What did you do, Sammy?” Fit whispered once Greninja and Lucina had walked past.

“I did a body swap with Lucina, then I did a life swap with her,” you said. “Then I swapped lives with Greninja, swapped lives with Lucina again, and finished by swapping bodies back with Lucina.”

“So... Lucina is now living Greninja’s life, and Greninja is living Lucina’s?” Fit asked.

“Yep,” you said, and started walking down the hall, pulling Fit with you.

“But, why do you and Lucina now have such long tongues?” Fit asked.

“The tongue was part of Greninja’s life,” you said. “It appears that the remote can alter someone’s body so that fits their new life, at least to some degree.”

“Okay,” said Fit slowly. “I can understand why Lucina has her long tongue; she’s still living Greninja’s life. But why do you still have a long tongue? You’ve got your own life and body back.”

You shrugged. “I guess the length of my tongue isn’t considered an important part of my life,” you said.

An idea struck you. You thought you remembered seeing Greninja eating once, but you couldn’t remember if he had retracted his tongue back into his mouth or not. Of course, now you weren’t sure if you were remembering Greninja, or Lucina living in Greninja’s life. Either way, you figured it couldn’t hurt to try.
1553212122222221122111212221111212211111.title: Swap bodies with Lucina.

choices: The two of you reach the cafeteria.
You run into someone on the way.
1553212122222221122111212221111212211111.content:
You can still feel the end of your tongue, even though it’s a lot longer than what you’re used to. You reach over your shoulder and pull your long tongue so that it’s now dangling in front of you, and start unwrapping it from around your neck. Once you’ve finished unwinding your tongue scarf, you start pulling your tongue back into your mouth. Surprisingly, you’re able to fit your whole tongue into your mouth, even though it feels like you’ve stuffed some of it down your throat. Maybe you have; you weren’t fully human anyway, since the Chozo had altered your DNA when they had adopted you so you could survive on Zebes. You reached up and rubbed your neck, and found that the front of your neck was puffed out slightly. If you had to guess, your tongue was now stored in some kind of specialised sac at the front of your neck. You’d have to scan yourself with the Power Suit when you got back to your room.

“Well, at least you look normal now,” said Fit.

“Mostleeee,” you said. As you pronounced the last syllable of the word, your tongue started to flop out of your mouth. You were able to stop your tongue from fully extending, and retracted it back into your mouth.

“Sorry,” you said sheepishly. “Guess I gotta be careful when I speak.”

“It’s okay,” said Fit, squeezing your hand reassuringly, the fur on her paws tickling your hand. “Let’s just get to the cafeteria.”
1553212122222221122111212221111212211111.title: You manage to retract your tongue.

choices: Perform a series of Head Swaps.
Perform a series of Gender Swaps.
15532121222222211221112122211112122112.content:
After dismissing your first plan, a few more plans came to mind.

You could do a series of head swaps. First, you'd swap heads with Lucina, putting your head on her body. Then, you'd swap heads with Greninja, which would result in Lucina's head on your body, Greninja's head on Lucina's body, and your head on Greninja's body. Finally, you'd swap heads with Lucina again, which would put your head back on your own body, but Lucina's head would be on Greninja's body, and Greninja's head would be on Lucina's body.

Or, you could perform a few gender swaps instead. By first swapping genders with Greninja, you'd make him female and you male. The next step would be to swap genders with Lucina, making her male and you female again. An optional third step would be to swap genders with Greninja again, giving him Lucina's gender while you got your own gender back. It would also be a good way to see how swapping genders between two people who were both female would work.

But, you still had other ideas you could possibly try. Maybe you could come up with some more plans?
15532121222222211221112122211112122112.title: Try something else.

1553212122222221122111212221111212212.content: Which one of them will you swap with?
1553212122222221122111212221111212212.title: Swap with just one person.

15532121222222211221112122211112122122.content: Swapping something with Lucina didn't appeal to you, so you decided to swap something with Greninja instead. Of course, that just left the question of what you were going to swap with the Ninja Pokémon...
15532121222222211221112122211112122122.title: Greninja

155321212222222112211121222111121221222.content: Which one do you choose?
155321212222222112211121222111121221222.title: Life Swap/Clothes Swap.

choices: "No, you can keep it for now." (Wii Fit POV)
1553212122222221122111212221111212212222.content:
You decided that the Clothes Swap option might be the most interesting option, so you pointed the remote at Greninja and pressed the button. Instantly, you felt all of your clothing vanish from your body, leaving you completely naked. Greninja, on the other hand, was now wearing the orange sports bra and shorts you had been wearing earlier, and your Jet Boots had been heavily modified to fit on Greninja's frog-like feet.

Fit looked at Greninja, then back at you.

"A clothes swap?" Fit asked quietly.

"I thought it'd be interesting," you said, resisting the urge to cover yourself up. You had to remind yourself that nobody would find it strange that you were completely naked now. "Besides, you have to admit, Greninja looks kind of funny in my clothes."

Fit looked over at Greninja again, and she raised a paw to her mouth to smother her giggles.

"Yeah, you're right, it is kind of funny," said Fit.

The two of you continued walking, and you walked past Lucina and Greninja on your way out of the gym.

"Samus, Wii Fit," said Lucina as you walked past.

"Hi Lucina," said Fit, waving at Lucina and Greninja. "Hi Greninja."

"Gre," said Greninja, nodding in response to Fit's greeting.

Lucina and Greninja headed into the gym as you and Fit walked out.

"I still can't get used to that," said Fit. "Everyone still recognises me, even though I have Lucario's body."

"And they didn't even seem surprised that I was naked," said Samus. "And they didn't see anything strange about the two of us being a couple."

"I know," said Fit. "That remote is incredible!"

"Speaking of the remote," you said, holding up the hand that was carrying the remote in question. "Can you carry it for a bit? I don't exactly have anywhere I can hide it at the moment."

"Sure," said Fit, taking the remote and hiding it in her pocket. "Are you going to want it back once we get to the cafeteria?"

How did you respond?
1553212122222221122111212221111212212222.title: Clothes Swap.

My scanner only showed what was already in the manual."

Samus removed her finger from the side of her helmet and pulled her helmet off. After shaking her hair free, she looked at you and said...

choices: Talk to Falcon and see if there's any differences
15532122.content:
The first thing the Wii Fit Trainer noticed was how comfortable she was. She- or he now- felt no different than before, despite the drastic change in body. Perhaps it came with being a trainer: his body was just too healthy to let changes like this affect him for long. It was pretty muscular too, all things considered.

He couldn't help but raise an eyebrow at the sight of Falcon. He still couldn't see any hair beneath that helmet, but her frame had shrunk considerably. The bulky uniform was now more of a skin tight ensemble, showing off every curve. And there were quite a few curves.

155322.content: You decide to try swapping with Pikachu, the little electric mouse Pokemon. It would make for a more interesting test run of the remote, and like a lot of the other competitors in the tournament, you thought Pikachu was pretty cute. But what to use on him? Pretty much every button would provide an interesting result. You decided to leave it up to chance. You aimed the remote at Pikachu, made sure the awareness setting was on "1", and pressed a random blue button.
155322.title: Pikachu

15533.content: Are you the space-faring Captain Olimar?
15533.title: More Characters

155331.content:
You are Olimar, the space captain from the planet Hocotate and the leader of the Pikmin. You are currently relaxing in the garden while the Pikmin are exploring it. There were one of each color in the garden: Red, Yellow, Blue, Purple, and White. The garden reminds them of their planet, minus the carnivorous creatures, so you take them here from time to time. As for you, you are laying back in a beach chair, eyes closed, and just relaxing. It felt good to not have to worry about the company’s debt or be on the lookout for bulborbs. This was your chance to take it easy

As you are laying in your chair, you feel a tug at your arm. You open your eyes and see that the Pikmin have brought you something. “What is this?” You ask as you take the item from the Pikmin.

The item was a package. “Where did you get this?” You ask them and the Red one points to a hole in the soil, next to the zinnias. Looks like the package was buried there, the White Pikmin must have seen it underground and dug it up. What was a package doing buried in the garden? Did someone loose it? Was someone trying to hide it?

You think you probably shouldn’t open it, but your treasure hunting side got the best of you and you decide to see what is inside.

Inside is a remote control with an instruction manual. After looking at the remote and going through the manual, you discover that this remote can apparently swap various features between people! You may have found that hard to believe before, but after your adventures with the Pikmin, nothing seems out of the ordinary at this point

You decide to test it out. But on who? You look around and see someone on the far side of the garden. Who is it?

Who is it?
155331.title: Olimar

1553311.content:
On the other side of the garden, you see Princess Peach tending to a section of the garden. You know her a little. You two would meet in the garden from time to time but never really talked outside of that.. She is definitely a nice person though. The Pikmin like her too, and it appears she does as well. Sometimes, whenever we were in the garden at the same time, some of them would wonder over to her. They seem to get along well. She seems like a good person to test the remote on

Which swap do you do?
1553311.title: Princess Peach

1553312.content:
This was an important decision to make. You weren't just an ordinary deliveryman, after all. You were a scientist. An explorer.

(Legally speaking, of course, you were exactly an ordinary deliveryman and to call yourself a scientist might be incredibly misleading. If you ran around calling yourself a scientist, Hocotate Freight could be put under liability).

Regardless. The important thing was that a discovery like this needed perfect results and perfect observation. It needed a patient mind and an explorer's mind. You let yourself puff up proudly at the thought.

You also need a control subject. Someone who represented the average person. Or perhaps the pinnacle of human strength.

Perhaps... one of those two.
1553312.title: Another character

15533121.content:
Ah. Luigi. The constant second player. The perpetual second banana. The underdog of underdogs.

The man hiding from a bee. He'd be sniffing the flowers for some time but the bees has scared him off behind a tree.

"He's the perfect specimen for our little trial, don't you think?"

Red listened to your words with interest. You waggled your finger in the air, hoping to make your points even more compelling.

"He displays all the basics of humanity. Fear, shame, terror. But also care. Compassion. The ability to push forward in the face of overwhelming obstacles." You grinned at your little followers. "That is the essence of humanity. And thus, the perfect control subject for our work."

The Pikmin, followers by nature, did the best they could to pretend they followed the logic.

Now, the question was where to begin. The manual offered various uses for the remote. There were plenty of subjects in the park to swap Luigi with. And so many options to test first...
15533121.title: Luigi

155331212.content:
You made your decision quickly, as befitting a captain of your prestige.

You stared at the buttons.

The Pikmin stared at you.

Obviously, you remembered which one did what. You were a Captain, an explorer, a researcher who catalogued the wonders of the universe.*

(Legally, not a researcher).

"Putting him in Palutena's outfit should be a simple test." You said this out loud, making eye contact with the Pikmin, so that they were aware of how much you definitely remembered what this button did. And one of the things it did was change clothes. It had a picture of clothes right on this button. Or... maybe that was a man wearing clothes. It was a little smudgy from the view in your helmet. So who was to say you were wrong when you said you were putting him in different outfits?
155331212.title: Clothes/Life Swap

1553312121.content:
Luigi watched the bee buzz away uncomfortably. He sighed in relief. That was close... Getting stung was so painful. He had bumped into a beehive once years ago and ended up getting chased for miles but the little stingers.

Climbing back out into the garden, Luigi brushed his dressed a little of any dirt he might have picked up. His belt was a little loose, so he straightened it until it fit nicely. Then, with perfect ease in his heels, he walked back over to peer at the flowers. There might be some he could gather for Daisy...

You observed Luigi's actions carefully. He seemed to behave as normal, but the results were obvious. His clothes had swapped entirely. You glanced over at Palutena to see she was in a similar state. She now had a long pair of overalls upon her godly form, rather than a dress. Even more interesting was that it fit perfectly.

"This truly is a fascinating device..." you murmured. "We need to test its limits...."

Snake and Lucina were in the garden as well. Either of them could be just as exciting a test to swap with Luigi or each other. But where to being...
1553312121.title: Clothes Swap

choices: Soft Snake, Crown Plumber, Prince of Second Bananas
Princess Snake, Crowned Soldier, Mario's Sister
Plumber Snake, Crown Prince, Soldier Luigi
15533121213.content:
As you pointed the remote at the figures, an idea came to you. Why pick one option when you could do both?

"We've proven the remote works between two people. Perhaps its time to split the swaps between all three of these subjects. After all, our experiences have taught us the power of split capabilities."

Each Pikmin had their own skills and you understood them well. It would best to apply that knowledge here.

With that, your options increased immensely. Gender obviously needed to be swapped between Lucina and another: it just made sense. That left you with....

Option A: Gender swap Lucina and Snake. Relationship Swap Luigi and Lucina

Option B: Gender swap Lucina and Luigi. Relationship Swap Lucina and Snake

Option C: Gender swap Lucina and Snake. Relationship Swap Snake and Luigi

Oh, the possibilities such an experiment would bring. This was going to be exciting!
15533121213.title: Relationship/Gender Swap

choices: Palutena sees her chance to pull a prank
155331212131.content:
The remote clicked twice.

Solid Snake examined the dirt carefully. The grime here was good for camoflage. She had to keep it in mind in case tactical combat was necessary.

That wasn't the only reason she had visited the garden, of course. On her ship, Otacon was raising Sunny while she completed her work. Snake had never been one for motherhood and couldn't claim she was the most stunning example of womanhood for the young girl. Still, girls liked... flowers and things, right? She hoped Sunny liked this sort of thing. Such a nervous girl. When you were on the run with the world's greatest soldier, Snake supposed any young girl would be stressed.

Snake tied her hair carefully with one hand, while fishing out her cigarettes with another. She really needed a smoke.

Across the way, Prince Lucina balanced his sword carefully. The Falchion seemed as fierce as usual. Good. He needed it this way. He had traveled through time to protect Princess Peach and Daisy from fierce invaders. With the Fachion by his side, he would fight any Koopa or Boo that attempted to harm the royal family. He was the brother of the legendary Mario, after all. He had quite a legacy to fulfill.

Luigi, anxious as always, couldn't help but feel jealous of the Prince. Luigi himself was the son of Exalt Chrom, yet he always felt like a second banana. He was supposed to lead the troops, but he could barely hurt a fly, much less opposing armies. He sighed. Perhaps he should call Yarne. He understood Yarne's cowardice better than anyone.

You couldn't help but laugh at the sight of everyone. What a strange sight this was! "This remote really can do anything! Oh, the way this could change the world... This must be studied further!"
155331212131.title: Soft Snake, Crown Plumber, Prince of Second Ban...

15533123.content:
You gestured at the figures in the distance, for the benefit of the Pikmin. "There is our perfect subject. The perfect test for our experimentation."

The Pikmin said nothing because they didn't quite appreciate your scientific prowess. And also they couldn't talk.

You hear your doorbell ring. You put the remote in your pocket before opening the door. Standing in front of you is the bounty hunter known as Samus Aran, who is dressed in her Zero Suit. "Hello, Luigi," she greets you with a smile.

1553322.content: Are you the dainty princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, Peach?
1553322.title: More Characters

15533221.content:
You are Peach, the princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. You loved getting to participate in the Smash Bros Tournament; Bowser would usually restrain you before you got to fight back, so being able to let off a bit of steam in the arena was great for you. But that didn't mean everything was about fighting. In fact, you were on your way to the garden to tend to some flowers, when you happened to come across a small box lying in the hallway. You looked around for anyone who might have dropped it, but no one nearby gave any indication that they had dropped something and were looking for it. You take it with you and head towards Master Hand's office, since he'd no doubt want to know about any lost items being found.

On the way there however, curiosity gets the better of you, and you take a peek at what's inside the box. Inside there seems to be a strange remote, as well a manual explaining how it works. Thoroughly intrigued, you take the manual out of the box and read through the manual. You can barely believe what it says. According to the manual, this remote could alter reality in strange and magical ways, anything from swapping two people's heads, to making everyone believe you were another person. You're sure whoever owns this thing wouldn't mind if you tried it out just once. No one would even have to know, since the remote could make everyone unaware of the swaps.

Looking around, you frown as you find no other people in the vicinity to test the remote on. Or perhaps "no other humans" would be more accurate, since there were a few of the tournament's non-human competitors around. Would the remote work on them? The manual hadn't mentioned anything about it, so it was worth a try. It'd be interesting nevertheless. Looking around at your options, you narrow your options down to two candidates. One is the giant ape, Donkey Kong. It seemed strange to think that you were considering swapping body parts with an ape, and a male one at that, but he was incredibly strong. The other was the electric-type Pokemon, Pikachu. You honestly thought Pikachu was adorable, and couldn't help but feel a little jealous of how much time Samus got to spend with him. Which person do you choose to swap with?
15533221.title: Peach

155332211.content:
"This is only meant to be a test, so maybe I'll leave the swap with Pikachu for later. So, what should I swap with Donkey Kong?" Peach asked her self internally.
"If I swapped bodies with him, I would be a big gorilla man in a dress," Peach broke into laugher at that mental image, "Life would get a similar result but I don't want to do that yet. Clothes would leave me in a tie, but I a princess shouldn't be so naked, but everyone would think that is normal. A head swap could have some fun results," Peach monologued her first set of options, she decided on a
155332211.title: Donkey Kong

choices: Swap back and went to get her friends
Peach had ideas for the body or remore
1553322111.content:
The hilarity of the mental image Peach just had was almost too good to resist, Peach aimed the remote at the large gorilla, and pressed the body swap button.

Within an instant, with the most fluent transition, it was even more fluent than her kingdom going from peaceful and having a picnic to being invaded and kidnapped. Peach was stunned and speechless to the changed, so wouldn't have noticed if not for the fact that the first thing she saw was her self wearing nothing but except a tie with the initials 'DK', and stood were Donkey Kong was moments ago, and not even flinching to the situation.
The second thing she saw was a large hand, covered by an elbow length white glove, holding a remote which looked a lot smaller now. Peach lowered her large furry arm, and looked over her much larger body. She giggled in her large, deep gorilla voice, which startled her at first but made her laugh more.
Once Peach was done laughing and looking over her large gorilla body, wearing an enlarged, very girly, pink dress.

Peach then...
1553322111.title: Body swap

15533221111.content:
Peach just loved this remote, but something didn't feel right, she felt like she was keeping a secret felt a little lonely. She pointed the remote at Donkey Kong, borrowing her body, and somehow with her much larger fingers, pressed the body swap button, changing things back to how they were. Peach grew a large grin and ran, which looked a lot more like her frolicking gleefully and quickly, to get bests friends, Zelda and Samus, in on the swap action.

While skipping, she thought about her friends locations, and said to her self under her breath, "Where would they be?" she hummed, "Samus would be practising against sandbags to get better with her zero suit. And Zelda, oh that knowledge seeking would be worming her way though the books at the library here. Maybe I should get Samus first, Zelda doesn't like her reading interrupted," she concluded.

Peach headed of to the gym, were sure enough, Samus was kicking the tea out of the sand bags. Peach raised her arm, and yelled out "Hey Sammy," she called out waving. Peach cringed, while she cared for Peach, sometimes her antics were a little embarrassing, but she took a sigh of relief that no one was there. "Hi Peach," she said in her rare friendly manner. "Hey, I've got something really special I want to show you and Zelda," Peach took hold of Samus's hand, Samus smiled, while she knew Peach would invent stories from her own imagination often, Samus was curious to what she had come up with this time, "Okay Peach, just let me grab my bag," Samus requested and Peach stopped and loosened her grip, letting Samus go and get her stuff. The two left the gym.

The closer and closer the two got to the library, the faster Peach skipped, "Peach, you know that when Zelda finds starts a book, she doesn't stop, and with the library here, she isn't going any where."
Peach replies, almost squealing, "I know, I no..." Peach broke out into her excited giggle, which wasn't to dissimilar to a fan-girl about to pass out. Samus smiled to her enthusiasm, knowing just how excited she must be.

Peach and Samus arrived at the library, which was huge, 3 floor each with a several dozen book selves, and each book shelf having more book on then there was book selves per floor. Peach's mood fell, "it would take ages for us to find her," Peach moped. "Or asked the oracle," Samus suggested, walking up to the desk, "Excuse me Farore," Samus said, getting the little green haired oracles attention, who looked up, "Could you direct me to my friend Zelda, we think she is in the library."
Farore smiled, "She's that way, behind a stack of books," Farore pointed the direction that Zelda was in, lifting Peach's spirit causing her to grab Samus before running off.

Soon, they had run into the stack of book that Farore had mentioned, Peach walked around, Samus followed. Peach saw Zelda head down in a book. Peach turned to Samus and then back to Zelda, and gentle closed her book. Samus calmly explained, "Sorry to interrupt," the two of them could see her masking disappointment and a little anger under a disarming smile, "Peach says she found something and wanted to show us." Zelda put the book down and Peach got ready for a little show and tell.

Peach present the remote and manual, "This is a remote of swap, and it's manual, it lets me swap heads, bodies, relationships, clothes, life's or gender with someone. The manual explains it all." Peach said handing it over for them to read, but Zelda kept on turning the page before Samus could finish the page, so Zelda read it first and explained it to Samus once she was finished.
"Peach, this is all very interesting, but how do you know this works?" Zelda asked, hiding her scepticism.
Peach smilied, "Because I tried it on Donkey Kong and it did what I asked."
"So, your suppose to be big and hairy like a gorilla?" Samus asked.
Peach shook her head laughed about the fact Samus had just asked such a weird question, "No I swapped back."
Zelda and Samus got into a huddle to decided if they believed her or not.
15533221111.title: Swap back and went to get her friends

choices: Peach has a few targets in mind
155332211111.content:
Samus turned to Peach, "We believe your story, Peach."
Peach, though all of this, now felt confused, "Why, this story is really hard to believe?"
"It does seem a little far-fetched," Zelda admitted, "But I could see in your mind that you believe this to be true, and even remember testing it," Zelda said reminding Peach of her telepathy, who frowned, "I know you don't like me using it on you, but I needed to so I could see the truth, and I can see, from your view, the story is true."
Samus agreed, "I believe in Zelda and you, Peach."
Peach cheered up, then Samus and Zelda could see the cogs in Peach head turning and plotting, Samus had to ask "So, what should we do?"
To which the princess of the swap, replied...
155332211111.title: They believe her

1553322111112.content:
Peach grinned, "How about we get our boys involved."
Samus, for the first time in her life, blushed just slightly, "You mean our boy friends," She said maintaining her normal tone and hiding her abnormal behaviour.
"I know Mario and Link will be happy to join in, given their adventurous personalties, but should we tell them, they might prefer if we tell them," Zelda stated her opinion.
"But the remote stops them from noticing," Samus pointed out.
Peach then realized something obvious, "But Samus doesn't have a boyfriend."
1553322111112.title: Peach has a few targets in mind

choices: One of the three peach suggested
15533221111121.content:
"But, Sammy doesn't have a boyfriend," Peach frowned turning to Samus, and Zelda's eyes widened as she turned to see both of them.
Peach's eyes also widened, before she smirks, and held Samus's face in place with a gloved hand, "But she does," Peach said starting deeply into her eyes, and scanning her face for reactions and hints to a close friends secrets.
"No, I don't," Samus said, very close to her normal tone.
"She does, she does." Peach said letting go, and twirling around in mid air, "Who is it?"
Samus's kept blushing, while her state is tame for most people, this was quite new to her, "If I remember, you liked the big strapping guys."
By Samus's vague reaction, which would give nothing to others, but Peach knew her well and was good at reading people, especially when it comes to love, and Peach knew she was on the right tracks.
"That could be, Ike, Captain Falcon or Little mac."
Samus's face dropped, peach had read her easier than one of her recipe books. She calmed down and said "It's...
15533221111121.title: Continue

155332211111211.content: "Who is Samus's lover?" Peach asked, turning to Zelda for a little help, but she shook her head, "I don't remember you getting along with Captain Falcon, and Little Mac would be to small for you, that 2 foot difference would make things complicated,and Ike lacks the technology for communication. But I have seen you admire Captain falcon last time we were here. The height could make a relationship interesting, and the distant relationship is special in it self. So who could it be?" Peach stated her train of thought, "It's..."
155332211111211.title: One of the three peach suggested

choices: Swap with the boys aware, but informed
1553322111112111.content:
Samus just confessed, "I started going out with Ike the last time we here. Ike gave quite the admirable fight, but once my armour came off, he wasn't as aggressive, but still fought his hardest. Afterwards he asked he out, saying how he respected a woman who can handle her self, and I admired that he still fought a good fight, knowing I was a woman, and I said yes," Samus gave this happy sigh thinking about her time with Ike and how happy she would be to see him in person after all this time.
Zelda tapped her shoulder, "Why did you hide him from us?" she asked confused.
"I didn't know how serious it would be, and with you to being in such deep relationships, and if Ike and me didn't work..." Samus trailed off, and leaned for Zelda, "Thank you for not telling, I can tell you read my mind." Once Samus leaned out, and Zelda smiled, and winked, meaning that Zelda knew and that Samus was right to trust her.
Peach got excited again, "So we can all do swap with boyfriends."
"But should we make them aware?" Zelda asked
Samus thought, "Should we swap, My Ike my not like some of the swaps."
1553322111112111.title: Ike

155332211112.content:
"That's pretty a hard thing to believe," Samus said.

"It does seem a bit farfetched," Zelda added.

You pouted. You had really hoped to share your new toy with your friends, but it wouldn't be any fun if they didn't believe you. Unless... A sly grin spreads across your face. "Well then, I guess I'll just have to show you how it works." Zelda and Samus looked at each other nervously. "So, which one of you wants to swap with me?"

"Peach, is this really necessary?" Zelda reasoned. Clearly she was a little worried about this device you had found.

"Well if you don't believe it actually works, then I'll just show you how it does. Neither of you want to volunteer?" You were met with awkward silence and Zelda and Samus tried to avoid direct eye contact with you. "I guess I'll just decide for myself then. Now both of you put your hand on the remote so you can see the swaps." They reluctantly did so.
155332211112.title: They don't believe her

1553322111121.content:
You point the remote at Samus and press the body swap button. That was the one button you had tried out before, so you knew it worked. You wouldn't want to try one of the other buttons only to have it not work. Within seconds, the swap occurred, and you now looked exactly like Samus, only still wearing your clothes, while Samus now looked like you.

"Woah!" Samus exclaims once she realises what has happened, before reaching a hand up to her throat when she notices she has your voice as well. Zelda, stunned into silence, merely watches as Samus looks over her body, which was now yours. You just smile smugly, and put your hands on your borrows hips.

"Well, do you believe me now?" you say, amused that it comes out in Samus's voice.

"Well I suppose we have no choice but to believe you now," Zelda says, somewhat calmly given the situation. Samus just frantically nods.

"See? That wasn't so hard. Now how about we have a little fun with this thing?"

Zelda opens her mouth as if to reply, but she is interrupted by Samus. "Can I at least have my body back before we go experimenting?"

You think about it. Samus was your friend, so really you should be nice and give her her body back. But on the other hand, Samus had always been the strongest of the three of you, so it was pretty amusing seeing her so vulnerable and worried like this. It seemed like a fairly mean-spirited thing to find funny, but since the remote could swap bodies and the three of you would be playing around with the remote, did it really matter which body Samus had right now?
1553322111121.title: Swap with Samus

choices: Both of them follow, Zelda is reluctant to swap now, but Samus is even more so
15533221111211.content:
You looked at your best friends, Zelda, who both intrigued and terrified by the power of the remote, and Samus who was looking over your frailer body she was loaned.
While you liked seeing more of Samus than just the tough bounty hunter image she normally had, you could now see her insecure side, but it saddened you to know that you had hurt Samus, making her feel so weak and vulnerable.
You held up the remote, and your friend took hold of it on to it, as you swapped back.
Samus looked over her body, made a slight smile and sigh, feeling strong, safe and like her self again.
You smiled, seeing you friend happy again, "Come on, I'm going to swap more."
Zelda grabbed your shoulder, "Are you sure that's a good idea?"
"Well, we aren't hurting anybody, no one knows about it, we can swap back when we want to, and you don't have to swap if you don't want to," you said skipping off, as Zelda couldn't argue
15533221111211.title: Swap back with Samus

choices: Get your body back and do something else.
Keep Donkey Kong's body and do another switch.
Keep Donkey Kong's body and find someone else.
15533221112.content: As Peach, you smiled to yourself. Well, I know it works, you thought. Now what should I do next?
15533221112.title: Peach had ideas for the body or remote.

choices: Swap something else with Donkey Kong.
Leave him be and find someone else to swap with.
Leave him be. You have your own plans.
155332211121.content:
You make your decision and press your button. In an instant you find yourself back in your own body. You're not sure what's more amazing: that you were able to switch bodies with Donkey Kong twice, or that you were able to do so without him even noticing.

Indeed, Donkey Kong was still there if you still wanted to swap something with him, although he looks to be going on his way. You realized that if you still want to do something with DK, you should do it now.
155332211121.title: Get your body back and do something else.

1553322111212.content:
Deciding you don't want to swap with Donkey Kong anymore, you went off to the Garden, as you originally planned, to search for someone else to swap with. You were amazed at what the remote you held in your hands could do. It could change everything about from your clothes to your relationships to your entire life. You wanted to explore its power a bit more.

At the garden, you find two people hanging out in the Garden. A closer look tells you that they are Link and Samus. They were both in a perfect position for an unnoticed swap as they are a fair distance away from each other. But on the other hand there may be better people to swap with elsewhere like in the gym or the library.

You consider your options before deciding to...
1553322111212.title: Leave him be and find someone else to swap with.

15533221112121.content: After some consideration you decided to swap with...
15533221112121.title: Swap with Link or Samus

155332211121211.content:
You decided to swap with Link. It could result in some humorous results that you'll be able to witness on a regular basis. Now the question is what should you swap with Link.

First, there's the body swap option. It'll be interesting to have Link's body as it's male and far more muscular than yours. But you'll still have everything else about you. It'll also be funny to see yourself in the mirror as Link dressed up like a princess and Link with your body. Of course, there are other options to try too.
155332211121211.title: Link

1553322111212112.content:
Of course, there's also the clothes swap option. It would be kind of fun to see how you will work in Link's clothes with his equipment and all. You will still have your magic too so it'll be interesting how you can work your magic with Link's equipment. It would also be funny to see Link in your dress complete with accessories. The though of Link fixing up his makeup and fighting with his hips and parasol made you giggle.

But there are still four more swap options and there's more to the remote according to the manual.
1553322111212112.title: More Swaps

15533221112121122.content:
There's also the life swap option. If you pick this option, you'll be the hero instead of the damsel in distress you were on a regular basis. It'll also be pretty funny seeing Link dressing and acting like you. You'll be also be in Link's clothes and skills and you're wondering how well you'll do with them.

Lastly you'll have all of Link's relationships including friends, enemies and lovers. You knew that Link had a fair amount of friends and not too many enemies. But what made you less than pleased is that you'll end up becoming Zelda's boyfriend or girlfriend in this case.

But if you decided not to pick the life swap option there are at least three other options you can pick.
15533221112121122.title: More Swaps

155332211121211222.content:
For the fourth option you have there's the head swap option. Out of all of them you find this one to be the oddest of them all. You will retain your original life as well as everything you have on your head. But you'll have everything that Link has below his head. This includes his body, his equipment and the skills Link's body has.

You weren't sure if this is the one you wanted to pick as you weren't entirely comfortable with your head on someone else's body.

Of course you still have two more options if this one isn't appealing to you.
155332211121211222.title: More Swaps

1553322111212112222.content:
Deciding against head swapping with Link, you look at the last two swap options on the remote.

The first one is Relationship Swap. This option will swap your relationships with Link's. These relationships include friendships, rivals, and lovers. You knew Link had a fair amount of friends and not too many rivals. But you weren't entirely comfortable being in a romantic relationship with Zelda. The manual also said that if you swap relationships with someone from another world, adjustments will be made for you to live in that world. You weren't how to feel about potentially living in Hyrule with Zelda.

The other is Gender Swap. This option will swap your gender with Link's. You will keep your original clothing, your life, weapons, etc. But everything will adjust as if you and Link were born the opposite gender. The manual also said that the level of masculinity or femininity will also affect the outcome. Link is a fairly masculine guy so you'll end up about as masculine as he is with the gender swap.

You decided to go with...
1553322111212112222.title: More Swaps

155332211121212.content:
You decided to swap with Samus. While it won't be as different as it would be if you swapped with Link, swapping with Samus may provide some interesting results in their own right. Now the question is what should you swap with her.

First, there's the body swap option. You knew that not much would change with this button. But you were interested in how well you would fight in Samus' body and it would be interesting to see her body in your dress and your body in her clothes. Oh course, there are other options you can try.
155332211121212.title: Samus

1553322111212122.content: Second, there's the button for a head swap. This would be very similar to the body swap, but you'd get to keep you voice, which could be nice. You'd also be wearing Samus' clothes after the swap. You could also choose to try a different kind of swap.
1553322111212122.title: Head Swap?

15533221112122.content: Deciding to want to find someone else to swap with, you walk away from the garden and head towards the....
15533221112122.title: Try to find someone else

choices: Life Swap with your Classic Trophy.
Life Swap with your All-Star Trophy.
Relationship Swap with your Classic Trophy.
1553322111213.content:
You race off as fast as you can. Donkey Kong turns at the sudden sound of your running, shrugs, and continues on his way.

You knew what to do with this remote. You'd have to test it first, but if it worked you'd never have to be kidnapped at Bowser's whim ever again.

You raced down the halls, away from the arena and the competitors' quarters. All the way you were keeping your dress up so you didn't trip. Eventually, you were able to reach the trophy area.

The trophy area was where the hands kept the Smash Trophies that were made before each tournament. There were hundreds of trophies but you found the one you were looking for.

It was a trophy of yourself. Once you swapped with it then Bowser wouldn't try to kidnap you. At least, that's what you hoped.

The choice then was what swap to make. If you performed a relationship swap, then no one would have any personal feelings towards you, but you would still be yourself, the Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. You were certain that you could rebuild your friendships, but then you were also worried that Bowser might try to kidnap you even if he didn't care about you personally. He would still be a tyrant trying to conquer your kingdom after all.

If you made a life swap then you'd be considered a trophy yourself and Bowser would have no reason to kidnap you. Of course you'd have to change back once the tournament ended, unless you got your trophy back to take home. Then you could keep switching. You'd be a trophy when Bowser caused trouble, and yourself when things were peaceful.

With either swap it would be a mindless trophy that was kidnapped, not you or anyone else. Smiling at your own cleverness, you pointed your remote and performed a-
1553322111213.title: Leave him be. You have your own plans.

15533221112132.content:
Feeling a little cheeky, you decide to do a life swap with your All-Star trophy (http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140...).

All it takes is the press of the button, and it's done. The figure in front of you is now wearing your pink dress while you-
15533221112132.title: Life Swap with your All-Star Trophy.

choices: The remote hits your finger, causing a life swap
The trophy takes the remote, leaving you stuck
155332211121321.content:
You find yourself almost completely unable to move. The only thing that seems to be able to move are your eyes. You are an inanimate object; no breath, no heartbeat, and yet you are somehow still conscious. Your feet are affixed firmly to the base of the trophy, your face is stuck in a permanent smile, your clothing seems to be almost as if it were a part of you. You would be tearing up right now if it were possible for you to do so. Looking down, you can see you still hold the remote in your hand, your finger on the life swap button, but you are unable to move the finger and save yourself from this prison you've created for yourself.

The trophy in front of you, however, is completely alive. She still seems to be made out of whatever material it was the Hands used for the trophies, her eyes still glassy, and yet she seemed to be able to move freely as if she were made from flesh and bones. She seemed to be admiring you, as you would have admired your own trophy.

The worst part of this was no one would ever know. Your trophy would take over your life and no one would be the wiser. You'd only ever get to see anyone when they came in to see the trophies, and even then you couldn't talk to them. And when the tournament ended, what happened to the trophies? You hadn't seen any of the trophies from the previous tournaments around here. Would you just be melted down and put out of your misery once the tournament was over?

"Oh? What's that?" You hear your own voice, but it doesn't come from you. Your trophy, now alive and living your life, seems to have noticed the remote in your hand. As she reaches for it, you hope with all your might that she'll end up bumping the remote against your finger so you can life swap out of this trophy again.
155332211121321.title: You can't move!

1553322111213211.content: If you could breathe, you'd be holding your breath right now. As your All-Star Trophy takes hold of the remote, it gets nudged ever so slightly against your finger, pressing down the life swap button. But who or what was the remote pointing at?
1553322111213211.title: The remote hits your finger, causing a life swap

choices: Try to find someone for her to swap with
Try to find a way to make her a normal trophy again
15533221112132111.content:
You let out a sigh of relief as you feel yourself able to move again. You were yourself again, and you certainly weren't going back to being a trophy again. You are about to leave, when you suddenly notice something odd. The trophy's eyes seemed to be moving, darting around in a panic. You realised that anyone touching the remote would be aware of the swaps, so since the trophy had been touching the remote when you swapped, it was fully aware of what had happened. Since it still thought it was you, it was probably experiencing the same thoughts you had been when you had gotten yourself trapped as a trophy, except that she didn't know what was happening because she didn't know what the remote was.

You felt pretty bad about this. You had essentially created a copy of your own mind inside the body of your All-Star Trophy, and then trapped it inside of an inanimate trophy. She was probably in a state of panic right now. From her point of view, she had just been turned into a trophy after touching some some weird remote that it was holding, and now the trophy had taken her life. There had to be something you could do about this. Maybe you could find a way to get her out of the trophy, like swapping her with someone else. Or perhaps there was a way to just make her a normal trophy again.
15533221112132111.title: The trophy in your life

choices: Take the trophy to your room
155332211121321111.content: Feeling guilty for giving someone life just to take it away you decide to try to swap it with someone nearby...
155332211121321111.title: Try to find someone for her to swap with

choices: Someone from the Fire Emblem world
15533221112132112.content: You find your perspective changes, but you are still unable to move. You can see the trophy in your old life from where you are standing, as well as the trophy you had swapped with, now dressed in the orange dress your trophy had been wearing. You can see that the trophy you have swapped with is...
15533221112132112.title: Someone else's trophy

155332211121321121.content: Which All-Star trophy did you end up as?
155332211121321121.title: Someone from the Pokemon world

1553322111213211211.content: Which All-Star trophy did you end up as?
1553322111213211211.title: Pikachu/Lucario

choices: She tries to take the remote again
She leave the remote there are runs off
15533221112132112111.content:
As if being inanimate object wasn't bad enough, you were now naked except for a hat on your head, down on all fours with you butt stick up in the air and an angry look on your face. You still held the remote, taunting you, ready to perform another life swap. You felt rather embarrassed about your current pose, but also upset about the fact you could do nothing about it. If you could, you'd be crying right now.

You notice that the trophy in your life seems confused as to why touching the remote made the trophy of her turn into a trophy of a Pikachu wearing the orange dress you had been wearing before. You remember that anyone touching the remote would be aware of the swap, so the trophy in your life would have been able to see what happened, although she wouldn't know why since only you knew what the remote did. She looked around before noticing where you now stood.

"What on earth?" she says as she comes over towards you. She can see that you've swapped with Pikachu's All-Star trophy, but she still sees you as an ordinary trophy, so she probably doesn't see your eyes moving about, watching her. She looks down at the remote, held in your hand of the base of the trophy. "Hmmm..."
15533221112132112111.title: Pikachu

155332211121321122.content: Which All-Star trophy did you end up as?
155332211121321122.title: Someone from the Fire Emblem world

1553322111213211221.content: Which All-Star trophy did you end up as?
1553322111213211221.title: Marth/Ike

choices: The trophy comes over to you
The trophy leaves, and you're stuck until someone else find you
15533221112132112212.content:
You can see that the trophy that you had been a few seconds ago now depicted Ike, a swordsman from the world of Fire Emblem, dressed in the orange dress your trophy had been wearing and holding an orange parasol. The trophy in your life seemed to be confused about what happened, since she was aware of the change, but didn't know about the remote's powers.

As for you, you now stood where Ike's All-Star trophy had been, dress as it had been, and performing the same pose. The change hadn't been too bad, if it wasn't for Ike's sword. Despite now being in the life of his trophy, you lacked Ike's strength, and the sword was actually rather heavy. Being frozen in place, you were unable to put it down, but it didn't stop your arms from hurting from holding it up. If you didn't get out of this trophy's life some time soon, the aching would probably become unbearable. Even worse was the fact that due to the way you were holding the sword, the remote was pointing behind you, so even if someone did discover the remote in your hand, the odds of swapping with them instead of another trophy when your finger nudged the button would be very slim. You carefully watch the trophy in your life as she examined the trophy of Ike in her dress. You hoped she'd notice you and do something that could somehow get you out of this predicament.
15533221112132112212.title: Ike

155332211121322.content:
To your relief, you find that you're still able to move. Then you try to widen your smile.

My face is frozen! You try to close your eyes, open your mouth, twitch your lip. None of it works; you feel your face stuck in a generic smile. You try to make a noise, but you can't. You can't even move your tongue against your teeth.

You decide to do a more thorough examination of yourself. You start with your crown, but you can't take it off. The crown is stuck to your hair. You try to take your gloves off, but can't. Putting down the remote and manual, you work on your clothes. Nothing comes off, not even your earrings. In fact, it almost feels like your clothes are part of you - you don't feel anything separate of yourself under them.

You pinch yourself. The flesh moves, but there's no pain. Realizing that you haven't taken a breath, you put your hand to your chest and find you don't have a heartbeat. Your eyes aren't tearing up. Your hair compresses but doesn't split. It moves as a semi-solid block, the way it would if you were some sort of animation. You imagine that you could tie it into a tail, but styling it probably wouldn't be necessary anymore.

You take a few minutes to compose yourself regarding your new state. Apparently, this is what it meant to be a "living" trophy. Well, at least the remote worked. True, you'd miss out on all the fighting now, but at least you should be left alone.

You wondered what to do next. You were wearing the yellow and orange dress the trophy once did. You could do a clothes swap and get back your own dress. Or perhaps you could do a body swap and get the trophy's mane of orange-brown hair. Either way would certainly match better than how things were now.

Or.... You thought about the trophy. Technically the trophy was supposed to be living your life. You were becoming very curious about that. Yes, the trophy was a trophy right now. Then again, the smash competitors had been turned into trophies during the last tournament. You knew how to change them back. What would happen? you wondered, if I were to touch the trophy base?
155332211121322.title: You can move, kind of.

1553322111213222.content: As you ready yourself to perform a body swap with the trophy, you think about what the consequences of the swap might be. You were currently considered a trophy, but you were able to move as if you were alive, with some restrictions. You weren't sure whether that was due to having a living human body, or because you were a living human before the swap occurred. If you swapped with the trophy, you'd instead be made of... whatever material it was the Hands made the trophies out of. Would you still be able to move? Would you still be conscious at all? There was the possibility that this swap could cause you to become trapped as a lifeless trophy forever. However, you had made up your mind; you were going to try it out. You point the remote at the trophy that currently occupied your life, and pressed the body swap button.
1553322111213222.title: Body Swap.

choices: Try swapping with some other trophies.
Someone else comes into the trophy area.
15533221112132221.content:
After the swap occurs, you are delighted to discover that you can still move. Your flesh-and-bones body now stood upon the trophy stand. It seemed more lifelike than the trophies the Hands made, probably because it was. You could now see and feel how lifelike the trophies were first hand. You body felt like some sort of plastic or something, and your skin was coated in some sort of finish that made the trophies shine. Your "flesh" was a lot more solid than real flesh, still allowing you to move around as you had before, but not moving when you did things like pinch yourself. You couldn't feel a difference between flesh and bones, probably because you had neither and your body was the same material all the way through. Even your hair had the same platicy feel to it, and felt less like individual hairs that merely moved as one, and more like one big solid block. You could still move it though, as you had been able to with your hair before, and all the other restrictions you had discovered about your body before still remained, such as being unable to move your face or remove your clothing. Even more than before your clothes felt like they were a part of you.

Overall, becoming a living trophy was a rather fascinating experience. You were made of some solid plasticy material, and yet you were somehow able to think and move. You pondered your next move. You were currently considered a trophy, albeit one that could move and think. Clearly no one expected you to be anywhere, but if someone saw a trophy outside of the trophy are, they'd probably just take you back here. Still, there were plenty of trophies here for you to experiment on. It'd let you try out all sorts of different things without messing up any real people.

Now that you had tried that out, you were feeling more adventurous, and wondered about what trying out one of the other bodies modeled in the trophies would be like. You were currently still in the section where all the trophies for the fighters in the tournament were stored, but not too far off was where all the trophies for assist characters and other things associated with the tournament were stored, and in the other direction were a bunch of trophies of things that weren't in the tournament, and were really just created to show off more about the different worlds. 15533221112132233.content:
With just a touch of your hand to the base the figure began to glow. You couldn't help but be a little disappointed. The whole point of this had been so that no one would have to suffer the nuisance of being kidnapped by Bowser or some other evil being.

Wait, but does it count if she started as a trophy? She wasn't alive before, so does making her alive now make it good? Would it be right if I made her just a trophy again and never swapped back? Would that even work now? Hmm, it's still mean if she's only alive when someone comes to kidnap "me," isn't it. Maybe I should share- Oh, this isn't fair! I just wanted to be able to relax. Now I have to handle this. Well, maybe it could be fun? She'd be like-

"Oh wow."

Your thoughts were interrupted by the sound of your own voice. You looked forward and saw that your All-Star Trophy self had picked up the remote and was looking through the manual. She looked at you and pressed a button.

In an instant you were wearing your pink dress again, and she was wearing her yellow and orange one. She squealed, "This is great! I need to try this some more!"

She didn't seem to think anything of you. To her you were nothing but a trophy. But you were certainly paying attention to her. Her skin looked like it had a thin bit of finish to it. Her eyes were glassy- no they weren't glassy, they were glass. And her hair was a solid block of sculpted material attached to her head.

As you looked her over, the trophy living your life walked off, remove and manual in her hands.

155332211121322331.content:
You followed her as quietly as you could, hoping not to attract her attention. You barely take a few steps when you almost stumble. Fortunately, the trophy was too engrossed reading the manual to care. You keep following, but there's a nagging feeling in the back of your head.

As the two of you go down the corridors, you notice that you're not hungry at all. That doesn't surprise you, but then you think about baking a cake and realize you've completely forgotten how. Your mind races as you think of other things - using your moves, cooking, putting on your clothes and makeup, even trying to talk.

It occurs to you that you don't know how to do any of that. You'd gasp if you could. All your skills have transferred over to the trophy now living your life. You remember doing all those things, but now you couldn't do any of them if you tried. You realize what the nagging feeling in your head is - it's you walking. Even walking is something you're barely able to do, and it's taking all your efforts to keep up.

So what can I do? you wondered. Focusing, you did what came naturally. You struck the pose of the All-Star Trophy you were now, unconsciously pulling out a parasol, and your mind goes blank.

155332211211.content:
You point the remote at Donkey Kong and press the Head Swap button, just sort of curious about what it would be like. In an instant, your head was no longer on your own female human body. Instead, you were standing a little further down the hallway, your body now big, muscular, and hairy. You couldn't help but giggle at the ridiculousness of the situation. You still had your own head, but it was now on Donkey Kong's body. You almost felt tempted to pound your chest like the big ape who's body you possessed, but you resist the urge, realising that people will still see you as Princess Peach, even if you have the body of Donkey Kong.

You decide you've had enough fun with DK's body for now, and turn around to look back at where you had been standing before the swap, so that you could swap back with him. As you had suspected, DK looked just as ridiculous as you probably did now, his head on top of your body. However, unlike you, DK was unaware of the changes, and had been walking away, taking your body with him. You may have had a little fun with DK's body, but you had no intention of letting him walk away with yours, leaving you stuck. You quickly point the remote at Donkey Kong, when you realise a bigger problem. With Donkey Kong's large hands, your fingers were now a bit too big for the buttons. What if you tried to press the head swap button, but accidentally pressed something else instead? You didn't really have much of a choice, though, since DK was almost out of sight. Crossing your fingers and hoping for the best, you point the remote at DK and try to press the head swap button.
155332211211.title: Head Swap

15533221122.content: Which swap do you use?
15533221122.title: Life Swap/Relationship Swap/Gender Swap

155332211221.content:
You decide it might be fun to take a bit of a break from having to be a princess, and acting accordingly. You point the remote at Donkey Kong and press the life swap button. In an instant, you find yourself across the hallway, completely naked except for a red and yellow tie around your neck. It catches you off guard, and you instinctively reach up to cover your privates. However as you realise that the remote had worked it's magic, you slowly lower your arms back to your sides, knowing everyone will just see you as a big, hairy ape instead of a near-naked princess. You still felt embarrassed, but you resist the urge to keep covering yourself up.

Looking back over at where you had previously stood, you saw Donkey Kong walking away, now dressed in your clothes. He looked absolutely ridiculous, and you couldn't help but laugh a bit at how he looked. He didn't stick around long though, and by the time you had finished laughing, he had already left. You supposed you were stuck in his life even if you didn't want it now, but you didn't mind, deciding that the life of an ape was the perfect vacation from acting like royalty.

"What to do now?" you thought aloud. However, you are surprised to hear now words coming from your mouth, but ape-like grunts. You frown, realising the downside of this vacation; you could no longer speak properly, and the only person who would probably understand you now was Diddy Kong. You put your free hand on your hip, and hold the remote up where you could see it with the other hand. Sure, Donkey Kong's like could be a good vacation from being a princess, but now that you knew the remote worked, there was no reason to stop using it. There was plenty of fun you could still have with it. But maybe you should sort out the clothes situation first, you did still feel a little embarrassed about being naked.
155332211221.title: Life Swap

Whether it was with a ball he found, when he tried playing with Donkey Kong, who left soon after, while Pikachu stuck around. Saying he looked cute was an understatement, he was down right adorable. However this couldn't last, Pikachu had slowed down, and his stomach growled, and started to crawl off to get some food, and still looked cute. "I can't lose him, I haven't swapped yet," you pulled a turnip from the ground, and cleared your throat. Pikachu turned around, as you signalled to come and eat, Pikachu happy obliged.

As he was happily eating, you thought of swaps, "I could Relationships with him, so I could spent more time with Samus, I could also swap bodies with him, that way I would be cute, and maybe Samus would agree. I could get a similar result with Head or life swaps. Oh, and seeing him in my dress was just be far to adorable, but which to do?" You asked yourself,

With a soft landing, you hear a click, followed by a 'Whooosh' as your perception moves over towards Pikachu; or more accurately, your naked body in-front of Pikachu. Pushing yourself off the ground, you breathe a sigh of relief over getting your body...or you try to. But you can't breathe. Panic wells up within you and reach a hand up to touch your face, only for your worst fears to be confirmed. Your head is a turnip.

You didn't even notice Pikachu walk away as you dealt with this very strange feeling. Your eyes could not blink, they could only stare forward. You could not look from side to side, either, unless you physically turned your head. You couldn't say a word, couldn't breathe or smell, and couldn't hear...you'd think, anyway? Because for some reason, you can hear just fine. Maybe that's the remotes doing.

The remote! You sharply turn over to where you think the remote was last, and are again relieved to find the remote where you left it. But wait...where is your head?

Lying in a pile of your clothing next to the remote was your head, stating blanking into the distance. At the very least, that was one thing you didn't need to worry about. You decide to try and get back to normal, so you pick up the remote, aim at your head on the ground, and press the clothes swap button.

Now you were no longer naked, but you still had a turnip where your head should be. You couldn't just use the head swap button; then you'd just be a turnip again with your lifeless body, still in the turnip's "life" lying next to you. You supposed you could probably do a body swap, which would turn you into just a head, and then you could try to use your face to push the button you needed to get your head back onto your body.

Pressing the buttons with your face didn't exactly sound like the easiest.thing in the world, though, and it seemed like something you might easily mess up, just as you had messed up previously, resulting in the current dilemma. You have a look around. There was nobody in the immediate vicinity, but it probably wouldn't be too difficult to find someone. Perhaps you could give someone else the turnip head until you came up with a better plan. You'd just need to do a body swap with someone. And if you used a head swap afterwards, you could even keep your own body and just use their head. You'd just need to make sure you kept the turnip your head had become safe until you came up with a better.plan to get your own.head back.

1553322121311211.content:
As much as you were worried about messing up, you didn't want anyone else to be stuck with a turnip head like you currently were, so instead opt to risk pushing the buttons with your face. But for now, it was probably.safer to do this in private. You pick up your head from the ground, and take it, and the remote, back to your room.

Luckily, you found it to be empty, so you wouldn't have Zelda.questioning what you were doing. You put your head down on your bed, and then sit down yourself. You could have a look in the mirror, but you have no desire to see the sort of abomination you've become. You just want to be back to normal. You aim the remote at your head and press.body swap.

As usual, the swap happens instantaneously. You can once again breath normal, blink, and, "I can talk again!" You do notice, however, that you were surrounded by a pile of pink material that seemed to be your dress. It looked a lot bigger with you just being a head right now. Since you had swapped clothes earlier, you were still "wearing" your dress, and it unfortunately obscured your vision of your turnip-headed body. "Hm, that might make it a but hard to aim."

Luckily, since you had only just swapped, the remote was pretty much already pointed at it's previous target. You awkwardly shuffle your head around to you could easily get to the swap buttons on the remote. "Now, how can I do this?" You hadn't really given it much thought when you decided on this plan. Your try to bend over and press the head swap button with your nose, but end up almost tipping over, and you inadvertently press the Swap Mode 2 button. "Oh well, it's not like it'll matter if the turnip is aware of the swap." If your nose wasn't working, you only saw one real option. "This is so gross..." You stock your tongue out and try to press the head swap button with it.

However, while looking around to see if anything else had changed, you noticed something peculiar. The frilly bit of your dress that sat around your neck no longer seemed to be attached to the rest of the dress. "Wait, then, did I...?" You try to maneuver your head so that you could see where your neck would be if you were back on your own body, and as you suspected, your head was attached to the neck hole of the dress. "Oh my." So now you were a head attached to a dress, and your "clothing" was a small part of the dress around your neck. However, now you were curious; Could you move? When you had swapped bodies with the turnip you couldn't really move anything with how stiff the turnip was. The dress was a lot more flexible than the turnip, though, even if it was normally an inanimate object. Perhaps now that it was part of you, you could actually control it. In order to test this, you attempt to move the sleeve of your dress like you would your arm.

As you attempt to move your "arm", you see the sleeve of the dress moving as you commanded. It was a little imprecise, with the sleeve being much shorter than your old arm, and being made of fabric instead of flesh, but you could actually move it. "Woah..." you mumble. You decide to try sitting up. As easy as it would normally have been, the dress extends upwards until your head was at about the height it would be if you were sitting, with skirt of the dress still spread out on the bed. This also causes the remote to fall off the dress and onto the bed, next to the turnip with your body. However, right now you were curious about being a living piece of clothing, so the remote, and getting your own body back, could wait for a little while.

You notice your gloves sitting on the bed, and you shoes on the floor next to it. Was it just your dress you could control? The clothes swap gave you all of your old clothes back, but maybe the head swap only worked on the dress. To experiment more, you focus on your left glove, and try moving the fingers.
