15533222222212122.content: You decide you're not done with just one swap, and want to try out more. But then the question was what to swap. You had just done a life swap, but doing another one could give you the ability to talk again, even if it meant putting some clothes on again. But on the other hand, there were plenty of other swaps you could still try out, and after seeing the results of this one, you can't wait to try them out.
15533222222212122.title: Make a swap of some kind with another fighter...

155332222222121221.content:
Someone comes around the corner
Who is it
155332222222121221.title: Do another life swap

1553322222221212211.content: Suddenly, olimar comes around the corner with a red, yellow, and blue pikmin following him. You always thought it was so cute how the pikmin would follow olimar around so you point the remote at him and hit life swap. Suddenly, you are were olimar was. You look and see that you are wearing olimar's spacesuit and helmet. You look behind you and see the pikmin looking at you. You always thought pikmin were so cute and now you could have some. You decide to stay in this life for a while but that doesn't mean you can't make other changes or do you spend time with the pikmin.
1553322222221212211.title: olimar

155332222222122.content:
You consider the other swaps you have available. The body swap button would give you Charizard's body entirely, but you'd still be wearing the same clothes you've always worn. That's also mean that Charizard would be walking around naked in your body, but everyone would think that was normal. Speaking of clothes, you could do a clothes swap, making Charizard wear your dress, and letting you walk around naked and have everyone think it was normal. It would be a little strange, having almost everything normal in your world except for the fact that people would expect you to wear absolutely nothing.

There was also the relationship swap. People would still believe you were Princess Zelda, albeit a princess of Kanto rather than Hyrule, but you'd be friends mainly with Pokemon instead of other human Smashers. You'd be curious to see how your relationship with Charizard's trainer, Red, would be when the tournament was over, but that'd leave you stuck with no way to return to Hyrule until the next tournament, so you figured you should probably leave your experimenting to within the bounds of the tournament. Lastly, the was the gender swap. Not being an expert on Pokemon, you weren't sure how much would change about Charizard if you were to make him into a female, but no doubt you'd end up changing greatly. It made you curious about what it was like to be a man, but after a while if you wanted to swap back, would you remember that it was Charizard you had swapped with? You couldn't really tell what his gender was aside from what people had told you, so if you didn't remember, you'd probably have to turn one of your fellow female Smashers into a man if you wanted your old form back.
155332222222122.title: More Swaps

1553322222221221.content:
Narrowing down your choices, you selected body and clothes swap buttons.
Looking over to the large winged reptile, "If I swap bodies, I will be myself, in my clothes but I will look like a dragon like creature. Will I get it's powers, will I lose my mine. Will I be able to talk, will I fly. I would know if I swapped. If I didn't like it, I could swap back," you analyse.

"But that might be to large of a change to just be a test. I could swap clothes, but that would leave me naked," you argued with your self.
Pointing the remote at the pokemon, you pushed the
1553322222221221.title: Body Swap/Clothes Swap

choices: Keep Charizard's body/Swap with someone else
15533222222212211.content:
Making your choice, you aim the remote at Charizard and press the body swap button. Within seconds, your Hylian body is replaced with Charizard's orange, dragon-like form, as he receives yours. You find that despite the huge change in your body, you are still wearing the same clothes, only adjusted to fit your new body. This also meant Charizard was currently naked in your body, but no one would see anything out of the ordinary so it didn't matter. What did matter is you now needed to remember to keep your new tail low enough that it didn't lift up your dress.

Everything about your new body felt so different, it was hard to describe. Aside from the addition of wings and a tail, your proportions were very different, with a much longer neck, skinnier arms, and thicker legs. Your facial structure was completely different, as were your hands and feet. The oddest feeling of all of this was the extra appendages to control, however. You were used to just have two arms and two legs, so adding a tail and two wings onto that felt almost like you had too much to control. And you could definitely validate your earlier assumption that Charizard was male, as you certainly couldn't feel anything resembling your old female parts hidden within your panties.

"Wow," you say in almost a whisper. You are surprised that you can still manage to speak properly despite having Charizard's voice. You assume Charizard can still only make growling noises and roars even though he has your voice now. Along with keeping your old ability to speak, you can still feel the Triforce of Wisdom with you, and the magic power you relied on for your attacks. Which probably meant you had kept all your own skills while Charizard had retained his. You were curious as to how Charizard was supposed to fly without wings.

Despite your immense transformation, possibly the most interesting part of the swap was the no one seemed to notice. No one thought it was odd that Charizard and your bodies had swapped places, but kept your original clothes. You could mess around with reality as much as you liked thanks to this remote, and no one would notice if you didn't want them to. You grin, flashing your sharp reptilian teeth, as you realise how much fun you could have with this little device.

You hear a grunt that sounds like your old voice, as Charizard begins to walk off. You weren't sure where he was going, so if you wanted your body back any time soon, you'd have to do it now. Of course, you didn't have to take your body back; you could just keep Charizard's for now and see how that went. Or, since you still had the remote, you could always try out someone else's body. Turning into a large dragon-like creature like Charizard had been interesting, but there were plenty of other things you could become here at the tournament.
15533222222212211.title: Body swap button

1553322222222.content: Are you the greedy tyrant of Dreamland, King Dedede?
1553322222222.title: More Characters

choices: Have the Waddle Dees use it.
Have the Waddle Dees use it, and go with them.
15533222222221.content:
You are King Dedede, the ruler of Dreamland. Sure, deep down you may not be a bad guy, but you're still a king and you should live like one. If the things you do cause anyone trouble, it happens. As long as everything ends well, that's what matters. That's why you came to this tournament when you heard that Kirby had been invited here long ago. Metaknight followed you, and now once again the three of you were here, getting ready for the big tournament.

You liked the tournament. You didn't quite trust the Hands, but there was nothing like having an excuse to bash people and not get in trouble for it. Even better, sometimes you got to attack your hated enemy (or at least annoying friendly rival) Kirby. It was a lot of fun.

You were strutting around the place, heading to your quarters, when you spotted a small box on the floor. You wouldn't have cared, but it was in your way. And you wouldn't have picked it up, but no one else was around. So you gave a small snort of annoyance and picked it up.

You opened the box. Inside was a remote and a manual. You read the manual, if only to find the owner and get that smug moment of talking down to them for littering.

The manual, however, was very interesting. If it was right, the remote had the incredible power of swapping aspects without others realizing that reality had been altered. Now that you knew it was a valuable object, you "ruled" that Finders Keepers applied.

Now, what to do with it? On the one hand, you could use the remote yourself. You weren't sure what anyone else had that was better than what you had, but perhaps you could find something.

On the other hand, you had your Waddle Dees. You had been practicing and no longer used them in battle, so this would be a good way to get them to stop slacking off and do something. And if the remote messed up, this would be safer for you.

You frowned. If you weren't touching the remote, you wouldn't be aware of the swaps. On the one hand, as long as they stayed loyal to you (and why wouldn't they?) you didn't have to be aware of the swaps. As long as things went your way, you'd know why.

On the other hand, maybe it'd be more fun if you were holding the remote as they pushed the buttons. But then again, that'd be more work for you.

Decisions, decisions. It's not easy being the king, you thought.
15533222222221.title: King Dedede

155332222222213.content:
If you want a job right, you have to do it yourself. Or at least watch while your minions do it. You nod at your own wisdom. Now came the hard part.

The Waddle Dees were no longer part of the tournament. Technically they weren't really supposed to be here, but no king worth his salt would shlep his own luggage around. They were bumming around, roaming the halls and hiding out where they could, all at your wise command of course. It took you a while but you were able to find one sleeping alongside the wall.

"Wake up!" You ordered.

The Waddle Dee sprang to attention and saluted with its stubbly little hand.

You cocked an eye at him. "You ready to serve me?"

The Waddle Dee nodded.

"You willing to obey my orders?"

The Waddle Dee nodded again.

"Hmph! Good! Follow me!" You kept going, now with a Waddle Dee in tow and wheels turning in your head. If you could get the Waddle Dees to swap lives or relationships with others, then those targets would become your loyal servants while your aware and still-loyal minions would be installed in positions of power. You grinned darkly at your brilliance deciding to go for-
155332222222213.title: Have the Waddle Dees use it, and go with them.

1553322222222131.content:
Yes. The Mushroom Kingdom or Hyrule would be good places to expand your influence. Of course, if you found someone else in a decent position of power you could go for them instead. And at the same time you would be looking out for more of your Waddle Dees while you searched. Keeping your options open and your ability to multitask are just two of the reasons why you're the king.

And indeed, as you're searching for more Waddle Dees you happen to find someone who would be more useful serving you than living out their own boring lives, and that someone was-
1553322222222131.title: The princesses.

15533222222221311.content:
You saw Samus walking down the corridor. She was looking at you warily, no doubt sensing the cunning machinations going on in your own mind. You held out the remote and gave your Waddle Dee the go ahead nod.

The Waddle Dee jumped up and pushed the button on the remote to activate the-
15533222222221311.title: Samus

15533222222222.content: Are you the Aura Pokemon, Lucario?
15533222222222.title: More Characters

choices: Return the remote to the Hands
155332222222221.content:
You are Lucario, the Aura Pokemon. You were one of the several Pokemon competing the the Super Smash Bros tournament, although since you were the only one who could speak the human language which most of the competitors in the tournament spoke, you found yourself often having to translate what the other Pokemon were saying. It grew a little tedious sometimes, but you were happy to help out where you could.

You were heading to the gym, as you wanted to get a little more training in before the Hands started organising practice matches, when you noticed a small box lying in the hallway. Curiosity got the better of you, so you pick up the box and check what was inside. Inside seemed to be some sort of remote and an instruction booklet. A quick look through the manual reveals that this remote is far more advanced than it looked. Far more advanced than anything your world, even.

You had to admit you were curious about how it worked, or whether it worked at all. The easiest way to find out would to be try it yourself. Pressing the buttons with your paws might not be the easiest thing to do, but you were sure you could do it if you tried. However, you also wondered why this device was here. During the last tournament, the Hands had recruited a Manaphy to assist in battles using it's Heart Swap move, but Heart Swap was temporary, and this remote's instruction manual mentioned nothing of the sort. Not only did it not seem to be temporary like Heart Swap, but it could also happen without anyone being aware of the changes, making it unsuitable for something to be used in the tournament. You had a feeling this had probably been brought without the hands being aware of it. Perhaps it would be best to hand it in, and ensure they were aware this item was here.
155332222222221.title: Lucario

1553322222222212.content:
You decide that, despite your curiosity about the remote, it would be best to give this device to the Hands and have them do with it as they see fit. On the way to their office, you take the remote out and examine it. It seemed to be exactly as depicted in the manual. For such a supposed powerful object, it seemed so mundane, like an ordinary TV remote. The only thing that gave it away was the symbols on the blue buttons, things you wouldn't see on a remote for any electrical device.

While examining the remote, you come to an intersection between two hallways. Normally, you would have simply continued on your way, but someone came running down the intersecting hallway, clearly in a hurry to get somewhere. So much in a hurry, in fact, that they don't notice you, and end up running into you, causing you to accidentally press a button and swap with them. Who was this person?
1553322222222212.title: Return the remote to the Hands

155332222222222.content: Are you the shorter-than-average boxer, Little Mac?
155332222222222.title: More Characters

1553322222222221.content:
You are Little Mac, a young boxer from Brooklyn. You had just had a major training session with your trainer, Doc Louis, at the gym, and you had now parted way so you could go relax. Even though Doc was allowed to come to the main gym to help you with your training, he wasn't participating in the tournament himself so he had to stay in the living quarters for assists and background characters. On your way to the leisure room, you happened to notice a box lying on the ground. You thought maybe someone had dropped it, but the hallway seemed deserted, so you picked it up yourself. Inside was a strange looking remote, as well as a manual explaining how to use it. After a little read of the manual, you can hardly believe that this is real. You wonder what you could do with this sort of thing.

The first thing that comes to your mind is that you could make yourself taller. Even though you used your size to your advantage in boxing, you had always been picked on for your height, and this could be your chance to change that. Thanking about who you could swap with, Link seemed like a good choice. He was taller than you, but he also seemed strong enough that you could still hit just as hard after the swap. You thought about going off to find him and perform a body swap, but in the corner of your eye you see a flash of green. Someone is running through an intersection in the hallway, obviously in a hurry to get somewhere. You turn to see if it's the guy you're looking for, but before you get a clear view, you've already accidentally pressed the button and swapped bodies with them. Looking down in shock, you see that instead of Link's body, you've ended up with the body of...
1553322222222221.title: Little Mac

15533222222222211.content: Without any warning by sound or lights, the remote makes the switch. This freaks you out a little, but what freaks you out more was that your point of view didn't get higher off the ground, it got lower. You quickly catch a glimpse of your old body running through the hallway in a bright green tunic before disappearing again. It seems you did swap with Link, just not the Link you were hoping for. There was no way you'd catch up to him with your short stubby legs now. Not only did you not like being even shorter than you were before, but you definitely didn't like having you head feel so massive. It was like its weight could cause you to fall over. You probably wouldn't see Toon Link again until dinner, so you'd have to wait until then if you wanted your own body back, but you definitely weren't waiting until then to get out of his. You wander the hallways looking for someone, anyone, who was taller then you currently were to swap bodies with. And as luck would have it, you came across such a person, and that person was...
15533222222222211.title: Toon Link

155332222222222111.content:
As luck would have it, while trying to find someone taller than you, you happen across the tallest person you know, one of your fellow newcomers, Rosalina. Considering you still wanted to be a hard-hitting fighter, she certainly wouldn't have been your first choice, none of the girls would have been, but right now you just wanted to get out of Toon Link's tiny body, so you'd even take becoming a woman right now. Making sure she didn't see you, you aim the remote at her and press the body swap button. Once again, there is pretty much no warning that anything is happening, but this time your point of view shoots up away from the floor. "Phew," you mumble, "I'm not a midget anymore." You quickly put a hand over your mouth, shocked by the very feminine voice that escaped it. You figured you should probably take a look at the body you'd be in until you found a more suitable one.

The first thing you noticed was that you were no loner seeing out of both eyes, as your right eye is now covered up by Rosalina's pale blonde hair. Since you hand is already held up to your face, you take note of your changed facial structure. Your nose and mouth are a lot smaller, your eyes larger, and your jawline a lot softer. Done with your face, you focus on the rest on your body. Looking down, you are first greeted with two lumps of flesh sticking out of your tank top. You had certainly never viewed a pair of breasts from this angle before. Trying to ignore them for the time being, you take stock of the rest of your body. While you had certainly gained a lot of height, you had lost a lot of muscle mass. Your arms and fingers were very slender, as were your legs and waist. That in itself wouldn't have been too bad, but Rosalina's skinnier body combined with her larger hips made for an experience you never thought you'd experience, nor one that you wanted to. Not to mention how it felt to have Rosalina's 'lady parts'. This felt very strange to you, and you were definitely wanting your old body back as soon as possible, but since you were forced to keep this body, or someone else's, until you found Toon Link again, maybe you'd have changed your tune by then.

Looking back up, you see Rosalina at the other end of the hallway with Toon Link's body. Perhaps it was because you were a bit far away and were only seeing with one eye, but Rosalina's clothes didn't seem too bad on Toon Link's body. Maybe if his hair was a little longer, you'd barely be able to tell something was out of place. Since you had no desire to go back to Toon Link's body, that would probably be Rosalina's permanent look from now on. You let out a laugh at the thought of one of the tallest competitors in the tournament now being the shortest, but because of your voice it ended up sounding more like a feminine giggle, and you stop immediately.

You think about what to do now. It was still a few hours before dinner, so you weren't going to be able to get your body back until then. Having just gotten a new body, you weren't as tired from your workout, so you could try to see just how much of your old power had been retained with your new body at the gym. The manual said that if you performed a life swap you'd receive any skills needed for that life, such as your boxing skill and power, but since you still had your old life, perhaps you could hit just as hard with Rosalina's body as you could your own. And while you were there, perhaps you'd come across someone else to swap with to give you a less feminine body to deal with until dinner, or just to try out some of the other functions of the remote if you got used to Rosalina's body. Of course, you could just head back to your room and get used to her body in private. You still needed to put the manual and the box the remote came from away so you didn't lose it.
155332222222222111.title: Rosalina

choices: Swap clothes with one of the girls
1553322222222221111.content:
You decide you need to see how much of your strength has been retained after the body swap, so you head back to the gym, leaving Rosalina with her new body. When you get there, you put the remote and the manual in your pocket, and throw the box in the bin, before putting your boxing gloves back on. Just like the rest of your clothes, the gloves have been resized to fit Rosalina's smaller hands. This bothers you a little, but you decide to test your strength before laying your final judgement. Once you're all ready, you walk up the one of the sandbags and attack it with full force. You can feel Rosalina's slender limbs flying with as much power and force as your own muscley arms used to. A grin starts to form on your face as you continue to work the back. You shuffle around the bag, punching it from different angles, and find that you're just as light on Rosalina's feet as you were on yours. Giving the bag one final uppercut, you manage to punch the bag off its chain. Breathing a little heavily, you sit down to take your gloves off.

You had a large smile on your face for the first time since you found that remote. It seemed that you were just as strong and fast with Rosalina's body as you were with your own. As long as you didn't swap out of your own life, it didn't matter what you looked like, you were still just as hard a hitter as ever. As an added bonus, the workout had gotten you more used to Rosalina's body and the way it felt. Now that you knew you could still fight the same with her body, you weren't as concerned about how soon you'd get your body back, and how much you'd get used to having someone else's body. In fact, the only downside you saw to this encounter was that your new breasts were a little sore. Since you had only swapped your body, but still kept your old clothes, your breasts weren't supported by a bra, so all the movement from your workout hadn't exactly been the best for them. You thought about trying out the clothes swap feature on one of the girls in the tournament so that your breasts would have a bit of support, but then that would also mean giving up your boxing gloves. Some of the competitors in the tournament wore armor or other things that just wouldn't be too nice to punch bare handed, so you were now comparing in your head whether that would be worse than having your breasts be sore after every fight. You didn't even realise, but you were thinking of Rosalina's body as yours, and you were thinking about things as if you would be keeping it permanently. Either way, you decide to head to the leisure room to relax, just as you were going to do after your first training session with Doc Louis before you found the remote.
1553322222222221111.title: Head to the gym

15533222222222211111.content: You decide that with how hard you can punch, you'll probably get used to punching bare-handed. On your way to the leisure room, you look down every hallway you pass, hoping to see one of the girls participating in the tournament who's clothes you can take. You are about to reach the leisure room still in your old clothes, but you manage to spot someone down the last hallway before the room. Luckily, it's one of the girls you were looking for, and they weren't facing you. That person was...
15533222222222211111.title: Swap clothes with one of the girls

choices: Relax in the leisure room for a while
Someone in the leisure room asks about the remote
155332222222222111111.content:
Down the hallway was Samus, walking down the hallway in her zero suit. That would definitely be interesting for you to wear, but you recall that Samus was participating twice in this year's tournament, once with her power suit and once without. Since swapping clothes with her would likely give you her power suit as well, you think that might mean you'll be the one participating twice. Thinking it over a little, it doesn't seem like too bad an idea. You were only a newcomer in this year's tournament, but if you could participate twice, you could prove twice as much how strong you were to the others. You get the remote out of your pocket, point it at Samus, and press clothes swap. In an instant, Samus is walking away in your old clothes, boxing gloves hanging around her neck. She also has her hair hanging loose.

Checking yourself, you find Samus' skin tight zero suit clinging to your body. You hadn't been able to see your body clearly underneath your old clothes, but with the zero suit you could see every single curve down your body. You can feel that your hair has been done up in a ponytail, although your right eye is still covered. You look down to see Samus' rocket boots on your feet. The remote should have made it so that you could walk in them without a problem, so maybe they could help to improve your speed and recovery during battle, or even use them for mid air attacks where your punching might fail. You move about a bit, since the point of this exercise you to get something to support your breasts. Thanks to the zero suit, no matter how much you moved around, your breasts barely moved. Content with your outfit and body now, you continue to walk towards the leisure room, hips swaying with each step. You notice that since your new zero suit had no pockets, the manual had moved into your free hand. This didn't bother you too much though. You just needed to make sure no one saw it or the remote itself and asked about it.
155332222222222111111.title: Samus

1553322222222221111112.content:
When you get to the leisure room you thankfully find it deserted. You sit down on the couch and cross your legs in a feminine manner, before placing the remote on your lap and reading through the manual again. You had been reading through it rather quickly when you first found it, so now you wanted to read through it thoroughly to make sure you hadn't missed anything. While you were absorbed in reading the manual, you didn't notice one of your fellow newcomers, Wii Fit Trainer, enter the room. That is, until she spoke.

"Hey Mac."

Once you realise she was here, you quickly try to hide the manual behind your back or something. You fail to realise that it would have been a lot less suspicious if you had just continued reading as if normal. "H-hey."

She furrows her brow at this action, and walks over behind the couch, leaning her arms on the back of it. "Mac, what are you up to?"

You try to remain calm, and fail miserably. "I have no idea what you're talking about, Fit."

She reaches over the couch and picks up the remote, which was still sitting on your lap out in the open, and holds it up in front of you. "What's this then?"

Your eyes widen as she picks up the remote. You sincerely hope she didn't press any buttons when she did that, but you guess if she did she would have noticed the swap and freaked out. "Careful with that!" You take the remote out of her hand, being careful not to swap anything with her.

She gave you a serious look. "Out with it Mac. What is it?"

You sigh, knowing there's no way out of this. "It's a remote that can somehow alter reality. It can swap things like bodies and clothes and stuff, and it makes it so everyone thinks the changes are normal."

"That's crazy," she says. Clearly she doesn't believe you. "Uh, don't use it on me yet, though." Okay, maybe she believed you a little bit. "Have you used it yet?"

"Yeah, three times actually. The first time I accidentally gave my body away and the person with it ran off, so I had to use the remote a second time to get a body that was better than the one I accidentally got. And then the third time I wanted some clothes that'd help with my new body, so I just took them off someone else."

"But... you look the same as always." You are about to explain that the remote makes everyone think it's normal, but before you can she makes a face and said, "Oh, derr, you already explained that. So, is there any way to make me see the changes?"

"Not that it said in the manual. But maybe the manual didn't say everything." You look over the remote closely. There wasn't anything but a smooth surface on the back, and the buttons on the front had all been clearly explained in the manual. However, looking really closely, you saw that there saw actually a small slit in the remote below where the buttons were on the front. Trying to pick at the slit with your fingernails, you manage to remove a panel, revealing 6 coloured buttons, that aren't labeled besides their colour. You point the remote at Wii Fit Trainer and say, "One of these hidden ones should probably do it."

Fit's eyes widen as you do this. "Woah! You just found 6 more buttons that you don't even know what they do, and you want to try testing random ones on me?" But before she can object any further, you've already pressed the...
1553322222222221111112.title: Someone in the leisure room asks about the remote

15533222222222211111121.content:
Fit is about to continue trying to talk you out of pressing the buttons, when suddenly she just stops, shocked, and her jaw drops. You think it worked. Once she gets over the initial shock of going from unaware to aware, she begins to laugh, realising who it was inside the body she was looking at. "Is that really you in there, Mac?" she asks.

"Yeah, it's me." You blush a little, remembering that you were once a buff boxer, but now you had the body of a princess in a skintight suit.

"So, why do you look like Rosalina? With... Samus' clothes?" She still can't stop herself laughing.

"Well, like I said, the first swap was an accident. I was looking to swap with Link so I'd be just as strong, but I'd be a little taller, but I ended up getting a little trigger happy. Instead of ending up with Link's body, I got Toon Link's." The giggles pick up as Fit pictures your reaction to getting even shorter. "I didn't like being in Toon Link's body, so I just went to look for anyone taller than I was at the time, and Rosalina happened to be the first person I ran into. Since I wouldn't know where Toon Link would be with my body until dinner time, so I decided to see just how strong I'd be with Rosalina's body. As it turns out, because I still have my own life, I still have all the strength I had in my old body, even though I have Rosalina's now." Fit looks shocked by this, finding it hard to imagine Rosalina's body executing the incredibly strong punches you used. "The workout also got me a bit used to how it felt to be in Rosalina's body, but my... uh," you pause, realising how awkward this would be. "My breasts were a bit sore from the workout because I didn't have a bra." Fit erupted into laughter at this. You had a bit of a laugh with her too. Once the two of you calmed down, you continued your story. "So, I decided I wanted to swap clothes with one of the girls in the tournament so I had a little... uh, support, and Samus happened to be the first one I found. And that's that."

"Well," Fit says in between fits of laughter, "That certainly explains it. So, are you keeping Rosalina's body now?"

"Well, now that I know I keep my strength regardless of my body, getting my own body back isn't much of a concern anymore, and I have gotten used to Rosalina's body, so I guess I'll be keeping it until I feel like a change."

"Haha, I guess I'll have to get used to you being a girl then."

"Actually, I only look like a girl. Because I still have my own life, people should still treat me like a guy."

"Well, that's interesting." After a pause, with a silly grin on her face, no doubt due to the situation you've gotten yourself into with Rosalina's body, she asks, "So am I going to be aware to every swap you do now, or is it just these ones?"

"You..." You don't know how to answer. The coloured buttons hadn't been explained in the manual, probably because they were supposed to be a secret, so you didn't actually know how they worked. You didn't even know what the other ones did, just that the orange button had made Fit aware to your changes. "I'm not actually sure." Then an idea hits you. "I do know how we can find out though." You hold up the remote, waving it around in the air. "I could swap something with you and see if you notice."

If it was possible for Fit's face to get any paler, then that's what just happened. "Uh, I don't know about that." Her voice was a bit shakey, and her stance was very defensive. Clearly she was worried about something going wrong, like ending up in a similar predicament to you, or you not wanting to give whatever you swapped with her back.

To try and ease her worries, you toss the manual to her. "Here, you can choose what we swap if you want."

"O-okay." As she read what the remote could do, it was clear she was very interested, but at the same time worrying about how each of them would affect her. "Um, let's try a..."
15533222222222211111121.title: Orange Button (Aware)

choices: Tell Doc Louis about the Remote.
15533222222222211112.content:
You shook your head. You liked your old clothes, and you certainly didn't want to give up your punching gloves. As you headed to the leisure room, you realized that perhaps your trainer Doc could help you.

You pocket the manual and change course, heading towards the quarters where the assists and background characters lived. There were many rooms, far more than there were for the main characters, but apparently they were smaller too. Fortunately you knew which room was his so you were able to reach it pretty quickly.

You knocked on the door and took in the telltale smell of chocolate as the man whose room this was opened the door and smiled, "Hey, Little Mac! What can I help you with?"

His name was Jerome Louis, although everyone called him "Doc." Once a heavyweight boxing champion, he was now your coach, and his advice had helped you through more than one tough match. You only hoped he could help you with this problem, if indeed he even thought there was a problem in the first place. He certainly didn't seem to see anything strange with you in a female body.

You blush a little as you begin to explain, "Well... this might be a little hard to explain... but my breasts... well..."

To your surprise, Doc beamed, "Hah! You finally admit it! Come in! Come in! Rest those hands a bit. You need some time to rest that ain't on a mat." Doc Louis waved you into his room. He sat on the bed and tapped on the mattress.

You sit on Doc's bed next to him. "Admit what?" you ask.

"I keep telling you, Mac. You gotta get a bra. I know, I know, you're a guy. But chafed nipples ain't no joke, son. No shame getting the right equipment. Just glad you got your head on straight before you hurt yourself. Maybe next we'll talk about getting you to see out of both eyes."

"Uh, yeah. Thanks, Doc." You scratch the back of your head, pausing only a moment to feel the new mane of hair you now wore. "So, uh..."

Doc laughed, "Don't go asking me if I have one Little Mac, but I'll see if I can help you out. We'll have to get you a custom fit, that's for sure."

"Thanks Doc, I really owe you one," you say.

"Oh, no need to thank me," said your coach, "Just lay off the training until you get it." He stood up and arched his back. "Ugh!"

"You okay, coach?"

Doc nods, "Yeah, yeah, I'm fine. Old bones just aren't what they used to be."

You look at him. He has been your coach all this time. Maybe you could use the remote to help him out. On the one hand, you could tell him about the remote and let him use it. But you're not sure it's best to tell anyone about the remote, even your coach. Maybe it'd be better to use the remote to switch bodies with him instead. You don't expect him to be going anywhere anytime soon, so it'd be like keeping your new body safe while you went out and switched with someone else. Then you could return and switch back.
15533222222222211112.title: Keep your own clothes

You wait until Doc's back is turned before pulling the remote and pressing the "Body Swap" button. In a split-second you feel yourself considerably heavier. You look down, your hair no longer blocking both eyes, and instead of two lumps of flesh what you see is a large flabby gut bulging out of your tank top.

You hide the remote just before Doc turns around and speaks in a feminine yet still professional voice, "Like I said, we'll have to get you a custom fit. Give me a day or two and I'll find a place for you." His red shirt and blue pants had resized themselves to fit his new frame, and they did so very well. Even though he was far more slender in Rosalina's body, Doc still moved like an old pro.

"No problem. Thanks coach," you reply, surprised that you're surprised to have a masculine voice again.

Doc pats you on the back, "It's what I'm here for, Mac. Keep practicing, but remember what we talked about. You might want to try it with your top off in private until that bra comes in, okay? Maybe after that we can have another session in the gym."

You nod, "Sure thing, Doc."

Doc beams as he opens the door for you, "Then go get 'em, son, and knock them off their feet."

You leave the room, wondering what your next step would be and looking at the remote as you did so. You still wanted to keep your life and the training that came with it, but you began to wonder. Maybe your coach deserved to have a better life. Maybe a sort of retirement, you thought.

You felt strange. You stopped to do a few jabs. You were still as strong and fast as you were in Rosalina's or your original body, but you still felt fat and out of shape. Before you started meddling with life swaps you knew that the first thing you had to do was pass your body onto someone else as soon as possible so you could get Rosalina's back. So the first question was: should Doc's new body be male or female?

15533222222222222222222221.content:
You are Robin, the tactician of Chrom's army. You had heard of the Smash Bros tournament through historical texts about Marth and Ike, so you weren't too surprised when a letter arrived from the Hands. You were, however, surprised that they wanted you and Lucina to compete, rather than Chrom. Chrom wasn't mad or upset though, he was more proud of the two of you being chosen to compete in the same tournament as the Hero-King, and he ended up being able to tag along as part of your "Final Smash", some sort of ultimate attack.

You had enjoyed your time at the tournament so far. All the fights were non-life threatening, the people were pretty friendly, you had actually gotten to meet Marth and Ike, and you had been able to learn some new tactics based on the strategies used by people from other worlds. In fact, you were actually heading to the library to return some books that you had borrowed. Or at least, you would be heading there, if you hadn't noticed that someone had left a box lying in the middle of the hallway.

"Hmm? What's this? Did someone leave it here?" you wonder aloud. You put your books down for a moment to check what's inside the box. "Can't be too important if someone just left it here." Inside the box was some sort of remote control and a small booklet possibly an instruction manual of some kind. "Hm, well, it's clearly more advanced than what we have in our world."

Reading through the booklet, you find out that the remote is not, in fact, for some sort of mechanical device, but is actually for messing around with reality through something you could only describe as magic. Was swapping things like this even possible? Well, if the rumors you had heard about Henry and Sumia were true, probably. But was it still possible to swap something and make everyone in the entire universe unaware of the changes, or even accept them as normal? It seemed like such an outlandish thought, and yet here you held a remote and a manual that said it could do just that.

You had to investigate this further. But first, you pick up your books again and head towards the library, taking the remote and the manual with you. Considering how to investigate this device, you think about testing it out yourself, finding someone to swap with at the library and swapping yourself with them. If Miriel were here, she'd probably call such a test reckless or something, but what could really go wrong? At worst, it probably wouldn't do anything and you could just throw it away. Then again, you had made friends here at the tournament from worlds where technology like this, or at least technology that looked like this, was pretty commonplace. Perhaps you should get one of them to help.
15533222222222222222222221.title: Robin

You decide it would probably be better not to involve others yet, at least not until you knew this thing worked. And to know if it worked, you needed to try it out yourself. You thought it was a shame that it could only swap you and another person, rather than swapping two other people with each other, but you supposed you'd just have to cope with that and involve yourself in the swap. Who knows, it could end up being fun swapping with other people.

Upon reaching the library, you leave your books at the returns desk and look around for someone to swap with. Unfortunately, the library seemed all but deserted at this time of day, and you were only able to find two potential targets. If you had wanted to remain somewhat normal after the swap, you were out of luck; both the people you had found were women. You were hesitant to go through with this, but at the same time, you wanted to know if this thing worked. You figured you could always swap back once you knew it worked.

Potential target #1 was Rosalina, a woman who travelled through the galaxy on her "Comet Observatory", acting as a mother-figure for a race of star children called Lumas. You obviously didn't have any relation to her outside of the tournament, but the two of you had run into each other here at the library, and during newcomer training sessions, from time to time, so you weren't strangers at the very least. Her Luma companion wasn't with her at the moment, and she seemed to be looking through some story books, possibly something to read to Luma before bedtime.

The other person you had found was Lucina, the other Ylissian fighter in the tournament, and Chrom's daughter. The two of you had obviously known each other for quite a while before this tournament, so you did feel a little underhanded at the fact that you were considering swapping something with her. Then again, you needed a test, and if you felt too bad about swapping with her, you could always swap back and confess.

After all, you still didn't know if the remote would carry over to your possession after a Life Swap. For the same reason, you also leave out Clothes Swap and Head Swap, at least until you knew for certain whether the remote would stay with you. You also decide to leave out Relationship Swap, as having Lumas follow you around all the time would likely be awkward for further tests.

That just left Gender Swap and Body Swap as his main options. Gender Swap would be simple and would show immediate results as to whether or not the device actually worked, as well as providing an interesting perspective on an entire half of humanity you did not fully understand. The downside to that would be that all of your life beforehand would be fundamentally altered so that you would become female, and you didn't know if that also included things like relationships, memories, or personality. Most notably, the pair of breasts that you received were far larger than Rosalina's, large enough to even show through your normally concealing clothes.

"Well, that wasn't supposed to happen," you say, before stopping. Your voice did indeed turn into that of a woman's, but instead of the elegant, regal tone of Rosalina's, your new voice had a sultry and sensual British accent.

You looked at who you swapped with. There you were, your body wearing a black catsuit and a pair of high heels that made him sway in a manner you found slightly uncomfortable to look at.

This would be the perfect opportunity to switch back, as you've proven to yourself it works. What do you do?
1553322222222222222222222111122221.title: Yes

choices: Swap something else with Bayonetta instead
15533222222222222222222221111222211.content:
You decide that you're not quite done with the remote yet. You only needed to use it once to test whether or not it worked, but you weren't exactly about to walk out of here with someone else's body, to say nothing of the fact that you hadn't intended to swap with Bayonetta in the first place. You raised the remote again, aiming it at Bayonetta, cringing slightly at the feminine way she was making your body walk, and prepared to press the body swap button to get your own body back.

Something made you hesitate, however. Being in Bayonetta's body was odd certainly, but not uncomfortable per se. You wondered whether you really needed to swap back just this second. In fact, you wouldn't mind testing out one of the other buttons. Not to mention, your original target, Rosalina, was still in sight too, if you wanted to try swapping with her instead.
15533222222222222222222221111222211.title: Switch back... or switch something else

choices: Head over to the Trophy Pavilion
155332222222222222222222211112222111.content:
Though your desire to test out the other buttons was certainly great, you decide that maybe a room of female Smashers isn't the way to go. So you aim your remote back at Bayonetta and press the button, feeling instantly more comfortable when your own body returns to you. Well, neither body was really uncomfortable, but the fact was that Bayonetta's was far less familiar to you than your own.

You're still going to test out the remote, no doubt. But you decide to choose someplace other than the library to do so.
155332222222222222222222211112222111.title: Get your body back

1553322222222222222222222111122221111.content:
The Trophy Pavilion was actually the living quarters for pretty much every non-Smasher in the tournament. Assist Trophies, stage hazards (at least the sentient ones), and even those who simply got a promotional Trophy all resided here. A few of them helped out here and there; the Pokemon Trainer from the last tournament, Red, stuck around to take care of most of the Poke Ball Pokemon, Lissa and Princess Elincia both stuck around to help heal Smashers after each round, Anna supplied items... you even heard that two sisters came to the Hands' attention after they discovered some kind of magical exorcising camera, and they brought them on to help take pictures of the tournament. No idea why those were the ones chosen in particular, but you decided to roll with it.

Anyway, you want to try out one of the other options on the remote, and thus you decided to make your way over to the Pavilion because, unlike Smashers, there was almost always a large variety of people in this area, as not many of them had business outside of the Pavilion.

So before you go walking in, what exactly do you want to test out about the remote?
1553322222222222222222222111122221111.title: Head over to the Trophy Pavilion

choices: Swap Mode 2 (You and target are aware)
15533222222222222222222221111222211112.title: One of the Mode Buttons

155332222222222222222222211112222111121.content: You decide that you want to test out the option on the remote to make the person you're swapping with also aware. For this, you decide to find someone you know personally, whether that be someone from your same series, or someone that your roommate Shulk has introduced you to.
155332222222222222222222211112222111121.title: Swap Mode 2 (You and target are aware)

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content:
Right. So, here's the list of non-Smasher characters from Fire Emblem that show up in SSB4.

Assist Trophies: Lyn

Other: Chrom

Trophies:

FE13: Lissa, Anna, Lon'qu, Gaius, Cordelia, Owain, Inigo, Tiki, Validar

FE14: Ryoma, Xander

FE9/FE10: Black Knight, Sothe, Elincia
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Someone from Fire Emblem

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content: Now your choices are Chrom, Lissa, Anna, Lon'qu, Gaius, Cordelia, Owain, Inigo, Tiki, and Validar. You probably shouldn't choose Validar, just saying.
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Someone from FE13

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content: Lissa, Anna, Lon'qu, Gaius, Cordelia, Owain, Inigo, Tiki, and hopefully not Validar.
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content: Anna, Lon'qu, Gaius, Cordelia, Owain, Inigo, Tiki, and please don't go with Validar.
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content: Lon'qu, Gaius, Cordelia, Owain, Inigo, Tiki, and definitely not Validar, right?
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content: Gaius, Cordelia, Owain, Inigo, Tiki, and no Validar.
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content: 10/10 "Deepest Sighs" Award-winning Pegasus Knight, Owain, Inigo, Tiki, and 0/10 "Worst dad in FE13" Award-winning Validar.
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content: Boiling-blood Handman, Inigo, Tiki, and you're getting uncomfortably close to Validar.
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content: Flirty Danceman, Tiki, and I swear, if you legitimately go with Validar...
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content:
Oh, right. Tiki. That's what you're going to go with, right? She's a popular waifu, I think. Well, that's all well and good, so just pick that top option...

Please.
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.content:
Hold on! Waitwaitwaitwaitwait! I just remembered!


There was actually going to be another FE13 Trophy in the game, but it was removed due to ESRB concerns about it potentially changing the game's E+10 rating!


We can come up with some kind of in-universe reason for why her Trophy doesn't show up, probably something to do with curses. And besides, if Tiki's popular, then Tharja's a celebrity when it comes to waifus.

Just... please don't pick Validar. They hate each other.
1553322222222222222222222111122221111211.title: Wait! Tharja!

155332222222222222222222211112222112.content:
There were certainly a lot of options for things you could swap with Bayonetta. You could try and see how Gender Swap would work if you had the body of a woman but people still saw you as male. You could test out Relationship Swap and see if that did anything; Bayonetta was still a new addition to the tournament grounds, so she didn't have a lot of relationships that you could mess up yet.

Of course, you still were uneasy with the way Bayonetta made your body walk, and you saw two things you could test that likely would get her to stop doing that. You could go with the straight-up Life Swap, which would instantly solve that problem, but would make you Bayonetta instead. You could also do a simple Clothes Swap, which would solve a part of the problem, but wouldn't completely get rid of it.

What will it be?
155332222222222222222222211112222112.title: Swap something else with Bayonetta instead

15533222222222222222222221111222211222.content:
Looking at Bayonetta prancing around if your body was bad enough, you didn't need to see her in her tight, black catsuit too. With a grumble, you select the clothes swap option and hit the button. In the blink of an eye, you see your old body suddenly appear back in it's old clothes: a long black coat, white trousers and a pair of high leather boots.

You breath a sigh of relief, Bayonetta's feminine prancing not nearly as embarrassing now that she was in your clothes. Looking down, you see Bayonetta's almost ridiculously feminine and curvy body clad in her tight, black catsuit. Each black fiber gleamed in the light. You look at your feet to see the high-heeled boots with a pair of large, pink pistols fixed to the back of them.

With a smile, you realize juts how sexual Bayonetta's body was...
15533222222222222222222221111222211222.title: Clothes

choices: You make it back to your room without incident.
You bump into someone on the way there.
15533222222222222222222221111222212.content:
You raise the remote once more, intending to swap again to get your body back, but something makes you reconsider. For some reason, there was something inherently exciting about the fact that the rest of the world still saw you as the same old man you've always been, despite the clearly female body you now possessed. While it was a bit awkward to see your body acting like a woman, you didn't interact with Bayonetta all that much, so it wouldn't be much of a problem, and you weren't particularly uncomfortable in her body yourself. Ultimately, you decide to keep her body for the time being, and lower the remote again. You figure there's no real problem with it, seeing as you're the only one who can tell that anything has even changed.

With that decided, you quickly head over to the front desk of the library to return your books. You find that the differences in Bayonetta's body are much more noticeable while moving about, but you do your best not to let them distract you. You wouldn't want someone to think something was wrong, after all. With your books returned and thee remote tested, you'd done everything you needed to do here, and you decide to leave. You take one last look back at Bayonetta, who was still acting as if nothing was out of the ordinary, before turning around and exiting, leaving your body behind.

You decide to return to your room for the time being. It would allow you to put the manual of the remote away somewhere safe so you wouldn't lose it, and it would provide you with somewhere quiet to think about who to do next. Perhaps you could devise some sort of strategy using the remote that would give you the upper hand in the tournament. Or perhaps you'd just use it for fun. You had to admit you were a bit curious to see the other buttons in action now that you'd experienced a body swap first hand.
15533222222222222222222221111222212.title: Remain like this

1553322222222222222222222112.content:
While you still weren't entirely comfortable with it, you decide to opt to swap with the option you were more familiar with; Lucina. She didn't seem to have noticed you yet, so you could make the swap without her noticing you or the remote, so that was good. You decide to keep the remote set to Mode 1, though. You didn't want her freaking out, or knowing you did this without her permission.

Now it was just a question of what to swap. The first option on the remote was the body swap, which would give you Lucina's body, but you'd keep your own clothes and life. You felt that would probably be rather strange, having someone else's body, but still having people recognise you as Robin. Not to mention the oddities that would probably arise from having a body of the opposite gender. Next was the head swap, which would place your head on Lucina's body, and vice versa. As with the body swap, people would still recognise it was you, but you'd still have your own face so it seemed more logical that way to you. You could just imagine how disorienting it would be to have your head suddenly appear on a new body several feet away, though.
1553322222222222222222222112.title: Lucina

15533222222222222222222221121.content: Which option do you choose?
15533222222222222222222221121.title: Body Swap/Head Swap

155332222222222222222222211211.content:
You press the body swap button. The change occurs almost instantly, and without and lights or fanfares that would indicate anything was happening either. Instead, reality just quietly rewrote itself giving you the blue-haired, female body of Lucina, and giving her yours. You look down at yourself, strands of blue hair falling into your vision. "Well, it certainly works," you mumble, hearing Lucina's voice coming out of your throat instead of your own. Your clothes mostly hid your body, but although you couldn't really see it, you could certainly feel how different Lucina's body was compared to yours. Even ignoring the difference in gender, Lucina's body felt a lot more physically fit than yours, probably due to her relying entirely on hand-to-hand combat in a fight, while you preferred to mix swordplay and magic.

Regardless of how alien the sensations Lucina's body was giving you felt, you were pleased with the experiment being a success. You figured that since you had used the remote on Lucina to test it out, it was only fair to let her in on the secret. The two of your were friends, after all, and it would probably be more enjoyable to have someone to share the secret with. Speaking of Lucina, you noticed that she was still looking through the bookshelves, completely unaware that she now had your body. Part of you kind of wondered how in the dark the remote really kept her. Would she find it strange if you brought up the fact that she had a male body despite being a princess? If you swapped with her now, but on a different awareness setting, would she believe that her own body was foreign to her? It still felt a little wrong to be doing this to her, and you knew Chrom would disapprove if he knew about it, but the more you thought about it, the more curious you became.

You walked over to Lucina, while...
155332222222222222222222211211.title: Body Swap

155332222222222222222222212.content:
You decide to get one of your friends to help out with you. For now, you decide to leave the remote on Swap Mode 1 to ensure that his test would be simple and easy to undo. The two questions you had to deal with now were what swap to use and what friend to choose.

You could go with one of the other Smashers. Lucina was nearby, and you already knew a lot about her, so noticing differences would be very easy. Then again, you also knew a lot about your roommate Shulk in your time here, so you could just as easily do that.

However, you could also go with one of your neighbors, or someone who frequents the rooms you normally use. You know that Zelda and Palutena often liked to visit the library you were currently headed to, and that the swordsmen/women all tended to gravitate towards one place in the gym to train (that being a modified kendo dojo). Aside from that, the Smashers from Skyworld and from Hyrule were very close to you, and the Pokemon world Smashers were literally right next door to your dorm room, so you could just as easily choose one of them.
155332222222222222222222212.title: Find one of your friends to help

1553322222222222222222222121.content:
You decide to head over to the library. You were intending to go there anyway, after all.

You see the usual suspects in their place, with Zelda and Palutena reading as much as they could get their hands on. The Wii Fit Trainer was also there, checking out a book on, well, fitness. Lastly there was the Pokemon Trainer, acting as the volunteer librarian. As the number of Pokemon Smashers increased, the Pokemon Trainer decided to go on a hiatus from Smashing to take care of them all. But he also proved himself to be a very good worker, and often helped out around the tournament grounds.

So, in short, your options were Zelda, Palutena, the Wii Fit Trainer, and the Pokemon Trainer. And you, but you would rather have someone else swap first.
1553322222222222222222222121.title: Head over to the library

155332222222222222222222212122.content: You decide to swap the Pokemon Trainer with someone else in this room. Who do you choose?
155332222222222222222222212122.title: Pokemon Trainer

1553322222222222222222222121221.content: You decide to swap something between the Pokemon Trainer and the Wii Fit Trainer. Question is, what do you decide to swap?
1553322222222222222222222121221.title: His fellow trainer

15533222222222222222222221212221.content: You decide to swap something between the Pokemon Trainer and Zelda. Question is, what do you decide to swap?
15533222222222222222222221212221.title: The princess

15533222222222222222222221212222.content: You decide to swap something between the Pokemon Trainer and Palutena. Question is, what kind of swap do you decide to do?
15533222222222222222222221212222.title: The goddess

155332222222222222222222212122221.content:
You decide to go for a Body Swap. It was simple enough, and you'd be able to see the results instantly.

You take aim at the Pokemon Trainer and press the Body Swap button, then you aim at the goddess Palutena and press the button as well.

Does it work?
155332222222222222222222212122221.title: Body Swap

1553322222222222222222222121222211.content:
Instantly, reality rewrote itself to place the body of Palutena behind the desk and the body of the Pokemon Trainer next to Zelda. Just like the manual said, the remote also switched around the clothes of the two people. Pokemon Trainer's body now was encased in a white dress with an assortment of gold accessories, with his feet strapped in a pair of sandals. Likewise, Palutena's body now had a red hat and vest, black shirt, blue jeans and sneakers. After observing the two, you believe that the Body Swap also resized the clothes to fit their respective person, as both of them pulled off the outfits rather well. Even if it was a little weird to see Pokemon Trainer's body wearing a dress.

The Wii Fit Trainer walked over to the desk to check out a book, and the two trainers talked with each other like old friends. Meanwhile, both Zelda and Palutena headed off after putting all their books back on the shelves. It seems that the remote really does just swap the bodies, and nothing else.

Where do you decide to go from here?
1553322222222222222222222121222211.title: It worked perfectly

15533222222222222222222221212222112.content:
You decide to head over to the cafeteria, after returning your books. You knew that people pretty much always frequented this place, whether it be for a meal or snack, and you wanted to test out two things about this remote.

Firstly, if a "Power Swap" was possible, where using a certain option would allow, say, ROB to use Zelda's magic or Link to jump high as Mario.

Secondly, how exactly the whole "levels of femininity/masculinity" thing worked.

Strangely enough, there seemed to be the perfect groups for that in this very cafeteria. Over in one corner of the room, there was a collection of various female Smashers, including Peach, Samus, Lucina, and the two newcomers, the female Corrin and Bayonetta. He supposed that Peach wanted to get to know the new female Smashers, so she must have invited them with her.

In another corner of the room, there was a strange collection of Smashers that probably all ended up gathering there because it was the closest tables to the food. Those were Lucas, the male Corrin, Rosalina and her Lumas, and Kirby.

The first group would be good to test out that Gender Swap ability, and the second group would be good to see if a Power Swap was possible. The question is, which do you decide to test out?
15533222222222222222222221212222112.title: The cafeteria

155332222222222222222222212122221121.content:
You decide to test out the Gender Swap for now, as you felt that a lot of those Smashers only really use their powers during battles and there were none scheduled for this week.

Now, the main question was: which Smasher do you decide to focus your swaps on?
155332222222222222222222212122221121.title: Gender Swap

1553322222222222222222222121222211211.content:
You decide to focus your swaps on Lucina, for the simple reason that you knew the most about her.

First off, you look over Lucina as she is normally. If you were being completely honest, there was very little about her that was stereotypically "feminine." She had very little in the way of... ahem, "feminine traits," she somehow managed to have a negative sense of fashion, and she much preferred to fight over spending time gossiping or... actually, you didn't know that much about what the stereotypical girl liked. Honestly, no one in your army was completely stereotypical, so you sort of based your idea of the stereotypical girl off of bits and pieces of Maribelle, Sumia, and Cordelia.

Shaking off those thoughts, you lift up the remote, target Lucina, then press Gender Swap. You then decide to go with someone similar to Lucina in "femininity:" the bounty hunter Samus Aran.

Instantly, the change occurred, though as you were expecting, not much happened. All that looked to have happened was that Samus's body looked decidedly less curvy, while Lucina's body looked slightly curvier, especially in the breasts.

You supposed that, in a way, curviness could also be considered a kind of "femininity."

You switch the two back and debate on who you should swap with Lucina next.
1553322222222222222222222121222211211.title: Lucina

15533222222222222222222221212222112112.content:
The whole thing about "assets" being considered part of someone's "femininity" now struck you as interesting, so you decide to use the Gender Swap on Lucina and Bayonetta next.

Sure enough, after doing so, Lucina's body grew enough to make her breasts, butt, and hips strain against her clothes, while Bayonetta's body shrunk down to be as flat as Lucina once was. Their postures also changed slightly to accommodate for their new bodies.

At this point, you are about to change them back, but Lucina takes notice of you, and you quickly hide the remote underneath your robe before she can see it.

What does she do?
15533222222222222222222221212222112112.title: Bayonetta

choices: You aimed at the wrong person
1553322222222222222222222121222212.title: Something went wrong

15533222222222222222222221221.content:
You arrive at the gym, and instantly you take note of the usual suspects: Little Mac was whaling on a punching bag, the Wii Fit Trainer was going through some poses, Captain Falcon was trying (and failing) to impress Samus...

Aside from the melee fighters, the aforementioned kendo dojo found itself occupied by none other than Link, Marth, and Ike.

There were even a few Assist Trophies hanging around the place, mingling with some of the Smashers; Phosphora and Lucas were practicing their aim with some targets, Roy and Lyn were sparring, and Ashley was off... doing something. You weren't quite sure, but you've dealt with Tharja's hexes before, so you were pretty sure you could deal with whatever would happen if anything went wrong.

Anyway, what do you decide to do?
15533222222222222222222221221.title: Gym

155332222222222222222222212212.content:
You decide to focus on the Assist Trophies. With these guys, you could either swap traits between the Smashers they were paired up with, or you could reconsider your position and swap something with yourself.

What will it be?
155332222222222222222222212212.title: Focus on the Assist Trophies

15533222222222222222222221221211.content:
You decide to go with Lucas and Phosphora.

You weren't entirely sure how the two became friends. Heck, you think the only reason the two even met is because the Earthbound fighters' room was located right next to the room that housed the Assist Trophies (and other people, like Viridi). But for some reason, the two really took a shine to each other. Somehow.

Anecdote aside, what do you decide to swap between the two?
15533222222222222222222221221211.title: Lucas and Phosphora

1553322222222222222222222122121111.content:
You point the remote at Lucas, press the Body Swap button, then point it at Phosphora and press the button again.

Instantly, the two appeared to switch their clothing, though resized to fit their new bodies. Lucas's body now wore Phosphora's blue scarf, boots, and white top and shorts (though with Lucas's height, they now looked more like a single outfit that just got a strip of fabric ripped out from the middle), while Phosphora's body now had on Lucas's red-and-yellow striped shirt, blue pants, and red and yellow sneakers.

What really cemented this as a body swap and not a simple clothes swap (plus position change) was the fact that the people kept on firing off their own projectiles, even after the swap. Phosphora, even in Lucas's body, kept firing her lightning, while Lucas in Phosphora's body kept on using PK Fire and PK Freeze.

The two stopped, turned to each other (Lucas looking down this time instead of up), smiled, then proceeded to let out a combined attack, where Lucas used PK Thunder and Phosphora bolstered its power and speed with her own lightning. The resulting blast struck all the targets in one go.

The two stood in awe for a moment before laughing and high-fiving each other. Phosphora even floated up to ruffle Lucas's hair.

You smiled, now knowing for certain that the Body Swap really didn't change anything except the bodies.
1553322222222222222222222122121111.title: Body Swap

1553322222222222222222222122122.content:
To reiterate, the Assist Trophies in the room are Phosphora (with Lucas), Lyn (with Roy), and Ashley (doing whatever).

Who will it be?
1553322222222222222222222122122.title: Swap yourself

155332222222222222222222212212221.content:
You rethink the idea of starting with someone else when you spy Lyndis, or "Lyn" as she usually went by, sparring with Roy, who apparently was her son in some Outrealms. The legends really did obscure who exactly ended up with who in the Elibean saga, but given how close Eliwood, Lyn, and Hector seemed to be, you could totally see how she could've ended up with either.

But that's beside the point. The reason you had changed your mind when it came to Lyn is because she was a legendary swordswoman in your homeworld. Even in basic training manuals, her style and method of swordplay described in the Elibean saga has had major influence over all regions of your world, from Ylisse to Plegia to especially Chon'sin.

As such, you were immensely curious what it was like to be such an esteemed swordmaster. With that in mind, you decide to swap yourself with Lyn using...
155332222222222222222222212212221.title: Lyn

choices: You can always get your cloak back. Sword skills!
Just the body's fine for now. The cloak is too important.
1553322222222222222222222122122211.content:
You select the Body Swap option on the remote, then point it at the swordmaster and fire.

Instantly, you feel a multitude of differences throughout your body. You felt your hair, now in a ponytail, against your back, and you can see from the few strands of hair close to your eyes that it is indeed now green. Your cloak still felt loose and comfortable, like usual, but now you felt two protrusions on your chest that pushed on the fabric slightly. You also felt a lot more fit; you weren't exactly in the worst shape, thanks to Frederick's horrible training routines, but you felt a lot lighter on your feet and a lot more powerful in your arms and legs.

You could just stay like this for a bit. You did want to know what it felt like to be Lyn, after all, and this could absolutely be enough for you for now. But you also remember that the manual mentioned a Clothes Swap could give you the proper skills to wear or use whatever equipment came with it, specifically mentioning sword skills as something that could carry over.

Then again, you did really like your cloak.
1553322222222222222222222122122211.title: Body Swap

choices: Go by the Assist Trophy(/Side Character) room
Go back to your room and practice
15533222222222222222222221221222111.content:
You decide that a chance to obtain the skills of one of your world's most legendary swordswomen is too good of a chance to pass up, so you swap once more with Lyn, this time using the Clothes Swap.

Instantly, you find yourself ensconced in much tighter clothing than you were used to. Lyn's Sacaean clothing, like much of her tribe's works, was simple yet masterful; a dress with a slit on both sides of the leg for complete freedom of movement, a sash around the waist, a pair of brown boots, and, of course, a belt to hold her famous weapon (well, second most famous weapon), the Mani Katti.

You look over at Roy again, and it looks as though he's fighting you. A blast of Elthunder comes from Lyn's new tome, and you can tell that, at the very least, skill transfer worked for her.

You look down at the sword by your side, and suddenly your mind fills with hundreds of different tactical uses for said sword, all of them in a style that you knew did not exist in your home world (and home time, you supposed).

What do you do from here?
15533222222222222222222221221222111.title: You can always get your cloak back. Sword skills!

choices: Search for an Assist Trophy/Side Character
Well, they probably don't care about Lucas, so why should they care about you?
155332222222222222222222212212221111.content:
This swap with Lyn has piqued your interest in the other denizens of the Smash tournament; the Assist Trophies, the people that changed stuff in some of the stages, even a few of the people who just came on to get their own promotional Trophy, but decided to stick around and help out.

With that in mind, you decide to head on over to the Assist Trophy building. That is, until a certain thought crossed your mind.

You had never actually been in the Assist Trophy building before, and you didn't know if Smashers were even allowed in the building. Plus, some of the Assist Trophies might be a bit resentful that they didn't get in as a Smasher, so they might not even allow him in.

That's when an idea struck you. If you found an Assist Trophy or a background character, you could Life Swap with them to make it so that you were an Assist Trophy. Then, you could Relationship Swap to retain your original friendships with Lucina, Chrom, Shulk, etc.
155332222222222222222222212212221111.title: Go by the Assist Trophy(/Side Character) room

1553322222222222222222222122122211111.title: Search for an Assist Trophy/Side Character

15533222222222222222222221221222111112.content: What kind of Trophy Character
15533222222222222222222221221222111112.title: A Trophy Character

155332222222222222222222212212221111122.content:
Okay, that narrows it down immensely.

When it comes to female Trophy Characters that only appear as trophies and nowhere else, there's a very short list of characters.

The Mario world has just Daisy and Pauline.

The Legend of Zelda world has Saria, Impa, Malon, and Fi.

Pokemon has just Serena from X and Y, F-Zero just has Jody Summer, and Star Fox just has Krystal.

Fire Emblem has Lissa, Anna, Cordelia, adult Tiki, and Elincia.

Xenoblade Chronicles has Fiora, Sharla, and Melia.

Sonic has Amy, Cream, Blaze, and Rouge.

Finally, Mega Man has Roll and Bayonetta has Jeanne.

So, pretty short list. Which series is this Trophy Character from?
